By: phrooglefa
So how are these youngins going to grow:

Pregnancy: PLEASE NOTE: THERES A FEW RULES ABOUT THIS

-As the first rule says, the children can ONLY become pregnant through NON-SEXUAL means (ex. Cream from Sonic the Hedgehog touching a chaos emerald or a pill being swallowed which, on its own, causes the pregnancy)

-MPreg (male pregnancy) is allowed


Inflation: kids getting bigger by blowing up with air, water, etc


Weight Gain/Stuffing: kids getting bigger through good old fashion food


Eating others (Vore): PLEASE NOTE: THERE ARE A FEW RULES ABOUT THIS:

- As the first rule says, No UB, CV, or Descriptive AV

- The CHILD IS THE PRED!!! Like it says before, Adults/Teens can be preds along side the children but AT LEAST HALF of the chapter should be about the kids being the preds. Prey can be any age though

- The main character can not get eaten

-Stuffing/Weight Gain can happen in vore section as well but it should LEAD TO VORE


A Combo: Two or more of the above mixed together (ex, inflation and WG)
1.title: How are those youngins going to grow?

11.content:
By: phrooglefa
How about these kids:

Synthia: Shes an 11 year old with long black hair and green eyes. Shes a bit on the shy side and doesnt have a whole lot of friends. Shes currently about 3 months pregnant after accident with a new machine her mother was working on

Sabrina: She's a 7 year old fox cub with short purple hair and pink fur covering her body outside of her 6 month pregnant belly which has a nice white patch on it. She's fairly outgoing although not so much since she has become a mommy to be
11.title: Pregnancy

choices: Did't want to be late for the doctor's check up
Was pretty hungry and wanted breakfast
111.content:
By: phrooglefa
Synthia slowly opened her eyes. It was early morning and the sun had only risen a little while ago. The beams of light hitting her face were all that was need to wake up the little one. She sighed and slowly lifted the covers off her body, ready to begin the day.

The first thing she was met with was the large tummy that pushed against her pink pajamas. She slowly rubbed the large dome with one hand. She began to remember how, 3 months ago, she was walking down into her basement and seen the new device her mother was working. It was a gun shaped object that looked like something out of a science fiction movie. She wasnt too taken a back by this though. Her mother was a scientist and was usually working on strange new devices.

She picked up the device and looked over, shrugged, and placed it back on the table it was resting on. However, as she did so a beam shot out and hit her square in the stomach. After a few moments of tingling pain, Synthia stumbled over and passed out. When she woke up, her mother told her the bad news: the gun was meant to implant an embryo inside woman who couldnt have children and that it had implanted her with a baby to be.

Synthia sighed as she rubbed the belly. At first little changed for her, but soon her tummy began to expand outward more and more each day. Sure a normal 3 month belly wasnt quite so large, but Synthia wasnt quite the normal mother to be.

Soon the child could hear her mother calling her breakfast. She slowly sat up and knew she should hurry down. She
111.title: Synthia

1111.content:
By: bartfargo

Once, Synthia had known Dr. Willis primarily as the mother of her best friend, Haylie. She knew the woman was a baby doctor, but had no knowledge of what that meant. That was all different now.

Mom had chosen Dr. Willis for one reason: she had a private clinic in the basement of her home. Mom was determined to protect Synthia from curiosity-seekers, so much so as to home-school her herself rather than risk Synthia being tormented by bullies or poked and prodded by teachers and classmates. With Dr. Willis, Mom and Synthia could enter the house's back door and use the same back entrance the doctor used. The other patients didn't suspect that the first patient of the day was so underage.

"Hello, Synthia," the doctor said. "My, that's a pretty dress you're wearing today."

Synthia thanked her, just to be polite. She hated dresses, but she no longer fit into her slacks or jeans.

"Is there anything you're wondering about?"

"Well, my chest is itchy and sore, and it feels a little swollen."

"Well, Synthia, having a baby affects more than just the belly. I suspect that's just your body getting ready to make milk, to feed the baby when it's born."

She had Synthia raise her dress so it covered her chest, but left her belly bare. It was so large now that it completely covered her upper thighs and hid that area. Then she wheeled over a big machine.

"This," said Dr. Willis, "is a sonogram. It's going to look inside you and show us a picture of what's inside."

Dr. Willis rubbed some cold, clear gel on Synthia's belly, then touched a plastic device to the mound and turned on the machine. It made whoosh-whoosh noises as the doctor moved it around.

"There we go," the doctor said, and Synthia got her first look at...
1111.title: Did't want to be late for the doctor's ...

11111.content:
By: bartfargo

"This is the head," Dr. Willis explained, pointing at the image on the monitor, "and here is the arm."

She pointed to something rapidly pumping in the chest. "Here's the baby's heart."

Synthia took this all in, looking back and forth from the monitor to her belly.

"Would you like to know if it's a boy or girl? Some mommies like to know that in advance, so they know whether to buy blue or pink, but some like to be surprised."

Synthia thought for a couple of minutes, then said, "It doesn't matter. It's my baby; I'll love it no matter what it is."

"I must say, Synthia, that is a very mature way to look at it."

"She's been very thoughtful about this," Mom said. "When we realized that the ray had worked on her, I told her that she didn't have to have the baby if she didn't want to. She thought about it for two days and said that she wanted to have it."

"Has she been eating right, taking care of herself?"

"Yes. I bought her some books on pregnancy, and they're practically all she reads."

"She's a wonderful patient, and seems like she has the makings of a wonderful mother."

"Yes, she does."

"She's in the room," inserted Synthia.

Sheesh, if her getting pregnant didn't cure adults of that habit, what would?


Dr. Willis gave her some pictures from the sonogram, and Synthia and Mom went off to...
11111.title: Her baby

111111.content:
By: bartfargo

"We need to get you some more clothes," Mom said. "You've already outgrown some of your big clothes, and you're only going to get bigger."

Synthia sighed, staring at the sonogram pictures. More dresses.

As they pulled into a parking space, Mom said, "Better let me put those pictures in my purse. They'll be safe in there."

In the store, Mom picked out a few more dresses, and even a nightgown. "Your pajamas must be getting a bit tight by now."

Out of the corner of her eye, Synthia spotted something that caught her interest. She walked over to get a closer look, with Mom following.

Overalls. Bib overalls. And it looked like they might fit her in the months ahead.

"Honey, those are for boys."

"Please, Mom? They're almost like regular pants, and Dr. Willis could examine me easier with these on."

Mom couldn't argue with that logic, and added several overalls to her cart.

The cashier rang up the sale, and they left the store. Then, Synthia needed a bathroom break.

When she was done, she went to the sink to wash her hands. She was soon joined by a woman with a huge belly. Synthia thought hers was big, but it was nothing compared to this.

She had to ask: "Are you going to have a baby?"

The woman smiled. "Yep. Just six weeks away," she said, rubbing her belly. "Would you like to feel it?"

Synthia hesitated. She knew she was uncomfortable with anything touching her belly. But the woman just smiled and nodded. Tentatively, she raised her hand. The woman took it and placed it on her belly.

It was warm and firm, much like Synthia's own was now. Then... thump. Synthia's eyes got as big as dinner plates as she realized, It just kicked.

Just then, Mom came in, probably concerned with why Synthia was taking so long. "I'm sorry," she said to the woman, "is my daughter bothering you?"

"No bother," said the woman. "She's just at that age. She's a charming girl. I'm sure she'll be a wonderful mommy herself some day."

They thanked her and left the ladies' room. Synthia wondered what the woman would say if she knew how soon "some day" would be. Then they went home.
111111.title: The mall

1111111.content:
By: bartfargo

The house where Synthia and her mom lived was fairly big, with four bedrooms. Mom and Dad had bought it, with plans to have more children, but they divorced last year.

As the car approached the house, Synthia noticed somebody else's car in the driveway. She thought it looked familiar, but couldn't say for sure, until they pulled up, and she saw the man waiting by the door. "Dad!"

Mom said, "Doug? I thought you'd be in Europe for another month."

"I finished ahead of schedule," Dad replied, hugging his daughter. "I decided to drop by the school, to see Synthia, but they told me you'd pulled her out. Why?"

"I left a message, with your secretary, for you to call me. Didn't she give it to you?"

"Ugh, I never check my messages, Helen."

"We'll discuss it inside. Come on."

Inside, all three sat on the couch, Synthia sitting between her parents. If she'd been younger when they broke up, she might have made them sit together, in the vain hope that they'd get back together.

"Now," said Dad, "why isn't Synthia in school? I mean, she looks a little on the heavy side, but that's no reason to take her out."

Mom opened her mouth, like she wanted to answer, but seemed unable to conjure the words.

Finally, Synthia spoke up. "I'm gonna have a baby."

Dad looked at her, baffled by the response, then turned to Mom.

"It's true," she said. Mom told him the whole story, from her making the raygun to that morning. She dug into her purse and showed Dad the sonogram.

Dad was silent for minutes that passed like hours.
1111111.title: A surprise at home

11111111.content:
By: bartfargo

"Helen," Dad said, "I really think I should give you some financial assistance, at the very least."

"That's sweet, Doug, but I -"

"I love and admire your persistence," he replied, "but I really think it's misplaced here. You've had to take a sabbatical from your research to homeschool Synthia. How long do you really think you can provide for three people with no income?"

Mom was indeed persistent, but she could often be swayed by a well-reasoned argument. "All right, Doug."

Dad looked around the house. "Is there anything else I can do for you? Problems around the house, maybe?"

"Well, some of the pipes act up occasionally."

"Okay. I'll bring my tools tomorrow."


"Your dad's really back here?"

Haylie was the only person Synthia's age who knew about the pregnancy. It only made sense to include her; she was Dr. Willis' daughter, and she might get curious as to why her best friend kept dropping by the house, and why she was getting bigger. Haylie used her standing as an excuse to drop by anytime she had the opportunity, and the two girls could talk about what was going on in their lives.

"He's just visiting," Synthia said. "He's giving us some extra money to help with the baby, and he's doing some repairs around the house. That's all."

"Yeah, but wouldn't it be wild if it turned out you getting pregnant wound up bringing your parents -"

"Don't say that! Don't even think that!" Synthia had gotten burned that way. Right up until the divorce papers were signed, she had been telling everybody that her parents would soon patch things up. She wasn't about to jinx things with predictions again.
11111111.title: Dad offers to help

111111111.content:
By: bartfargo

As usual, the first thing Sinthia was conscious of in the morning was her belly. It looked like a basketball now, on her tiny frame.

"Good morning, baby," she said, rubbing her belly. Soon after came the now-familiar sensation of movement within.

It took her by surprise two weeks ago, when it first started. All the pregnancy books said it shouldn't be so soon. But, Dr. Willis explained that she felt it early because she was so small compared to other mothers-to-be.

Sinthia rarely left the house anymore, only when she had to see Dr. Willis. Now, she was big enough that her condition was obvious. Anyone who saw her would know that she was pregnant. Only her childish face hinted that her pregnancy was not a normal one.
111111111.title: Second trimester

1111111111.content:
By: bartfargo

A knock came on the door. "Sinthia?" Mom asked. "Are you up?"

"Just a minute," Sinthia replied. She arranged the sheets to protect her modesty, then raised her nightgown just high enough to uncover her belly. "Okay."

Mom entered, carrying a tube of cream. She sat on the edge of the bed and began rubbing the cream onto Sinthia's belly. Mom said the cream was supposed to help fight stretch marks caused by the growing baby.

When she was done, Mom said, "There we go," and kissed the top of Sinthia's belly. "You can get dressed, now, honey," she said as she left the room.

"That was your grandma," Sinthia said to her belly. "Just before she left, she kissed my belly. She did that because she can't get in to kiss you. She loves you very much," she said, rubbing her belly, "almost as much as I do."

Synthia wiped a tear from her eyes as she and her mother drove off from the adoption center. Synthia chose to keep one child, and named him Martin. She was sad, yet the happiest she had ever been in her life. She had a baby, and that's all that mattered. Dr. Willis even saw to it that nobody knew that Synthia was the mother. When they got home, they all continued their normal lives.

ONE YEAR LATER........

"MARTIN! WHERE ARE YOU? IT'S TIME FOR YOUR BATH", Synthia called to her four year old son. Martin hated baths, and always hid when it was time for him to go into the dreaded porcelain tub. This time, he had found the perfect hiding place: The basement. Martin looked around at all the gadgets his grandmother had invented. But one in particular caught his eye: What looked like an old, rusted over, Buck-Rodger's style raygun. Martin hefted the heavy load and played with a few dials and switches. He continued to carry it around for a few minutes, then slipped in an oil puddle, sending the laser gun clattering to the ground, firing right into Martin's belly! Martin then felt his belly begin to grow as his mother came rushing into the room with a horrified expression on her face.

He gave the boy belly a soothing rub before he struggled to get. He almost fell back again as he still wasnt used to having his pregnant tummy be his center of gravity for him. He gave the large dome a loving pat and hurried downstairs with a pronounced waddle.

After what seemed like an eternity, he soon entered the kitchen. The father to be grinned as he looked at the table. Set out for him was a nice big plate full of waffles, bacon, eggs, and sausages. There was enough to feed at least 3 cubs his age. However, Kwasi was a hungry little boy and was more than willing to eat it all down.

And thats just what he did. He tore into the food like he had never eaten before. The plate slowly disappeared in a steady stream into his hungry maw. He only paused to get a drink or pour more syrup on his massive feast.

All too soon, Kwasi was done his meal. He leaned back in his chair, causing his stuffed pregger tummy to push out even more. He looked down at happily, hoping the meal he just had was enough to hold him.

His thoughts were interrupted by a near by voice.

Up for seconds? Asked

It was only made worse by his grumbly, pregnant, cub tummy. He didn't want to move about, he just wanted to sit on his plush, gravid, butt and eat. However, he knew his sister needed help and wasn't going to let her down.

Steve, on the other hand, was able to control his desire to feast a bit better than his pregnant friend. He spoke the truth about knowing how to prepare food and worked with nearly expert precision, much to Erikka's shock and delight. The otter child with child was able to help her pull off the massive meal far faster than she expected.

"Wow Steve! You did a really great job." She told the pregnant otter cub as she began to bring the food to the table.

"Thanks. My mom taught me how to make lots of different dinners and stuff." He replied as he helped carry everything out.

"Well it looks you might have to give Kwasi some lessons." The teen lioness joked.

Her younger brother just "hmphed" a little and was about to reply to his sister's tease when everyone heard the front door open. It looked like his mother was finally here with Maya who was probably going to want to join in with the feasting. Especially given the fact that she was, even without her newly pregnant tummy, a very chubby child.

"H-hello..." Kwasi stammered out at the plump cheetah.

The cub instantly had a crush on this girl. He did have a few, small, puppy love crushes on other girls before. However, the 9 year old had never felt anything like this. Maybe it was just his pregnancy making him a bit "moody", but he really took a liking to Maya. Perhaps stranger yet, the boy seemed oddly attracted to her chubby form. He didn't know why, but he really though she looked cute with so many extra pounds on her frame.

"Hello Maya, I'm Steve." Steve said happily, trying to be nice to the girl.

It didn't seem that this boy had any special feelings for Maya, but still wanted to be nice to his new friend.

"Welcome to our house Maya. I hope you have a fun time with us." Erikka said, clearly thrilled to have another big belly in the home.

Karai, Kwasi's mother, smiled as she saw the kids taking to this girl so quickly. She was a bit concerned about having a third pregnant child in her house. However, this display did make her feel a bit better.

"Thanks....It's nice to have some place to go where I don't have to hide my....well...you know..." Maya replied, blushing from her predicament.

It was a warm and sunny day in the town of Springfield. There wasn't a cloud in the sky and things were quite peaceful. Well, as peaceful as they got in Springfield anyway.

Marge was at home washing the dishes from breakfast. Homer was at work and Bart and Lisa were off at school. The only one there to keep her company was Maggie and she was currently napping after her breakfast.

The blue-haired mother had just finished up with the dishes and looked around to see what else she needed to do. She quickly noticed the mail had arrived and decided to go see what had come in today.

After a quick jaunt to the mail box, she returned with the stack of mail. It was mostly bills, junk mail and a few threatening letters from the various bill collects Homer had, inevitably, not paid. Yes, once again the Simpson family was struggling financially and could really use some more money.

"What's This?" Marge asked herself as she saw a brightly colored pamphlet in the stack of mail.

It was offering quite a considerable sum of money if there was anyone in the house ready to become a surrogate mother. Of course, Marge didn't seem to notice how young the girl on the pamphlet actual was, especially given her bulging middle.

Marge...

Amy could see that Maggie was starting to get tired. She didn't blame the round bellied baby. After all, Maggie had a pretty big day that would have tried out most little girls her age. It was probably made worse on someone carrying so many babies.

"I think it's time for you to go to bed Maggie." Amy told the sleepy baby as she got up and began to get things ready for the pregnant child.

She decided to keep an eye on Maggie. After all, she was responsible for the child's welfare. However, that was as far as the scientist's professionalism went. While Amy could have easily monitored Maggie with a video camera from another room, she had other plans in mind.

Amy couldn't help smile as she slowly moved her cot into Maggie's room. She quickly set it up and made a nice little barrier around the bed with blankets. She was just glad that the cot that had been provided for her by the lab was big enough for this to work.

"There. Now are you ready for us to go to bed?" Amy happily asked Maggie.

The pregnant baby could only smile sleepily and yawn at the woman caring for her. She happily lifted her arms towards Amy, wanting to be lifted into bed. Of course, this would be quite the lift for the scrawny caretaker.

1141211211111221111112211.content:
addition by: phrooglefa (38)

Since that night when Amy had fallen asleep, still in her lab clothes, next to Maggie's barely pajama-clad tummy, Almost another week had gone by.

In that time a lot had changed. First off, Amy continued to bring young Maggie to be with her as she slept. However she didn't bothered to put Maggie in her pajamas anymore. It was too much work for her to do, especially with the heavy lifting the pregnant baby presented her. So, she just left Maggie in her normal clothes as she slept next to her, Amy herself neglecting to change out of her lab clothes each night as well.

However, these weren't the biggest changes that Maggie had gone through in the past week. No, Amy clearly see the biggest change as she happily watching her young charge.

"My how you've grown Maggie." She said to the pregnant child before her.

Maggie was now almost twice the size of what she had been even just a week ago. Her stomach spilled far past her knees now and had made her diaper virtually disappear, at least when she was viewed from the front. Her top was now nothing more than a belly shirt that kept her chest covered completely, but not much else. Her big, round, tummy spilled out freely for all the world to see and was a sight the two scientists liked looking at quite a bit.

The was one last change though and Maggie was showing it now as she reached up like her life depended on it, nearly ready to cry. No, it was not to be picked up. It was so she could get the massive bottle Amy was holding. Since growing so large, the baby-filled baby's appetite had skyrocketed. It seemed that all she wanted to do from sun up to sun set was stuff herself with anything she could fit into her mouth.

"Okay, Maggie. Here you go..." Amy said as she put the bottle next to her mouth.

114121121111122111111221111.content:
addition by: phrooglefa (38)

It had taken all day for Maggie to properly give birth to her massive brood of babies. It was a good thing that Laura and Amy had knocked her out with the gas. Such an ordeal would have been horrible for an adult and there was no telling how a young baby would react to it. So, Maggie just laid there and slept as her tummy slowly started to deflate.

Of course the scientists were working like mad to make sure everything went alright. Fortunately, Maggie's body seemed to be holding up well, despite the large number of babies that came from her. In fact, their young, pregnant, charge even held a little smile as she slept.

However, this wasn't their only problem. They now had nearly 50 or so hungry, crying, newborns to contend with along with Maggie.

"What are we going to do?" Laura asked Amy in desperation the last child was placed in a waiting bassinet.

Amy didn't reply to her. Not only because she was moving the, now mostly deflated, Maggie from the operating table into a crib, but also because she was horrible exhausted herself.

Shelly was born different, one of the rare cases of fetus-in-fetu in which she was born with her twin sister Ellen inside her womb. The medical community decided that it was safer to leave Ellen inside Shelly and keep a close check on their health.
Shelly was always noticeably rotund, but eventually (or occasionally) Ellen would have a growth spurt.

She grinned her shirt sliding up as it couldn't hold her stomach anymore. She ran her hands over the bump happily. Now she really looked like a mom. And it was starting to feel heavy too. Rosie reached out and patted the bump lightly.
"You're getting to be a real club member now." She giggled before going over to her bag and bringing it over to the other girls. "I found some nice big clothes for us too. 'Cause nothing fits Emily anymore." She said with a shrug. "I thought we could divide it all up so we all have some clothes because we're getting really big now." Emily nodded her agreement and started dividing the clothing between them.
"Right. These were my last shorts..." Lily muttered trying to close her shorts only to find that there was a good inch between with her bump in the way. Emily finished dividing the clothes and they each took their share. She hefted herself to her feet rubbing her belly.
"I have to get home. I wasn't even supposed to come here." She giggled before waddling off towards home. Lily watched her go wondering when she would start to waddle as well.

11533222212121.content:
With a cock-a-doodle-doo from the rooster, Alice yawned, wishing she could sleep more, but alas, work on the farm waits for no one. She tried to sit up in her bed, which she struggled with, thanks to her swollen belly poking out from under her pajamas.

About three weeks ago, Alice and her younger sister Becky were each impregnated with a puppy. Sylvester, the family's Labrador, had passed away at age 14. He had been having trouble coping with both herding the livestock and game hunting for supper. So the parents decided they needed a dog for each task; Alice was carrying a rough collie for herding, while Becky was carrying a Beagle for hunting. Now, they just had to wait for six more weeks before they were due.

Alice stood in front of a mirror, amazed at the progress she was making. "We're almost there, Daisy," she said encouragingly to her soon-to-be-puppy while patting her swollen midsection. Both their puppies were confirmed to be female, and both girls instantly thought of names for the puppies; Alice named her rough collie Daisy, while Becky named her Beagle Venus. Alice could smell breakfast cooking downstairs, causing her belly to suddenly growl, meaning it was time to feed her puppy.

Alice waddled downstairs, where her mother Tina was cooking breakfast, and wearing an apron over her pregnant belly, heavy with a foal. Since both sisters were carrying puppies, their mother decided to add more to the farm as well. She had been impregnated with a horse just three days after her daughters were with their puppies. The foal was confirmed to be a mare, but Tina hadn't picked out a name yet.

Becky was already sitting at the table, affectionately rubbing her barely-covered pregnant tummy.

"How's Venus doing this morning?" asked Alice, taking her seat next to her sister. "Very hungry," Becky replied, rubbing her belly before it growled loudly, causing her to blush. Before Alice could react, her belly suddenly gave an even louder rumble, causing her to blush as well.

"I guess both our babies are hungry," chuckled Becky.

She felt her belly press against her hands, swelling up until she couldn't see her feet. Before long her torso was assuming a spherical shape, with her arms and legs swelling as well. Tina squealed with anticipation as she felt herself grow lighter, rising on her tiptoes. Unable to wait any longer, she gave a little push against the floor with her feet the best she could and rose into the air, floating towards the ceiling.

Her mother, meanwhile, remained blissfully unaware of her daughter's inflation, too engrossed in her magazine to notice. She was pleased, at least, that Tina was enjoying whatever it was she was doing. Then she noticed a strange sound, like soda bubbles. And it was getting louder by the second. Finally, she looked up from her magazine. "Tina, what are--"

The magazine fell from her hands as she stared at her daughter in shock. Her little girl had inflated like a balloon and was floating in the air before her. "Isn't this great, mommy?" she said as she started to brush against the ceiling.

"O-of course, dear..." her mother said with a strange smile. Then, without another word, she slumped back against her chair in a dead faint.

When she came to, Tina's mother saw her daughter standing before her, looking perfectly normal, albeit concerned. "Are you all right, mommy?" she said worriedly.

"Yes, dear..." she replied, rubbing her temple. "I just had the strangest dream that you had blown up like a balloon and were flying through the air..." she rubbed her dry throat. "Tina, could you bring Mommy a drink?"

1241.title: The simpsons

12411.content:
It was your standard Saturday in the Simpson household, except for the fact that nobody was home. Well, all except the eldest child and only son, Bart. There was nothing to do, and he was absolutely bored out of his mind, he needed SOMETHING to do.
"Aw man, this blows!" Bart complained. Trying to find a cure to his boredom, he tried seeing if there was anything on TV, and just his luck, a new episode of Itchy & Scrtchy was on! This episode, Itchy gave Scratchy a can of soda, only for it to fizz up inside of him and blowing him up like a balloon, only for him to pop into gore. To Bart, this was hilarious, but it also gave him an idea on what to do today.
"Say, I wonder if it's possible to do that in real life?" Bart questioned. Looking into the fridge, there was quite a bit of soda (likely from Homer), perfect for what Bart wanted to do.
"Alright, let's do this..." he said as he cracked open a cold one. He gulped the fizzy drink fairly quickly, letting out a belch once he finished. He continued on, until all 6 12 packs of soda were in his, now bloated, belly. Bart chuckled at how full he felt, rubbing the bulging dome that jutted out from his middle. It wasn't too big, but it made Bart smile.
"Now onto step two..." Bart said, and he started to violently shake his stomach. After a good ten seconds of shaking, he stopped and felt the deep rumbling within him.
"Oh man, here we go!" Bart said as he started to expand.
12411.title: Bart Simspon

124111.content:
Bart's belly quickly surged out, reaching basketball sizes within seconds.
"Whoa mama!" Bart exclaimed. The skin on his stomach started to go tighter, as it grew to be as large as a yoga ball. Unable to support the weight of his girth, Bart lay down on his tummy. He started rubbing his face into his belly, which was nearly eclipsing him in size! He was really enjoying this, he never realised how fun blowing up like a balloon could be. Finally, the growth ended. Bart looked at himself. He had to be able to fit himself inside of his midsection. Suddenly, he felt a bulge make its way up his throat. However, instead of burping out the gas he had, he kept it inside of his cheeks, bloating them up to the size of softballs. All of this was euphoric for the young Simpson, as he continued to rub his titanic tummy. But soon enough, he started wondering what to do next...

By: phrooglefa

Tommy was rolled into the room, quite literally too. There was just no other way for the baby to be moved. He was far too wide to walk, or even waddle, on his own anymore.

The doctor didn't even bother trying to get the inflated baby boy onto the examining bed, he knew no one there was going to be able to lift him. He just began the examination without much change in his face. Strangely enough, this wasn't the first time he had seen this.

However, his demeanor did change as he finished examining Tommy. Most of this had been prodding and listening to his large inflated belly, something young Tommy had seemed to enjoy. The look on the doctor's face was one that didn't match the child's enthusiasm.

"Well Mrs. Pickles. We do have a cure for cases just like this." He began.

"However, your son is just too large for it to work I'm afraid. But don't worry, the effects are only temporary." He continued, offering the poor mother a bit of hope.

Tommy only took mild interest in what the doctor was saying. He was having too much fun exploring his newly rounded body. To him this was quite fun. He liked being this big and loved how light this inflation made him feel. He did his best to reach his pudgy baby fingers over his way too small shirt and feel his exposed little boy belly.

The doctor added,

"In fact, Tommy should be back to his normal size in..."

1252.title: Other characters

12521.content:
Alexis was spending the day with her mother at her company’s headquarters. Her mother’s focus on her career meant Alexis acted mature for her age, and as of late her mother tried to spend more time with her. Alexis didn’t mind though because she got to skip school and indulge her interests. Alexis has a fascination with balloons and since her mother owns one of the premier party supplies franchises and is on the cutting edge of balloons and latex manufacturing, Alexis loved visiting her mom’s place of work.

Her mom was busy at a meeting so Alexis wandered around the building, eventually finding the research and development wing of the facility. Looking through the experiments going on she found several intriguing one involving balloons.

The types of experiments were.
12521.title: Alexis

125212.content:
She raced over to a gigantic balloon easily three times her size laying on the ground in a glass room. “Whoa, it’s so big.” She marveled as she looked at the giant balloon. “Hey, Loona, what’s this.” Alexis asked to the empty room, when from a nearby speaker came a reply. “It is a failed project which was supposed to create unpoppable self-inflating balloons.” Said the AI program, it overseers all of the facility and can be used as a digital assistant by the families of important personnel such as Alexis and her mom, who have the programmed installed in their homes.

“Self-Inflating?” Alexis questioned as she peered at the immense balloon, she noticed it hissed slightly and swelled bigger. “Hey, It grew!” Alexis cried to Loona. “Of course, the balloon has been growing overtime, it once had a circumference of eight inches fully inflated.” Alexis was stunned to learn that the balloon had once been so small seeing it now. “Wait why is it so big, I thought you said it was a failed experiment, it looks like it worked to me.” Alexis asked with a skeptical glare.

“The experiment utilizes nano-bots that when exposed to the surface of an object will work their way inside and find an appropriate place to start producing air, such as inside a tied balloon. Overtime the air fills the object and as it gets larger the nano-bots maintain the objects structure allowing it to potentially inflate endlessly.” Loona explained to Alexis who just looked at the balloon again in awe, processing all the information she was just given. “However, the rate of inflation was too slow, as the nano-bots collect oxygen and maintain the object’s structure, that and the balloon’s lack of buoyancy made it deemed a failure, not to mention the potential problems of the object’s potentially limitless inflation, the potential problems and a lack of customer interest ended the support of the project, the test balloon is being observed to see if there is a limit to the nano-bots inflation.” Loona explained further, Alexis stared intensely as she contemplated the balloon. “What happens if it pops or the balloon isn’t tied?” Alexis asked in curiosity. “Nothing, the nano-bots must enter a sealed environment to properly start the inflation, but if possible, they can repair damages and resume producing helium, the safety of their container is prioritized.” After Loona’s explanation, Alexis glared in annoyance.

“Failure, that’s stupid, looks fine to me, so what if it doesn’t float, and lack of customer interest, I’m interested I’d love a giant balloon that blows up on its own.” Alexis started looking around the area for something, and she quickly found it a very small vial of the inflation nano-bots. “Is this the stuff?” Alexis asked Loona. “Correct, however it is advised not to remove experimental products from the facility, and your mother will not be pleased to learn of your actions.” Alexis rolled her eyes as she defiantly snatched up one of the vials. “Yeah yeah, I know, that is why we won’t tell mom about any of what I doing right Loona, code flate297.” Alexis said with a smirk triggering the AI’s secrecy protocol. “Yes, Alexis.”

Always prepared for a little fun with balloons, Alexis pulled out a balloon from her shirt pocket and tied it up. She was about to open the nano-bots when she heard someone approaching. She decided to hide the items where.
125212.title: Inflation Nanites.

choices: They head home and neither her or her mother notice anything strange.
They head home and her mother doesn’t notice anything strange, but she does.
They head home and she doesn’t notice anything strange but her mom does.
They head home and both of them notice something strange.
1252122.content:
She quickly took the tiny vial and balloon and dropped them into the collar of her buttoned-down shirt which was tucked into her skirt. They landed safely over her stomach as a worker at the facility turned the corner right as Alexis hid her ill-gotten prize. She waved goodbye as she ran past the person doing her best to cover the objects hidden in her shirt.

Wanting a place that was a little more private, she headed for the nearest restroom. She hesitated at the restroom door and looked around see if anyone was around. Before she could react the door unexpectedly swung open. There was a little shattering sound the door slammed into Alexis’s front. “Oww!” She screeched rubbing her face in pain, the tech that was exiting the restroom apologized nervously. “Oh god, I’m sorry Alexis I didn’t know you were coming in.” The tech fawn over her, but Alexis was quick to shoo her away. “I don’t need your help you klutz watch where you’re going.” As Alexis shuffled toward the restroom in pain, she noticed the crinkling of glass and felt some pain in her stomach. “You won’t tell your mom about this, right?” The tech asked nervously, Alexis just nodded distractedly and darted into the restroom.

She opened her shirt as the tiny shards of glass and the balloon fell out onto the floor. She looked at the balloon in dismay, noticing that there were tiny cuts on it from the shards. “Darn it.” She cried, but then she noticed the cuts miraculously reseal. “Whoa!” she said entranced as she watched the balloon heal itself and hiss to life becoming very slightly inflated. If she was paying attention she would have noticed as the tiny cuts on her belly miraculously healed as well.

“It worked, that is so cool but is that it?” She asked noticing how little it had actually inflated. “Sheesh, that is slow but I guess it will get big eventually.” She said dismissively as she stowed the balloon in her backpack and started buttoning up her shirt again. She fixed her self up and strode out of the restroom a smug smile on her face as she thought of her new super-science balloon. Once again failing to notice as her skirt grew tighter.

She goes to find her mother eager to take her new toy home.
1252122.title: Down in her shirt. “Belly”

choices: Oh my gosh, I’m a balloon. D:
Oh my gosh, I’m a balloon.
12521222.content:
Come on Alexis, her mother called as she headed out the meeting room. Alexis followed close behind worried about the occasional hiss from the balloon, it was very quiet but in silence you could hear it faintly. Luckily for Alexis the headquarters was anything but quiet, she started to relax but for some reason every time she heard the balloon hiss soon after it would feel like her skirt was shrinking. She rubbed her stomach feeling very bloated as her mother lead her outside. Once in the car and while her mother was finishing up, she peeked inside her backpack to check on her balloon. It was actually inflated now, still very small only slightly bigger than a golf ball, but round and full. She tucked it away when her mother returned and they started driving home. “Hey mom can we listen to some tunes.” She asked, hoping the radio would obscure any hissing that might come from her backpack.

She leaned over and hugged her backpack feeling the balloon inside. She felt a smug sense of satisfaction that her plan worked and she had cleverly stolen a new toy from her mom’s work place. As they drove home, Alexis started to notice how tight her skirt felt. She rested her hand above the hem of her skirt cradling her stomach. As she did, she could feel how bloated she was, her tummy stuck out a few inches over the hem of her skirt like she been pigging out. She was just about to wonder why, when she felt the balloon inflate some more inside her backpack. Right as she noticed that her attention was drawn back to her stomach as it too swelled larger. The flimsy button on her skirt popped off as she looked to develop a little pot belly. For a moment she was too stunned to move, but eventually she worked up the courage to touch her round middle. She poked, prodded, and squeezed her belly and as she did it would just pop back out, it was full and round just like a balloon.

When they arrived home, Alexis rushed inside doing her best to hide her growth, once inside her room she dropped her backpack on the floor and fished the balloon from inside. As she observed the balloon curiously, she took it over to her mirror and compared it to her inflated belly. The sizes were nearly identical, it appeared as if Alexis had swallowed a balloon the same size, her stomach was round and full making her look pregnant. Her buttoned-down shirt was stretched tight, gaps between the buttons showed a glimpse of her deep belly button. She sat her balloon down on her dresser and turned to the Loona console installed in her room.

Her mother being the CEO had the Loona Life system installed in their home, having inter-comms, security cameras, and various state of the art tech integrated into the whole house. “Hey Loona, I think those nanites might be doing something to me, could you check it out discreetly, code flate297.” The console sprung to life and answered. “Yes, Alexis, scanning the room.” The screen flashed as it analyzed the contents of the room and after a few moments replied. “The signal of the nanites are coming from two points, one is the balloon and the other is you Alexis, it appears that the nanites have entered your body and have found a viable place to activate in a layer of adipose tissue centered around your midriff, this situation requires medical action, but because of your requested discretion I am unable to contact emergency services.” “They’re where?” Alexis asked as she glanced down, she had no idea what some of those words meant. “Too put it simply, they are turning your fat into a balloon.” “MY FAT!” Alexis said with a disgusted cringe, it was at this moment that the balloon started to inflate again. Alexis was momentarily distracted by this until the same happened to her, the buttons on her shirt popped off as her stomach swelled larger.

In the mirror Alexis saw her round belly looking like she had swallowed a play ball. As she looked at her belly, she could only think of one thing.

Oh my gosh, I’m a balloon. She gasped excitedly, her hands hesitantly reaching down to caress he swollen belly. Even the slightest touch was made more intense as the skin on her stomach was stretched taut. As she continued to fondle her belly her cheeks flushed from how good it felt. “Even if it is fat, it feels great.” Alexis moaned, having fun playing with her balloon belly, squishing and groping it. “Is this what being a balloon is like, if I had known it was so awesome, I’d have begged mom to make me a balloon years ago.

She strode over to the balloon on her dresser and picked it up with a mocking pout. “Well, well my little friend you’re not so special anymore are you.” She said lowering the balloon to her belly as if to show it off. “Look I’m just like you now, but that doesn’t mean I don’t need you.” She said rubbing the balloon against her stomach. She pranced around the room fawning over her balloon until she collapsed on her bed ready to sleep. She slipped into her nightgown which was stretched tight around her middle, and crawled into her bed. “Good night.” She told her balloon as she tucked it into bed next to her and she retired for the night. In the middle of the night a gentle hiss broke the silence in the room, as the balloon and Alexis’s belly swelled slightly bigger.

It started like any other friday morning for Jenny, she woke up with a smile on her face. Went downstairs and had waffles for breakfast with a glass of apple juice. But just as she entered the bathroom to brush her teeth her nose began to twitch.

“ah..ah...ahhh..ACHOOO*pwomf*.” Jenny said as she sneezed.

The instant that Jenny sneezed her body began to inflate like a balloon. In mere seconds Jenny’s body had turned spherical leaving her hands and feet as stubs with her head unable to see under the round mass that was her body. Though her pajamas were unaffected

“MOM.” Jenny called out.

“Coming sweetie.” Jenny’s mom replied.

Within a minute Jenny’s mom appeared who bared a striking resemblance to her daughter and she looked at Jenny the same way a mother would if their child made a mistake.

“I thought I showed you the trick to prevent sneezing.” Jenny’s mom sighed. “You know sneezing causes you to inflate quicker Jenny.”

“Sorry mom.” Jenny said with a bit of sadness in her tone. “Can you brush my teeth and help get dressed please?”

“Of course sweetie.” Jenny’s mom replied.

Then Jenny’s mom helped her spherical daughter brush her teeth and then rolled Jenny back to her room to get dressed. She picked out Jenny’s favorite outfit which was a green and white striped t-shirt and with matching shorts. Luckily for Jenny every piece of her clothing was custom made for her with a special kind of rubber, so when does Jenny does inflate her clothes will stretch out along with her rather than tear apart. In fact their entire house was designed to accommodate both Jenny and her mother’s unique condition.

Once Jenny was dressed her mother rolled her daughter down the hallway until they reached a certain door. Jenny’s mom opened the door to the room which was...

13111112.content:
By: phrooglefa

Suzie continued to stuff her face with everything she could get her chubby little hands on. Yes, despite all she had already eaten, the tubby 7 year old still wanted more food inside her bloated belly. Fortunately, thanks to the fact that her shirt buttons had popped off around the stomach region, her big, young, tummy was free to expand out without any hindrance.

Her mother watched in delight as her, not so little, little girl wolfed down the food she had provided her. She loved fattening up Suzie and was so glad her daughter liked having a big belly too. Even now, the woman could see the creamy-white dome spilling out further and further into Suzie's lap. Her belly was almost at her knees and she was still cleaning up the last of the treats: a large plate of homemade, extra-fattening, Twinkies.

It was at this time though that Suzie paused in her eating. Her eyes went wide as she heard her chair creek in an ominous fashion before the poor, overburdened, seat broke under her. The fat little girl was barely able to grab the last 2 Twinkies before she was sent to the ground, her chubby frame bouncing and sloshing as she went.

Her mother gasped at this sight, not wanting her plump young daughter to be hurt. Fortunately, it didn't look like Suzie had been injured by the fall. She had more than enough blubber on her frame to protect her. Even now, Suzie's mother was relieve to see her child still stuffing the last Twinkies into her mouth as she sat there looking up at her.
13111112.title: The chair beneath Suzie was about to break

131111121.content:
"Oh my goodness, are you alright, my chubby little girl?" Her mother asked with a playful tone.
"Of course Mommie", Suzie said, as she chewed and swallowed. "My fat keeps me safe. I think those Twinkies already made my tummy fatter, what do you think Mommie?"
"Let me feel it, I'll know if they're working". Mommie reached down to pull her blubberball off the floor and into her lap.
"Pull up your sh- oh, that's right, all your buttons are gone!" Said Mommie, as she tickled her daughter's mound of kiddie fat. "Haha, that tickles!" Suzie said as she squirmed around. Her mother then started to rhythmically rub and squish her child's belly.
"Oh yeah, you're definitely fatter already. My recipe will make you the fattest little girl in your school!"
"But I'm already fatter than everyone else! Even the boys".
"How do you know you're fatter than the boys?"
"I just know I am. All the other boys and girls are so skinny, there's just no way they're bigger. No way at all".
"Alright darling. But just in case, we'll have to make sure you stay that way. Do you want more of my Twinkies? I have plenty more.
"Please!"
"Alright, I'll get the rest of them, and bring them-"

Mommie looked at the clock, and saw that it was time to take her daughter to the bus stop. So, she grabbed the dozen or so remaining Twinkies and drove her daughter the 2 blocks to the bus stop. It wasn't sure long walk, and it was a warm day as well, but, why should Suzie waste the calories on walking? She'd never get them back, after all.

Suzie's bus rolled up a minute after she got to the corner, and she waddled out of the car to the special-needs lift on the side of the bus, since the stairs were long since too much effort.

"Good morning Mr busdriver! Are you ready for the weekend?"
"For the hundredth time, my name is Stan, kid"
"I know, I just like 'mr busdriver' more". Suzie said, still Kong her tongue out.
"Yeah, I know it's justhgrmblegrumble..." Stan trailed off, knowing he wasn't going to get anywhere arguing with her. He softly pressed the gas pedal, and the bus moved onwards towards the school.

It was odd; every week, Stan thought his bus got worse and worse gas mileage, as if weight was pilling on and slowing it down.

I'm probably just losing my mind after all these years, Stan said to himself. It's probably nothing.

The supportive mother dashed for her daughter's bedroom and retrieved the largest sweater she could find. She could've made her little angel go get it, but that put her at risk of losing calories. Even 3 calories were worth it to save if they were going straight to Suzie's big lovable kid belly. Sabrina returned to the table and placed the long sleeve top on one of the seats. She then walked over to Suzie as she played with her vast expanse of thick flab and wrapped her skinny arms around her massive circumference.

"Alright, Suzie baby...just need you to stand up so Mommy can dress you." The lithe woman then pulled up, failing miserably in lifting her enormously heavy daughter. In fact, all she had done by squeezing on Suzie's overfed girth was upset the sloshing, gurgling digestion taking place inside the greedy, bloated girl.

"BBRRROOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPP!!! Heehee~" Suzie giggled at how deep and masculine her burp sounded for her age; especially as a girl. Just to have some fun with her mother, she intentionally kept her humongous denim covered rear planted heavily in her seat as Sabrina exhaustedly continued to lift her fat daughter; having to suffer burp after burp the more she pulled on Suzie's sensitive tummy to lift her. Eventually...

Sabrina wasn't quite as thrilled. Of course, she loved her plump, bloated, young daughter and did enjoy the feel of her flab just as much as Suzie enjoyed having her tummy played with. However, the Sabrina was quite a slim woman and it took a LOT of effort for her to lift the overweight 7 year old. She was already sweating and panting as she tried desperately to get her fat child ready for school.

"Oh, Suzie. You're getting just SOOOO fat! I can't even lift you up!" Sabrina said in a mix of happiness, frustration and exhaustion.

Suzie giggled and playfully replied to her overworked mother,

"Mommy, do you think I'm getting TOO fat?" she asked, slapping her big tummy and giggling.

It was then both girls heard the creak in the chair. All this excitement, and more importantly, all the weight this fat little girl had put on caused the chair to give way, sending Suzie down to the ground. Worse yet, since Sabrina had her arms so wrapped around her child's middle as much as she could, she fell along with her.

Fortunately, neither Suzie or Sabrina were hurt. Sabrina was too far away from the chair and Suzie...well she had more than enough blubber to protect her from feeling anything too bad from the fall.

"I'd have to say yes, Suzie." Her mother teased as she helped her daughter back up and presented her the bigger sweater.

Suzie sat up in bed, stretching and yawning in the bright light that streamed in through her blinds. It was shaping up to be a beautiful day already, Suzie could see, a nearly cloudless blue sky, bright colors, and beautiful birdsong emanating from the trees. Most importantly, she could see she had gotten bigger once again.

Her pyjama top only covered her chest now, unable to even begin to contain her big, round belly. Her arms had plumpened up, too, Suzie noticed, as her sleeves were literally bursting at the seams. As she shifted her legs slightly, she could hear and feel a few more small pops. Her legs, too, Suzie soon saw, were bursting out of her pyjama bottoms, the material tight against her thickening thighs and squeezing her rounded rump. Her bare belly sat in her lap, round and soft and... Empty!

A loud growling sound shook Suzie, starting in her belly and spreading throughout her body. This rather excited Suzie, as it meant it was time to start stuffing herself. She smiled widely, thinking of how big her belly was gonna be very soon.

Suzie raced downstairs, waddling as fast as she could, pyjamas creaking from the strain of her jiggling body, but holding on. Suzie couldn't wait to eat herself out of her pyjamas, and slid into the kitchen, stopping at the sight of the table.

It was covered with a feast just as massive, if not more so, than supper had been last night, but consisting completely of snack foods. Suzie's eyes widened and her mouth fell open as she took in the sight and smell of the feast. Hearing footsteps behind her, Suzie turned, and her eyes got even wider. Miracle of all miracles, here was Katrina, out of bed and functional at 8:30 in the morning. Ss was dressed in her pyjamas, still, a light blue button-up top and elastic bottoms decorated with, ironically, ice cream cones, and clutching a book.

"Mornin', squirt," Katrina said, walking past Suzie and sitting down at the table.

"Um... good morning..." Suzie said after a moment, still shocked to see Katrina so awake and so... calm. Suzie took her place at the breakfast table next to Katrina just as Sabrina came into the kitchen.

"Oh, there you are, girls!" Sabrina said, smiling happily. I heard you get up, and I figured you'd follow your noses..!"

"I followed my tummy, Mommy," Suzie said happily, eyeing the food.

"Sabrina laughed.”I'll bet you did!" In a more serious tone, she said "Katrina, do you remember what we talked about?"

Katrina looked as if she was trying not to smile. "Yeah, Mom, I remember."

Suzie didn't know what they were talking about, but with all this food waiting for her, she didn't much care. "Can I start eating now, Mommy?" she pleaded.

"Go ahead and eat as much as you can," Sabrina smiled, a strange twinkle in her eyes.

Suzie squealed with joy and grabbed a Twinkie...

Only to have it snatched out of her hand a second later.

Suzie, startled and confused, looked around. Who could have done that? Katrina was still sitting at the table, looking totally bored and reading her book. Sabrina was on the other side of the table, standing at the counter and sipping some coffee.

A slight frown creasing her brow, Suzie picked up another Twinkie...

...Only to have it disappear again! Suzie looked over at her mother and sister again, but both were right where they had been before. Besides, they surely couldn't have moved that fast... right?

Suzie picked up a Twinkie, looked around warily, and brought it towards her mouth...

There! A blur of movement and the Twinkie was gone again. Suzie snapped her head around and looked at Katrina. She appeared to still be reading her book, but was that the slightest bulge in her cheeks...?

Glaring suspiciously at her sister, Suzie purposefully raised two more Twinkies towards her mouth...

This time she saw it better: Katrina's hands, moving so fast they were but a blur, shot out, grabbed the Twinkies, and stuffed them into her mouth, then caught her book before it fell. Suzie merely gaped open-mouthed, as Katrina quickly swallowed the Twinkies. Then she looked over, right at Suzie, and licked her lips.

"Mmm... delicious..." she taunted.

Suzie was confused and outraged, but anger won out as she tried shoving more Twinkies into her mouth as fast as she could. But no matter how fast she was, Katrina was always faster, snatching away each and every Twinkie and eating them herself, all the while maintaining the same, slightly bored, slightly amused expression on her face.

Suzie's eyes teared up with hot, angry tears. She glared angrily at Katrina, who seemed not to notice. Sabrina had since left the room, so there was no one Suzie could turn to for help.

Instead, she turned back to the food, knowing there was no way Katrina could keep this up forever. But Katrina, if anything, sped up, snatching food before Suzie even got her hands on it, no matter what or where it was. Suzie's stomach was growling angrily, demanding to be fed, and Suzie wanted so desperately to comply, but she just couldn't.

Pausing to catch her breath, Suzie looked down at her belly. Was it just her, or...? No! It was true! Horribly, unbelievably true! Suzie was beginning to lose weight, her stomach already smaller, her pyjamas no longer splitting at the seams. Without food, she was getting skinnier... less cute!

Suzie looked over at Katrina. Katrina’s belly was slightly rounded, outlined against her pyjama tops, undoubtedly filled with all the food she’d stolen from Suzie. Katrina didn’t seem to mind, or even notice, simply reading her book and biding her time, waiting for Suzie.

Suzie, desperate to restore her cuteness and add to it, tried to subtly and slowly sneak a plate of Nutty Bars over to her. But in only a few seconds, they were once again gone, Katrina’s belly pushing out a little more.

Katrina closed her book and set it aside. She looked over at Suzie, smiling a small, smug smile. “Well? Aren’t you gonna eat, Suzie? I thought you loved this stuff.”

Suzie was outraged beyond words at this. How could Katrina DO this to her? How could she just sit there and act like nothing happened? How could she be so heartless?

“No? Okay, I’ll guess I’ll help myself then,” Katrina chuckled, after failing to get a response from Suzie. She turned to the feast, and with the speed of a tornado, started cramming things into her mouth, chewing and swallowing with no discernible pause between the two.

Suzie watched, aching with sadness and jealousy, as Katrina’s body softened, fattened, and her own body wasted away, shedding every last one of her hard-earned extra pounds, transferring them to Katrina. Every time Suzie tried to reach for something, hoping Katrina wouldn’t notice, it disappeared into Katrina’s mouth, adding to her growing figure.

Katrina’s cheeks were round with both food and fat, her face softer despite its feverish exercise. Katrina’s arms, too, were softening, splitting the seams of her sleeves as Suzie’s had done not long ago. Katrina’s thighs were thickening, spreading to cover more of the chair she sat on, beginning to tear through the legs of her pyjama bottoms. Her hips were curving out, stretching out the elastic of her bottoms, and her butt, too, was growing rounder, pressing against the seat. Katrina’s chest was growing too.

But by far the most noticeable change, the one that Suzie envied the most, was Katrina’s belly. It had grown round and globular, bursting off several buttons from her pyjama top, resting heavily and softly in her lap, obscuring her shorts in front. Thick love handles rolled out on her sides, pushed up by the ever-tighter elastic below.

Katrina didn’t seem to notice, didn’t seem to care. She simply ate like there was no tomorrow, her figure growing and growing. When she finally ran out of food, her belly was resting in her lap, halfway to her knees. Pale arm and leg flesh peeked out from various split seams. Her pyjamas were in even worse condition than Suzie’s, but still holding on tenaciously. She belched loudly, and her body shook and jiggled.

Sabrina walked in just then, smiling ear-to-ear. “How’s my favorite daughter?” she said warmly, opening her arms for a hug as she looked towards the girls.

“Mommy!” Suzie sobbed, getting up to hug her mother.

However, Sabrina walked right past her and went to Katrina, who had struggled to her feet. The two embraced, and Suzie could see parts of her sister’s wide body even around her mother. Suzie could see Sabrina lovingly squeeze one of Katrina’s love handles, as if sizing her up. The two broke apart, but not before Katrina smiled and winked smugly at Suzie over their mother’s shoulder.

“Ooh, you’re so cute!” Sabrina said joyfully, admiring Katrina’s body at arm’s length.

Katrina placed a hand on either side of her bloated belly and rubbed it a bit, smiling. “Thanks, Mom! It’s a shame about Suzie though, eh?”

“Yes, such a shame,” Sabrina said, disappointedly looking at Suzie. “That attitude of hers… I just don’t know where she gets it…”

“What attitude?” Suzie heard herself say, “It’s a FACT that fat is NOT cute! All the magazines say so!”

‘Oh no! NO! What am I saying?’ Suzie thought desperately, unable to believe what had just come out of her mouth.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211.title: A nightmare with a silver lining

choices: Katrina would be happier if she was fatter
13112121121111211221211111212122112111.content:
By: metroidbob

“Katrina’s eyes teared up, and her face turned red. She turned and waddled into the living room, where a loud THUMP soon indicated that she had thrown herself onto the couch.

Sabrina tsked, looking sternly at Suzie. “Now look what you’ve done, Suzie. You’ve gone and upset Katrina… I’ll be taking those magazines from you later. If you can’t be nice to Katrina, then maybe you don’t deserve them.” Sabrina walked into the living room, presumably to comfort Katrina.

“You can’t argue with the EXPERTS, Mom!” Suzie heard herself shout before she knew what she was saying.

‘No, no! This is all wrong!’ Suzie thought, panicking. ‘I’M supposed to be the cute one! I’M supposed to be the one who knows fat is cute! Katrina’s the mean one, not me!’

But Suzie was no longer completely in control of her own body. She felt herself stomp to her room and slam the door. There were fashion magazines in a box under the bed, and Suzie took them out and started to look through them. There were articles about weight loss, pictures of thin models, clothes for thin girls, and not a fat-positive message in sight.

To her horror, Suzie could feel these messages trying to creep into her brain, to poison her opinions, to change her outlook on beauty. She fought it with all her mental might, trying to remember how good it felt to be fat, to eat, to stuff, how nice belly rubs were, the joy of bursting through her clothes…

A sudden knock at the door interrupted Suzie’s thoughts. She shoved the magazines back into the box and the box back under her bed. “Come in,” she said, jumping up onto the bed.

Sabrina opened the door and walked in, sitting down next to Suzie with a sigh. “I’ve had a talk with Katrina,” she said, “and she’s willing to forgive you, which is very nice of her, considering. So, I won’t take your magazines if you can go out there and apologize to your sister and mean it. Okay?”

The nightmare-concocted part of Suzie wanted to do anything but that, but Suzie took back control. “Okay, Mom, I can do that,” she said, getting up to leave the room.

“Thank you, dear,” Sabrina said. “I know Katrina will appreciate it.”

Every step was a struggle against herself as Suzie made her way down the hallway. The dream-turned-nightmare didn’t want her to have control. It wanted to show her dark things, frightening things. It wanted to make her cry. But Suzie would not let it, holding the feeling of joy at being stuffed in her mind like a torch against the dark.

Suzie made it to the living room, where she could see Katrina sitting on the couch, spooning chocolate ice cream into her mouth right from the container, another few ice-cream containers next to her, empty, by the looks of it. There were tear-tracks staining her face, and she sniffled occasionally.

Suzie walked up to her, noticing Katrina looked a bit plumper than before. Sitting down on the couch next to her sister, Suzie said quietly “I’m sorry, Katrina… I shouldn’t have said those things… You- you’re cute…”

Katrina didn’t say anything for a moment or two as she finished the last bit of ice cream, her belly softening slightly. “Then she said “Thank you, Suzie. I forgive you. I know how it is, growing up… It’s tough.”

The two sat in relieved silence for a while, Katrina eating her way through another gallon of ice-cream. Sabrina watched, satisfied, from around the corner and smiled, glad the two had reconciled.

Just as Suzie was wondering what to do next, Karina said quietly “Suzie… would you- like to touch my belly?” Katrina was hoping that maybe if Suzie had a positive, first-hand experience with fat, she wouldn’t be so harsh to judge.

Everything the nightmare stood for screamed out, pushing Suzie to say no, to insult Katrina again, but Suzie struggled against it, remembering all the good points of being fat, all the good points of others being fat.

With effort, Suzie raised her hands and put them on Katrina’s belly. As she did, the dream dissolved in a golden light.

“Thank you…” Katrina whispered, just before Suzie woke up.
***
Suzie sat bolt upright in bed, gasping for air. Bright light streamed in through the blinds and birdsong could be heard, sweet music of the morning.

Suzie expected the dream to fade into mist, but she found she could remember just about everything. She didn’t know how long this would last, so she sat and thought on it for a while. Eventually, she came to this conclusion:

Katrina would be happier if she was fatter!

Tuut..... tuut... Click! Hell this is Lilly from little gainers. can i help you?"

The head of the group Lilly. She was younger then Sabrina expected. She thought it would be a fat older lady in her forty's with with marks of some pregnancies but this seemed to be a young woman in late twenties, early thirties. She was't really fat but just a bit chubby. A fat girl about three years old hold tight her leg.

"Oh you must be Sabrina. So glad to see you. What a beautiful kids you have. Especially that red head. She'll be perfect for our group."

"Well i first had some questions. There are some things i..."

"Of course i understand. You're a bit concerned and don't really know all about this. That's normal. More people have that. Please come to my office."

The office was nice. There was a big fire burning in the fire place. The walls were full with books. There was a big desk and some chairs. some were very wide. There were even two chairs for babies that were perfect for Bella.

"Take a seat." She placed a plate of cookies on her desk "Feel free to take some."

Suzie fast grabbed a cookie. Bella tried to take one but could't reach it. Sabrina gave her a cookie and turned too Lilly.
The fat girl was in a chair next to Lilly sucking on her thumb.

"Well i heard that every member need to place a picture of their family does that include their whole family?"

"Yes. Mother, father, son's, daughter's, pets and other relatives that live in the same house. Why do you ask?"

"Well you see I have four daughters. Suzie and Bella here are pretty... fat but the other two are... "

"Oh i heard this many times. Obsessed with being thin right. Is that it?"

"Well the oldest is. The other wants to gain but has just such a small appetite. She can't eat enough too gain. So i was wondering if i should put them on the picture since the group is for gainers... "

"I would like it if you put them also on the picture. Some families put their skinny ones out the picture what i think is the wrong way. Just like you don't think they are good enough for the family."

"I was just wondering... maybe you just wanted the fat members of the family... see me and my husband are't... "

"I'm also not fat myself and i'm the head of the group. It's all right. And you can alway take the one who wants to gain. Maybe someone knows a way for her to gain."

"That would be great. How about the other. I think she will try to ruin the meeting."

"Then better leave her home."

"What do you also do at these meetings?"

"We also talk about how much and were our kids gain and ways to gain and fat positive things. The kids can also play with each other. We have a lot of toys and books for them them too play with when they're not eating."

It all seemed perfect. But still. When Sabrina was a teenager she once became member of a club for popular girls. She need to do lot of things before she became member but there was catch. She soon found out the girls just used her like their servant. It took her some time before she was able to get out the club and since then she was careful with becoming a member of something.

"Well can i have some proof time."

"Of course you can. Many people before you wanted proof time. However every one of them soon became a full member but anyway proof time is fine. But please send a picture of your family soon and some information so we know who is who. Maybe Suzie wants too play with my daughter."

Sabrina looked at the three year old and Lilly started to laugh.

"Oh no not her. My other daughter. This is Tilly She's just three. I also have a son johnny. He's nine and also hates fat and always is gone on our meetings. But Yoli is about Suzie's age. Maybe they can play and you can help prepare the meeting and ask more questions."

Sabrina nodded with a smile.
Lilly yelled: "Yoli!"

Soon a fat girl appeared. Her long hair was as white if snow and her blue eyes where very light. Bowl, pink cheeks with a nice smile. She had some rolls of fat on her arms and her thighs were rubbing. She also had rolls of fat around her legs and a big belly that was hanging. She was about just as fat as Suzie.

"Yoli this girl thinks about becoming a member so be nice too her lead her around and play with her. All right. The others will come soon."

Yoli stuck out her under lip and blew some of her blond hair out her face and smiled friendly.

Sure. Come on."

She quickly noticed two things as she did so. She noticed how happy Lilly looked as she grabbed the cookies. Sorry, but I gotta fill my big tummy. But dont worry, therell be LOTSA food when the meeting starts. She said as she stuck out her big tummy at Suzie, it slightly brushing against her own pudgy belly.

Suzie grinned at this, just knowing these two were really going to hit it off, before she left with her new playmate, Bella and Tilly following behind them to go play with some blockswell their play was really more to stack two or three before stopping completely to shovel in cookies, sharing with their younger sisters.

Some boys and girls were fat all over like her, some boys and girls held their weight just in their bellies, and they ranged from just slightly chubby to far more obese than Suzie or Yoli.

Suzie couldnt help but grin at this assortment. She could see many potential friends in the girls and boys. She also had to admit to herself though, a number of the boys did look very handsome and maybe even could be more than friends with her.

The parents kept talking happily about their kids gaining, making friends, having fun, and anything else they wanted to share with one another. Susan was pretty happy about this part of the meeting too. Since having children, she hadnt had much time just to sit and talk with friends and such. Subsequently, the number of friends in her sphere had diminished over the years.

However, here she was able to sit back and talk freely with other mothers who seemed quite nice. Not only that, but she wasnt made fun of or chastised in anyway for having fat children or her liking her kids this size. Most mothers she had met had almost immediately delved into the My goodness your child is so big speech and would not hesitate to politely bring up how the plumper of her children should be on some sort diet and exercise regiment. Here she could smile and tell the parents happily how she liked her daughters fat and how big they were getting. She really liked this club.

Suzie and the others just kept up their chatting and gorging, more the latter than the former. Most kids went back for a good 3-4 plates of food plus dessert. Some of the older and fatter kids went back maybe 1-2 more but by this time most were fairly full and not much food was left. All the food in a bowl with a red dot are very fattening. The ones with a green dot not, and the ones with a blue dot between."

Cindy was't sure what she was going to do but could't say no and lifted her shirt. She rubbed and felt Cindy's tummy and smiled at her.

"I see you started gaining. you made a good start. But don't get to confident. In this resort you're still a skinny twig. But don't worry. We're here to change that. Listen to me, Do what I say, eat food from the bowl with red dots and when you leave we will sure see some changes. Important is that you also do what I tell you at home. There you need to make your own food. But if you make fattening food and do what I teach you, next time when you will be here, you'll be a fatty!"

Cindy smiled and felt very happy and would do her best to learn everything and follow every advice.

1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.content:
"...a large, extra fattening dinner?" said Sabrina excitedly.

Cindy curiously walked towards the table, and what she saw nearly made her faint. A feast fit for two people around Jo and Jessie's sizes, food that was basically puddled in grease and butter. Just the sight of it made her pudgy belly roar in anticipation, eager to get all of that food stuffed inside of it. An even louder roar followed suit, which Cindy almost immediately deduced came from Suzie's belly; sure enough, Suzie waddled towards the dining table, holding her ever-roaring tummy in her hands.

"I saw this spread when I got back with my DVD," she explained, sounding super hungry, "but Mom told me to wait until you got back, as she feared I would eat it all before you returned. It was to celebrate the official beginning of you becoming a fat girl."

Cindy felt both honored and guilty, pleased that her mother put together an entire spread to celebrate her becoming fat, but also guilty for having her much fatter sister wait for so long. "I'm sorry, Suzie. I didn't know about this dinner. I was showing Maurice what I found."

"It's fine," Suzie replied, "I didn't know at first, either. Can we please just eat? Anymore waiting, and my tummy will start shrinking." Sabrina nodded. "Go right ahead. Your father and I already had our fill, so I expect the three of you to clear all food off this table. I'll go get Bella so she can eat with you."

Cindy quickly took her seat at the table, with her belly grumbling even louder than before. As soon as she sat down, she grabbed the first plate of food that she could get her hands on. Then she immediately began devouring the plate's contents, as if she hadn't eaten in months. Suzie followed suit and was practically inhaling the food. Cindy knew that Suzie would be able to eat much more than her, but Cindy was still determined to eat more than her tummy would allow, if it meant getting fatter.

Sabrina walked out of the bedroom with Bella and put her in a high chair, which the baby just barely fit into. She handed Bella a plate of mashed potatoes, and the tubby toddler immediately began wolfing them down. Sabrina was amazed by the show her trio of fat daughters was putting on for her. Suzie was the fastest eater, finishing off plate after plate, but Cindy wasn't too far behind.
