Both swallow their pills at the same time.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.content:
An hour later, Cindy slowly walked to the bathroom and cleaned herself, admiring her newly swollen belly in the mirror. "That was a great feast, wasn't it, girl?" she said to her tummy as she rubbed and patted it.

"BURP!" she belched, followed by her tummy gurgling as it continued digesting the huge meal resting inside of it. Cindy then put on her pajamas, which to her surprise, didn't completely cover her bigger belly, only showing a slight sliver of it. Cindy grinned, pleased at the excellent progress she was making. At this rate, she would completely outgrow her shirt before this vacation was over. Cindy walked out of the bathroom and bumped into Sabrina.

"Sorry, mom," Cindy said. Sabrina was trying desperately hard to contain her excitement for Cindy's new look. "You look wonderful, sweetie," she whispered, giving her daughter's tummy an approving pat-pat. Cindy blushed from hearing that. It felt rewarding, knowing that she was making her mother prouder with every pound she gained.

"Thank you, mom," Cindy replied. "I aim to please," she added with a chuckle. Sabrina gave Cindy and her tummy a good-night kiss, and with that, Cindy walked happily to her bed, eager to try her super-size-me pills the next morning.

The next morning, Cindy was still sleeping peacefully, dreaming about her and Maurice fattening up to immense proportions, as well as fattening up their possible future children. Her dream was suddenly interrupted by a deep rumble, so powerful that it shook her awake. She sat up and looked around for the source of the noise, only for it to happen again, and she quickly realized it was her empty tummy. She lifted the covers and saw her new belly. It had shrunk a tiny bit, but there was still plenty of pudge on it, including a bit on her thighs.

"Mornin', Butterball," said a voice. Cindy looked over and saw Suzie standing in front of her bed, her tummy so massive, it was so close to covering her knees. Cindy chuckled; she liked that nickname "Butterball," and decided it was perfect for her.

"Mornin' to you, Red Whale," she replied with snark. Suzie chuckled, which made her belly jiggle. "I like that," she said. "If I'm Red Whale and you're Butterball, then what should we call Bella?" Suzie asked. Cindy thought, but couldn't come up with anything; her thinking was cut off by her belly rumbling. "Can't think on an empty stomach," she said, patting her tummy, while Suzie's belly gave an even louder roar. "I hear you," she agreed, "once we're nice and full, I'm sure we'll think of something."

Cindy got out of bed, and both sisters made their way to the dining table. As usual, a massive breakfast greeted them, this time consisting of pancakes and waffles, immersed in syrup and whipped cream, as well as super greasy bacon, cheese-covered eggs, and extra-buttered toast. Both girls' tummies roared immensely at the spread. Cindy saw that Bella was already in her high chair, and upon closer inspection, saw that the baby's pajamas also failed to cover her big belly, resting high above her belly button.

As both sisters took their seats, Sabrina walked out of the kitchen, carrying an extra plate of pancakes. "Good morning, my BIG girls," she smiled, patting their growling bellies. As she set down the plate, a knock came at the door. Sabrina went to answer it and happily opened the door to allow Ruby and her family to enter the room.

"Good morning, Ruby," Sabrina greeted with a smile, "what a surprise for you to visit our room once more."

"Maurice said he wanted to visit Cindy and try her new weight gain pills with her," Ruby replied with a grin. Sure enough, Maurice walked over to Cindy and pulled up a seat next to her, while Michelle waddled her way over to say hi to Suzie. Cindy noticed that Maurice had also gained a noticeable amount of weight yesterday. Both of them hugged each other in a loving embrace, their bellies squishing against each other.

"Are you ready to go super-sized?" Maurice asked excitedly. Cindy eagerly pulled out the bottle of pills and carefully read the directions: "Take one pill each morning. Wash it down with water. After one minute, follow it up with lots of fattening food." Cindy took out two pills, giving one to Maurice.

"Super-size me up!" Cindy declared.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.title: Tomorrow morning

"Now wait a minute," Sabrina said. "The instructions said: take in with water and wait one minute before you started eating."

Cindy looked at a clock hoping it would move sooner. Of course it did't move any faster or slower. Suzie also looked at the clock. She felt like she needed to wait with eating until her sister and boyfriend were also ready.

Sabrina thought and smiled. Ruby was right. You could get food here everywhere. She just liked seeing her three daughters fattening up.

"5, 4, 3," All kids started counting down. "2, 1, 0 lets eat."

The next moment not a word was set because all five started stuffing their faces. All five ate at high speed. Sabrina was especially happy to see how Cindy was eating. That toothpick girl she arrived with a few days ago would be buried under pounds of fat when they left. She put on a lot of weight in just a few days and they had some more days to go.
Suzie was chewing fast. Sure she wanted her sister to gain but that did't mend she should go hungry. She wanted to gain to. She had no pills so she needed to do it the old fashioned way. Eat a lot.
Cindy at the other hand tried to eat as much as fast of possible. But could't help sometimes take a look at Maurice. But he also sometimes stopped to look at Cindy.
Michelle did the same like Suzie. It was surprising how fast Suzie and Michelle could eat. Or how much food their fitted in their tiny mouths.
Even Bella used her roly-poly arms to get as much food if she could in her small mouth.
But after a short while the table was covered with empty plates and bowls. The fatties did't leave a single crumb.

"I'm still hungry," Suzie said.

"Yeah I could also eat some more." Michelle said.

Cindy also was to her surprise not full yet. But suddenly she remembered something. Jerry. That man with his two fat daughters. She still was't sure if he put some stuff in her food to make appetite increase…. Maybe not… but if he did... She could always go over to him. He had food so she could eat and maybe it would increase her appetite as well. Besides she liked his fat daughters. She and Maurice could go over there until it was time for class.

"Well I guess we need to go downstairs to get some more food." Ruby said.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.title: Breakfast for four girls and one boy

choices: Stay with Suzie, Bella, Michelle, Ruby and Sabrina.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.content:
"Alright," Cindy replied, "Maurice and I are going to see Jerry for more food before we head to class." "Have fun, lovebirds," Suzie teased, causing both 10-year-olds to blush a bit. "I'm gonna have fun with Piglet and Porkbelly," she said, referring to Bella, then Michelle. Cindy smiled at this; Piglet sounded like a perfect nickname for little Bella since she was the real pig of the family, even though she was still a baby. Michelle also seemed to smile at her nickname of Porkbelly.

"Well, have fun, Red Whale," Cindy said with a chuckle. "Back at you, Butterball," said Suzie, "have fun with Big Boy." Both Cindy and Maurice looked at each other, proud of their new nicknames. As Cindy went to change to her bikini, Sabrina and Ruby looked at their daughters.

"I love the nicknames you gave each other," Sabrina said happily. "Bella does eat like a piglet, even though she is still a baby." "Indeed," Ruby added, "my Michelle certainly looks like a Porkbelly." Michelle lifted her tummy and snorted like a pig as if to prove it. "And with every day my Maurice keeps gaining weight, the more fitting the name Big Boy sounds."

A few minutes later, Cindy walked out in her bikini, her belly proudly spilling out and jiggling for all to see. Everyone looked at Cindy's progress in admiration. Sabrina was pleased that the stick-thin girl that was Cindy was now becoming a ball of fat. The only thing that would seal the deal was Katrina joining in on the gaining, but alas.

" 'indy i' 'at," shouted Bella. "Yes, Bella, Cindy is getting very fat," Suzie replied. "Not as fat as me," she muttered to herself, hoping no one heard her.

"Have fun, Butterball," Sabrina said as the young lovers walked towards the door, "eat lots of food and let me know how the class goes." Cindy nodded happily, as she and Maurice walked out the door. "You too, Big Boy," Ruby said to Maurice. After the two walked out the door, Sabrina turned to her two 'little girls.'

"So, where would you like to eat, Red Whale and Piglet?" Sabrina asked.

"Let's look for somewhere new," Suzie said with excitement, patting her belly, making it jiggle. "I want to stuff my tummy with all the delicious fattening food they have here." The thought of this made her massive orb of a belly emit a mighty growl. "Porkbelly agrees," said Michelle, rubbing her own still-hungry tummy.

"Well, then, let's all change into our swimwear so we can chill at the pool after we eat." Ruby and Michelle were already wearing their swimwear, so Sabrina went to dress Bella, while Suzie waddled to her room to change, Suzie quickly observing her new curves in the mirror. Once all were ready, they headed to the elevator.

Once in the lobby, they began their search for a food place. After seven minutes of walking/waddling, they came across a BBQ joint. The smell of all that delicious meat just seemed to call to Suzie and Michelle, or rather, their still-hungry tummies.

"Can we eat there?" both girls asked almost simultaneously. Sabrina looked towards Bella, who also looked excited to eat some BBQ. She then turned towards Ruby, and both mothers gave a single in agreement.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.title: More Breakfast

choices: Stay with Cindy, Maurice, Jo and Jerry
Switch to Suzie, Sabrina, Bella, Ruby and Michelle
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.content:
"Is there a special reason why you want to go to Jerry?" Maurice asked. "You don't have a crush at him do you?"

"What? No! Eeeeew. He's old. Or well at least to old for me. But he's friendly. But that's not all. You know I used to have a tiny appetite. I Always did. I did't like it but I had. Well since I ate by Jerry My appetite suddenly increased. I don't know why, but suddenly I can eat way more then before. I bet Jerry has something to do with it. I guess he put some stuff in my food that make my appetite bigger. If he did I don't blame him. I would thank him. But if we go to him he will maybe put some more in my food. So..."

They entered the swimming pool where they met Jerry the other day.

"Cannon ball!" Cindy yelled and jumped in the air, curled up in a ball and splashed in the pool.

"That was more a bullet then a cannon ball," A voice said when she came up. "If I make a cannon ball I cause a tsunami."

"Oh, hello Jo. Nice to see you again. I was looking for your father. I had a big breakfast but I would like some more. I would really like the food from your father since… well... it seems I get hungrier from it."

"You do," Jo said. "He has a stuff he puts in food that increases your appetite. He put it in your food. He told me yesterday. I must say it's a improvement. Because sorry to say this but you're a skeleton. Especially around here. Come I will take you to him."

"The swam after the morbidly obese tween. Cindy could't help but look with envy at her huge body, rolls of fat and cellulite. She would love to look like that. But it would take a while before she would reach that side. after a while they entered the place where Suzie and Bella had been.

"Hi dad. These girl wanted to have some of your food. She also wants some of your special stuff of you. You know what I mean."

"I do. Oh I remember her. Yeah I did put some of it in her food, but she wanted to gain so I..."

"It's fine," Cindy said. "Even better than fine. It's fantastic. I love it. But I would like some more."

"Wait second," Maurice said. "We took one of those weight gain pills this morning. Is't there a chance that mixing with that stuff can cause problems. I know when you mix some medicine…"

"Don't worry," Jerry said. I know where you are talking about. I heard about those pills. Don't worry. You can mix them. Just realize that thanks to my stuff you will eat more and thanks to that stuff you will gain weight easy. So using both you will gain weight like crazy."

"That's what I want!" Cindy yelled.

"And me too!" Maurice said.

"And me three!" Jo added.

"Jo stop it. You don't need to gain any faster. You're are already a beautiful, morbidly, obese kid. Almost a teenager. You don't need extra help to gain. Those two need some help. Especially that girl. However I see my stuff already had some effect."

"You bet!" Cindy said and looked at her writs watch. It was a good thing it was water resistant.

"Do you have a appointment?" Jo asked.

"What? Oh no. I just don't wanna be late for class."

"Class?" Jo asked. "Don't you have vacation?"

"It is't that kind of class. It teaches people how to gain weight fast."

"Oh those. I heard about them. But I don't think I need them," Jo said laughing causing her whole body to jiggle like jelly.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.title: Food from Jerry

choices: Stay with Suzie, Bella, Michelle, Sabrina and Ruby.
1311212112111121122121111121212211211112.content:
Back at the BBQ restaurant, everyone had taken their seats, with Sabrina holding Bella in her lap. As they looked over the menu, Suzie and Michelle couldn't help but sneak glances at the place. It had various dark shades of red, except for the floor, which was a light brown. On the left side was a little bar, with a couple of TV sets over it, set to sports, one was football and the other hockey. Sabrina figured this was a place her husband would love to come too. There weren't many people around since it was still early, but of the few that were there other than Suzie and co., they were all various sizes. In one corner, there was a 250-pound-looking 16-year-old girl, being fed onion rings by her pencil-thin boyfriend. At the bar, sat an overweight couple in their 30's, lovingly feeding each other barbecue-flavored chicken wings, their shirts barely covering their muffintops. Finally, sitting at a table by herself, was a 15-year-old girl, whose physique looked similar to Cindy's from earlier this morning, after eating the initial breakfast; this girl was eating a double cheeseburger, with an extra-large side of onion rings and fries. Sabrina smiled as the latter girl devoured her food with determination, knowing that Cindy must surely be doing the same as soon as she found Jerry.

"Good morning, everyone," said a voice, cutting off Sabrina's train of thought. "My name is Valerie, and I'll be your waiter. Are we ready to order?" Sabrina looked up to see an overweight waitress in her late 20's, her outfit fitting snugly around her plump frame. Sabrina realized she hadn't looked at the menu. As she skimmed through, everyone else placed their orders.

"Can I have two double cheeseburgers?" Suzie asked. Valerie nodded happily. "I'll have those, too, please!" Michelle said, happily jumping in her seat, her belly jiggling vigorously. Sabrina kept looking through the menu until she finally found something she would like, as well as something for Bella, right as Ruby gave her order. "I would like a triple order of spicy chicken wings, please," she said politely. Valerie quickly wrote the order before turning to Sabrina. "I would like a Caesar salad, please," she said, then looked down at Bella, "as well as a large fry for the baby." "Coming right up!" Valerie replied as she took the menus and headed towards the kitchen.

"Mommy, why don't you want to get fatter?" Suzie asked. "Because, sweetie," Sabrina replied, "I am not interested in gaining weight. I much prefer stuffing you and your sisters. Well, not all your sisters agree," she sighed, remembering Katrina. "Not everyone likes fat people, and at the same time, wants to become fat themselves." Suzie sighed. She was a bit disappointed but understood her mother's wishes. She wouldn't stay disappointed for long, because almost 15 minutes later, Valerie returned with their orders. Suzie's massive belly roared with hunger at the huge burgers that lay in front of her. Almost immediately, she began tearing into the first burger, her taste buds in total bliss. She kept on eating, bite after bite, not noticing her mother watching. Sabrina stared in awe at her glutton of a daughter. She felt immensely proud of Suzie, wishing she could also see Cindy pigging out. She looked around at the rest of her company; Michelle devoured her food at almost the same pace as Suzie, while Ruby tore the skin off her chicken wings, right down to the bone. Sabrina then looked down at Bella, smiling as the piglet toddler shoved handful after handful of fries into her mouth. As Sabrina began on her salad, Suzie was already starting on her second burger, followed immediately by Michelle, while Ruby was only halfway through her second batch of wings. Sabrina figured she should probably hurry it up with her salad if she didn't want to keep everyone waiting. As she ate, she couldn't help but notice the 15-year-old girl watching them with fascination.

13112121121111211221212.title: Cindy wants to get fat like Suzie

13113.content:
"Hi Suzie!"

Chelsea, a friend from school, had decided she would visit her chubby companion. Chelsea was a schoolmate of Suzie's, and they had shared history together; one that began with food. Chelsea was competitive, and one day, seeing all the good, fatty treats Suzie had brought for lunch--two or three lunchboxes filled with desserts--she had challenged Suzie to an eating contest. Chelsea wasn't fat, or incredibly good at eating, but whenever she saw the opportunity for a friendly bit of competition, especially one that included free desserts, she took it.

She didn't win, but she did get to ask Suzie how she managed to eat so much, so quickly. A conversation began, and the two girls bonded.

As Chelsea entered her friends room, she was amazed at how much Suzie had changed. It wasn't a week ago that Suzie had walked into class wearing that shirt without a gap of skin, and here it was showing her entire flabby midriff.

"Hi Chelsea. Do ya recognize me?" Suzie jokingly replied.
"Hardly. Your mom must be working hard to fatten you, huh?"
"Yeah, Mommie really knows what foods to get me. I've been gettin' so fat that pretty soon, I won' be able to see my feet!" Suzie said, bouncing on the balls of her feet in excitement. Suzie's mom was fat-positive, even pro-fat. Mommie did everything she could to fatten her daughter, and quickly. Chelsea was aware of Suzie and her mother's practices, and, though it took some time to appreciate, she was supportive.
"I see that! It looks like your belly is starting to fall over your waist. Do you think I could feel it?"

Suzie grinned devilishly. Yes, her belly hung over her waistline, but that was only the top half of it. Suzie sat down, unbuttoned her jeans, and pulled them down her lap, letting the full force of her pudge slide out like lava, to a stop quarterway to her knees.

"The truth is, I ALREADY can't see my feet", Suzie said to her gawking friend as she kneaded the fresh dough that piled on to her thighs.

"Oh. My. GOD! How much do you weigh now?", Chelsea asked, moving subconsciously forward to grab a handful of her friend.
"I dunno', I was one-hundred-and-fifty pounds last week, an' I haven't weighed myself since I stopped being able to see the numbers, can you-" Suzie apparently didn't need to finish her sentence as Chelsea ran into the bathroom to grab a scale. Suzie could've sworn she saw a twinkle in the girl's eye as she ran. She was ecstatic to have a friend that supported her growth, and waited eagerly for her friend to get back.

A moment later, Chelsea proudly marched into the room to present the scale to her fattiness. She heaved Suzie to her feet, and waited as she stepped on the scale.

Chelsea was speechless.

"What? What does it say?" Suzie said with a giggle. "How close am I to the two-hundred pound mark?"

Cassandra grinned as she took in the last bite of her cereal. She looked down with a grin at her tummy as she let out a cute burp. She loved how much it was growing. She reached for the box and...

By: dogwolf93

"Cassandra!" The little cub squeaked and jumped as she heard her mother calling, frantically walking into the room while pulling on a coat. "Come on dear, you're going to be late for school!"
Cassandra's mother was basically an adult version of her, except slimmer with brown fur instead of Cassandra's blonde. She sometimes worried about the thought of her fluffy little daughter would get too big one day, but she loved her so much she would give her whatever she wanted.
"But mommy," Cassandra protested, reaching more for the cereal box, "still hungry..."
Her mother grabbed the box and put it back up on the shelf. "I've made you a lunch, now get your bag." She hoisted her little cub off the table and handed her a little pink lunchbox with pictures of hearts and stars and other stuff a girl her age might like.
Cassandra grabbed a schoolbag from her chair and threw the straps on, her mother taking her soft little paw and hastily leading her out towards the car, making the cub's belly jiggle and slosh as she walked. She hauled herself into the front passenger seat while her mother climbed into the driver's seat, starting up the car and driving off once Cassandra had her seatbelt on.
The fox cub stared intently at the lunchbox on her lap, licking her lips. She had to at least see what her mom made! She unclipped the box and opened up, eyes widening and her fluffy tail wagging as she beheld today's lunch; three chocolate bars, a small baggy of chocolate spread sandwiches, and a bag of BBQ flavour potato chips. Cassandra wiped the drool off her maw, her round belly letting out a powerful rumble.
"Now now sweetheart," her mother tutted playfully, smiling and closing the box back over, "wait till lunchtime, then you can stuff your little face."
"But mooooom," the fox whined softly, rubbing her grumbling belly, "my tummy wants it noooow..."
"Well it'll just have to wait then," her mother said matter-of-factly, stroking her little girl's head and making her tail wag very fast.

"I'll see you later sweetie," Cassandra's mother smiled softly, giving her daughter a small kiss on the forehead before letting her go off into the school playground. She looked around for her friends amongst the other animal kids talking and playing, wincing gently as her tummy let out another loud grumble.
"Mmff," the cub whined gently, blushing softly and rubbing her empty belly, "mom said to wait till lunch time, but I'm so hungry..."
Poor Cassandra had a tough choice to make, especially when she'd just found her friends hanging around a large fully-leaved tree. Their usual hangout. She grinned at them, then looked down at her lunchbox while licking her lips. She had to make a choice...

By: mephilis
Mandy slowly sat up, bringing her plump hands up to her chubby face to rub the "sleepies" from her eyes. Looking around, she noticed that the kitchen was exactly the same as before she and Cindy fell asleep.

Wrappers everywhere, bags everywhere, and two fat girls in the middle.

She looked at the clock after her vision stopped being blurry and gasped at the time. Grandma and Grandpa were about to wake up. She panicked a little, not knowing what to do. Would Grandma and Grandpa be mad if they saw the kitchen like this, or would they be proud? Mandy hoped they would be proud, but better safe than sorry right? Besides, she and Cindy would have to clean their mess anyway.

Mandy began picking up the bags and wrappers and threw them in the trash can. That's one problem down, but here's the real problem: Cindy. She was still sleeping like a bear in hibernation (that may have been a slight exaggeration), and Mandy didn't know if she could carry her younger sister. Mandy wouldn't dare drag her, but what if she drops her, or worse yet, what if she can't even lift her up.

Mandy decided to test her chances. She knew she didn't have muscles; there was no way. Being a lazy eater couldn't possibly make her some a bench-presser or anything. And even then, Cindy was a heavy girl. Could Mandy really do it? Wether she was able to lift and carry Cindy or not, it was a good thing. It would be a good thing that she was able to make the kitchen look spotless and be able to make it look like she and Cindy wasn't there in the first place. On the other hand, if she couldn't lift Cindy up, it would still be a good thing. It would mean that Cindy's too fat and heavy for her big sister to lift her up.

Mandy brought her left arm under Cindy's knees and her right arm under her back and tried to lift her up to the best of her strength. She couldn't do it. Not anymore than two or three inches of the ground anyway.

Mandy knew there was nothing left do to other than to wake Cindy up. But she wasn't about to give up. She tried carrying her "little" sister again. She knew it wasn't much, but those two or three inches counted! Mandy lifted Cindy to about as high as her knees, and her face was turning red already. She began to walk out of the kitchen as quickly as she could, but not so fast that she drops Cindy. She made her way into the hallway, and into one of the bedrooms. Her and Cindy's bedroom. She put Cindy down and opened the door. With the door wide open, she slowly, but surely carried her sister into the room and heaved her onto the bed. Mandy closed the door. She walked back to the bed and pulled herself onto it. She rested her head on the pillow, pulled up her shirt, and moved Cindy into a position that made her own belly Cindy's pillow.

Mandy was suprised at Cindy. Cindy had actually stayed asleep through all of that, but most importantly, she gave Mandy a hard time. It was a good thing. It meant that she was getting too fat for her big sister to lift her up. Mandy closed her eyes in an attempt to go back to sleep.

Truth be told, Kitty loved having her tummy warmed by the flames. It felt so good to have the constant warm and inviting heat hit her young belly.

And what a belly it was. Over the last few months it had grown from a barely noticeable sliver of baby fat to a nice chubby ball of blubber. This was mostly thanks to her laziness and many snacks. Kitty didnt mind though. In fact, she hadnt paid much attention to it.

So here she lay in her favorite spot, eating away happily until her little paws felt only the slightest few crumbs left in the bag. "I don't like needles." Kitty suddenly mumbled.

"Are you afraid of needles. Well you don't have to worry. I'm not gonna use any needles on you. I'm just gonna look if everything is all right with you. For that I don't need any needles. Just relax. go lie at that table there I come in a second."

Dr. Feedar looked at Kitty's mom.

"Is there something special?" He asked her.

"Yeah I was a bit worried about her weight. It seems really high. Especially for her age. I was wondering if she's healthy." Kitty's mother whispered.

"Yeah I see. Well let's see. I will give her a full check up while she's here. All right Kitty."

The doctor did't do anything unusual. looked at how tall she was she was, her weight, her reflexes and asked her some questions and also felt her belly to be sure if there was't some strange reason why she was so big. He once heard of a boy who suddenly got a lump that grew. Inside it they founds his sister. Perhaps there was something like that but she seemed to be just a morbidly obese kitten. He checked a few things with her. He knew exactly what kind of problems a high weight could cause but Kitty did't seem to have any of those.

"Well miss I checked your daughter from head to tail. She's perfectly healthy. Nothing wrong with her."

"But her weight. Is't that very high for..."

"I admit it's kind of high but she does't seem to have any health problems. People often think that just a few pounds overweight is already something life threatening. It's not that serious. People often over react. You don't have to worry about it that much. Especially at her age. There's a good chance she'll grow into it and lose some. But she's perfectly healthy. But she's perhaps a bit fast out of breath sometimes. Is that right Kitty?"

"Yeah a bit but further I feel fine."

"So you see miss nothing to worry about. If she does feel bad drop her by whenever you think is necessary. Now you can go. Oh and Kitty here you can have a lollipop."

While mother and daughter walked out and to their car both felt pretty relieved.

addition by: phrooglefa (38)

Kitty simply let out a burp in reply to her mother's question. She had finished her breakfast. However, it wasn't because the overweight kitten kid wanted to stop eating. It was only because the food ran out.

The fat toddler girl looked even bigger after her feast. The was a big meal, even by her standards, and it showed. Kitty's bulging middle was stuffed, but still soft given how fat she was before eating. It stuck out a good 2 inches bigger than before.

Of course, Kitty liked this fact quite a bit, despite how hard it made things for her mother. The poor, overworked, underfed, mom was trying to rush her daughter out the door but, given how tubby the 4 year old was, she didn't want to move all that quickly.

It only got worse when Kitty's mother tried to get her into the car. Thanks to the large meal she had just consumed, Kitty needed a hand getting into her seat. Her mother had to come and try and lift the obese child into the car. The plumper kitten just giggled at this and let out the odd burp in full delight as her overworked parent heaved her in as best as she could.

Then came the hard part: Kitty's seatbelt. The adult always had trouble with this and today would be no exception. The ballooning middle of Kitty would just not let the seatbelt go all the way around it. The situation was only made worse as the toddle continued to giggle as her well-fed girth was played with. It took Kitty's mother 5 whole minutes of fighting to get the seatbelt on and neither cat was sure it would hold for long.

1352111111222111212111211221122112111221.content:
addition by: amber (51) More by this author
Starting stuffing the slices cake into her mouth. Eating like a pig. Simone wondered how a kitten could eat so much but if she saw Kitty's huge belly she understood how so much food could fit into her. Where she lived not one of her friends would dare to become near her size. They were all beautiful slender kittens just like their mothers. They would't dare to become fat and if one did she would at least buy weight loss products or stick her finger in her throat and throw up. She heard from one of her friends that her mother did that after she gained two pounds.
Kitty kept pushing the food in her mouth. However deep in her mind a voice kept asking her why Simone would do this. Simone hated her. She was always mean to her and did't liked the fact she was fat. So why was she suddenly so nice to her to give her some cake. Could it be that it was a trap. But she did't feel anything. It all tasted good. So good that it would be a waste not too eat it.

"Is't that strange?" Nightstar asked the others.

"The fact that it is lunchtime and our eating machine is't here?" Jinx asked. "Or the fact she rather ate with Simone instead of us?"

"Both. However I do understand she rather eats cake, but why would Simone give it to her? She does't like Kitty." Nightstar said.

"Well if you do have some left over birthday cake you..." Minoes started but was cut of by Jinx.

"From which birthday party? She does't have any friends here."

"That's true." Nightstar mumbled. "See what I mean. It does't make sense. Nothing makes sense. What does Simone wants?"

"I don't know." Minoes said. "At home she just sits on her room and riding her bike. Well I don't like my cousin, but well... she stays family. It also is't easy for her of course. She has no friends here. She did't wanted to be here."

"Still, that does make sense how she got that birthday cake or why she gives it to our friend.

"I think we can better keep a good eye at your cousin. After all Kitty is our friend, and friends look out for each other." Jinx said.

In the meantime Kitty wolfed down the last slice of cake and belched loudly.

"Thank you Simone. That was really... nice of you. It tasted good. Well I'm gonna get some lunch. I'm still hungry."

Simone stayed behind. Surprised how fast she ate all the cake till the last crumb and still was hungry. How good did that weight gain powder worked?"

"Well how better it works, how faster I reach my goal." She said to herself, but deep in her mind appeared the question if she would be ever able to reach her goal.

It was about to get better for her too. She quickly spotted a very large table with two huge lasagnas on it. One of the daycare works was happily cutting pieces off for the kittens in the class, not yet noticing the fat toddler girl waddling over to her.

Kitty happily grabbed a plate and quickly got in the short line that was waiting to be fed. The caregiver almost gulped in shock and worry as she noticed Kitty step up and wait to be fed. How could someone let their child get so fat, she must have been thinking as she reluctantly cut her off a slice and gave Kitty a plastic fork to eat with.

Kitty just grinned and happily waddled off to eat her piece of lasagna, sitting down on a bean bag chair next to a skinny boy of the same age, her massive tummy jutting up into the air. The lithe child couldn't help but stare at Kitty as she wolfed down her slice because...

1352111111222111212111211221122112111221.content:
addition by: amber (51)

Kitty took a few big bites of her lasagna before she noticed the boy was looking at her. She ignored it first but he kept looking at her. She tried to focus on her lasagna but the boy kept looking at her. Finally she decided it was enough.

"Why are looking at me like that?"

"Who? Me? Well I... eh I..."

Kitty got a better look at him. A bit of a nerdy look. Skinny and kind of short. A light gray fur but his clothes looked pretty good.

"I... well I think... I like you." The boy finally managed to say.

Kitty looked at him wondering what to do. She already had a secret admirer. Going with this boy would feel a bit like cheating. She also did't really felt attracted to this boy. She also did't want to let the other think she was in love with him. In her mind she could already hear the others sing.
Kitty and (name of that boy) sitting in a tree
K-I-S-S-I-N-G
First comes love, then comes marriage
The comes Kitty with a baby carriage.
But then the thought came in her head, perhaps this was her secret admirer.

"I like your... big belly. Can I touch it?" The boy asked.

Kitty wolfed the last of her piece of lasagna and must admit she would like some tummy rubs. But let this boy touch her stomach would look a bit strange. But then she saw he did't touched his part of lasagna. She would still like some more food.

"Tell you what. You can rub my belly if I get your part of lasagna." Kitty said.

"Deal!" The boy said and shove his plate over too Kitty and started to rub her belly.

Kitty fast started eating the lasagna. But at the same time she wondered if this boy was her secret admirer. But her secret admirer knew who she was.

"Did we meet before?" Kitty asked.

"No. I'm sure I would have remembered you. Orange fur with dark brown stripes and such a big belly. No chance I would have missed that."

Kitty looked at him. He looked at her.
So he's not my secret admirer. Kitty thought. Else he could have said it by now.

"So you have a crush on me?" She asked.

"Yeah I think so. Do you like me too?"

Kitty thought what to say. She really did't want this boy to be her boyfriend. But maybe he was a nice boy and they could become friends.
She could friendly say no and maybe get a new friend, but she was't sure he would then get the message.
Or she could turn him down rude and the he know she was serious.
Where will this story go next?

"Well...not rea...wait, what is your name?" She said, just realizing she didn't know who he was.

"I'm Simon. Hey wait a minute! Weren't you the girl I saw with all those kitten's leaving that house?" Simon asked, pointing at Kitty's friends having just now remembered he had spotted her before.

It took a moment for the bloated, 4 year old, kitten girl to piece together what he was saying. Kitty looked back at Simon with a slightly confused look on her pudgy young face.

"You mean when those girls left my house?" She asked pointing at her friends.

Simone nodded and quickly replied,

"Yah! I have seen you before. You looked really pretty. I even wanted to buy you some snacks when I saw you." Simone said with a very cute blush on his kitten boy face.

Kitty was in shock. He had seen her before AND he said he was buying her packages of snacks! He had to be her secret admirer! Any doubts about whether this boy was handsome enough for her vanished in a second. She wanted him to be her boyfriend!

Her friends did hold a look of uncertainty as the obese kitten waddled away from them. Still, none of them did anything to stop her from doing what she wanted. Kitty smiled as she saw Simon standing there, waiting for her faithfully. He grinned back at the portly kitten toddler as she waddled over to him.

The little kitten boy beamed from ear to ear as he heard this. He nodded excitedly and quickly wrapped his arms around her....well he tried to anyway. It seemed that Kitty was just too fat for him to get his young arms all the way around her tummy.

Kitty smiled at this and hugged him back, inadvertently pulling him deeper into her flabby middle. She purred a little as she felt this, liking how nice it felt to snuggle this cute little kitten boy against her blubber.

However, the moment was quickly broken as Kitty's tummy rumbled loudly. She was, as usual, hungry.

addition by: Nowaya (1)

To tell the truth, the cake hadn't filled Kitty up much at all- she was, after all, very large, and the cake rather small by comparison. She certainly looked well fed- her enormous belly spilling over her waistband to hover by her thighs. However, she didn't exactly want to be rude to this new friend, so she instead said, "No, thank you, that was excellent!"

Just then, though, her flabby stomach let out a furious GROOOOOOOOOWL. The startled children looked up from their toys, wondering what it was. Kitty patted her belly nervously, but over the top of the sudden babble a shrill voice shouted, "IT'S A TIGER!"

Panic ensued. Cubs of all colors raced around the room, crashing into bookshelves, running over block houses, and smashing into each other in their panic. Only something equally grandiose could stem the chaos, and luckily Kitty provided that also, in the form of an excessively loud and very embarrassed burp. Now, the noise made sense, and after a solid minute of the rest of the room gaping at her, play resumed as normal.

Kitty looked over at Simon, who was staring open mouthed at her exposed belly. "I guess I could eat a little more..." She blushed. She knew this wasn't exactly proper behavior for a four-year-old, and she hoped Simon wouldn't be grossed out...

Simon, to the contrary, was grinning from ear to ear. "I'll be right back!" He turned tail and raced away to the kitchen, intent on getting more to eat for his obese new friend. Once he reached the door, however, he was confronted by...
Where will this story go next?

Ashly - A fat 8-year-old who eats more than she thinks. Andy grinned as he waited by his front door. The 8 year old was extremely excited that his best friend was coming over. Andy himself wasnt the most popular boy in school or in his naborhood for that matter. He wasnt a nerd or anything like that, although he wasnt dumb. The boy just happened to be very shy. In fact many of his class mates only really talked to him when he was standing up for his friend against their teasing. This severed only to make him even more unpopular with those kids.

The slowly began to pace in front of the door in anticipation. He wore a red t-shirt and blue jeans with slightly older looking sneakers. His red hair was medium length and suited his quite well. His build was fairly slim, as it had been all his life, however he was starting to put on a few pounds as of late. It was nothing major, maybe just 5 or so, but he didnt mind the slight pot belly it gave him. He had actually kinda wondered what it would be like to gain a bit of weight along side his friend.

It was then, finally, the door bell rang. The little one almost lunged to open the door, being so happy that she was finally here. He quickly opened the door and grinned at the sight of his friend.

There stood Ashly. The fat little 8 year old had long brown hair parted down the middle, slightly to the left, and beautiful brown eyes. She was sporting a nice dark pink shirt and a pair of blue jeans. The buttoned up shirt looked very strained on her. Sure the top buttons keeping her chest covered and looked like they werent going anywhere, but the buttons around her belly were looking very pushed out. In fact everyone could see a nice sliver of the tubby little plumpers belly ooze between the bottom of her shirt and the top of her jeans. Most of her weight was in her sizable belly, but she did have a nice cute looking layer of fat over the rest of her body.

She grinned as she noticed her friend standing there. She was always happy to see him. Not only that but was a bit happy to see his slightly growing paunch.

Hi, Andy. She said happily

Hi chubby Ashly. He replied back, using his pet name of her.

He then walked over to her and gave her a big hug, feeling her big round little girl belly. Ashly hugged back as well, and stole her own feel of his plumpening boy belly. Both then went in for a nice cute kiss on the lips, still hugging one another.

Since Andy had stuck up for her on the playground against the bullies, the two had become friends. Even more though, after finding out how much the two had in common, and finding they had the same like for fatness, they had started to become much more than friends. It was still a puppy love crush, and the most they actually ever did was make out a little and have Andy play with Ashlys blubber. Still they kept their liking of one another in this way a secret. They didnt want to be teased by their parents or class mates. So they made sure people thought they were only friends.

So whyd you call me over? She asked.

Ive got a surprise for you. My parents

"Of course dear. Have some more." Her mother said.

She filled fiona's plate with a big amount of food while her plate had been full just a few minutes ago. This did't worried her parents. It even made them proud. In their family being fat is good.

Fiona's mother (Wanda) was about 476 pounds and proud of it. She had the same black hair that Fiona got from her but Wanda had blue eyes. She had nice round DD cups and arms covered in rolls of fat just like her legs but most weight was in her big round belly. She did most of cooking and other things around the house sitting. Of course she could't sit while cleaning and other stuff.
This is why Katja lived with hem. She was 23 years old with white spiky hair, blue eyes and lived with the family. She had her own room and cleaned and did other things around the house where you need too move a lot.
She also took care of Fiona. Fiona saw in her the big sister she did't have. When she was younger she believed Katja really was her sister. A very skinny sister since Katja was kind of thin with a small appetite.
Fiona's father worked with computer programs and made good money with it. He weighed 360 pounds with dark brown hair and brown eyes Fiona got from him. Just like his wife he had arms covered in fat just like his legs and was most of the weight in his belly.
Fiona looked a lot like a smaller version from her mother but of course had't DD cups yet. But she was planing to get them and too make her parents proud by becoming fat. Even fatter then they were.
Her parents liked it that their daughter tried to become fat.
Katja first had her doubts about it but learned how this people looked and thought about fat. She also knew how much Fiona liked it to be fat and finally supported her in it.

"I want too become fatter. Way fatter!" Fiona said before pushing her mouth full with food.

Fiona never had much trouble with her size since her parents build he house for obese people with wide doorways and big stairs and a huge bath tub an more. All those things made life for Fiona very comfortable. Fiona loved her life.
She swallowed the last food of her plate.

"More food!" Fiona demand.

"There's no more food sweetie." Her mother said.

"Ah. But i'm hungry. But we do have dessert do we?"

"Well i thought we have everything for a banana split!" Katja said.

"Hooray!" Fiona yelled.

Katja stood up to make the banana splits. Even after living a few years with the family she kept her figure. That was thanks too her small appetite so she did't eat much at breakfast lunch and dinner and did't eat their fattening snacks they ate between meals and of course she did't eat the same desserts like them. Just a small cup of yogurt was enough for her. But she must admit she liked making ice creams. Something what was very handy if you lived with this family.
She was still surprised how fast Fiona devoured her ice cream like it was nothing.

Fiona licked her lips and let out a loud belch and used a nail to get something out between her teeth.

"Are you full honey?" Her mother asked

"Yes mommy."

Katja rolled with her eyes. The little girl ate enough for several adult people. She had a big appetite. She also loved any kind of fatty food. Fiona herself saw no problem in that.
Katja worried sometimes a bit. When she saw Fiona at the playground. She could't keep up with most other kids. She was also the fattest kid in her class. She found it hard to believe Fiona never had problems with her size.

"All right Fiona it's almost bedtime for you." Her mother said.

Katja gave her a hand and took her upstairs too the bathroom.

"That was a good meal!" Fiona said while she clapped on her big belly. "Also a good dessert Katja."

Katja filled the tub with water. Nice hot with a lot of soap so there was a lot of foam just like Fiona liked it. The fat little kid got in the tub and slid so deep in the water only her head was visible between the foam.
Katja got some shampoo and rubbed in in Fiona's hair. She always took good care of the Fiona's hair since she thought it was very pretty and washed and combed it until it was shiny.

"Katja?"

"Yes what is it."

"I last saw something on T.V."

"Fiona you know your mother does't want you see horror movies."

"It was no horror movie. It was a talk show. There were some fat kids but it seems like most mothers want those kids to be... THIN! Can you believe that? Why does anyone want their kids to be thin?"

Katja thought what she needed too say.

"Well some people like their kids thin."

"Yeah but why."

"They think thin is beautiful and it's healthy."

"That's silly. Thin is not beautiful. Fat is!"

"Well do all kids at school think that? I heard they calling you names. Fatso, fatty and..."

"I like it when they call me that. I like it to be a fatty."

"Well but those kids don't like it or else their parents don't like it. Be happy you have parents that want you to be fat."

"I'm glad it's Friday. Tomorrow i'm free. Hmmm those poor kids don't know how good it is too be fat."

Katja gave her a towel and she came out of the water and curled it around her middle.

"Can you rub yourself dry. I still need to change your sheets." Katja said while she walked out the bathroom. Fiona fast put on her PJ's and liked it to see how her big belly poked out between her shirt and pants. She thought it made her look cute.
She pinched in her fat rolls. On her arms and legs an i her puffy, pink cheeks. It felt all so soft and warm and nice. How could people not like that?
Slowly she walked too her room

"All right. I'm done!" Katja said.

Fiona fast got in bed.

"My belly feels much more softer then that mattress."

"I'm sure it does. Now sweet dreams."

"Don't forget. Tomorrow it's Saturday."

"I know." Katja said.

Since Fiona was free the whole day she could eat a lot of the day and that was what she did. She closed her eyes and fell asleep.

Both Maiko and Tabitha looked at one another. Hey, did'ja hear that? A cruise, Tabi! Do you think it will be like the ones on the commercials? Maiko asked the kitten excitedly. She shrugged.

I hope so. The one's on the commercials look so nice. Tabitha's eyes gleamed at the thought. We could just have fun all day. Ooh and sit and eat, too-

And swimming, Maiko interrupted. Don't forget about swimming! Maiko was acknowledged with a nod.

Of course! I wouldn't wanna miss those cute swim-trunks of yours, Tabitha said, giving Maiko a soft nudge. He grinned.

You-know-it! I gotta make sure I bring those when I pack. Oh, but I actually got a new pair a few days ago. I hope I don't forget anything important before we go. Like last time when I went camping... I forgot the whole bag with everything in it at home. We had to drive all the way back.


It was set up that both families would be driving out to the bay where the boat was the day after next. He didn't have the hood over his head though because he didn't like having his ears stuck under it. His mother thought about the prospect of not having to hear any complaining from Maiko if he was too busy having a ride in the car with his friend, Tabitha. It was agreed that Maiko could ride with Tabi. Maiko opened the sliding van door, Tabi was already in the van. Hi, Tabi. Looks like I get to ride with you, huh?

Tabi was sitting there, half asleep as well, wearing a pink, shin-length skirt and a light jacket. It was white. You think we should just come back later? I could probably eat some more food, but I also want to save room for lunch at the same time. It's so hard to choose."

She gobbled up everything she could get her chubby hands on. Unfortunately, this also included her mother's slice after the woman set it back on the table. Vivian sighed in angry frustration, having only taken a small a bite out of her pie before her bloated toddler got it.

However, as determined as Tanya was, she began to slow down as she neared the last few slices. She was still going, but not nearly at the same pace as before. More than a few people in the restaurant thought she wouldn't be able to make it. They were soon surprised as the tubby, toddler, girl slurped down the last piece of pie.

She happily slumped back into her chair. Her face and hands were covered in pie stains. Her belly, now far larger than when she entered, jutted out for all the world to see. She smiled at her handy work and let out a happy, loud, rude, burp.

135332223222222222212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

It was a school day, but Vikki didn’t care. Yes, lunch time and recess were prime opportunities for throwing her weight around and ruling the place, but she was getting tired of sitting through classes. She was surprisingly good in maths class, but she hated it more than any other. So instead, she decided to check out the mall.

Had she been paying attention in class, she’d have known that they were going on a field trip there that very day.

“Okay kids! Today’s lesson should be a lot of fun!” announced the ever enthusiastic teacher, Ms. Carter, “It’s pretty simple; you each have twenty dollars to buy supplies to survive the zombie apocalypse! Follow the guidelines on your sheet, and choose carefully! Stay with your buddy and let’s meet back here at 12:00!”
The kids had voted on the zombie theme in class; the lesson was actually about problem solving and budgeting.

Vikki hadn’t been in the mall for even five minutes, and had already helped herself to someone else’s cheeseburger meal while they were looking down at their phone. Her dark purple shirt was fitting quite well of her pillowy stomach; which she didn’t like much at all. It meant her belly didn’t have enough inside it, and that just wouldn’t do at all.

“Where can a girl get a decent bite to eat around her?” she grumbled, stuffing the last few fries into her mouth as she rode the escalator up. A few more inches of belly fat and she’d start getting stuck in them, and probably cause big jams as people tried to push past her, falling over and tripping themselves up.

She was looking forward to that, but as it was, she stepped onto the building’s second floor without difficulty. That was when she saw Bradley and Sarah. It appeared that they saw her too, because they suddenly became very frightened.

“There’s no escaping her…” sighed Bradley as the plump powerhouse waddled towards them, grinning evilly. “Should we run? We’d be way faster than her.”
Sarah shook her head, “No. She’ll just remember it next time she has us cornered…”

“Hey buddies!” Vikki smiled at them sweetly. “Fancy seeing you guys here, wow! Oh, today’s the Vampire Survival thing isn’t it?”
Sarah corrected her “Z-zombie.”
Vikki clearly didn’t care, “So, that means you’ve got forty bucks on ya!” Her stomach grumbled, making the picture on her shirt shake. They knew what was coming. “Guys, let’s face it, zombies and vampires are wimps! What you really need to learn to survive is…well, me.”
She laughed, and threw her arms around the two, as if hanging out with two good friends. Then she pulled them close, trapping them against her fat figure.

Vikki now essentially had forty dollars to spend on food, and two servants to help her along. Tormenting these two was a particular favourite pastime for her, and this may be her best chance yet!
But then again, forty bucks wouldn’t cover much, would it? She could eat way more than that could buy. It wouldn’t be quite as personal of an experience, but if she found more of her classmates, she could have herself a small army of servants and hundreds of bucks worth of food!

Waiting in line really wasn’t her style, so Vikki barged through the line until she was at the Hungry World counter. A startled teenager looked down at the enormous girl.
“Hiya, my mom gave me some money for lunch or whatever. What can I get for this much?” she handed him the money.

Shortly, Vikki waddled back to the table, carrying a tray with three bags, each filled with cartons of fries, all sorts of burgers, chicken drumsticks, nuggets, and four flavours of sundae. In short, it was enough to feed at least five people.
Plus, there was the kids meal she’d taken before anyone else could claim it.

“You guys stuck around! Man, you’re way smarter than I expected!” she scooted in between them, purposely shoving both aside with her tremendous backside as she did. Leaning back, she put her hands behind her head.
“Well? I ain’t gonna feed myself. That’s why I have you two!”
Sarah quickly unwrapped a burger and held it to Vikki’s mouth. She bit down, then engulfed the whole thing. Sarah shivered, feeling she almost lost a finger.
“See? Vampires and monsters aren’t real, they can’t hurt you guys. I’m totally real, and, well, you know what I can do,” she laughed as Bradley poured fries into her mouth. “I’m just looking out for you love birds!”
“Thanks…” they both sighed, slowly filling her up like a balloon.

After two bags, Vikki’s gut was finally pushing out her shirt. She burped in Sarah’s face, causing her to sputter and gag. “Oh come on, my breath is minty fresh!” she laughed, slapping her stomach. “Aw, only one left…” she gazed sadly upon the remaining bag.

Bradley poured the melting ice cream down her throat like a glass of milk as she pondered what to do next. She could always go for more food, and if her wristwatch was right, she didn’t have long until everyone had to meet up again. Her class always grouped together at 12.

All her classmates in one place…with all their money already spent. Lame. If she wanted another free meal, she’d have to hurry. She knew a few kids in her class who might’ve left it to the last minute; if she hurried now, she could catch them.
But then…she didn’t want to waste her time. Maybe it was time to cause a bit of mayhem. She could always steal a snack, after all.

Simon balled up the money in his fist and glared at Vikki, right in the face.

13533222322222222221211122213.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Oh the heck with it.” Vikki leaned her head beneath the nozzles on the machine and pulled all of the cranks at once. She smiled for a moment as the machine buzzed, and the rainbow of cold desserts began to flow out down towards her.
She had an awfully excited, gleeful smile for someone so horrible.

Letting the ice cream fill her mouth was easy, but with so many pumping at the same time, she had to juggle them, and that wasn’t turning out so well. Ice cream was getting all over her face, and dripping down her chin. It was getting a little hard to keep up eating it, but she was too determined to let up, and held tight to the handles. She could already feel the brain freeze starting to kick in. Despite the big mess, it was impressive how much she managed to catch.

A few moments later, a girl in a Hungry World uniform stepped back into the stall. Everyone of course returning from a fifteen minute lunch break. She couldn’t help but stop and stare as she discovered Vikki below the counter, drinking the machine dry.

“Uh…whoa…” she glared, unsure of what to do. Vikki’s shirt had started out nice and roomy, but was now scrunched up around her chest as her belly bulged out rounder and rounder throughout the day. It was almost like a balloon; the girl kneeled down next to it and could see it visibly expanding before her very eyes.

“Dude, that is freaky…” she said, leaning in and watching carefully as her belly button slowly moved up the expanding girth. “Could you maybe, uh, stop? We kind of need that…” Vikki tried to kick her. She missed, but the girl got the idea.
“Yeesh! Fine! You want it, you got it.”

Reaching over, she turned a knob and the ice began to spray out at double speed. Maybe this was meant to be some kind of revenge, but the young glutton’s eyes lit right up; she wished she had known about that earlier!

Shortly, more of the employees returned. At least one tried to drag her away, but she wouldn’t budge. Another had the much smarter idea of rolling her, but got a smack in the face for their troubles. Finally, something made Vikki stop.
The tank went dry.
“BUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRAAAAAAAHP!”

Relaxing, the employees hoisted her up and out of the stall. There wasn’t much point trying to bill her, she was only a kid, and looked in no state to tell them who her parents were.
“Hope you’re happy, you pig. What do you have to say for yourself?”
Her stomach sagged past her knees, but stuck out almost three feet ahead. None of them had ever seen the human body contain so much food all at once, let alone someone so young. While nothing compared to the collection of food inside her, her outside was smothered in it as well. The stains on her top would likely never wash out, and hunks of her hair was stuck together with melted banana and strawberry. Most of her fat face couldn’t be seen behind the melty cream. And of course, her fat stomach had blobs of every flavour every few inches.
She seemed on the brink of passing out…
“Can I get a b-URRRP! Burger to go?” she grinned.

“You look…huge…” marvelled the guard, in utter shock.
“Oh, yeah,” Vikki laughed. “Um, hey, can I get a towel or something?” The guard handed her one, and she began cleaning the ice cream off her fat face. “Much better.”
“I’m sorry, but I really can’t get over how big you are,” he marvelled. “I checked the security tape and…well, you jump the counter one size, and twenty minutes later, they pull you out like…well, that!”
Vikki shrugged and patted her enormous gut, “Hey, it’s a gift! Actually, I’m still feeling kind of peckish!” she winked.
“Whoa…” the guard just glared at her huge stomach. It completely covered the top of her legs, and seemed to rest heavily on them. “So, you do this all the time?”
“Well, I’ll be doing it a lot more from now on!” she smiled.

The guard seemed younger than the one she saw earlier. He was pretty scrawny; no wonder he was working the security cameras instead of catching shoplifters. In fact…he might’ve only been fourteen or fifteen years old.
“Hey, there’s no way you’re old enough to work here…” Vikki accused him.
“Work experience. My dad is a pretty big name in this department,” he grinned. “I don’t think I’ve ever seen someone’s stomach expand like that. And you’re only like, what, thirteen?”
“Eleven.”
“Seriously?” He laughed. “That is seriously cool.”
Vikki thought for a second, “What? Do you like fat girls or something?”
He blushed, having not been asked that question in person before. “Well…yeah. I mean, you’re probably a little young for me, but I still think it’s cool. You…well, you’re something special.” He replayed the footage of when she tricked the security guard into chasing an imaginary attacker. “You fooled my dad, and then pigged out even more. You’re unstoppable!”

‘Unstoppable,’ Vikki liked the sound of that! “Thanks, shrimp,” he was taller than her, by the way, “I like you, which is really lucky, because people who I don’t like tend to be pretty unhappy.”
“Oh, I can imagine,” he replayed the footage of her sitting on Simon. “Listen…you’re actually meant to be in big trouble after what you did. I’m meant to be drilling you about breaking rules and doing hard time and stuff. Dad wants me to call your parents.”
“But we’re pals now, so that’s not going to happen!” she grinned.
“Right. You’re free to go!”

The universe just seemed to like moving in Vikki’s favour sometimes. She could just leave, knowing she had a man on the inside who wouldn’t report her crimes, but that wasn’t enough for an ambitious girl like her.

He really did seem to think she was the coolest thing he’d ever seen. If he had a night shift, he could escort her around the mall, and she could do whatever she wanted! Heck, he’d probably cheer her on!
But then…well, he wasn’t that much older, really. Three years wasn’t a big difference. Heck, her birthday was coming up, so he was only really two years older. If she got him on a date, he’d buy her all the food she wanted, and would help her do any mean thing she had in mind. He’d have him eating out of the palm of her hands…figuratively speaking, of course. She’d much have it the other way around.
Plus, he was a little cute, and he really thought she was cool. Maybe it could be fun…

“Hey, I’ve got an idea…” she grinned.

addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Let’s go to my house!” Vikki happily suggested.
“Uh, are you sure? I mean, you just met me, what’ll your parents think?”
“My parents will love you, because I’ll tell them to like you. Besides, we don’t need to stick around, my mom’s just making meat loaf, and I don’t want to miss that.”
“Well…okay…” Darren grinned. He didn’t want to argue with her; both because he was happy, if concerned about the idea, and because he knew very well what she was capable of.

“So uh, what’s the plan? I finish my work experience at three today, so…”
“I can amuse myself until then. Then, let’s meet up at the fountain and you can walk me home like a gentleman,” she grinned. “My little legs might get a little tired, so you might have to carry me.”
“Oh, so you want to kill me?” he laughed.
“Hey, there are worse ways to go, right? Ahaha!” And with that, he escorted her out back into the mall. He pretended to be angry with her, and she pretended to be upset, but both smiled and started to giggle the minute the other guards were out of earshot.
“Well, I’ve got a few hours to kill, might as well have some fun.” The shop ‘Pizza Party’ fell victim to Vikki’s ‘fun’, all with her dutiful admirer happily watching through the cameras, and warding off the other guards when they got called over or too close.

A few hours passed. Vikki snuck into a movie and slept off some of the pizza before an usher kicked her out at the end. She’d have gotten some payback, but obviously, she had someone to meet.

“Hey there, shrimp!” she called out to Darren as he sat by, waiting for her.
“Vikki!” he stood up as she waddled towards him. Her gut hung out even more than before, and her shirt now had plenty of gnashed pizza toppings to go with the ice cream stains. He glared, unable to believe she actually managed to make her gut bigger. “Are you ready to-“
Before he could finish, Vikki shoved him into the fountain, and fell on her enormous butt with laughter.

“AHAHAHA!” she cackled. “Oh man! Sorry Darren, but if we’re gonna go out, you’ll have to get used to it”
“Right,” Darren pulled himself out and squeezed the water out of his sleeve. He certainly didn’t like what she did, but he did admire how she didn’t pretend to be sweet and friendly just for him. This was the real Vikki.

The walk home was mostly uneventful, but pleasant. Vikki’s footsteps were loud, and the contents of her stomach gurgled and shook as she waddled. Every second word out of her mouth seemed to come with a wet burp.
“So I tied-URRP, tied him to the jungle gym and BRAHP made him watch me eat his URRAP lunch.”

“This is the place?” It was a surprisingly nice house. A lush garden, complete with fountain in the front lawn two stories tall, an expensive car in the drive way, and a pool in the back from the looks of things. Darren admitted to himself that he expected a rundown, dinky flat.
“Yep! Home sweet home!” She sniffed the air; she could already smell her mom’s cooking steaming out through the window. “Come on, Shrimp! Your date’s hungry!” She dragged him by the arm to the front door and slammed her fist against it.
“MOM! DAD! GET YOUR BUTTS OVER HERE, I’M HOME AND I’M HUNGRY!” she screamed, then turned and laughed at Darren. “Need to motivate them, y’know? Keep em’ on their toes. I MEAN IT, LET ME IN NOW!”

Just less than half a minute passed before the door opened, and Darren was introduced to Vikki’s parents.
Where will this story go next?

“A little, but I’ll get something when I get home.” Vikki grinned; he had the right idea.

Vikki waddled her way to her room upstairs as Darren patiently sat outside and waited for her. She’d have made him help, but she loved how each step creaked as she trod on it.

The back yard was very beautiful. The pool was large, there was a patio set up, and even a bar. Though from the looks of things, any alcohol had been replaced with soda, bottles of juice, chocolate sauce and the like; anything Vikki might want to drink.

A few minutes passed, and he heard her thumping footsteps descend the stairs. Soon, she stepped out the door wearing what looked like a two-piece swimsuit, with her huge gut hanging out hunrestricted.

“Whoa, that’s a bit revealing, isn’t it? Even for you,” Darren exclaimed, startled.
His fat date shrugged, “It was a one-piece when I put it on.” She smacked her belly, which sloshed, being both enormously fat, and packed full and tight. “You’re not complaining are you? You said my gut was gorgeous a minute ago.”

135332223222222222212111222132.title: Wake up at the hospital

choices: The nurse does something else for Vikki
1353322232222222222121112221321.content:
A young woman entered the room, wearing an old-fashioned nurse gown and hat. She had the facial features of a bubbly bimbo, with blonde poofy pigtails to match. Her figure was a modest hourglass figure, with her bust and butt looking very noticeable. Basically, she looked almost like Harley Quinn without the clown makeup and outfits.

She casually walked into the room with a trolley filled with various food. The top was covered with fatty foods like pizza, burgers, bowls of pasta, cheesesteaks, fries, onion rings, doughy breadsticks, and more. Underneath were large assortments of baked goods, pastries, and candies galore. It almost looked like everything was nearly falling off of the trolley with how everything was crammed inside.

Vikki's eyes were widening with surprise as she saw a large amount of food being driven towards her bed. Her mouth slowly began to drool as it grew closer and closer to her. The nurse placed the trolley on the left side of the bed, then proceeded to fluff Vikki's pillow.

"Hello sweetie," chimed the nurse in a thick New Yorkian accent as she pulled back, "I understand you had a little too much to eat by yourself yesterday!"

"Too much," replied Vikki as she looked almost insulted, "Lady, I hardly even started yesterday! I was ready for more before I conked out."

As if agreeing with her, Vikki's belly growled in hunger. The growl was so loud that it could've been heard from the nurse's station. Vikki was then surprised to see the nurse pull back on her blanket, as it revealed that her nightgown was hardly restraining the fat figure on this little girl. Vikki was about to say something, but the nurse proceeded to poke her belly gently. Then she placed her hand on it to feel it.

"So chunky, you feelin' hungry?"

Vikki looked surprised by the nurse's question, but then began to smile as she nodded to reply. The nurse then proceeded to lock the door for some privacy.

"Can't have any onlookers checkin' in on what we're doin', right piggy?"

The nurse giggled as she picked up a whole pizza, as the contents were slightly spilling off the sides from her grip. The aroma of the cheese, sauce, and grease felt intoxicating to Vikki. The nurse took two slices and stacked them together, then proceeded to bring the greasy pile to the young girl's mouth. She took a wide bite and savored the taste, then proceeded to eat the rest of the slice combo bite by bite. This process continued for a while until she ate the last two slices with fewer and quicker bites.

"Mmmm, that was *BUUUURP!* so good," exclaimed Vikki as she finished her pizza.

The nurse went back to the trolley to get more food for Vikki, who had been ambitious about being fed a lot of food. Seemed like her wish was coming true. Her belly was growling, still feeling a little hungry. Soon the nurse pulled out a tray filled with half a dozen cheeseburgers, each dripping in grease, cheese, and various condiments. She placed each burger in front of Vikki's face, leading her to chew at each one bite by bite until they disappeared. One by one, the burgers had soon been devoured by this obese bully. The result led to her belly peeking out a few extra inches, but it was only the beginning.

For a long while, the food began to disappear into Vikki's belly, which was beginning to feel extremely full from the feeding. Pasta was slurped up like crazy, cheesesteaks were munched away into nothing, fries and onion rings were chomped out of sight, breadsticks were dipped in sauces and then dipped into her throat, nachos gone, tacos gone, empanadas gone, fajitas gone, everything served in the top of the trolley was gone. All while making Vikki's belly stuffed and bloated, looking larger than a basketball but just as spherical and tight.

Vikki's feeding session was something she was hardly used to but enjoyed every minute of it. Even if her gut was tight and stuffed to maximum capacity, it was still worthwhile in the end. But then she saw the nurse pull out a yellow cake with chocolate icing and she began to feel greedy and eager.

"How 'bout dome dessert, fatty," asked the nurse as she held the cake up.

Vikki only nodded as she opened her mouth, allowing the nurse to feed her again. Slice after slice of the cake went into the maw of the young girl. By the time the cake was half gone, Vikki grabbed the cake and began to scarf it down without hesitation. The tightness of her gut was already increased just before she reached the halfway point of the cake, but it was hardly over for her. The nurse pulled out a tray of chocolate chip cookies, which led Vikki to alternate between handfuls of cookies and munching on more cake. Her eating habits hadn't changed despite her belly's capacity.

With a few last munches of the cake and the cookies turned to a faint pile of crumbs, the nurse prepared two thick eclairs for Vikki, who was still eager for more even as her belly was under tremendous pressure and pain. The chocolate and creme almost numbed the pain, even though she was just savoring the taste and loving her sense of gluttony. The nurse could only smile as this young girl ate to her heart's content and forced hunger cravings. Her belly surged further outward, looking more like an overinflated beach ball only tighter.

The nurse brought more sweets for Vikki; pies, donuts, croissants with fillings, even thick cinnamon buns. Each would be gobbled up by the bloated brat who had once been in a euphoric binge now gasping and breathing heavily from the amount of food she inhaled. Her belly was practically on her lap and getting close to her knees, as it nearly resembled a medicine ball. She licked her lips from the crumbs and smears left on her face, as part of her still felt eager for more despite nearly ready to explode.

The nurse swayed her figure and made her way back to the trolley, then pulled out a tall glass of a large drink. It was a thick strawberry milkshake with whipped cream and a cherry. Vikki's eyes widened at the sight of the beverage, her mouth feeling pretty dry just from looking at it. The nurse pulled a long straw out and placed one end in the shake and the other end towards Vikki's lips. She gently placed her lips to the other end without hesitation.

"Now just take your time, fatty," said the nurse in a calm yet catty fashion, "you can drink as much as you want, but we wouldn't want you to burst from going too fast with it, now would we?"

Vikki's body trembled slightly as she slowly began to drink the shake. The taste was practically intoxicating, sweeter than any other beverage. As she slowly gulped it down, she felt her body creak and noticed her belly pushing slowly outward again.

"It's a particular mixture, fatty," said the nurse as she gently poked her chubby cheek, "It's got more than strawberry syrup in there. It's got vanilla extract, a little cocoa powder, whole milk, heavy cream, vanilla ice cream, strawberry ice cream, a little lard, and some melted butter. Almost as much dairy in there to make you into a fat cow!"

As the nurse laughed, Vikki continued to drink the shake, beginning to take larger and quicker sips. This caused her belly to creak again, as the amount of food stuffed into this girl was more than what she could handle. But the taste buds and gluttony took over her mind more than the pain her belly felt, signaling for more food to enter her body. Soon she took out the straw and began to chug the rest of the shake like a ravenous beast. She lifted the glass up to let the last few drops drip in her mouth.

After licking it dry, she threw it away and placed her hands on her belly, as the pain began to show its full effect on her subconscious. She tried to rub it gently to ease the pain but her belly was so chocked full of food that her own hands weren't enough to lull the pain.

"Aww, does the laden hog feel too full?"

Vikki nodded and tried to speak, but a large burp was the only thing she could let out. The nurse cackled at the response, gently poking her tight belly like a child. Vikki didn't know how to feel about the situation. She would feel humiliated, but the gluttonous haze and pain from her feast was more overbearing than a simple person's jest. All she could do was rub her belly gently and make a few burps.
1353322232222222222121112221321.title: Nursing Vikki Or Just Spoiling Vikki?

1353322232222222222121112221322.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

…a man in a white coat and glasses with a clipboard, and a very worried expression.
“You’re awake, good. Good. How are you feeling?”
“Sleepy,” Vikki yawned. “And hungry.”
“Hungry? I see…” he jotted something down just quickly, then too his stethoscope and pressed it to the girl’s massive, ice cream filed belly. She flinched slightly, as the cold metal hit her stretched skin. “Hold still just a moment, please.”

She shivered; her stomach was chilly enough from all that ice cream as it was. A good lot of it had digested, but her stomach was still huge; her shirt still couldn’t hope to fit down all the way.

“That’s quite a ruckus you’ve got in there. Sounds like a marching band.” He laughed. Vikki rather liked the idea of eating a whole marching band… “My name is Dr. Price. What’s yours?”

Vikki didn’t answer, having more important things on her mind. “Am…I okay?” she asked, worried. Big and tough as she was, Vikki had a slight phobia about hospitals after getting a needle a few years ago.
“Oh, don’t worry,” smiled the doctor. “Some staff at the mall said you ate, well, an awful lot of ice cream. They were really worried you’d hurt yourself, but so far you seem alright. Personally, I wish I could eat half as much ice cream as you!” He seemed impressed by her enormous stomach; or at the very least, he wasn’t disgusted.

“It’s really not often we someone who can handle quite that much food.”
“You’re not gonna cut me open are you!? Do crazy tests on me?!”
“No, no, goodness no, we’re here to help. We’re just going to take your blood pressure and some x-rays of that ol’ tummy of yours. Just to make sure you’re okay.”
“Okay…”
“Maybe afterwards, we can have another talk. You tell me who your name so we can call your parents, and you can be back home in just a few short hours. Sound good?” He was very friendly, and managed to calm Vikki right down. “I’ll be back in just a few minutes. If you need anything, just hit that button and a nurse will be with you shortly. Okay?” She nodded, and he left with a smile.

Vikki laid herself back. Maybe this wouldn’t be so bad. Her bed was pretty comfortable, and after such a big meal, it’d be good to get some more rest. Heck, maybe these tests would be fun; she always wanted to see in inside of her full belly before.

But then again, it wasn’t like she was full; the only thing that stopped her from eating more was passing out. She hadn’t heard much good about hospital food, but it was food, nevertheless. And while she liked Dr. Price, she was quite keen on having someone new to push around…
