Dr. Price re-entered the room, smiling warmly and followed by two nurses, a man and a woman. “Alright kiddo, we’re ready for you now.”
The three of them wheeled her chair down a few hallways and into another room, though with great effort.
“Guess I need to hit the gym!” Dr. Price laughed, pretending the problem was with him and the nurses, rather than the enormously bloated patient. He of course didn’t know Vikki took utter pride in her weight.

This one was dark, and had a few strange machines that Vikki didn’t recognise at all. Basic hospital equipment, but she didn’t know that. It almost felt like being in a spaceship.

“Now, this is our X-Ray camera,” Price explained. “You know, the one that lets us see inside of you?” Vikki almost squealed with excitement and pulled the last little bit of her shirt that covered her belly off of it.
“Show me what’s in here! This is going to be so cool!”
“That’s the idea,” the doctor smiled at the cooperative patient, and the camera snapped a few pictures. “Now, just turn to the side, please.” The female nurse’s jaw dropped as Vikki did so, showing just how far the girl’s stomach stretched out.
“That’s ridiculous…” she exclaimed as another set of photos were snapped.
“Don’t be rude,” Price calmly told her. “She’s a patient, and we’re here to help.”
“But she’s so fat!”
“I don’t care if she’s green and breathing fire. You respect the patients,” he reasserted quite firmly. “That’ll do!”

Vikki plopped back on her bed, making it creak. She giggled excitedly at the thought of the x-rays. Dr. Price returned to her bedside.
“Very nice. We’ll have those developed shortly, and you can have a look.”
“Awesome!” Vikki shouted. “Now, you said something about blood pressure?”
Price nodded, and explained the process as he wrapped the band around her chubby arm. He started inflating it, but after a few pumps, it popped off.
“Oh, that’s…not common,” he laughed, but was partly concerned about the girl. “I’ll have a nurse fetch us a bigger one. For now, I believe those x-rays should be ready!” Vikki lifted and dropped her belly in excitement. It made a sloshing noise as it hit her legs. Kind and friendly as he was, Price gave her a strange look for it.

Taking the freshly photocopied x-rays, he began looking over the obese child’s insides.
“Come on, doc! I wanna see em’! I like you, and you really don’t want me to change that,” she said, ominously.
Doctor Price looked up at his enormous patient, then back down at the x-rays. “Interesting…”

13533222322222222221211122222.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Oh sure, definitely!” one of the teens said, much to the shock and surprise of their friend. “My buddy here can handle that while I work the kitchen.”
“D-dude, what?” the second guy whined before his friend abandoned him to this hungry customer. Vikki smiled sweetly at him, but her smile was…off. Like he could read her evil little mind.

He took a slice and pushed it towards her mouth. She opened wide, and engulfed the whole thing, taking a second to chew before swallowing and burping in his face. “More,” she said, simply.
And more he gave. He took two slices at a time, and she gobbled them both up in moments. This was a very strange feeling. She was way too old to be asking to be fed, and seemed way too fat to need food at all. Her firm, fat stomach jutted out, with a few ketchup stains and bread crumbs strewn over it, making it clear this wasn’t her first snack of the day.

He quickly got with the program and just began quickly shoving pizza slices at her. In mere moments, she had eaten two whole family sized pizzas.
“My god, how are you doing that?”
She looked at him, “Do I look like someone who hasn’t eaten a lot of pizza before?” She patted her stomach, and then yanked over another pizza dish, messily tearing it apart and smearing her face with pizza sauce. “Hey, did I tell you to stop?”
“Urgh…” he groaned, stepping up. He didn’t have to take this, he was going to make that clear.

Or he would have, but Vikki grabbed his arm and pulled him down. He was shocked; she was very strong for someone so young and out of shape.
“Where do you think you’re going? You heard him, your job is now to feed me.”
“Look kid, I-“
“Nuh-uh, I really mean it. This is your job now.” Her stomach growled, ominously. “You don’t serve pizzas any more, and you don’t work for Pizza Party. Your job is feeding ME pizza, and I’m gonna pay you in letting you feed ME more.”
She squeezed his arm, making him yelp in pain. “What…what is wrong with you?”
“I’ve got a hole in my belly, and it needs filling. Hey, just be glad I’m making this your job and not your life! You get to go home later; the next guy might not be so lucky!”

Vikki let go, and the employee stared at her. Then he sat down and fed her another slice. Her teeth bit down quickly, nipping his fingers and leaving a mark.
“YOUCH!”
Vikki’s grin widened as her belly roared. “Hey, not bad…”

choices: Chloe Lets Dawn Rub Her Tummy.
Chloe Doesn't Let Dawn Rub Her Tummy.
1353322232222222222322223233231.content:
"BURRRRRRRP!!!!!" Chloe belched, laying back in her seat, rubbing her stuffed belly. She had just finished the breakfast that her mother, Alice, had prepared for her. "Was that good, sweetie?" Alice asked with a smile, knowing what the answer would be. "Delicious," Chloe moaned, feeling very bloated. Her younger sister, Dawn, sat in the seat next to her, applauding Chloe's binge. "Chloe can eat anything!" Dawn cheered, before giving a celebratory howl. Chloe smiled. "Thanks, S' more," she said, patting the little tyke's head, then patting Dawn's belly. "But don't forget to finish your breakfast," she added, tickling the little Collie's tummy. Dawn laughed and blushed; Chloe was the one that came up with the nickname, "S' more", and it seemed to fit, given the colors of Dawn's fur. She had the light golden brown of graham crackers, the dark brown of chocolate, and the creamy white of marshmallows.

Ever since Dawn's parents adopted Chloe into the family after the latter's parents disowned her for not conforming to the society of upper-class animals, the two puppies had gotten along well. Chloe was already sporting a bit of a belly by then since she gained weight just to spite her snobbish poodle parents; food not being a problem since they lived in a mansion and had personal chefs. Thankfully, Dawn's father, Aaron, worked a well-paying job, so they were able to accommodate Chloe into their family, especially since Dawn wanted a sister, no matter which breed she was. Now, Chloe lived happily with her Collie family in a comfortable home in the suburbs.

Dawn quickly ate the rest of her breakfast, which Chloe rewarded with a tummy rub. Dawn moaned in pleasure. She was only one year younger than Chloe but was still thin before Chloe was adopted. After seeing Chloe binge for a while, Dawn wanted to follow in her sister's footsteps and was starting to obtain her very own layer of fat, not considering whether or not she wanted to gain weight just for the fun of it.

After both sisters brought their dishes to their mom to wash, they walked over to the living room. Once on the couch, Chloe turned on the TV so they could watch some cartoons. All the while, Dawn kept focusing on her sister's big belly. Chloe did have smaller layers of fat on her limbs, and, if you look closely, the slight beginning of a second chin. But her belly was what stuck out most. It was round as a ball and looked almost two-and-a-half months pregnant. Dawn was fascinated at how big it was, especially since Chloe's red pajamas could barely cover it, only showing a sliver of it. Dawn only had a slight muffin-top, meaning her pink pajamas could still fully cover it, but only barely. As Chloe rubbed her dome of a tummy, Dawn tried to reach over to rub it as well.

...got up to leave the room.

"I suggest we wait a while," she said. "Let's give Silver's tummy some time to digest its recent snack," she continued, turning to the empty box of donuts. "I'll inform your aunt Poppy about the buffet, so we can all go together." Aunt Poppy had moved into their home almost two months ago. After her boyfriend broke up with her, Poppy had no home; so Sunny agreed to let her stay, as long as she could pay the rent. She was also a great cook, and Silver loved her meals and thought she was a master chef, but Poppy's current job was stocking shelves at the supermarket.

Sunny left the room, and Grey turned back to her plump sister. "Now, where were we?" asked Grey teasingly. "You were about to rub my tummy," Silver replied, pushing her belly further outward. Grey immediately started caressing the furry dome that was her sister's belly. The more rubbing her belly received, the less full Silver felt, and more excited to continue eating.

"What do you think the buffet will have?" she asked excitedly. Grey started pondering, "Well, they might have all kinds of food. They might have Italian, Mexican, Chinese food, and many other fattening foods." The thought of so much food made Silver drool and her tummy roar in excitement.

A few hours later, everyone was getting ready to go to the buffet. Aunt Poppy was waiting at the car, while Grey walked Silver out the front door. "Are you excited to go to the buffet?" asked Poppy encouragingly. Grey just smiled, while Silver jumped with excitement, jiggling her belly. Her mother had asked her to put on a sweater so that everyone wouldn't see her big belly exposed, but it still only showed a tiny bit.

They arrived at the buffet and walked in to see all kinds of families; there were bears, deer, eagles, leopards, foxes, etc. They made it to their booth, ordered their drinks, and Grey walked Silver to the buffet. Silver could smell all kinds of food; pizza, fried chicken, meatloaf, ice cream, cookies, it all just made her belly growl impatiently. "Don't worry, girl. You'll get your food," she said to her tummy.
1353322232222222222322223233232121221.title: Left The Room And Grey Rubbed Silver’s Tummy

choices: Silver ate the entire meal and Grey got her dessert.
Silver didn't finish it and felt full.
13533222322222222223222232332321212211.content:
Silver stayed close to Grey as they made their way to the buffet. "What do you want to eat?" Grey asked. "Everything," Silver thought to herself, but she wasn't sure if she could eat absolutely everything in the buffet, despite her empty tummy saying otherwise. "Surprise me!" she said eventually.

Grey nodded eagerly, and Silver walked back to the booth where her mother and aunt were sitting, just as their drinks arrived; Silver had ordered chocolate milk. "Where's your food, sweetie?" asked Sunny. "Grey's getting it for me," her daughter responded, "I told her to surprise me." Silver's belly growled impatiently. She rubbed it soothingly, trying to calm it down until the food got here. A minute-and-a-half later, Grey returned with Silver's food. And boy, was it a lot! She had gathered two plates, one filled with pasta and meatballs with four slices of garlic bread, the other was stacked high with meatloaf, fried chicken, and pizza. Sunny and Poppy were both amazed at how much Grey had gathered for her sister. It showed just how much she cared about Silver.

Silver's belly growled even louder at the sight of it, so loud that even the people sitting behind them heard it. "If you finish all that," said Grey, "then I will get you dessert." Hearing this made Silver determined to eat her entire meal. She immediately started digging in, starting with the pasta. She twirled as much pasta as she could on her fork, then swallowed it in one big gulp, continuing this way until every last noodle was gone. Silver quickly devoured her meatballs, finishing the last one just as Grey returned with her own meal, a large Caesar salad. Grey loved fattening her sister, but she did want to be healthy herself, thinking she had to be to take care of Silver.

As their mother and aunt went to get their own food, Grey watched as Silver finished her first plate, licking her fingers and not leaving a single crumb untouched. After that, Silver immediately moved on to her second plate and started digging into the meatloaf, feeling her tummy expanding with every bite. Grey watched while slowly eating her salad, enthralled by how much her little sister could pack it away.

Eventually,
13533222322222222223222232332321212211.title: Grey gathers a lot of food for Silver.

135332223222222222232222323323212122111.content:
…Silver finished the 2nd plate as well. The fat, young, child looked extra round after eating so much. Her gut stuck out even further than before. It pushed up her sweater, as big as it was, and showed off a nice, large, sliver of her fat, wolf cub, tummy

“Wow! I didn’t think you’d eat it all so fast!” Grey said, still working on her own salad

The teen was only half-way finished her small dinner. True, part of that was due to how much attention she gave to her younger sister. Still, what it really showed was just how gluttonously hungry this plump, preteen, cub really was

Silver let out a nice, loud, burp that, once again, alerted the table next to them before she nodded at her older sister’s comment

“Yeah. I’m REALLY hungry though. Can I have some more please?” She asked her sis, giving her older sibling, literal, puppy dog eyes

Of course, Grey wasn’t going to be able to resist her “little” sister’s request. She put down her fork and nodded at the chubby cub

“Sure. I promised you dessert if you ate everything and I’ll go and bring you somethi…”

It was then Silver interrupted her, asking her to get…
135332223222222222232222323323212122111.title: Silver ate the entire meal and Grey got her des...

choices: Silver finished the whole dessert and was full.
Silver doesn't finish and asks Grey to feed it to her.
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
"Grey, could you please get me a huge dessert?" Silver asked, still using her puppy eyes. Grey just smiled; she would gladly get Silver a huge meal anytime, whether she begged with her eyes or not. Grey got up and walked over to the dessert section. She knew that whatever they had, she would gather a lot of it for Silver. When she arrived, she was amazed by the selections they had. There were brownies, three different cookie flavors (chocolate chip, sugar, snickerdoodle), marshmallows, chocolate and caramel sauce, and of course, soft-serve ice cream, in chocolate, vanilla, and swirl. Grey stared in wonder at the spread that lay before her. If this didn't fill her sister up, then nothing would.

She immediately set to work; she filled three bowls to the brim with ice cream, then topped each bowl with both chocolate and caramel sauces, then piled a plate with brownies, all three cookie flavors, and two handfuls of marshmallows. She carefully carried it all on a tray back to her table, not noticing the few pairs of eyes that turned towards her and her massive dessert until she was back at the table. Her mother and aunt, who had just returned with their meals, were amazed at how big Silver's dessert was. Before they could comment, Silver began devouring the dessert before Grey had even set the tray down.
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: A BIG Dessert!

1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
The young, wolf, girl began to greedily wolf down her dessert. It was as if she hadn’t eaten a bite at the buffet yet! Even her mother gasped at this display. Sure, the adult wolf had seen her child pig out before, but not usually this fast, or this publicly

Silver didn’t care about her gluttonous display. She was a fat, hungry, little girl and had a heaping pile of dessert in front of her. She only cared about getting it into her, ever-growing, cub tummy. So, she gleefully ate down the bowls of ice cream, only taking a break between each to munch on a couple of cookies. This helped keep down any brain freezes the chubby child might get from her rapid gorging

As Silver reached the last bowl, however, she stopped. Not that she was finally full. No, she still had plenty of room in that ball of a belly of hers. No, she had a better idea on how to finish off her dessert

She looked over at Grey, who was happily staring at her this whole time, and, once again, flashed puppy-dog eyes at her older sis and cutely asked,

“Grey, could you please feed me the rest?”

Grey couldn’t resist a request like that. She quickly got out of her seat and began to feed her round, little, sister
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: Silver doesn't finish and asks Grey to feed...

1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
Grey quickly finished the last two bites of her salad, then started feeding Silver the rest of her dessert, starting with the second bowl of ice cream. Silver took each bite with pleasure, keeping both her hands on her big belly. After the second bowl, Grey then fed her more of the cookies, along with a few brownies. As Silver took large bites out of each cookie and brownie, crumbs fell all over her sweater and her visible tummy, but she didn't mind. She was more concentrated on being stuffed with all this delicious food.

Sunny and Poppy watched in amazement. Sunny rather enjoyed the show her daughters were putting on for her, while Poppy was more perplexed. Poppy knew that Silver loved food and that Grey loved feeding Silver, but had never really seen much of it for herself, except occasionally in passing. Peeked with curiosity, she decided to ask her nieces, the next morning, about why they did this.

As Grey and Silver got to the final bowl of ice cream, Silver was starting to feel a little full. She noticed that besides the last bowl of ice cream, there was only one cookie and one brownie left. Silver was determined to finish her dessert, right down to the last crumb. Grey noticed her sister was getting a little full, but when Silver put on a determined face, Grey smiled at her sister's eagerness to finish her entire dessert. Grey started feeding her large spoonfuls of ice cream every two seconds, and Silver wolfed them down with ease. After she finished the ice cream, Silver's belly was starting to feel a bit tight. "Come on, tummy," she thought, "we only have one more cookie and brownie left."

Grey looked concerned. "Are you alright, Silver? You're looking a bit full."

Silver nodded. "I'm fine. May I finish my dessert, please?"

Grey sighed; this wasn't the first time Silver ate past fullness. Both of them knew Silver's tummy could handle it. Grey obliged, holding the cookie and brownie in each hand. Silver finished the cookie in two large bites, then rubbed her tummy as it felt tighter. There was only one brownie left, and Silver wanted to finish it, no matter how full she was. Silver opened her mouth wide, grabbed the entire brownie with it, chewed it in two bites, and swallowed.

Grey smiled at her sister's successful binge. "Great job, Silver," she congratulated, then gave her a big hug. Silver moaned in pain, causing Grey to let go. "Sorry. Does your tummy hurt?"

Silver nodded, closing her eyes and moaning from the pain of her stuffed belly. Her tummy was so stuffed and so big, her sweater had ridden up way past her belly button. "I feel so full," Silver moaned. Grey instantly knew what to do; she began rubbing Silver's belly in smooth, slow circles. Silver's groaning slowly subsided until she was moaning softly with pleasure. She loved having her belly rubbed since it always removed the feeling of being too full.

After Sunny and Poppy finished their meals, and Sunny paid the check, they got back in the car to go home. Despite Silver's bloated belly making it tricky to buckle in, her mother managed to close the seat belt, and they drove home.
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: Silver Is Finally Full

choices: The Whole Family Comes Down For Breakfast
Only Silver Comes Down For Breakfast
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
The next morning the first to wake up wasn’t Grey. It wasn’t Sunny either and surely wasn’t Silver. After all, her full belly ensured the fat, little, cub a good night’s sleep. No, the wolf who awoke first was Poppy

Still in her dotted nightgown, the older, slender, wolf came into the kitchen to get a pot of coffee going and to fix breakfast for the family. After all, she liked to help out when she could. It was the least she could do to thank Sunny for letting her stay with them

However, as she began to fix apple-cinnamon waffles, her specialty, she began to ponder the events of last night. She couldn’t believe what had happened. Yes, she knew Silver had a big appetite, but had never really seen her pig out that much. It helped to explain how the child had become so large

What caused her to be even more perplexed was how Grey seemed to enjoy feeding her younger sister. Not to mention their very public belly rubbing session. As her thin build showed, Poppy was a firm believer in good eating and exercise. This who situation wasn’t sitting well with her. She was not at all fond of how large Silver was becoming, or how little her mother seemed to care about it
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: The next morning.

1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
After cooking a few waffles, Poppy could hear heavy footsteps coming down the stairs. At first, she thought it was Sunny, but, turns out, it was Silver. The little wolf cub waddled eagerly towards the table, her massive, jiggling belly peeking out from her red pajamas and giving a loud, hungry rumble. She must have been the first to wake up by the smell of breakfast and probably her rumbly tummy.

"Good morning, Aunt Poppy," said Silver cheerfully, not sounding groggy at all. It would seem that the smell of breakfast is enough to deprive her of tiredness. Almost immediately after, Grey walked in as well, in her sleeveless white crop top and elastic black shorts, rubbing her eyes and giving a big stretch. It seemed that Grey always liked tops that showed her midsection, even if she was pencil-thin. "Morning, Aunt Poppy," Grey yawned. Since it was summer break, they didn't need to wake up early.

Poppy asked Grey to help set up the table, and the 15-year-old wolf set to work. She began setting out plates, followed by utensils, then pouring four glasses of milk, occasionally sneaking a little belly rub for Silver. By the time Grey had finished, Poppy had cooked enough more than waffles for everyone, with a few extra for Silver, and Sunny had entered the dining room, wearing her golden, striped nightgown that fit snugly around her. Sunny wasn't as thin as Poppy and Grey, but she wasn't fat. She didn't exercise as much as Poppy, but wasn't as unhealthy an eater as Silver.

"Good morning, mom(my)," her two daughters greeted. "Good morning, everybody," she replied groggily. She gave both daughters a good morning kiss on the cheek and an additional one on Silver's exposed belly, to which Silver's tummy gave a happy rumble in response. Sunny pulled out the butter and maple syrup, while Poppy brought over the stacks of waffles.

Silver drooled at the stack of waffles, until Grey told her to stop drooling. "You're the best cook ever, Aunt Poppy!" Silver said happily, as her tummy rumbled in agreement, "GRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWLLLLLLLLLL!"

Poppy was feeling conflicted; on the one hand, she was pleased that her family enjoyed her cooking, but on the other hand, she was concerned about her youngest niece's gluttony. Everyone took their seat at the table.

Once everyone had waffles on their plates, they spread butter and/or syrup on their waffles and began to eat, with Silver eating hers in large bites for a cub her age. As Poppy watched her youngest niece devour her breakfast, she noticed Grey and Sunny smiling at the show Silver was putting on for them. Poppy decided to ask about all this gluttony while they were still at the table.

She took a deep breath and asked, "Silver, why do you like eating so much?" Everyone stopped to look at Poppy, until after 30 seconds, Silver responded, "Because I like being fat." "And I enjoy feeding her," Grey added, patting her sister's belly, which growled loudly that breakfast stop, abruptly.

"Isn't there a reason? It can't be just because."

"I love the feeling of being big and full," Silver continued, rubbing her belly with one hand, while the other kept feeding waffle bites into her mouth, albeit slower. "It's such a wonderful feeling, and it looks amazing, the way my belly peeks out." "And feeding her and rubbing her belly makes me happy," added Grey, joining in on the belly rubbing.

"Not to mention," interrupted Sunny, "that it helps them bond greatly. I've never seen them get along so well from anything other than this. I'd say that as long as they get along swimmingly, then they shall continue their feeder-feedee relationship."

Poppy....
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: Family Breakfast

choices: Purposefully Gave Silver A Small Helping
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
Poppy was in shock by what she was seeing, and hearing, from her sister’s family. She couldn’t believe that they were all okay with Silver getting so large and indulging her gluttonous appetite like this. Sunny’s attitude especially bothered her. True, she loved it when her nieces bonded, but they didn’t need to do it by causing poor, little, Silver to get so big!

“Well that might be true Silver, but there is something to be said for good eating habits.” Poppy replied to the chunky youngster

She had a lot more to say to her mother about this. However, this wasn’t her child and wasn’t even her home. She’d have to broach the subject very delicately. So, she held her tongue for the moment as the waffle maker dinged, signaling it was time to eat

Silver, especially, lit up as she heard the buzzer go off. The chunky, little, wolf cub licked her lips as she climbed up into her chair. Grey sat next to her and could clearly see just how big her little sister’s tummy had gotten. Her pjs couldn’t contain her bulging belly and a nice, big, sliver of blubber poked out between her pj top and bottom. She looked even bigger now that she was sitting down, drooling for waffles

Poppy just sighed as she brought the waffles over and she…
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: ...disagrees.

choices: After breakfast, Poppy talks to Sunny.
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
...reluctantly gave Silver extra waffles. Poppy wanted her little niece to eat the proper amount, but knew that if she gave Silver a small helping right this moment, the little wolf would just beg for more until she finally got more. Her mood didn't change when she heard the little cub's tummy growl ravenously once the waffles were set in front of her. Grey helped pour a lot of maple syrup over her sister's waffles, causing Silver to drool at the delicious sight that stood before her.

She only snapped back to reality after her tummy let out a thundering, "ROOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Silver quickly came to her senses and turned to face her aunt.

"Thank you for breakfast, Aunt Poppy!" Silver thanked, patting her empty tummy before diving right into her food. Silver may eat like a gluttonous pig, but at least she has some manners.

Poppy sighed. She did appreciate Silver's kind words, but wasn't impressed by her niece's gluttonous behavior that followed.

She just didn't understand what fascinated her family about a little kid pigging out nonstop. She decided, as soon as everyone was finished with breakfast, to first talk to Sunny about it, then talk to both her nieces. Might as well, since a couple of Silver and Grey's friends were coming over tonight for a slumber party.

For now, though, she was stuck watching Silver scarf down waffle after waffle with determination. Poppy also couldn't help but notice the wolf cub's tummy expanding after each waffle, and noticed Sunny and Grey smiling at Silver's gluttony.

She was pleased that her family loved her cooking, but not at the expense of the youngest fattening herself up to immense proportions! She had to put a stop to this as soon as she could.
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: Gave Silver A Large Helping

choices: Let It Slide And The Conversation Went Elsewhere
Fought Back A Little At Poppy’s Comment
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
Poppy knew she needed to say something to Sunny about all of this. After all, she was their mother. She was the 1 responsible for keeping her daughter’s weight in check. Family unity was no excuse for her chunky niece to be eating like this

Just looking at the sight brought a mix of astonishment and horror to the slender wolf. Seeing the young, wolf, cub wolf down so much food so quickly. Seeing her, already large, tummy swell with each bite she took. Worse yet, seeing the smile on Silver’s face made it all the worse for her

It took a while for everyone to clear out. After all, Grey had to rub, and play, with her little sister’s tummy. However, when that was done, the 2 girls left to enjoy the rest of the day. As they did so, Sunny stayed behind to help clean up

“So Silver sure does love her eating…” Poppy began, trying to bring up the subject as delicately as she could

“Yes she does. Of course, Grey enjoys Silvers eating just as much.” Sunny nodded and replied, giggling a little

“Well, as I said, there is something about maintaining proper eating habits. It’s never a good thing to for kids to eat TOO much…” she added as she began to wash the dishes alongside Sunny

Sunny…
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: After breakfast, Poppy talks to Sunny.

1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
Sunny sighed. She knew where her younger sister was going with this, but didn't want to slip into a heated argument; it wasn't in the nature of her name. She took a deep breath, and calmly spoke.

"I understand why you think that," Sunny replied nonchalantly, "but you should also know that not everyone likes to be thin. Some like to be fat, while others are ok being in between."

Poppy sighed. She had heard this response before, and it still didn't sit well with her. "I understand that not everyone is super thin, but they can still be healthy eaters."

Sunny nodded, feeling her own figure. She was well aware that she had a barely noticeable amount of pudge on her frame, and didn't exercise as much as her sister, but still ate a balanced enough diet.

"You should also know," Sunny continued, "that at Silver's current size and weight, it would take forever for her to lose any weight. Not that she would have the energy nor motivation."

Poppy went silent for a moment. She didn't consider that. "Even so, something has to be done, for if she keeps eating only junk food, and never moves a single muscle, she's not going to live very long to enjoy eating."

Sunny took this into consideration. She knew Silver's gluttonous habits, as well as Grey's feeding habits, and she knew that changing their habits would be near impossible. She had to come up with a solution that would allow them to continue their feeding hobby, and keep Silver healthy enough for Poppy to be satisfied. Eventually, she came up with a solution.

"All right, Poppy," she sighed, "how about this: Silver can continue eating to her heart's, and tummy's, content, as long as she includes a fruit or vegetable in her meals and moves a bit every few hours? She won't be thin like you want her to be, but at least she'll eat a little more healthy and be a bit more active."

Poppy pondered this as she finished cleaning the last of the dishes. It wouldn't be like she wanted, but at least it was something. As soon as she set the last plate on the drying rack, she decided....
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: Fought Back A Little At Poppy’s Comment

1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.content:
It was Poppy’s turn to sigh at her sister. True, this was a bit better than what was happening currently. However, the thin wolf knew she was right. Allowing such a little girl to be so big wasn’t at all good for her. Besides, just because it would take time and effort didn’t mean that Silver should do nothing to lose that extra weight

However, the wolf woman didn’t see a way to do anything more at the moment. After all, Silver wasn’t her child and this wasn’t her house. As much as she hated what Sunny was doing to her chunky niece, she had no choice but to accept her terms

Poppy simply nodded as she finished cleaning the dishes, hoping this would calm things down a bit. She’d think about how to get her pudgy, preteen, housemate to slim down more another time. She wouldn’t give up on this

Not knowing what Poppy was thinking, Sunny smiled at her nod. She was glad to sister came around to her way of thinking. She didn’t really care whether Silver was fat, or not. Oh, she did care about her heath. That much was true, despite what Poppy thought about her. It was just she knew how happy Silver was with her eating and how it helped her and Grey bond. Beside, at her last check up, Silver was in perfect health, despite her weight
1353322232222222222322223233232121221112.title: She agrees.

1412111.content:
By: remoryoshi

The mouse boy felt himself slowly slipping down a slimy tube, it was hot and wet and rather uncomfortable, this was not how he had expected to spend his day, nor had he expected in any way that it would be his last. Only a few seconds after his head had gone down the wolf boy's throat, he felt some of the pressure on his face release, and then he knew were he was, his whole body was now sitting in someone else's stomach, he felt the area around him shift and then his whole world seemed to jostle for a while, he figured the wolf must be going somewhere else, "probably to find a nice spot to digest me" the mouse muttered sadly under his breath. The movement stopped, and he sensed that James had sat down.

For a short time, the mouse was horrified, worried about what would come next, he calmed down after about a minute when he realized nothing was happening. This calmed him down a bit, so much so in fact that he began to enjoy his arrangements, James had just fallen asleep, and he was rather enjoying the cozy warmth and the rising and falling of James' chest was rocking him gently. The only thing bothering him was his wet clothes. He was so calmed by the situation, that he didn't notice the fact that the lack of oxygen was starting to affect him, and that he was losing some feeling in most of his body from its attempt to keep his brain working. When James' stomach began to digest him, the mouse was nearly asleep, he felt a small tingling all over his tail, and around his bum, also, he began to feel a small drip of something on his belly and in other places, he wasn't sure what this was at first, but after a few seconds of pondering, he realized what was happening. He became somewhat sad when he came to the realization that he was being digested, this was it, the end of the day, the end of all days... for him anyway. He was still really young, so he wasn't sure what was going to happen to him, he just knew that when he ate food, he'd stuff his belly up, til it was nice and round and tight, then after a little nap, it would be smaller and softer, and then he would go to the bathroom. He knew a little about digestion, mainly that his teachers told him it happened to food you ate, and when it was done the food was gone, he assumed he would be too when it was over.

After a minute, the tingling sensation he had felt was all over his body, though he didn't feel it on his tail anymore, and the tingling had begun to hurt a bit, not a whole lot, but it was annoying, however the calm of his environment offset the pain a bit, what he didn't know was that the lack of oxygen to his brain was numbing the pain a lot. He couldn't feel his tail anywhere, which scared him a bit. He felt on his belly because he could feel that dripping feeling again, but it felt weird, like it was deeper, he put his finger on his tummy, and he couldn't feel his fur anymore, and the skin on his belly felt somewhat sticky and mushy, he also felt the pressure of his finger on it, it felt like it was thinner and somewhat harder, he felt around on the mushiness trying to find where the dripping feeling was, when he found his bellybutton. He realized the juices on him must have done that, he realized then how digestion worked, the juice would slowly make stuff melt away, he felt a small sense of achievement in this, as it was something the mouse had always been confused about.

A minute later, the mouse realized he couldn't feel the sensation on his legs and most of his lower body anymore,he felt for them but felt only mush and a burning sensation, he felt his belly again, this time finding it felt like a wet paper bowl full of old cereal, he could no longer make out the shape of his stomach, just slushiness. a little later he tried moving his arms. but, he realized his arms were shorter, much shorter, in fact he found that there was nothing below his elbow he could feel, it was also getting hard for him to breathe, and he felt very sleepy, the mouse resolved that this must be it, the part the wolf boy's stomach had been working towards, He tried shifting his weight, but succeeded only in barely propping himself up, and in the motion, he felt a load of gooey weight roll out of where his belly used to be, it didn't matter, he had moved himself to a comfier position now, and closed his eyes. He thought to himself "This wasn't so bad, it hurt all over, but not very bad, and other than that it was comfy. I hope that wolf boy is happy, no point in being mad at him... I suppose... I'll... rest now.." and fell asleep, he was pretty sure he wouldn't wake up again, but he was too out of it to care.

The mouse boy's body slowly digested away, at no small effort to James' stomach, his tummy was working hard, like it always did when he devoured his classmates. The boy's torso slowly sank into the sludge, melting away bit by bit over a few minutes and finally, his head, which already had a hole in the top of it, fell, letting loose the melted remains of what used to be the mouse boy's young brain. As the final remaining parts melted into mush, the young wolf's stomach let loose something it had been building up, opening at the top and producing a loud burp, which nearly woke young James from his sleep. Moments later, the first segment of the pool of digested mouse was sent down James' intestinal tract, followed by more and more, slowly causing the young wolf's belly to decrease in size, while at the same time depositing a little bit of belly fat into his young, and now very happy tummy.

James awoke from a very restful sleep to find that his belly was now much smaller, he felt it, it was a bit pudgier now, but he couldn't feel anything of the mouse boy he had eaten earlier. He noticed that the sky was now much darker, and he didn't hear any noise, he heard his belly rumble as it churned away at anything that might left of the delicious meal, and then he realized he had to go to the bathroom, badly. He went inside the school, but no one was there, he realized he must have slept all day!

"Oops! Aw man, how will I explain this to mom? Oh well, I have to pee." James thought aloud, and he went into the school bathroom to relieve his bladder. He finished up, and then it hit him, he needed the toilet even more now, it seems the mouse had reached his final destination rather quickly!

He sighed again and pushed some of his brown hair from out of his blue eyes as he looked over to the seat next to him. He grinned a bit as the sight of Shaura came into view.

The fat little 10 year old grey wolf cub with long purple hair was also pretty board with the lesson. She liked school but this was just too much for her. Not only that but it did little to help take her mind off of how hungry she was. She hadnt eaten anything for almost 2 hours and her fat young belly really wanted something inside it.

She looked over at her boyfriend of 2 months or so and smiled weakly. She knew this was torcher on everyone and didnt want to see her human feeder being put through this unbearableness. She decided to brighten his day a bit as she leaned back in her chair slightly, her big belly pushing against the desk in front of her as well as her yellow shirt and dark grey sweat pants. She slowly began to rub the gut very showingly for her puppy loves benefit. She could just see his eyes light up at the sight and couldnt help but let out a little giggle before sticking her big belly out even more for him to see.

Their fun was interrupted though as
14411.title: School!

choices: Romantic lunch at the Playground with Timmy
144111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Shaura,” called out the teacher, Mrs. Wicker as she stepped over. “Dear, could you please put your…belly away?”

“I um, I can’t,” Shaura lied. “My shirt doesn’t fit right…” she sighed, and tried to pull her shirt over he fat stomach. True, her shirt was far too small, but it fit a little better than she let on.

“Do you remember our talk about buying some better fitting clothes?”

“But miss, my family’s too poor to buy any more!” Another lie, of course. Her mother fully supported her daughter’s fat physique, and would spend hundreds on her per meal.

Shaura’s fat antics were becoming all too common for her put-upon teacher, so she decided to let her win this one. “Okay, but…just, could you not shake yourself like a bowl of jello while class is in session? The last thing we need right now is a distraction,” she clapped her hands, suddenly waking up half of the snoozing class.

The wolf cub rolled her eyes. Maybe if she waited until the bell rang, she could catch her teacher alone and …well, eat her alive. She was both a glutton and a wolf, after all. It’s not like anyone would miss the boring woman. But class had just started…that seemed like a whole year away.
Fine, if her teacher didn’t want her there, why should she stick around? “I uh, actually really need to use the bathroom. Mom made a biiiiig dinner last night.” So much for pretending to be poor.
“Fine, go ahead,” she said with just a hint of relief. Without a word, Shaura pulled herself up and waddled out the door. Just before leaving, she looked back at Timmy and winked.

“Oh, well, I’ll need an escort, too. I don’t want to run into any b-b-bullies!”
“Oh, yes, of course. Can we have someone to go with-“ Timmy was out of his chair before she could say another word.

The second after closing the door behind themselves, the two leaned in for a smooch. They only stopped because they kept giggling.
“Your brain must be as big as your belly! I thought we’d never get out of there!”
Shaura giggled, putting an arm over his shoulder. “And you’re usually my knight in shining armour. Mrs. Wicker knows how long my bathroom breaks are, so we basically have all day.” She shook her large butt in victory over her boring teacher. Putting her arm around her boyfriend’s shoulder, he in turn put a hand around her waist an on her belly.

“So, until that lunch bell rings, the school is all ours! Which is good, because you need all the room you can get!” she hook her gut, making both of them laugh. “So what does the most beautiful girl in the world want to do?”

“Hmmm,” Shaura wrapped a purple strand of hair around her finger as she pondered. On the one hand, she was starving! And she knew one of the older classes was practicing some play in the drama hall. The dark, spooky drama hall, where nobody would see her…
But, of course, there was Timmy. Wonderful boyfriend that he was, he’d brought his backpack with him, and it was always filled with sweets and treats for her. He didn’t know what was sweeter, him, or the candy. She did know he needed another big smooch, though.
144111.title: Escaping the classroom

1441111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Timmy got his smooch then and there. Quick, but beautiful. Her puffy, fuzzy cheeks smooshed against his face, her fat belly engulfed his body, and her arms squeezed him closer still. It was all the fun of being trapped in her belly, without the unfortunate ending. And he was a good kisser, himself; anyone who could see Shaura’s wagging tail could tell you that.

“Ahh!” she pulled away, but licked him once on the cheek for good measure. ”Well, first, I could do with a few snacks…and then a big one!”
“A big one?” he grinned back, taking a cream bun out of his backpack.
“A big one!” she tapped a little poster on the wall with some kids on it, before swallowing the bun whole.

Shaura explained her plan (if you could call her vague idea a ‘plan’) and the two headed across the school to the Drama Hall. By the time they got there, Shaura had eaten six cream buns, two croissants, five bags of chips, and a juice box. It didn’t do much to sate her hunger.

“Remember the plan, Timmy?”
“Aye aye, captain!” he saluted excitedly as they quietly pushed open the door. Most of the class was on stage together, paying no mind to the two as they crept in, quietly. Fat as she was, Shaura was still a wolf, and an expert hunter. She ducked behind a chair, then snuck behind a curtain, holding her belly up so it didn’t hang into view.

Timmy, however, waltzed up and greeted the few of the teens not down the back, rehearsing. He told them some story about Mrs. Wicker sending him, asking if their class could see the play when it was ready. It made Shaura’s job much easier.

The older students liked to spread rumours about the drama hall being haunted. There were dozens of different stories, but none were true, of course. But now, Shaura was going to give them a true story to tell, if anyone got out of there…

“I can’t sing to a plant!” one of the actors, a rabbit boy, sighed.
“It’s Little Shop of Horrors, John!” growled the teacher. “Roughly half the play is you singing to the plant! You’re going to have to eventually!”
“That thing eats me later, it creeps me out!” He couldn’t stand to look at the big plant puppet for very long. “Can I go on a break, please?”
“Fine, fine!” the teacher sighed. “We’ll start again in five minutes, but please take this seriously, everyone else is!”

John turned away and walked to the dark at the edge of the stage, and came to the stairs. He reached to push away the curtain, but instead touched something soft and fuzzy. Shaura giggled.
“Terry? Oh, sorry about that, I-“ John sank into the darkness without every realizing some child was swallowing him down. If he ever did realize it, it was only after it was far too late to do anything about it.
She held both hands over her mouth to keep her roaring burp contained. Getting someone in her tummy felt wonderful, but if she was going to really pig out, she’d need to be careful…

She saw two options from here…sneak around the back and hide in the costume closet. Plenty of stuff to hide in in there, and most of them would need to go in there to put their outfits back eventually.
Or maybe she could sneak over and hide in the plant! No, it wasn’t nearly as good an idea, and sneaking inside would be hard, but the puppet was meant to swallow up the actors anyway, it was too funny to resist!
1441111.title: Sara haunts the Drama Hall

14411111.content:
addition by: phrooglefa (38)

Shaura really liked the idea of playing the plant. Having the actors willing feed themselves to her was something the overweight wolf girl really liked. Her bulging belly even rumbled at the idea, despite currently being filled with John.

However, it wasn't going to be easy to get away with and if she got caught it would be the end of her feasting. That wasn't something the hungry cub could chance. So, Shaura slowly opened the costume closet's door and looked around inside it.

She quickly saw a number of half-made props and street clothes from the teenagers who were using their elementary school's auditorium. It was then she noticed that the person who was playing the plant would soon need to put the head of the costume on a peg on the end of a large tube...one just big enough for a chunky, 10 year old, wolf girl to hide inside.

"Man I HATE playing this stupid plant. This costume is was too hot and I have to pull everyone inside it with me." A nerdy looking teen boy said as he entered the closet.

He had short cut brown hair, thick glasses, and was carrying the head of the flytrap in his arms. The teen was quite short, about the same size as Shaura, and was apparently talking to someone outside of the closet.

Shaura grinned as she quickly, and far more quietly than one would have imagined of a girl her size, got into the tube just before the teen came over to it, her maw open nice and wide.
14411111.title: Costume Closet

choices: The Tale of the Insatiable Hunger!
The Tale of Something Else I Guess!
144111111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“The movie was better anyway…“ The boy’s eyes widened in fright as the plant came to life and lunged at him. You’d better believe he screamed for his life, but by then his head was already inside its throat.
Of course, he didn’t quite see Shaura’s head sticking through the plant’s mouth. He saw a shimmer of sharp teeth, but in the heat of the moment, he wouldn’t have expected a young wolf cub was attached to them.
It didn’t make much difference; either way, he was being eaten alive.

“Okay, what if John rehearsed with just Damien without Gene in the plant? He could learn the lines, and then we phase the plant back into rehearsals.”
“It’s worth a shot, I guess,” the teacher shrugged. “Right now, let’s focus on the Dentist scene. We don’t need our Seymour for that. Sunny?”
“Gotcha, teach!” The dentist was usually a male role, but Sunny was one of the best actresses in school, so once she was in costume and in-character, nobody could tell the difference. They even gave her a fake little moustache as part of the costume. And speaking of her costume, it was still in the closet, since they were only planning to rehearse the one scene today.

“Mmmm!” Shaura gulped, tucking the very last of the nerdy puppeteer into her stomach along with John. “How do you like getting eaten, you Mean Green Bully?” she laughed, causing her stomach to shake and slosh. Now she really couldn’t hope to fit her shirt over it, even if she wanted to! And once this load was digested, they’d definitely need to buy some new clothes…though nothing too baggy, of course.
Hearing the door push open again, her ears perked and she sniffed the air. More food.

“I am your dentist, and I enjoy the career that I’ve picked,” sang Sunny as she happily strolled into the closet. She looked straight ahead and gasped.
“Gene! Teach told you to be more careful with the plant!” she ran over and propped the head back onto the peg. “You should be more respectful to your props, pal, someone worked hard on this handsome guy!” she flapped the plant’s mouth open to say “Thanks, Sunny!” and she laughed.
She began shifting through a rack of coats, quietly humming the tune of ‘Don’t Feed the Plants,’ before finally taking out her familiar dentist uniform. “Now, where’s my stethoscope?” She turned to a big pile of thrown about props.
“This place is a mess…”
Reaching for it, the pile suddenly sprang to life as Shaura made her move. Sunny’s immediate reaction was to laugh; Shaura had popped up wearing a top hat, a feathered boa, and a fireman jacket. Her laughter quickly turned to screams as the fat wolf shoved her over and began guzzling down her legs.

“Help! There’s a wolf in here! She’s eating me! HELP!”
“Yeesh, Sunny! I thought you were a better actor than that! It’s a plant, remember?” laughed the girl playing Audrey.
“I’M NOT ACTIIIING!” she squealed as Shaura swallowed up the girl’s flat belly. The porky wolf tried not to giggle; they may as well have hand fed themselves to her!

“-and that’s why fat girls are just flat out cuter!” Timmy beamed to the teen girl sitting at her desk. Fairly plump herself, she could only stare confused at the young boy, who seemed to have completely lost track of why he was actually there.
“…right.”
“WHY IS NOBODY HELPING ME!?” Sunny’s voice echoed from the end of the auditorium. Timmy grinned. He loved knowing what Shaura was up to.

In moments, he knew that the poor girl would disappear without a trace, and leave the classroom panicked and baffled. He remembered when he first started at school, how the older kids would torment him and the others with all the scary stories about the Drama Hall. In fact, Shaura is the one that helped him get over it; after all, she was bigger and tougher than any ghost or monster could ever hope to be.

Maybe now he could them tell his own story, of the hungriest girl in the world. A story that would quickly come true…
Or maybe he could make something up. That did sound like a lot of fun for both him and Shaura, but the idea was to keep them in one place and scare them a bit; he didn’t want to give Shaura away. He could blame this on any old ghost story, and it’d probably have the same effect.
144111111.title: Wolfing them down

1441111111.content:
addition by: phrooglefa (38)

While he could continue the scary ghost stories that had been floating around their school, the idea of Shaura being part of a new legend was really something he was starting to like. Besides, unlike those mean 5th graders before him, he didn't have to make anything up. However, he would need Shaura's help to make that happen, even if it was just these teen's disappearing.

"Uh, Would you come back to the prop room for a moment? I wanna show you something really cool." Timmy said to the plump girl before him.

By this time, the chubby teen was more than a little weirded out by this little boy. Besides, she wasn't one to really like younger children. No, she wasn't a bully by any stretch of the means. She was more...indifferent to children and this one was starting to annoy her a bit with his constant chatter. However, she did find it a bit cute that he clearly thought she looked pretty and appreciated her extra weight.

"Listen...Um...What was your name again?" She asked with about as much excitement as someone who was forced to watch paint dry.

"It's Timmy. Come on I wanna show you something I found about the all the haunted stuff that happens in this atrium." Timmy said, pointing to the prop closet.

The chubby teen looked over at the little boy smiling up at her and eventually decided to...
1441111111.title: The Tale of the Insatiable Hunger!

choices: ...and tackled Timmy, kissing him crazily for everything he said about her. *

14411111111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

…follow him into the closet. He stood, looking curiously around the room, as if looking for something in particular.
“Yeesh, wish they’d clean up in here more,” the girl grunted. The room was now in complete disarray, with props and costume pieces all over the floor. “So, what’s this about?”

Timmy saw a fluffy tail waggle from a large pile of clothes, and grinned. “Have you heard the Tale of the Insatiable Hunger?” he said in a dramatic a tone as he could manage.
“Sounds like me at Thanksgiving, actually,” she replied.
“I’ve heard stories of…a girl…a beautiful girl. Some might say the most beautiful girl to ever live!” He winked at the lump of clothing next to him. “But the girl had something of a curse. You see, she couldn’t stop eating, no matter what. People tried to satisfy her appetite, but no matter how big her belly got, she always had room for more!”

The girl cupped her pot belly, feeling her cheeks redden. “You’re a real jerk, kid…”
“Hmm? No, no. That’s the story, it’s not about you. Not that you aren’t one of the prettiest girls in the world,” the tail whipped out and smacked his leg. “So anyway, the girl got fat, super fat! And the fatter she got, the harder it was to fill her up! Soon, her belly was so fat, her bottom was so large, and her cheeks were so puffy, her appetite was out of control! She started eating people!”

He tried to hold back his excitement, but couldn’t help it. He wasn’t sure whether to act scared himself or confident in his story, and just ended up sounding even weirder to his teenaged guest.
“And it was only then her true hunger was unleashed! The town might not know it, but she’s always out there, looking for more snacks to make her butt even bigger! And as fat as she is, they say you’ll never know she’s there until it’s too late!”

“Uh hu…” Clearly unimpressed, the teen picked up a prop skull and played with the jaw, “Writing tip, if you want your story to be scary, you should include some more blood and guts. Fat people aren’t scary.” Timmy grunted; he thought he’d done a pretty good job. “But that’s a new one. Usually it’s actors buried under the stage, or a teacher who died during a performance. Where’d you get the idea?”
The room went quiet, and Timmy took a seat on a box.

“Because my girlfriend’s the girl in the story, and she’s right here in this room.”

And with that, Shaura burst from the costume pile, teeth glittering and belly bouncing as she leapt to her feet. Even as fat as she was, her belly was huge, and the people trapped inside were still kicking. Her tail wagged furiously, enjoying every second of everything that was happening. The teen girl fell back in fright, seeing nothing but obsessive hunger across every inch of the obese wolf girl.
Unable to control herself any longer, Shaura pounced…

She swallowed hard and only the legs of the girls were left out side. She slurped the legs in like if they were spaghetti. Finally all what was left out were her feet. 1442121222122111211212122212122122211112.content:
By: protomite

Bandana Girl grunted and struggling as she continued to carry the girl. This was work for a forklift; not a single ordinary person! But regardless, she managed to carry the blob into the bathroom before finally collapsing.

All that weight came down on her with a crash, but thankfully due to its squishiness, she was mostly unharmed, just very uncomfortable.

"I'm nowhere near the toilet! You're useless, you know!" growled Cia, in quite a bad mood given their situation. Jared ran in and tried to push her, but at his age and size he was nowhere near strong enough. Despite her situation, Bandana Girl did her best to push Cia upwards (mainly, off of her), and through her and Jared's combined efforts, was successful! With a THUD, she hit the toilet...or rather the bathtub.

She didn't seem to mind.

"There we go!" she exclaimed in relief as a loud and obnoxious 'FLOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!' tore out from behind her. Both Bandana Girl and Jared quickly threw their hands over their mouths as the foul stench filled the room, though Jared stayed, braving the nightmare, while the girl ran out of the room as quickly as possible.

"She's supposed to be helping us? I don't think she's up to it," Jared exclaimed grumpily, as if he were some expert and not a complete newcomer to getting people eaten.

Cia barely reacted, just grinning stupidly as she finally dumped out her victims. She was jam packed full of them, taking no time at all to fill up the bathtub and spill human bones all over the floor. Jared probably would have been terrified if he hadn't known that spectacular girl was the cause of it all.

"But...you seem to want to go with her idea so..." Jared pouted to himself. Getting help was good and all, but he wanted to be Cia's master feeder; at best Bandana Girl should have been his lackey, following his plans to help Cia, instead of some kind of 'equal.'

But then again, he remembered he was pretty desperate...it was either do what this girl said, or let Cia go hungry. Even if she was his lackey, what would make his plan so good...

She watched as, through some miracle, the top buttons on her chest staid on, but what ever buttons were around her belly popped off like little bullets. The massive little girl let out a not so little burp as she looked down at her giant gut. It was bigger than her and was a good 4ft out there. *BURRRRRP!* Thanks. You and your daughter were SOOOOO tasty and really filling. she said as patted her belly where their heads were.

She woke up just as the sun was on the horizon. She stretched and gave a big yawn before she decided to get acclimated to her surroundings. She realized she was laying on the ground at the playground next to the bench. She slowly, but surely remembered just why she was asleep on the ground, then she looked down. A big grin came across her not-so-chubby face. Her double chin was as defined as it could be, spreading outward as she looked down. Her arms were nothing but rolls now with her sausage fingers sticking out. Her belly was the real masterpiece, however. first off, her shirt was pushed up as a makeshift bra, which she actually needed now because of the added weight. Her belly, lying on her back, spread out a good foot on both sides and stuck a good two feet in the air.
She grabbed one of her many rolls with both hands and gave it a shake. The rippling that ensued lasted a good 2 minutes. When she decided to get up she grabbed the side of the bench and, with great effort, managed to pull herself up. When she stood up as straight as she could, she then realized just how fat she really was. Her belly fat hung down to her knees, which, surprisingly enough were still visible. Her numerous thigh rolls jiggled and rubbed against eachother with each thunderous step.

-GRRRRRRRROWWWWLLLLL-

"Really?!" Cia replied to her stomach as she gave it a rub," You can't be that hungry."
Indeed it was, because she had never craved anything so much in her life.

"Stop!" A girl's voice rang out through the playground," just leave me alone!"

Cia turned around, her stomach following her closly and stopping with a slap against her thighs. When she finally was able to focus on the issue.

Megan, a fat girl from Cia's class, was sitting on the ground outside the sandbox. A few mean bullies from class were surrounding her, making fun of her. You see, Megan wasn't just fat, she was absolutley obese. She needed help walking around because her bulk was too much for her to carry by herself. Her clothes never fit right, thanks to her bum parents that don't give her a second thought, so her belly rolled out onto the ground as she sat there.

"Hey fatty! Did your parents forget about you again?" One bully cackled.
"No...they just...they just went to go get me somemore food," Megan lied. Of course her parents forgot about her. They always forgot about her.
"Why? To make you even fatter, cow?" another "clever" bully teased.

"What seems to be the problem here?" Cia intervened.
"What's it to you fatty?" the last bully asked.
"Do you have a problem with fat girls? Cia asked, taking a step forward.
"Fat girls are ugly and disgusting," Bully #1 said.
"They are actually quite delicious," Cia replied quietly as she stared at Megan's fat, delicious, cream body.
"What was that?" Bully #2 asked.

Casedy was like the outcast in pre-K. She was shy, so she never spoke without being spoken to, thus making friends near impossible. It wouldn't have mattered anyway. The only people who talked to her in school were her teacher, and bullies. That's another thing: she's also the only one in her class who is overweight, making her a perfect target for bullies. Sad thing is, no body stands up for her. She never understood why kids picked on her for her weight, what difference would it make in their lives wether she was thin or not? They kept calling her typical names such as "fatso", "fatty", "tubby", ect. Whenever she becomes sad in anyway shape or form, she would just eat, eat, and eat, something kids also teased her about. The teasing never really got to her, because they were telling her the truth, she is fat, besides, she only gets teased about two or three times a week, but one kid said the most cruel thing she had ever heard in her life today.

"Will you just quit it?", Casedy asked.

"What are you gonna do about it?", the boy asked, "Go home and cry to your mommy, then eat so much you become a fat sack of junk?"

"Well, I would like that...", Casedy admitted.

"Then go on", the bully started, "Go eat and die!"

Casedy gasped and started crying. Complete cruelty. Even the bully's suck-ups thought that was uncalled for.

Casedy looked at the boy with tears streaming down her face. For some odd reason, he turned into a hot dog. Her urge to eat when upset was making her see things. And making her hungry.

"Go away meanie!", Casedy cried out.

"Since you like eating so much, how about I give you an knuckle sandwhich?", the boy asked. He punched at Casedy's mouth, but Casedy opened her mouth and the boy's fist flew into it. Casedy bit down on his arm.

The boy tried pulling his arm out. "Let go!", he shouted. Without thinking, Casedy began to swallow, bringing the boy's arm further into her mouth, down her throat, into her stomach.

The boy's suck-ups watched Casedy in complete fright. They could believe (let's call the boy Shawn) Shawn was being eaten, no, swallowed whole, alive.

Casedy shoved the rest of Shawns body into her mouth and swallowed, causing the rest of Shawn to plumet into her stomach. She burped and patted her belly, which had gotten so big her shirt rode up, revealing most of it.

Shawn began pushing against Casedy's belly, knocking her back her senses and making her realize she just swallowed someone.

"Oh my gosh!", she freaked, "What have I done?!" She wasn't shocked at the fact she just swallowed someone whole, she was shocked at the fact that was able to swallow someone whole.

The other bully's were scared of Casedy now. "Please! Don't eat us!", one of them begged, "We're sorry! We won't be mean to you again! Just don't eat us!!!"

Casedy wondered if she should spare them, even after all of the bullying.

It was a beautiful summers morning. The sun had just peaked over the horizon a few hours ago and illuminated the perfect cloudless sky. The warm rays from the golden globe slowly drifted over the land and soon hit the top windows of the average suburban home.

The warm beams of light slowly crept up the bed of the sleeping little 9 year old child. She looked so cute, as her face held a contented smile on it as she lay there with a hand on her tummy. The plump pot belly under the covers slowly raised and fell with each little breath the child took.

Soon the beams had reached her face. Her eyes slowly started to flutter open and she let out a little murr of happiness at the way she was awoken. She was glad it was the sun that had woken her up this morning as opposed to the normal way.

It was then her hopes were dashed as she heard her bedrooms door open. She tried to look up, but it was too late. She could hear the heavy foot steps of the fat little girl running towards her bed. She only managed to lift her head slightly before the little one was upon her.

Little 6 year old Emily jumped up onto the bed with a giggle and landed lightly onto her older sister, Sara. Of course with Emilys chubby overweight frame, this wasnt light enough. Sara let out a little moan as the blubber of her sister hit against hers.

Wake up sis, its morning! Emily yelled happily.

Sara just groaned at this. She loved her younger sister but hated how she had to wake her up this way. She couldnt figure out how a child who was normally so lazy could have so much energy in the morning. She knew the younger girl looked up to her, and she didnt mind this, but she preferred to wake up gently.

Seeing her work was done, Emily slid off the bed and stood there with a grin on her face. She was more than ready to start the day and wanted to be with her older sister as it began.

Sara looked over at her sister and grinned. She looked so cute with so much pudginess to her. Her pink and red pajamas were straining to hold in her fattening frame. Neither of them minded this though. In fact both young sisters loved getting fatter together.

This could clearly been seen as Sara rolled out of bed. Her own frame was a bit more lithe, although her own purple pajamas werent loose by any measure. She didnt have as much baby fat all over her frame. However, anyone could clearly see her belly was where her weight went. The large dome pushed up her shirt slightly, showing off a nice sliver of her stuffed looking tummy.

144231121212122122212112122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Packed with food, despite what their greediness might have suggested, the two sisters slept like logs that night. A train could have crashed through their bedroom and they’d have probably ignored it. Which made it rather odd that Emily’s eyes would very suddenly pop open, wide awake.

You could probably guess that it was because she was hungry.

Glancing over at the alarm clock, she was the numbers ‘5:30’ glowing in the dark. She wasn’t great with times, but what she did know was that this was too early for breakfast. Once upon a time, Emily would have sighed, dropped back into her pillow, and tried to nod off again.
But, that was the Pre-Cannibal Days. Now, she was hungrier than ever, and this slight tummy rumble couldn’t be ignored.

Carefully sliding off the bed, she nevertheless hit it with a thud thanks to the extra plump her new eating habits had given her. Fortunately, Sara herself was still sleeping like a rock and didn’t even stir. After making sure, she immediately waddled out and headed for the kitchen, hoping her parents were as fast asleep with each thudding footstep. She’d never been this heavy before.

But the kitchen only brought bad news; her mom had (quite smartly) put everything on the top shelf where Emily couldn’t reach. And to think, at first she was glad Sara hadn’t come down with her; she was way too hungry to share.

She began pulling up a chair towards the light of the fridge, when a thought crossed her mind.
“What if I’m too heavy for the chair,” she thought. “I’ll could really hurt my butt…or worse, GET CAUGHT! And then mom’ll put it up too high even for Sara to reach…” It seemed big sis’s gluttonous wisdom had been getting through to her.

“B-but I’m so hungry…” her belly roared, begging her to fill it up. She’d never been hungry like this. It’d be wonderful if only she had something to eat! Starting to freak out a little, she barged into the living room and out the front door (after a brief but annoying moment with their mom’s house keys of course). This little belly rumble was driving her crazy!

She knew it was kind of silly to look for food out here at this hour, but she was getting desperate. The morning wind made her shiver, especially her enormous new belly. She tried stuffing it back into her pyjamas, but it was no use, they were far, far too small for her now.
And then she did something she really shouldn’t have; gone looking.

Emily walked alone along the suburban streets, in desperate search for something to eat. Something nice and filling so she could go back home to her fluffy, warm bed…

“Are you lost, little one?” Emily’s chilly, chubby face ballooned into a smile as she came across a house with a big, beautiful flower garden, and, more importantly, a man watering it.
“Oh no, I’m just looking for breakfast,” she didn’t see anything odd about the answer. “What are you doing?”
“Oh, just tending the garden. It’s, well, it’s what I do,” he figured a girl so young probably didn’t want to know his life story or how early he worked.

This was too perfect! The man was a little old, but fairly chubby, and very tall; she’d fill her gut right up, and she could even get a drink from the hose afterwards!

But then again, he seemed very friendly. Maybe if she threw on the scared little girl act, he’d let her inside and get her some breakfast. Maybe he had some kids, meaning a dozen boxes of sugar frosted cereal waiting, all for her! That’d be great! She’d be as smart as her big sis if it worked! Oh, what to do…

14423112121212212221211212212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Emily, what am I going to do with you?” sighed Sara, shaking her head with a laugh before dropping back into her pillow. She’d have loved to go back to sleep, but now that she was awake, her belly had begun growling something fierce. Just like her sister, she’d need a lot more food to fill herself up from now on.
“Dang it sis, I don’t want to get breakfast without you…”
“…b-breakfast?” yawned the younger girl, stirring. Sara couldn’t help but laugh.

As Sara got up, so did Emily, just to be told to stay where she was.

“Sara, I’m hungry too!” Her enormous stomach wobbled and sloshed as she sat up, “BUUUURP! I’m starving!”
“But what If mom sees you like that?”
“I’ll do up all my buttons and she won’t even notice!” a very distinctive hand shape pressed up against the side of her gut as the man inside desperately cling to life.
“Let’s put it this way, you get to sit your fat butt in bed while I bring us up a bunch of food.” Her sister gleamed with the sort of pure happiness only a child could know.
“I love breakfast in bed!”

Less than eight minutes later, that’s exactly what both girls were having. Sara had no trouble reaching the fridge’s top shelf, and had brought just about everything she could carry. After polishing off a box of pop tarts each, the two now ate up overflowing bowls of cereal. Sara had forgotten the milk, so instead, they used ice cream.
Sara watched as her sister ate like the true pig she was. You’d almost think she hadn’t eaten in days.
“Was it really a good idea to go outside and eat someone all by yourself?”
“Definitely! He was delish! And only a few houses down!” Emily gleamed, hugging her gut. She noted her sister’s glare, “It’s totally fine! He didn’t have a family or anything, so I couldn’t have shared even if you came with!” Sara laughed; that girl was utterly reckless about eating people, but darn it, Sara couldn’t stay made at her.
But it was a serious problem. She knew that someone would find the bones in the dumpster, and there were only going to be more and more skeletons to come…
And then it hit her.
“Emily! You’re a genius!”
“Well duh…but why?”

Once they’d run out of food, Sara wasted no time and left the house with her huge bellied sister in tow. Sara explained that once they got home, they’d just tell their mom they got up early and were playing hide and seek. But Emily still didn’t know why they were sneaking out in the first place, especially with such full, heavy bellies.

“Is this the house?”
“Yep! That’s the garden, see?” Emily pointed to a small groove her huge stomach had buried into the ground after she ate the man. The hose had filled it with water and partly flooded the lawn. “What are we doing here?”
Sara giggled madly, so pleased with her brilliant idea. “Sis, say hello to our new secret hideout!” She pointed to the house. “You ate the guy who lives here, so now we can move in!”

Only expecting to be out for a few minutes, the man hadn’t locked the door, and the two waddled in without a thought. Sara explained that from now on, they could use the bathroom here after eating people, and come here to nap after a meal if need be. Plus, having their own house would be totally cool, and nobody else would know.

“So what do you think?”
Emily didn’t answer. The idea of their own place where they could do whatever piggish thing they wanted was just too exciting, she couldn’t think of anything to say. She and Sara just giggled at each other for a few minutes, thinking about all the people they could eat without getting caught now, before finally, Emily had something to say…

“Being fat is seriously hard work,” huffed Sara, licking some pizza sauce off her cheek. Emily had eaten more than her fill, but the idea of getting something to eat without her just didn’t sit right.
It was a little worrying to know just how greedy her sister was, but then, she’d never seen anyone eat like them before. Surely if this was going to hurt them, or make them sick, or worse, it would have happened by now. She decided not to worry too much.
“Come on, sis, let’s go get some real breakfast!”

Emily really was onto something with her unfulfilled scheme earlier. Sara had taken her down the street, and had begun studying the houses.
“Hmmm…”
“What are you doing? We don’t need more houses, we need some food!”
“Hold onto your overalls, Tubby!” she laughed, patting her sister’s huge stomach. “I just had this idea, look. This house has one of those big cars.”
“So?”
“So, that means they might have lots of kids! But here’s how we can be sure!” she pointed at the stickers on the back window, depicting two parents and three kids. “I think I’m getting the hang of this!”
They both giggled excitedly as they waddled up the foot path and up to the door. Sara reached up and hit the doorbell.
“Follow my lead, just pretend you’re sad.”
“I am sad, because my belly’s empty,” her churning stomach said otherwise.

A tall woman with blonde hair opened the door, and stared in shock the second she laid her eyes on the two enormous fat blobs before her. She had to double take for a second just to make sure that, yes, she was looking at two young girls. They were real, and they were huge.
“Uuuuh…” Sara threw her hands around Emily and started to cry.

“Please…please, we’re lost! We’ve been lost out here for days, and we can’t find our parents!”
“We haven’t eaten in years-BURRRP!” Emily sobbed, her full stomach gurgling loudly.
“You need to help us! I can’t look after her by myself, I’m only a kid!”
Emily hid her mouth behind Sara’s head, licking her lips as she stared at the woman.
