addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

After just a few minutes of TV, both girls had nodded off. They were getting sleepier and sleepier as they grew more and more gluttonous, it seemed.
Sara eventually opened her eyes and looked down in disappointment; her belly was smaller. Of course it was, that is just how it worked, and it made moving around much easier, but part of Sara still hated getting smaller.
Moving on, she hopped off the couch with a thud, and started to giggle, noticing a very ‘Sara’ shaped groove where she was sitting.

Emily was still snoozing away, but from the looks of her smacking lips, she was already hungry again. Sara was one of the most gluttonous people you’d ever see, but even she was a little shocked at her small sister. It made her kind of proud, actually.

Feeling a light rumble from her own stomach, Sara waddled into the kitchen and helped herself to a punnet of strawberries, but quickly set her eyes on the plentiful junk food the family had lying around. She’d have taken to it straight away, but an idea struck her.
“Emily! Wake up, I just had another idea!”

Twenty minutes later, the two sisters were carting over snacks and toys back over to their new secret hideout a few houses down. Cool as it was to have, the house was full of stuff they didn’t care about, like car posters, gardening books and VHS tapes (neither sister had any idea what they actually were). Now they could fill it with video games, snack food, and dreamy boy band posters.

They’d even raided the girl’s wardrobe to replace their torn pyjamas. Naturally, none of it fit properly. Emily’s gut spilled out of a fluffy brown coat, and Sara wore several mostly torn shirts and a bathrobe. They’d both tried the girl’s jeans, but split every pair, and instead settled for stretching out a pair of skirts.

“This is so cool!” Emily stood in their new living room, jumping up and down, causing the floorboards to rattle.
“Can I get some help?” grunted her big sister, trying to paste a One Direction poster onto the wall.
“Nope, too busy!” Emily quick picked up a box of plush toys they’d taken from the girls bed, and began placing them around the house. Sara couldn’t believe she had gone five minutes without eating something!

Shortly, the girls stood together, with their bellies jutting out of their ridiculous new garb, surrounded by the mess of a house they’d decorated. Posters pasted over family pictures, a fluffy turtle toy in the fish tank, and a massive heap of clothing on the table.
They hi-fived.
“Nice job, sis! This place is looking great!”
“Well, you did most of the work.”
“Well, yeah, but you helped.” They had a long way to go to ‘fix’ this house, but they were happy with their days work. Typically, the moment they stopped decorating, their tummies started to rumble. Emily turned to the kitchen, but Sara grabbed her arm.

“What? I’m hungry!” she laughed.
“We just filled that fridge, sis, you can’t empty it already!”
“Sure I can, give me two seconds!” she giggled.
“I have a better idea,” Sara grinned.

As far as their mother knew, the two still hadn’t had breakfast, which meant they’d probably have something waiting for them once they got home. The sisters giggled up a storm as they waddled home, knowing that nobody would ever guess what they’d been up to. They felt so smart.
But as they pushed open the door, Sara realized something…

“Emily…these…these clothes aren’t ours…”
“Nope!” the younger sister beamed, patting her tummy, remembering their fun ‘adventure.’
“We fell asleep after our snack…”
“Yep!” Emily grinned excitedly.
“Emily! We’re wearing brand new clothes and it’s past lunch time! If mom and dad catch us, we’re dead meat!”
Emily froze in fear. “Then…then let’s not get caught!”
“We won’t,” Sara winked, leading her sister quietly through the house. “We get to our room, get changed, and just tell mom we’ve been playing really, really good hide and seek. If she asks how we got fatter, just say she’s a good cook.”
“Gotcha…”

And so the two crept as quietly as a pair of obese, gurgling, burpy children could through the house. Their bedroom door was soon in sight; it looked like everything was going to be just fine…

addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

On the way home, their mother hadn’t calmed down .She had driven home in complete silence, with the same stern, deadly expression. Hours passed when they got home, and they didn’t hear a word from her, until…

“Girls! Dinner time!” she called out in a sweet, warm tone. Both girls had eaten about a dozen people each now, and had proven themselves as dangerous as a vicious animal; but this sent shivers down their spines.

The two waddled into the kitchen, staying close, and took their seats. They creaked and groaned under their weight, which for once, the girls didn’t laugh at. Their mother stood over the counter, making the final touches to their meal.

“Sara…Emily…I just want to apologize,” she began, “I got a little…carried away back there. I said some very mean things. Things that no mother should ever say to their darling daughters. I just… I worry about you. What’ll happen to you, and what people will say or do to you. The world isn’t kind to…larger people. From the bottom of my heart, I am sorry, and I hope you’ll forgive me.”

Her daughters smiled and breathed a sigh of relief. “Of course we forgive you!” Sara smiled.
“Yeah, we love you, mommy!”
Their mother turned around, abandoned the food, and hugged them both. Of course, she couldn’t reach around the both of them, but she tried her best. She kissed them both on the cheek, and went back to the food.

“Hope my angels are both hungry!”
“You bet!” Neither of them had eaten a thing since their paltry ‘afternoon breakfast,’ and their stomachs were virtually screaming to be fed. Then, she placed two plates down. Both had tiny piles of green mush; it was barely a handful, but was spread in the shape of a smiley face.
Both girls gasped, as though their mother had committed a truly heinous crime.
“What…what is it?” Emily poked the mush.

“Ground peas, carrots and potatoes. And for dessert, we’ll all have SlimWow smoothies!” she said with motherly glee. “Hope you girls like avocado-oh, what am I saying? You two like everything!” The girls were less than impressed.
“But mom! What about everything you just said! About being sorry and all that…”
“I am sorry, Sara! I should never have yelled at you or called you names, that was horrible of me! But we’re still doing the diet.” She patted them both gently on the back. “But I’ve realized why we’re not getting anywhere with your weight loss. I treat it like a punishment when it should be an adventure!” Apparently she thought making their food into faces would be fun. It just made the meal look smaller.

“I’ve called your father. He’s taking tomorrow off, and all four of us are going to go on a hike up the hills! I’m gonna show you how to shed those pounds and have a good time doing it! And maybe I’ll find my happy little daughters under all this chub!” she laughed, poking Emily’s belly. It growled, hungrily, “Oh, better eat up!”

She blinked, and the food had vanished off their plates, and both girls burped. With a smile, she went to fix up dessert. She felt so happy; she knew she’d finally cracked the code! She could be a good mother, put her daughters in good health, and keep everyone happy!
This was the best night of her life.

This was the worst day of Sara and Emily’s life.
“Mom’s gone bananas.”
“Please don’t talk about food, Emily…” whined Sara. Their bellies seemed to think that there was more food coming after the smoothies, and they were still aching for another bite of absolutely anything.

The two lay in their pyjamas on the floor of their bedroom, groaning with hunger. Their bellies visibly shook with each mighty rumble.
“I can’t do this…Sara, I really can’t do this at all!”
“I know, sis…” she sat up and looked over at a framed picture of their family on vacation. They were so small back then, not even half the girls they had grown into over the last few days. She really wanted that old, happy family back, but if this was how it was going to be, they had to break the rules.
After all, they’d eaten a dozen people; they couldn’t exactly break rules worse than that, could they.

“Sara…” Emily could see her sister was thinking very hard. “What do we do?”

addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Their stomachs growled somethings fierce; rumbling so hard it popped buttons on their PJs.
“I can’t make It to a bar, Sara, I’ll die of starvation!” Emily cried out dramatically.
“I think I might too…” she clutched her wide stomach and groaned. “Fine, let’s just head a few houses down.

“This one!” The two had run out into the cold, not even thinking to use the warm, if tiny clothes they had taken. She pointed to a fairly regular looking house, just a few down, across the road from Castle Emily. They waddled up and rang the bell and waited patiently. Well, patiently for two starving gluttons maybe. Barely a minute passed before they started to panic and began ringing the door bell over and over again.

“Must be a heavy sleeper, like dad…” Sara grumbled. Emily wasn’t taking it so well, flopping forward in hungry defeat; her fat stomach propped her right up and she barely moved an inch.
“I’m sorry, Sara…we tried our best, but the world is just against us. It’s too late for me! I’ll always love you, sis...if you see mom again, tell her I’m not sorry about anything and only wish she’d made us bigger breakfasts…”
“Stop being so dramatic and come on.” Emilý’s eyes blinked open from her daze to find Sara waddling into the open door. During her little spiel, her sister had found a key under the Welcome mat and unlocked the door. The younger sibling just shrugged and followed her in.

Elsewhere, a woman lay fast asleep, indeed, a light sleeper. Her husband, on the other hand, didn’t take much to wake.
“Honey! Did you hear that?” he gently nudged her awake.
“No,” she mumbled.
“It sounded like a…burp…”
“We had a big dinner, it was probably me.”
“No, no…I think we should check on Tommy. The woman sighed and began pulling herself up as the door suddenly creaked open. Whoever did so had loud footsteps, and made sloshing movements with every one. Their breathing was heavy, and there was an odd…muffled noise…screaming?
Something climbed on the bed, and the mattress sank inward.
“T-Tommy?” the woman looks up. In the dark, she saw two massive, round shapes, one shaking crazily, as though something was trapped inside. It bent over, and she saw the vaguest impression of a young face, grinning madly, with lips pouring with drool.
It was the last thing she and her husband ever saw.

“AhahahauuUURP! Hahaha!” the two sisters giggled and laughed as they packed all manner of things into their backpacks. They wouldn’t bring any food back to Castle Emily, because every scrap of it was going straight down their throats.
“So cool! SO COOL!” Emily squealed, munching down an untouched birthday cake.
Sara only got to eat the dad, but she didn’t complain, munching down on cold pizza and shoving more video games, movies and books into her backpack. “I know! This is like both our birthdays at once!”

The two hauled out their fat stomachs down the road, burping and gurgling all the while, dragging their stolen treasures along with them back to their new home.

The two hadn’t ‘fixed’ the bedrooms yet, and were now far too tired to work anything out, so they simply sat together on the couch, and threw on the blanket they had just taken. It didn't quite fit them, but their fat kept them warm enough.
“Sis,” Emily yawned. “I think things are going to be just fine from now-URRRP-on.”
“So long as we stick together, Emily, the world is our buffet! For real!” They giggled and finally nodded off into the deepest, most satisfied sleep of their young lives.
144231121212122122212112122121221112111.title: When sisters attack

choices: She finds something intresting in a different room.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51)

Emily opened her eyes. Her head rested at Sara's shoulder. She was normally the first one of the two to wake up but there was something strange this morning. Normally her tummy was calling for food every morning. But that was't the case. Sure she could eat something but she was't starving. Besides she wanted to play with all the new toys they had and decorate their new house.

"Hmmm. With what do I start? Maybe I first need to look for my own bedroom."

She walked to the second floor. She was planning to use the biggest room she could find but realized Sara probably also wanted that bedroom. They already called their new home: Castle Emily. But perhaps Sara did't really wanted a big room. Perhaps they could share a room. They also did that at home. Perhaps this man had a guest room. Then they only need to take the bed from the guest room too the bedroom. But a bed was kind of heavy. Well she would worry about it when it was that time.
She walked into a bedroom and saw a huge bedroom. Inside was a big two persons bed. A clothing closet, a digital clock, a full length mirror, a few drawers, but what got her attention was the T.V. She always wanted one in their bedroom but their parents were against it for some reason. She crawled in the big bed and turned on the T.V watching some cartoons totally forgetting looking in the rest of the house.

Some time later Sara woke up. She yawned and looked if she saw Emily. She was't really worried. Emily normally was always the first to wake up. She was probably somewhere else in the house. She walked in the hall way but suddenly she heard the mailbox. She looked and saw the newspaper. She normally found the newspaper boring and not that much interesting and only read the comics but now she wanted to know it. She took the newspaper to the living room. Spread it out on the floor. reading the heads. But suddenly she found the article she was looking for.

ANOTHER STRANGE DISAPPEARING!
Again some people in a small town suddenly disappeared. The past time more people were suddenly gone. Disappeared without a trace. The first victims were kids or teenagers, so the police thought about kidnapping. But lately also some adult people are missing. Yesterday something strange happened. Another time some people disappeared. But they were taken out of their own home. A woman and her three children. But how strange it might bee they also took several stuff including some clothes. The police also found some split pants at the floor. Why the split pants is a mystery. But since also some clothes are also taken they perhaps want to keep them alive. That could give people some hope. There still is't a clue who is behind all this and why. The police suspect more then one person is responsible for this horrible crimes. The police want to advice people to lock windows and doors and only open when you are sure who it is and do not let your children go outside until we found the persons who are responsible for this. We ask everyone who might know something to tell this to the police.

Sara fold up the news paper and put in on the table. She could't help it but smiled. So they did't had a clue. No one knew it were two innocent little girls. She looked forward too the paper of tomorrow. Probably the biggest news would be: Two obese girls missing. Sara realized they must be a bit more careful. If people saw them they could probably tell their parents.
She stretched herself once what caused another button to pop off of her pajamas. She smiled when she saw more of her fat belly spill out.

"Oh I really like being so fat. I'm gonna be the fattest girl in the world... well except maybe for Emily. The girl is a bottomless pit. But I'm gonna be on the second place. That's not bad."

The obese girl started to wonder where her sister was and decided to look for her.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: The newspaper

choices: They make up a song about eating people and getting fat.
They listen to their burps and sloshing bellies with it
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Stopping to listen, Sara clearly heard someone watching Star vs. The Forces of Evil upstairs. She pretty much figured out where Emily had gotten to. No need to worry.
Her stomach gurgled, and she knew it was time for breakfast. Moments later, she walked out of the kitchen with a mixing bowl with an entire box of sugar frosted cereal, peanut M&Ms and chocolate milk, and ate it with a soup ladle. It felt so…right. She just knew her mother would faint from horror if she saw her eating this monster.

She wandered around the house, taking in what she hadn’t noticed before. The man’s garden had apparently won a few prizes and awards over the years. Sara smiled, proud to be the new owner of such a renowned and beautiful garden. She was kind of sad that they were probably going to wreck it when they started burying the bones of the people they ate in it. But then, that meant they were eating more people, and she smiled again.

After finding the bathroom, and then the laundry, she found something far more exciting. A speaker set with a microphone, with a book of song lyrics. Sort of like a homemade karaoke machine (not that Sara knew what that was). The sisters did have a good lot of interests, but they all took a backseat to filling their fat faces. Singing and dancing was one of their favourite activities, but their dad would usually ask them to stick with dancing, since their singing ability was…rather loud, and not very graceful.
But dancing just by itself seemed boring, and tired them out really quick. But they now, they made their own rules.

Sara slurped down her chocolatey breakfast (staining her pyjama top quite badly) and grinned. “EMILY! Oh man, you need to-UUUURP see this!”
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: The karaoke machine

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51)

"What is it?" Emily asked while she kept watching T.V her eyes seemed almost glued to the screen.

"I found a machine. It's made to... sing... and dance, or something like that." Sara said.

Emily ripped her eyes away from the T.V and looked at her sister.

"So. Daddy always said we were terrible at singing, and dancing was exhausting, and the last time we danced was a lot of pounds ago." Emily said.

"So? Dad is't here. But you and I are. So is that machine. So don't be a fun killer. Come on let's have some fun with that thing."

"Perhaps the thing could be fun... if he had music we liked, but I seriously doubt that this man had any songs we would like. He did't have any kids so. I don't think we can expect that he has anything we liked."

"We can of course make our own music!" Sara yelled excited.

"What do you mean?" Emily asked.

"Easy. We just write a song. I mean people do it all the time right. How hard can it be? We just write a song with things we like. I'm gonna start right now. Let me get some paper and pencils." Sara said and ran out of the room.

Emily was a bit more skeptical about this. Writing a song 'was't that easy. Many people did it and many failed. But if they did it just for fun... well what harm could it do?

Sara came back a few minutes later. She went sitting on the bed mumbling and writing words down while Emily kept watching cartoons.

"All right I have something here." Sara said after some time.. "Come on Emily."

Emily sighed and waddled behind her sister to the room. Sara fast put it on and took the microphone.

"I'm Sara that's the girl you now see
That other girl is my sister Emily!

Our appetites are so big they're going through the roof
Look at our bellies for proof.

We both love to eat
Especially human meat.

We eat people, man and wife
Young old and alive

Emily started to like this. This was song over them an how they liked to eat people. She was excited how the song was going further.

choices: Emily cries tears of joy and hugs her again.
Later, Emily plans a big Thank You for everything Sara's done for her.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Belly’s getting bigger every day
Gobble you up if you get in our way!
Want to eat
No I won’t stop
Gonna eat until our tummies pop!”
“Sara!” Emily gasped in shock
“It’s a joke, Emily. Our bellies will NEVER pop, so we’ll NEVER stop eating!” The younger sister’s eyes widened instead with excitement. “Here, you try!”

She handed Emily the microphone, letting her think for a second. “Just say the first thing that comes into your head.”
“What if I sing it wrong?” she sighed.
“You can’t sing it wrong, this is our song! Anything you want to say, that’s how the song goes!”
Stuttering for a moment, Emily took a deep breath before bringing the microphone close to her chubby face.
“I’m so hungry…
So very hungry…
I wish I had someone to eat…
I’d um…I’d eat all of them…
Every bit of them…
From their head to their feet…”

“Whoo! Yeah!” Sara jumped up and punched the air like she was at a rock concert (also causing the floorboard to rattle). “Rock on, sis!” Emily felt like a coat of ice had just melted off her. She grinned, and thought about what to sing next.

“My name is Emily, I’m as fat as they get,
If think I’m a pig
You’d win that bet!
Say hi to me and you go inside
Better run from me
Because you sure can’t hide!”

“Um, what was that?” Sara asked, excitedly. “Were you rapping?”
“No, I was sing-talking like those guys on TV.”
“That’s called rapping, sis! And you’re awesome at it!”
“Really?”
“Yeah, from now on, you’re MC Emmers!” Sara laughed. “Though I think we’d both rather some MC Donalds! Ahahaha!” Emily didn’t get the joke, but was having too much fun not to laugh.
“Your turn!” she handed the microphone back.
The older sister thought for a second, then started smacking the side of her stomach. It made a nice, loud noise, and she quickly found a good rhythm. She copied it from somewhere, but she couldn’t really remember where. It didn’t matter.
“Two princesses lived like slaves
Starved by a queen who wouldn’t let them grow!
So they decided to run far away
And make a kingdom of their own!
A place of fun and plenty to food
And nobody to be mean or rude!
These sisters will eat the wooooooooorld!”
“I love this song…” Emily hugged Sara, burying her face into her fat front. Sara grinned, and sped up the song.
“Watch out for my sister,
Cos’ she’s a hungry beast!
The world to her
Is just one big feast!
One day soon
She’ll be bigger than me!
On on that day
I’ll be so hap-py!
Cos’ she’s the best
And she’s so cool
Face it folks,
Emily just plain’ rules!”

Sara grinned down at her younger sister, who glared right back. “Just singing how I feel, sis. Honest truth!” She patted Emily on the belly and smiled.
"No...Sara, you're the best..."

choices: Emily Comes Down To See What's Happening
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51)

Suddenly Emily's eyes got wet and she started to cry.

"What?" Sara asked worried. "What's wrong Emily? Is something wrong? I thought everything went fine."

Emily looked at her sister with a face wet from tears and a bright smile. There was't a sign of sadness on her face.

"Hee you're laughing. You was't really crying. 'We're only allowed to use fake crying to adults." Sara said friendly to her sister.

"I was't fake crying Sara." Emily said. "I cried for real... But it were tears of joy. At this moment... I'm just so happy." She hugged her sister tight, again.

"Yeah I admit everything is going fine at the moment." Sara said.

Emily went lying on her belly and Sara thought she looked a lot like a beached whale. Her sister smiled with a bright red face.

"What did I do to deserve such a fantastic sister like you?" Emily asked. "Well I must admit I liked singing or own song. We should really write that one down. Anyhow, it made me tired. tired and hungry! Very hungry!"

"Yeah I know. I'm hungry too. But we need to be careful now my little eating machine. No one may see us while we're eating people, you knew that already. But now no one may see us at all. Else they tell our parents where we are and then it's goodbye castle Emily and hello diet. You don't want that to happen do you."

"No!" Emily screamed. "I like castle Emily. I wanna keep it with my older sister and never leave. Besides that I hate dieting. I like having a big belly. But now this big belly needs food."

Sara looked outside and saw some people were moving. If more people moved and the two of them kept eating like this there soon would't be much people left. Not that she cared about the people so much, but it would be harder for them to find tasty snacks. She looked out another window seeing if she could find a tasty snack.

"Hello breakfast!" Sara said.

Outside she saw three teenagers walking towards there house. They wore the most reveling outfits Sara had ever seen. Very short (too short for Sara's taste) pants and small shirts that did hide their chest, but just barely. One with red curly hair, one with black straight hair and one with short blond hair.
Sara ran downstairs. She needed to get this people inside. She smiled and opened the back door.

addition by: phrooglefa (38)

At first Emily didn't know what was going on. She just saw Sara run downstairs and felt the floor shake in time with Sara's bulging fat. Of course, had the 6 year old been thinking clearly, she would have known there was only one thing her fat older sis would run for: food! It took a moment to dawn on the chunky child but the second it did, she took off at her 8 year old sibling as fast as she could.

Despite her size, Emily was moving quite quickly. Of course, as she waddled down the stairs her fat tummy bounced and jiggled with each movement she made. It was a miracle that the staircase could even survive so much abuse from the obese little girls. However, they held up fairly nicely.

Emily licked her lips as she opened the door to the sight of Sara and the three tasty teens she was chatting with. The hungry little girl was just about to waddle over and start her breakfast when she felt a chubby arm get between her and her food.

"As I was saying..." Sara said in a tone that let Emily know she needed to pay attention to her as well.

"We wanna make a cool music video but we don't have a camera or backup singers. You three look really pretty and cool. Wanna be in our video if you got a camera we can use?" She asked cutely and innocently.

The three teens, who were still getting over just how massive these two little girls were, whispered to each other for a moment before giggling could be heard and the redhead replied,
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Emily Comes Down To See What's Happening

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51)

"Are you two fatties kidding me?" She sneered.

"No. Why would we. We just want to make a music video. We have some pretty good ideas. But like I said we still need backup singers and a camera."Sara said calmly.

Emily licked her lips while she looked at the tasty teens.

"You two sure love to eat." The blond girl said friendly. 'So you two really wanna make a music movie."

"Of course we do. Music movies are a hit. I know for sure we're good. Come on."

"Come on let's go." the redhead said. "You don't want to do something with those two ton girls?"

"Daisy there's no reason to be so mean." The blond one said. "They ask us to help them with something. I like singing. Even if it's only backup. Maybe a important person hears or sees me and wants me to do more. Every star needs to start somewhere."

The redhead rolled with her eyes.

"I don't understand why two kids ask a few older girls, that they never have seen before. for a music video. I'm sure I have't seen them before because I sure would have remembered two kids who are so fat! What do you think Sasha?"

"Well, I'm not drunk, yet." the third girl said. "We don't have any boys with us. It's not like we have anything important to do. We can watch what they have. perhaps it's good. If it's really bad we can still go. By the way, I like singing."

"Well fine then. Let's see what you have." The redhead said. "But if we don't like it. we'll go."

"I understand please come in. We have everything upstairs."

The three teens followed Sara upstairs, followed by Emily. Sara walked too the bedroom. Emily looked at the blond girl and the one with black hair.

"I have dolls. Do you wanna see them?"

The two walked over to her telling how cute she was while the redhead followed Sara too the bedroom. Sara closed the door and went standing on the bed.

"So what do you have here?" She asked. "I don't see anything I like."

Sara bent over to her and the next moment she opened her mouth wide and her jaws closed over the girls head. Sara fast started to swallow. The redhead did't even know what had happened. She saw herself like a teenage super star. Who could get any boy she wanted, and that any girl wanted to be like her. But what now happened she did't understand. Sara swallowed hard and got the teens head inside. She oped her mouth wider to get the shoulders inside while she felt her throat expand thanks to the girls head. She swallowed further and got more and more of her inside. When her chest went in her throat she started at her belly. She slowly licked it and must admit she liked the taste of it. She was delicious. sucked the girl further inside. When she was at her middle she swallowed further and must admit she liked the taste of skin way more then the taste of clothes. Slowly the teen started to struggle what did't do her any good. only her legs remained outside of Sara's mouth. Sara grabbed her feet and pushed the legs in her throat. She pulled of her shoes and socks. Then she stuffed the feet in her mouth. she needed two swallows to get them in her throat and a third one to let them enter her stomach.
Sara opened her mouth.

"BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!! Oh that girl was delicious. Hopefully the two other are just as tasty."

But when she opened the door she did't saw the two teenage girls. But she did saw Emily with a bloated belly. She knew exactly what happened.

"Emily. Did you eat... Never mind. I already know the answer."

"I was hungry." Emily whined.

"You did't left one for me. I could still eat some more." Sara said.

"Me too." Emily said.

Sara smiled. Emily was even fatter then her. Even without compared to age and height.

choices: Sara and Emily's perspective (Best Dinner Ever)
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

It quickly turned into quite the lazy day. The two had been very busy running away from home and stealing stuff for Castle Emily, and they had quite the morning as it was. It was time to take things a little easier.
Emily parked herself on the couch with a box of pop tarts and put on a movie. Her enormous belly thrashed and wobbled, but she didn’t pay it much mind, being far too invested in what the Smurfs were up to.
“I wonder how many Smurfs I could eat up…” she asked herself. “Probably all of them.”

Sara meanwhile was in the kitchen, fixing herself something up. She called it ‘The Sara Shake;’ a big jug of uncooked chocolate cake batter, with sprinkles and strawberries. It was thick, and hard to drink, but of course Sara downed it, no problem.
“Mmm! I never want to go a day without a few of these!” she squealed, and got to mixing another.
Inside her, the redhead squealed as well, as the gooey drink poured over her head. As if her situation wasn’t horrible enough.

A few minutes passed, and Sara joined Emily in the living room, handing her a Sara Shake of her own. She sat on the floor, up against her sister’s bloated stomach; there just wasn’t room for both of them of the couch.
“So, what should we do for dinner, Emmers?”
“Smurfs!”
“I don’t think those are real.”
“Awww, dang it…Hmmm.” They both had a good long think about it. The easy answer was ‘the neighbours,’ and while they’d never get tired of eating up the neighborhood, they weren’t in the mood for leaving the house today.
They both smiled, and together said, “Delivery!”

“And I’d like a eight whole roasted chickens, and at least sixteen buckets of Crispy Wings! Oh, and chips of course, with extra salt, and tubs and tubs of gravy-I…hmmm, I don’t know. How many boxes of chips do you think twenty hungry people will need?” Chicken Pal didn’t actually deliver, but they did do catering, which was even better for the sisters.
Sara occasionally stopped to ‘speak’ with her mom, so they didn’t suspect anything. Emily sat at the other end of the room, rolling around and cackling with laughter.
“Thanks! Oh, and, daddy says he can help you guys set up and unpack, so just park the van in the drive way, okay? Thanks! Bye-bye!”

“Sara!” Emily glared, “Sara, are we going to take their delivery truck, too? Seriously!?”
“Well the delivery guys won’t need it, will they?” she giggled, rubbing her fleshy gut. “That can be our secret club house!” They both giggled and laughed at how clever they were. “I’ll make us a few Sara Shakes! I think we have a little cake mix left!”

After getting their shakes ready, the two passed a few minutes braiding their hair when they saw the catering van outside the window. Their stomachs roaring, they flew into the garage. After finding the light, they knocked over tools and boxes as they waddled around, looking for the button that opens the garage door, before finally spotting it.

“Hope your hungry sis, because it’s dinner for twenty, serving two!” Sara gleamed as the door began to lift open…
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Lazy day

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51) More by this author
The delivery car drove in and a young man and chubby young woman stepped out. Both were a bit surprised seeing only two young girls. Also the fact they never saw kids who were this fat but knew how too hide it.

"Hello young girls. We here. Could you please call you dad. He would help us unpack."

Sara knew she should have thought about this. But she lately became very good in making up stories to get her and her sister out of trouble calmly she looked at the man.

"A friend just called and asked him for some help with his computer. He should be back pretty soon. Is that a problem?"

"No not at all. Right daisy." He said and looked at the chubby girl. "We can easily unpack the food ourselves. We have done this many times before. We're no rookies. I've done this work for several years. Just tell us were we need to put the food."

"Follow me." Sara said.

"Oh that girl looks so tasty." Emily said whispering and drooling a bit. "I want to eat her now..."

"No Emily. They first need to unpack that food. Besides you already had two entire girls for breakfast. I only had one."

"But I'm a growing girl." Emily said and looked sad.

Both girls waited patient while the two people put everything down. The girl walked back too the car and Emily followed her. In the garage the girl noticed the fat girl followed her.

"Oh it's you." She said friendly. "Is there something?"

"Yeah. I'm really hungry." Emily said.

"Well all the food is in the kitchen." She said friendly and smiled.

"Not all the food." Emily said.

The next moment Emily grabbed the girl and shoved her head in her mouth. She swallowed getting the girls head in her throat feeling it expand. She opened her mouth wider to get her shoulders in. Emily was a hungry girl and became a expert at eating people. It only took her five seconds to get the girl to her waist in her mouth. She felt how the girl entered her stomach but she did't cared. All she cared was filling her empty stomach. She fast slurped the legs in like f they were spaghetti. Soon the chubby legs and feet disappeared in her mouth and entered a second later her stomach.

Emily was getting so fat that even a slow waddle was getting difficult. Her belly almost touched the floor. She slowly waddled but was still hungry. But when she walked in the kitchen she only saw the bare legs of the man sticking out of her sisters mouth. Sara was also good at eating people but Emily was better and faster at it. She was also fatter then her sister. She was proud at this. She liked Sara but... Sara was always able to beat her in games and anything else. She finally had something she was better in then her sister. After a loud belch the man was gone. Sara's belly was more sticking out forward the Emily's belly. Probably because she was taller and weighed less then Emily.

"Sara i'm still hungry," Emily whined.

"Well Emily... We have enough food for twenty people...." Sara said looking at the food.
Where will this story go next?

She was also fatter then her sister. She was proud at this. She liked Sara but... Sara was always able to beat her in games and anything else. She finally had something she was better in then her sister. After a loud belch the man was gone. Sara's belly was more sticking out forward the Emily's belly. Probably because she was taller and weighed less then Emily.

"Sara i'm still hungry," Emily whined.

"Well Emily... We have enough food for twenty people...." Sara said looking at the food.

Emily surveyed the array of delicious food on the table in front of her as her belly let out a sharp growl. Mac-n-cheese, chicken tenders, cupcakes... She licked her lips, and then realized she wanted, no needed it. All of it. So she turned to Sarah, and said, "Hey, there's a whole cake outside in their truck!"
Sarah looked at her in surprise. "Really?" "Yeah!" Emily said, trying to come up with something else to say, "It's like...uh...really big!" She indicated with her flabby arms. "Okay, I'll go get it!" Sarah said, lumbering away. Perfect, Emily thought, dragging herself closer to the table. She immediately started gorging on potatoes.

Sarah lumbered out towards the truck, even though she knew there wasn't any cake. She saw through her sister's scheme at once (she wasn't that stupid), but she had a scheme of her own to plan. She saw how hard it was for her sister to walk, and she then realized that if her sister were to just so happen to become immobile, she wouldn't have to share any of the people she wanted to eat. Even though Emily was better at eating people, she didn't like it as much as Sarah did, preferring people food to people. Sarah vastly preferred to eat people, and if she kept her sister fed on normal food she herself could eat as many people as she wanted (because Emily couldn't move to get to them.) It was a perfect plan. It just meant she'd have to go a little hungry for a while.

Take the bus somewhere in town
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Yum, yum, yum!” Emily gurgled as she chewed through her last bucket of chicken wings. The bucket hit the ground with chunks bitten out of it, squeezed and beaten, before the young girl stepped forward, and completely crushed it with her belly.
She polished off the mac n’ cheese in no time, swallowing mouthfuls big enough to fit someone’s head. Oh, to be the poor delivery girl trapped inside of her. She was almost completely buried under food, and only now was she discovering the bones of Emily’s breakfast. A shame that even Emily couldn’t hear her screaming under her thick fat, otherwise the whole neighbourhood would have heard her.

Sara watched Emily finishing off the food, smearing grease across her chubby face and drenching her new (if poorly fitting) clothes. This started out as a good idea, but the more she watched, the more she wanted something to eat. It seemed even if she did have a little plan in mind, denying her belly so much as a crumb was going to be nigh impossible.

“Aww man, forget it!” The older sister charged as quickly as her mammoth figure would carry her towards the massive meal. This was not particularly fast at all, and before the food was even in grabbing distance, it was all inside of Emily.

“EMILY!” Sara growled, furiously.
“Sorry sis…” Emily burped, trying to rub her stomach with her short little arms. “I couldn’t help it…”
“I can’t believe you’d do this to me!” she wailed, forgetting that she hadn’t even been tricked, “I know living in Castle Emily is all about doing what we want, but we’re still meant to be a team!”
Taking a deep breath, Sara tried to calm herself down…and watched as Emily waddled into the kitchen.

“What are you doing now?”
“Need a snack…” Emily’s stomach roared, “That was yum, but didn’t quite fill me up, you know?”
This was certainly, if by just a bit, the fullest Emily had ever been in her entire life…and she was still hungry?! Her rumbling tummy almost sounded like a wild animal loose in the house. It was impressive, but almost a little worrying…would Emily ever stop eating?

Not just yet, at least. She couldn’t reach over her huge belly, and so smacked the cupboard with it. Two boxes of cereal, a bag of chips and some Butterfingers fell out, landing safely atop her gut. While she immediately ripped open the box and began pouring the marshmallowy breakfast food into her mouth, she tossed Sara the Butterfingers.

“I’m sorry for tricking you, sis-BRAAAAHP! But you’d have done the same to me, right?”
Sara looked at the tiny treat and sighed, knowing at this point a snack like this was nothing to her, but she appreciated the gesture, “Kinda, yeah…” She felt bad; she clearly didn’t need to trick Emily, she was doing a fine job of getting immobile by herself.

“I don’t blame you, sis…but now I’m starving!” she swallowed the treat without unwrapping it. That was just enough to split her new shirt around her tummy; the only one that even fit her properly. “I definitely need another person in here. Can't go to bed until I have at least one more.”

Emily’s eyes lit up, “Oooh! Ooh! I have an idea!” crumbs dripped from her full mouth, fell across her gut and onto the floor, “But we’ll need some disguises!”
“Or at least fitting clothes,” Sara tries to pull her top down, but just ripped it more, but still keeping her chest covered. "What's the plan, Emmers?"
"Well, I know there's a bus stop around the corner from here..."

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:

"So we could eat people after they got off the bus. That's a good idea. But we have one problem. Were can we get some disguises. There was only one old man living here. I don't think his clothes fit us. Since no one else lived here, we have no chance of finding other clothes. Even if we did I doubt they would fit us either."

"Yeah I know what you mean. The stuff I'm wearing is awfully tight." Emily complained.

Sara looked at Emily's clothes that were stretched to the limit and looked like if they could rip any second.

"Well perhaps we could wear some sheets." Sara mumbled. "And maybe that man has some hats."

"Yeah! That's a good idea!" Emily cheered and throw her hands in the air. That movement ripped her shirt around her tummy, keeping her chest covered though. "Oops. I really need those sheets."

Some time later they walked over to the bus stop. Both wrapped a sheet around their obese bodies. from some distance you would think those girls just wore some dresses. Both wore a hat and kept their face hidden. They did't wanted anyone to recognize them.
Both slowly waddled forward. Neither of them had been active. Both were more kind of lazy. However they could be very fast if it had something to do with food. But even as toddlers they were't active. It took a long time before Sara started walking and even longer before Emily started walking.
Emily was close to becoming immobile but did't really noticed. Sara did. She noticed her sister was breathing loud. She knew that being obese could make you run out of breath very fast, and she must admit she noticed that on herself too.
Left and right from the bus stop grew some bushes.

"All right Emily, this is my plan. We hide behind some bushes. You the ones on the right, and I the ones on the left. Or the other way around. When people walk out of the bus we eat the one who came out... but wait until the bus is away."

"So I eat the ones who walk my way and you the ones on the other way." Emily said.

"Well... that's the idea. Except of course if all people walk the same way. Then we need to share. Capice? Now hide."

Both hid behind some bushes. Soon a bus arrived. One man and two girls got of. The bus drove away and the man and one of the girls walked right and the other girl walked right.
The girl who walked right looked one moment up at the sky. Suddenly something grabbed her leg and a huge weight pushed her to the ground. But before she was able to see what it was her head was between the powerful jaws of Sara. Sara fast swallowed and the girl went down Sara's throat. She needed to push a bit to get her shoulders in her mouth but after that fast swallowed, pinning the arms of her victim to her sides. She swallowed her torso but disliked the taste of her shirt. When she was up to her waist she fast pulled off her shoes and socks. Fast she swallowed further. She enjoyed the taste of bare meat. A few minutes later. The girl curled up in Sara's stomach. It took Sara some effort to get up but she manged to do it and waddled over to Emily. Her belly was huge.

"Did you eat both of them?" Sara asked.

"Well I started to eat her, but then he grabbed her and well he also came in my mouth and I still had some room left so... Could you help me up?"

It took them all their effort, strength and many failed attempts before they got Emily on her feet but Sara saw clearly that even while Emily stood on her fat loaded legs her belly touched the ground. She smiled.

Both girls took quite a while to get back to Castle Emily. Even though the bus stop was almost right in front of the house, both bloated little girls took a half an hour to struggle their way through the door...well almost through the door anyway.

"Sara! Heeeelllllllp!" Emily whined as she found her massive middle wedged between the doorframe.

Sara, who had barely managed to wiggle her own tummy through the door looked back and sighed at her sister in annoyance. True, she loved her "little" sister's gluttonous appetite and cute, round, tummy. However, the last thing she wanted to do after her hike home was to put more effort into pulling her bloated little sister's frame from the doorway.

"Oh, Emily. Here..." Sara said to her younger sister as she turned around, her tummy belly bumping Emily's

The massive 6 year old couldn't help but giggle at this. It was even better for her too as her own tummy actually engulfed her older sister's a slight bit.

Sara probably would have enjoyed it as well, but she was far too preoccupied with trying to free her younger sibling. She grabbed onto Emily's arm and pulled with all her might. However, very little movement was actually happening.

Finally, the 8 year old stopped when she looked over and saw...

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

…her sister pop free of the door frame.
“Ooof! Thanks, sis…” Emily laughed, stuck on her belly, struggling to get up. Sara sighed and helped her up, almost falling over herself in the process. The way their prey kicked and squirmed inside of them made it harder, but eventually both of them were upright, and Sara managed to close the door behind them.

“What a day, huh?” Sara grinned as they waddled along. “I’m gonna sleep like a log tonight!”
“Not me!” yawned Emily. “I’m gonna stay up all night!”
“Oh really?”
“Yeah! Throwing a big…party. Wanna come? There’ll be balloons and music and…food, food, food…” Emily patted her mouth, which yawned wide enough to swallow her hand.
“Sounds cool. Any special guests?”
“One Direction and Katy Perry, and Taylor Swift, they’re all gonna be there. And when they’re done singing, we’ll eat them up…” Emily tripped and landed back on her gut, but didn’t yelp or even seem to register it. She just nestled up against her own fat and began to snore. Sara giggled, and decided she didn’t want to try the stairs today. She switched off the light, and laid herself back against her sister.
“Just think, every day is going to be like this from now on. Forever and ever.”
Emily didn’t say anything, but Sara knew they were both looking forward to tomorrow.

And they were right to; the next day was wonderful.
The two were so full they slept in until 2:00 in the afternoon, awakened by the arrival of someone trying to sell them a magazine subscription. Typically, Emily got him, but Sara enjoyed a breakfast of whole chocolate chip cookies in a big bowl full of milk. On TV they giggled and laughed at a news report about the disappearances. Some people were actually trying to blame aliens! Sara laughed so hard she crushed her chair into rubble beneath her.
When night time came, they decided to raid another neighbour’s house for dinner, and left with not only a family of four between them, but a whole collection of Disney movies and a fridge worth of food.
Best of all, this family had pets! Sara slurped up a fish tank, watching the turtles try and paddle away from her hungry, pursed lips to no avail. Then she sat and cuddled with a fluffy kitten before abruptly shoving it in her mouth. It put up a bit of a fight, and Emily had to make the ‘cat got your tongue’ joke.
Speaking of Emily, she put her lips around a habitrail and let a small family of hamsters scurry down her throat. That was all they had left, but she didn’t mind; she felt the scamper around inside of her amongst their owners and everything else she’d eaten. She decided to swallow the habitrail itself just for those cute little guys!

And after that, things only seemed to get better. In just a few days, they cleaned out two more houses and filled Castle Emily with even more fun stuff. They went back to the bus stop and ate so many people they had to sleep in the backyard because their bellies were too big and their bodies were too sore to bother squeezing inside.
They spent days watching through their new Disney movies, and for a while even adopted a puppy one of their victims had been walking. Sara ate it when they realized they didn’t have any dog food.
The walls of their new home became coated in messy, bright paint, messily tossed around glitter, and posters of all sorts. They made pillow forts with no intention of pulling them down, and adored each room with streamers and banners. Hand drawn pictures of rainbows and candy were glued over family photos, and pizza boxes covered the floor.
The backyard, once as beautiful and well-kept as the front garden, was now dug up and pulled apart as the sisters buried more and more bones with each visit to the bathroom. That part used to stress them out so much back home, but now it was like a game!

Castle Emily was truly their paradise.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Gluttons paradise

choices: It's their parents...just so happy to see them safe!
A doctor...they've been taken to hospital!
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

In the distance, they saw the lit up sign of the next bus on its way.
“Got any room for more?”
Emily shrieked with laughter. Sara chuckled a bit too; it was a pretty dumb question, really.

The bus stopped, and the six passengers departed, just to be ensnared by the sisters. A few minutes passed, and another bus rocked up. Followed by another, and yet another sometime after that. A big machine that dropped off delicious people every few minutes? This was heaven, plain and simple.

The sky had grown pitch black, but the sisters were totally lost in cannibalistic joy. They barely said a word, just patiently waiting to pounce from the bushes. A few minutes turned into an hour, and an hour turned into several.
Between each other, the sisters had devoured perhaps thirty five people. They didn’t quite have the patience to keep count.
The simple truth was that their bellies were now completely massive. Even under all their doughy fat, their stomachs churned and wiggled as dozens of people desperately tried to escape. Sara was now more belly than girl. The bushes completely failed to hide her new form; the only thing keeping either of them hidden was the night time darkness. And even then, you could still hear the churning two houses over.

Of course, Emily had managed to outdo her big sister just slightly. You’d certainly need to be told which one of them was older, because Emily had long outgrown her sibling. She was as wide as a car, and her stomach stretched much too far for her tiny arms to reach. It annoyed her that she couldn’t give herself a proper belly rub anymore, but she certainly didn’t miss being a pound skinnier.

“Hey…Sara…”
“Yeah,” she burped.
“I can’t get up.”
“You ate like a hundred people, what do you expect? Haha…ha…” Sara yawned, stretching her mouth out wide enough for someone to start climbing back up. They didn’t get far before she slurped their arm back down, though.
“N-no…” Emily fluttered her eyes, trying to keep them open, “I’m still hungry…just one more…one or two…eight more…”

Sara chuckled. Her sister’s belly was truly bottomless. True, she herself could go for another bite, but she couldn’t move much either. Closing her eyes, she relaxed and let her writhing body lull her to sleep. Emily fought her heavy eyes, but soon nodded off just the same.

On the cold grass, they slept peacefully as their inhumanly gorged stomachs mushed and melted the poor people inside, inflating the girls one pound at a time. In the short time since they became cannibals, they had more than quadrupled in weight, and that certainly wasn’t about to stop now…

They could have slept for a week with that load of meat inside them, but just a few hours passed before something nudged Sara’s stomach just enough to wake them up. It was only as her eyes blinked open that she even realized they had fallen asleep in the middle of a public street…
The morning light blinded her eyes for just a second, but she knew one thing; she and Emily weren’t alone.

They were in a room. But she knew for sure they did't went into this room. Or any room for that matter. The ate lots of tasty people at the bus stop. Or had that all been a dream? She only need to take one look at her huge belly to know that what happened at the bus stop was't a dream. The she noticed a man standing in the room.

"Ah. So you're finally awake. Good to know that."

"What... what happened? How did we get here?"

"Well you two were both passed out near a bus stop. Some people saw you and were worried. So the called 911. Now you're in the hospital. But you won't stay in here for long. Or did you really think you would get away with it?"

"With what?" Emily asked who also had woken up.

"Well your bellies were so huge. I'm still surprised how you two were able to stay alive. But we took some tests. and during a X-ray test we saw skeletons in your bellies. not just one, but several. You live in a neighborhood were a lot of people disappeared lately. It looks like we now know who did it.

Sara suddenly noticed two things. She and Emily both wore a mask around then mouth. With a small opening with bars were their mouth was, and her wrists and ankles were stuck to the bed with some leather belts.

What are these masks for, and why are we stuck to the bed?"

"You two have killed people by eating them. You two are very dangerous. We don't want you two to eat a doctor or the nurse. Or anybody else. So we took measurements. You have killed a lot of people and you don't seem to have a bit of guilt. Don't you care about all those people you murdered."

"We only ate them," Emily mumbled.

" Yeah, that's not helping Emily." Sara said. "Let's give it up. They got us. They found out what we did. We're in trouble. I should have know that this would have ended, sooner or later."

"Really? You knew that?" Emily asked.

"I guess I knew it... deep in my hart. That this could't go on. Besides look at us sis. We're both unable to walk or do anything for ourselves. We're immobile. I'm afraid we never eat people again."

"But they're so tasty."

"Emily... we ate lots of people... I don't know exactly how many... but every person we ate... well we sort of... killed them. We're serial killers."

"That's right the doctor said. We're gonna do some tests to make sure you two are fine... but after that... I think it's the jail for you."

Suddenly the door opened and their parents walked in. They seemed furious. Sara never had seen them so angry. Not even when she accidentally put the carpet on fire. Or the time they cut their own hair.

"How could you?" Their mother screamed. "Eat all those innocent people! Don't you feel ashamed? Or at least a bit guilty."

'Not all were so innocent." Emily mumbled thinking about the bullies they ate.

"That does't matter! And you Sara! I expected more from you! That you would be a bit more responsible! That you would look after Emily!"

"She did look after me mommy." Emily said.

"Look at how fat you two got! This will take a lot more the just a diet! You two can't even move!"

"Yeah well we..." Sara started. "Ah what's the point. We're in deep trouble."

"You bet you are!" Their father shouted. "Killing people and walking away! Did you know how worried we were about you? We thought you might have been killed! But all this time you were the killers! I still can't believe it!"

"Well we did't eat family." Sara tried.

But their parents walked out angry mumbling, followed by the doctor.

"It's over sis. We will never eat people again. We will be in jail for the rest of our lives. I don;t think we will ever let us out for good behavior."

"Well... if I need to go to jail anyway... I'm glad it is with you sis." Emily mumbled

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

A few minutes later, a pair of police officers stepped in, just to freeze in shock. One of them gazed over the enormous sisters. Emily’s belly by itself was still large enough while empty to fit a dozen people. She was a mountain of fat now. The younger officer stepped up closer for a better look.
“It’s true…she…she really is just a little girl…” seeing her face amidst all that blubber was a little worrying. And then she leaned forward and tried to bite him.

“Emmers!” Sara whined. “Aren’t we in enough trouble as it is?”
“I…I can’t help it…” the younger sister whined, snapping hopelessly at the air as the officer backed away. “I’M STILL HUNGRY!” she sobbed, unable to quench her ridiculous hunger.

“Kind of sad…” sighed the older officer, “Look at her, she’s too young to realize she’s even done anything wrong. But…there were at least a dozen skeletons inside her alone.”

Inspiration struck, “No, that’s right!” Sara yelled, trying to get their attention, “It was all my idea! I loved eating people, so I got Emily to do it! I told her it was okay! That it was a game!”
“Sis, what are you doing!?”
“I didn’t know she’d get so addicted! It’s not her fault! Send me to jail for as long as you want, but Emily doesn’t deserve this!”

The officers sighed. “Even if we believed you, it’s pretty clear that she’s far, far more dangerous than you if she’s that big and still trying to…eat us,” they shuddered. “You two are kids so…maybe in a few years, after some serious liposuction and therapy.”
Liposuction?
Both sisters wanted to cry after hearing that awful word…it was the only thing worse than ‘diet.’ They began to whimper.
“That uhm, well that was meant to be reassuring, actually.”
“I think they’re too far gone,” said the other officer. “Come on, we can make our report now, let’s let the doctors get to work.”

A doctor, draped in a surgery mask and a hairnet stepped in and began to fiddle with some equipment, waving at the officers as they left. They seemed familiar…
“Good luck, doc, this has to be a once in a life time experience.”
The doctor sighed “Part of me always saw it coming, I have to say…”
“Really?”
“Uhm, y-yes! New studies have shown…well, it’s all very scientific, I won’t bore you with it. Oh, and uh, maybe bring a fork lift or two on your way back. I don’t think the paddy wagon will cut it for these two.”

There was an uneasy laugh, and the officers left. The doctor slid the door shut behind them, and took a scalpel from the table. The girls began to shiver. They’d been so used to being in charge, they completely forgot what it was like to feel powerless…

The doctor rushed over, holding the tiny blade up towards them, standing over Emily and giving her a good look.
“I can’t believe it’s come to this…”
“I’M SORRY!” bawled the enormous girl, “I’LL NEVER DO IT AGAIN! I’M SO SORRY, PLEASE!”
“I don’t think you’re sorry at all,” they grunted angrily. “You’ve always thought with your stomachs, and you’ve been responsible for almost a hundred disappearances in just a few short weeks!”
The girls both looked away as they began slicing away with the scalpel.

Emily’s arms dropped free as the belts were slashed apart.
“…but…you…you’re my kids…and darn it, I still love you, and I’m getting you both out of here!” the doctor pulled down the mask to reveal, their teary eyed…

"Daddy?" Emily said in disbelief. "You're here... for us?"

"Of course. I love you two. I wanted you two to be happy. That's the job of a parent. But I can't let you two eating people. You have too understand that. So many people disappeared in your stomachs, It was great news. On T.V, the newspaper and on the radio. All those people you have eaten had family. Those families are very upset. They probably want you two dead."

Far away from here. In the middle of the woods. With some grass fields around it, some high mountains and even a lake. Miles away from the nearest cities. We can live there. Just the three of us."

"What about mommy?" Emily asked.

"Eh... I don't think mommy is coming. She does't love you anymore. Outside she said to me that you're not her daughters anymore."

"No. It was meant to be a surprise." Their father answered.

"So you want to get us out in a car and drive over there." Sara asked.

"Yes. No other people live there so no one can tell that you're there. We can live there in peace. So how does that sound."

Sara was thinking. It all sounded good. Better than being in jail. The worst criminals were treated very bad. And they were bad. They were serial killers. But she saw one problem. The food! At the other hand... in jail they perhaps would even get less food. So it did't really matter. However... she still wondered if their father could get enough food for the both of them. She also need to be careful Emily would't by accident eat their father. But she would need to eat less anyway. It sounded better then jail.


"Well I admit it does sound good. I think we should do it!" Sara said

"Yeah! No liposuction for us!" Emily cheered.

"Are you two really sure about not having a liposuction?" He asked.

Besides there is so much room for so much food in there. I'm not sure I'm able to fill it each day. Besides you can always gain again. Gain all the weight back. How does that sound? Does't that sound good? I won't force any of you two. If you want to stay it's all right but think about what I said.

Sara was really thinking. Liposuction seemed to her a fate worse then dead, but her father did had some good arguments. But what would Emily think about it?

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

The sisters glanced down at their enormous bellies, then to each other.
“…sorry dad…we…it’s a good idea, but…this is all us now…”
“It’s okay,” their father sighed, “Let’s uh, look on the positive side of things. Now we have more time to get you out...” He threw a blanket over them, and began to push the beds. The wheels just groaned at first, but once they got moving, he didn’t stop.

The hospital was very quiet. The two couldn’t see a thing under the blanket, but they were expecting the place to be full of journalists and police officers. And yet, they only heard the odd set of foot steps, and their father only had to cover up what he was doing once, explaining that he was transporting some new equipment. The other person obviously recognised the massive, fat shapes under the blanket, but nodded and moved on, just wanting to get far away from the monstrous girls.

“It’s quiet…too quiet…” Sara whispered.
“Dad’s a ninja!” Emily said quietly in awe.
“Hmmm…I’m not so sure…”
Their father leaned in and whispered to them. “It’s all under control Pretend you’re asleep!” He didn’t have any quick way of explaining that their mother was a few rooms over, distracting the reporters and policemen with the story of her struggle against Sara and Emily’s weight.
Yes, what her daughters had become horrified her, but by doing this for him, her husband would take the two far away. She was too scared and angry to admit it, but she didn’t want anything bad to happen to them…
This was better than nothing.

After twelve minutes, the girls’ father threw off the blanket, letting the girls see. They were in the back parking lot.
“Thanks dad…phew, that was scary…”
“You’re telling me…” he huffed and puffed; pushing these two around was quite a work out.

Defying expectations, the two were still able to walk. Just barely. They moved slow, and their father had to help hold them up as they went, but they were still moving. After a good struggle, they arrived before a supply truck.

“I’ve never stolen anything before…” their dad gulped. “The things I do for you kids…”
“It’s okay, we stole a food truck yesterday!” Emily grinned. Her father look down at her, horrified. “And I’m uh…we’re both really sorry…”
With a sigh, he began opening the back and pulling out the ramp. Things were never going to be simple for this family ever again…

A man and his daughter. Time to break a promise...
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

After coming so close, the sisters were truly grateful for what their father had done. Having gobbled down any witnesses, it had always been so easy not to feel guilty afterwards without anyone to get them in trouble, but now they promised their father never to eat anyone again. It seemed like just the right thing to do.
The problem was, however, that saying something was easy, but actually doing it was a different story. The girls had only dozed off for a few minutes when their bellies began to rumble. They were so large at this point, they shook the entire container.
They needed to eat someone.

“Dad said no,” Sara smacked her stomach.
“Yeah, dad said no!” Emily slapped it as well.
“Ow! Emily! You’re meant to hit your own stomach.
“Why would I hit myself? That’s dumb.” She fiddled with the mask, trying to pull it off, but it was a sturdy thing.
This was bad. They’d made their promise less than ten minutes ago, and she already felt ready to break it. Maybe if they did have some animals to eat, but it wasn’t likely a pair of deer were snoozing somewhere in the truck.
“Hey dad!” Sara yelled out.
“Yes sweetie?”
“We’re hungry…” Her father gulped hard. He was dreading the moment they’d say that.

A few minutes later, they pulled up at a gas station.
“You two just relax, and I’ll be back with a nice snack, okay?”
“Hurry…” Emily groaned, laying almost lifeless on her back, letting her fat belly jut high into the air. She was just being overdramatic, but her father gasped and ran inside, fearing she’d starve.

“We can do this…you know, maybe eating people was just a phase! Remember that time we were crazy about sculpting? After a while we couldn’t stand it!”
“This isn’t sculpting, sis, this is food!” Emily gripped both sides of her mask and began trying to yank it off.
“I’m just trying to be optimistic. After all, we can’t-Emily!” Sara’s eyes bulged as she watched her sister start to eat the mask off her own face. The back snapped, and she quickly crammed it past her chubby lips. “Aren’t these like…plastic?”
“Tasted a bit bland,” her sister whined, patting her fat. She helped Sara out of hers, before swallowing it whole. “I uh, need some fresh air.”

“No, Emmers, we need to stay put. If we get caught out there-“
“We won’t get caught, it’ll just be for a second! Trust me!” Emily pushed open the back doors and was immediately set upon by surprised, shocked eyes. They gasped and almost fell over. Whoever it was, they’d clearly never seen someone as fat as Emily (which was hardly surprising).

“Emily, I told you not to!” Sara growled, “Get back in here, dad will be back soon!”
Unfortunately, only one thing raced through Emily’s head as her eyes locked onto their visitor.
With a mischievous smirk, she whispered to herself, “Lunch time!”

But what was she looking at?

Sara did her best to get up and stop her little sister but with Sara's huge size even getting up was a challenge. Emily already got out of the car. But when she finally got up all what was left of the man and his daughter were some legs sticking out of Emily's mouth and some socks and shoes.
Sara suddenly remembered what people said about her in the hospital. that she was mean and did't seem to care. He was right. Sure they both started eating people but she wanted only to eat mean people while Emily did't seem to care and said all people were just food. Sure she also did eat all that other people without a care, but now she cared. She remembered she once saw a movie about a criminal who at the end got remorse. He felt terrible for all the people he killed. And all the people he hurt. Sara felt herself in that position. But Emily did't see to have any problem with it. Was Emily perhaps just... mean?

"Emily! How could you do that?"

Emily swallowed the feet in her mouth an looked guilty at her sister.

"I... I was just hungry." Emily said trying to sound innocent.

"I can't believe you! We just promised dad we would't eat people any more. I kept my promise.... but you, no! You just had to fill you fat tummy again and eat two people! Emily if we get caught it's your fault! You realize that?"

Emily looked at her sister. She was almost crying. Sara rarely had been angry at Emily. But Emily never had seen her sister this angry. They were sister and always had been really close. That could't all just been over because of a few people. The both had eaten so many others.

"I was really hungry." She tried again.

"Yeah I know you're hungry. I'm hungry too. But I did't eat two people to fill up my tummy! We mus't draw any attention! If you keep eating people they can track us. Then we wont be safe in that house where daddy is taking us."

"Are you angry at me? It were just two people." Emily asked.

"Did you two eat people again?" Their father shouted.

"No just Emily. I tried to stop her but, I did't get up in time. Sorry." Sara said.

"Emily! I thought we agreed to don't eat anymore people. If they have a clue we did it, they come after us. Then what?" Do you want to been on the run? Forever?" Their father asked.

"Does that mean I can eat people?" Emily asked.

Sara could't believe her sister. Was eating people all she cared about? did she enjoy it to eat them. To have the power over life and death? It seemed like she did enjoy it.
Her father bought a lot of food. So at least Sara had something to eat.

"Can I have some food too?" Emily asked.

"No!" Sara and her father both shouted.

Emily turned her back while she mumbled: "No fair."

They drove further.

Sara sat there, stuffing more and more junk food into her face. It didn’t seem like it, but she was eating it slowly, since her father clearly couldn’t afford as much as she could eat.

“Can…can I please have a little bit?”
“No, Emmers! You’re in trouble!”
The younger sister pouted, watching her sibling inhale snack after snack, her belly creeping just a little bit larger with each. People were delicious, but she had lost no love for normal food.
“Just a bite?” the girl asked in vein. “Look, I’m really sorry!”
“Are you? Because you seemed darn happy to eat those two!”
Emily had trouble finding the right words. She seemed very confused. “Sara…you think it’s bad that I still want to eat people…I think it’s weird that you don’t. We just spent like a whole week eating more and more people! Don’t you remember when we sang about it? Or all the fun we had at Castle Emily? We only had that place because I ate someone! I thought that…I thought we both loved it the same…”

Sara swallowed a massive mouthful of marshmallows, and with a sigh, slid a bag of gummy bears over to Emily, “I do…oh, its the best thing ever! Every moment I’m not eating someone, it’s driving me crazy! If we’d never gotten caught, I’d still be doing it, yeah…but we did get caught and…dad is trying really hard to protect us…”
Emily nodded, but didn’t seem much happier, “I’ll…try a little harder next time, sis.” Sara smiled; maybe that was the best they could hope for.

They heard their father curse loudly and the truck came to a stop. A moment later he opened up the back, smiling and looking nervous.
“Hey girls, nothing to worry about it’s just we…seem to have a flat tire.” The girls immediately looked down, suspecting their own weight was to blame.
“Can you fix it?”
“Um…no,” he admitted. “But that means you two can get some fresh air while I figure something else out! And that’s not all!” He plopped a box down in front of them. “I brought you some dress up and make up stuff! Put it on now please…”
The girls lit up at the sight and immediately took to it. He’d obviously taken it from home, they recognised all their mothers clothing and makeup. Barely a single article of clothing fit, and they had no hope of in any way concealing their weight at all, but they did their best with what they had.

Sara let her pigtails down and applied green eye shadow and some lip balm, along with some clip on earrings. Emily barely recognised her, but the belly was a dead giveaway, even if she had wrapped a blanket around her middle to keep it covered. Their dad didn’t think the news had travelled this far yet, but didn’t sound very optimistic.
Emily had Sara put her hair into a bun, and hit it under a fancy hat. Her makeup was much messier, and again, Sara had to help her out a little, though it still didn’t look as good.

With some help from their dad, they waddled down the ramp. He complimented them on their wonderful disguises, but had something more serious to say.
“Now…daddy needs you two to be on your best behaviour. And I’ve never meant that more, okay? I know your tummies get very hungry, and I’ll try my best to get you something to eat…but this is really serious now. If you get caught, we can’t just drive away…”

Sara nodded, and looked past her father to see just where they were…”Oh…this isn’t going to be easy…”

Emily sighed. Sara was right. She always was…but just this once, she didn’t want her to be! She understood why she needed to stop eating people, but it just sounded like another diet. Nothing felt more satisfying or rewarding than locking someone up for the rest of their short lives inside of herself, and making herself bigger!
But with a sigh, she decided to control herself…no more eating people.

And then, Sara let go of her arm, and she immediately ran off into the car park.
“EMILY!”
“I’M SORRY, I CAN’T HELP IT!”
Their father gasped and ran after her, “We have to stop her!”
He bolted off like a rocket, while his eldest daughter sort of waddled along awkwardly. “Wait up, dad!”

It didn’t take him long to catch Emily, but where to go from there was another question. He grabbed her arm, but she just began pulling him along. It shocked him how strong she’d gotten.
“Emily, please! I want to protect you and Sara, but if you keep eating people, we’ll get caught again! We don’t have a spare truck tyre, we’re stuck here!”
“Sorry daddy, but a girl’s gotta eat!” she defiantly yelled, moving towards a family van.
“What happened to my sweet little Emmers? She’d never do anything like this!”
“I ate her!” she laughed.
He ran over to her front and pushed against her belly. She just pushed him along with her, dragging his feet against the ground.
“EMILY! PLEASE!” That was when he heard his daughter’s belly rumble up close for the first time. He let go and fell, and she walked right over him. Thankfully she didn’t step on him (he probably would not have survived), but her thunderous footsteps crashing by his head felt like a near death experience.

Sara finally caught up as Emily started banging on the side of the car. “LET ME IN I WANNA EAT YA!”
“I just heard her stomach growl…” her father sounded shaken. “That’s…that’s crazy…it felt like someone attacked me! Is that what it always feel like when you two are hungry? Like someone’s attacking you!?”
Sara thought about it. She was used to it by now. Her ravenous stomach would quake angrily, and the rumbling could get pretty loud. She thought about it; maybe if she were skinny, hunger like this would hurt. She had all this fat to absorb the force.
“All the time. I mean, I’m hungry all the time, even right now…”
Her father pulled himself up and watched his younger, but larger daughter slam her chubby fists against the window, and the occupants, a family of five, woke up and began staring in surprise.
“Sara…after thinking about it…”
