1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

As the van drove out of the drive-in, Sara and Emily sat in the back in silence. Emily had quite the satisfied grin on her face, with both hands firmly on her tremendous stomach. Sara had eaten her fill as well, but wasn’t in such as good a mood. Both were quite cramped up against each other and filled the little vehicle easily; this was a far cry from the roomy delivery truck.

“What’s wrong, Sara?” Emily asked, noticing her sister’s bad mood, “Come on, isn’t this great? Dad’s letting us eat people again! Isn’t that the coolest?”
Sara didn’t say anything, giving her young sister a look, and then going back to her thoughts.
“Oh, I get it! Too happy for words. No problem! BRAAAAAAAHHHHP!”
“No, Emily…just because dad says it’s okay doesn’t mean it is.”
“Sure it does!”
She sighed, knowing she wasn’t going to win any arguments with Emily. “Look, I just...for a moment there, I really thought I was going to change. I finally realized I was doing a bad thing and, I thought I could fix it…but, I guess eating people is just what I’m meant to do!”
“Yeah!” Emily cheered, still not understanding.

Their dad was scared. Both for his daughters, and of them. While he and their mother always had great difficulty controlling their appetites, they thought they’d done a good job in every other department. But Emily really didn’t see anything wrong with eating people. Sara at least felt a little bad, but that wasn’t a big help.

“Sara, you’re trying to go against your nature!”
The older, yet smaller sibling’s ears perked. “Huh?”
“Remember in school, they taught us all about how animals act? Like, how bears hibernate, or how lady lion’s hunt? Well, look at us!” she yanked off the (now quite loose) blanket off of Sara’s belly, revealing the massive ball of flesh, shaking and jiggling from those trapped inside. “We’re meant to eat people! I think that’s our nature!”

“I don’t think it works that way,” her dad chimed in.
“Sure it is!” Emily smiled, “You should have seen us! Sara and me must’ve eaten a hundred people back at Castle Emily!”
“Sweetheart…” he tried to say, but was cut off.
“We were so good at it, we’d have probably eaten the whole town if they hadn’t caught us! Just imagine how big we’d be then!”
Their father shivered in horror, but Sara began to smile.
“Emily…come on,” she composed herself. “You saw what almost happened to us! I don’t want that happening again.”
“We got unlucky!” she huffed, “You saw me eat my mask, I’d have eaten every one of those doctors!” Sara laughed, knowing how very true this was.

“Girls, just because you can eat people…doesn’t mean you should, you know?”
“But we want to! It’s the best thing ever, daddy, for real!” Emily said in her innocent little voice. “Right, Sara?”

Sara put her hands on her tummy, feeling half the family struggle for freedom as they were digested alive. These innocent people would be gone forever…but they sure did taste good, and they’d make her even bigger…

Sara smiled, “Yeah!” she nodded. Her father shuddered, and the van swerved for a brief moment before he took back control.
Trying to hug her bigger little sister, Sara just sort of bumped their bellies together. They could feel their meals kicking at each other from inside, making both voracious girls laugh. Falling back, the van shook.
“Girls! Please, control yourselves! We don’t want to have an accident!0
Both of them sat, giggling. At themselves, at each other, and at the weak little van that could barely hold them.

“Look, Emmers…I’m sorry…we’ve had a really stressful day, you know? I’ve been acting crazy.”
“That’s okay, you just don’t want us getting into trouble! And then we can keep eating!”
“Crazy?” their father sighed. He thought at least one of his daughters were coming to their senses. Ever since they’d disappeared to that ‘Castle Emily’ place, his life had been nothing but stress…

Seeing her dad’s expression in the rear-view mirror, Sara leaned in and whispered to Emily as quietly as she could.
“I know daddy’s letting us eat people again, but I don’t think he’s happy about it.”
“Hmmmph, he should be happy that we’re happy.”
“Don’t be too hard on him, he’s got good reasons. I don’t know about you, but just a few smelly animals and the odd traveller doesn’t sound like it’ll fill me up at all.” Emily gasped.

“We’ve done nothing but break rules since we started eating people! It’s going to happen eventually.”

The two leaned back and shared a small packet of cookie’s the family had left behind. Of course it didn’t affect their monstrous appetites, but it kept them occupied for a while more. Their father hadn’t heard anything they’d said, but he did feel a strong sense of dread surge through him…
…but then he’d been feeling that constantly since he found out what his kids had been up to.

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Father and daughter

choices: They feast! Well, Emily does anyway.
No, wait, Emily's gotta use the bathroom first.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Nowaya (1)

Sara jolted awake, and suddenly. The van had stopped. Craning her neck, she was able to see a sumptuous cabin surrounded entirely by trees. "We're here," her dad said, turning around and giving her a smile. Emily was still asleep across the car from her, so she jiggled her sister's belly a little bit. No good. She was really asleep. She jiggled it a bit harder- no dice. A little exasperated, she gave it a big old smack. That got her up! "Whuzzat?" Emily asked, groggily. "We're here, you big silly. Now, let's get inside." Sara unbuckled her seatbelt and heaved herself out of the car, not without some difficulty. She was just able to clear the car door with her still-engorged stomach. Emily likewise heaved herself out, panting heavily as she did so. Her belly gurgled, and sweat dripped off her brow with the effort. Once she reached the ground, she leaned on the side of the car, breathing hard- and then got a look at the distance to the house. It was probably a few hundred feet, but to the massive Emily it looked like miles. She took one step, two steps, and then leaned forward, using her still massively distended stomach as a support, and called for help. Sara and her father begrudgingly helped her into the house- "helped" being more like "carried." It was hard work, especially since Emily was crying for food the whole way inside. Sweating with the effort of moving her massive sister along with her own enormous gut, Sara was able to take solace in the fact that it would be really easy to immobilize her cannibalistic sister.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: They arrive

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51)

"Phew! That was hard work." Emily mumbled. "It made me very hungry. I could go for a human, or two, or three."

"Hard work?" Sara whispered to herself so soft Emily could't hear it. "Hard work for who. She barely helped. We almost needed to carry her. And she's hungry again. She just ate three people a short while ago. Oh well, at least giving her something to eat would make her immobile faster."

Suddenly they heard a car outside. Their father looked up and smiled.

"Ah she's here."

"Who's here?" Emily asked curious. "Is it lunch?"

"No it's not. Get this clear. Outside is Gwenda. She;s a good friend of me I know from school. Don't eat her! I mean this. Especially you Emily. Listen Gwenda knows about you two. She won't tell anyone. She promised that. But she does the grocery shopping for us. So I don't have to leave the two of you alone."

"We can watch out for ourselves." Emily said.

"I'm not sure about that Emily." Sara said.

"What? In castle Emily we also did it. It worked fine."

"Yeah but that was a lot of pounds ago. Or did I need to remind you you need help to get into the house?"

"Hm, good point." Emily said. "Fine then. I promise I won't eat her. Besides she gets food for us.

A young woman appeared. She looked friendly and nice. With long dark blond straight hair. A bit chubby and a bright smile. She wore some dungarees and a pink shirt. Sara heard a: 'Tok!' sound. She then noticed One of Gwenda's legs was made of metal.

"Hello you two. I have some food for you." Gwenda said and gave them a box filled with hamburgers.

Emily started to pig out. Sara just took one and leaned over to Gwenda.

"Say Gwenda." She whispered. "Next time you do the grocery shopping... can you also take some weight gain stuff?"

"Sure." Gwenda said friendly.

Sara fast grabbed a few burgers. She wanted Emily to gain but that did't want to stay she did't need to eat. By the way Emily ate way more burgers then her. This fattening thing was going to be very easy.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Gwenda

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Nowaya (1)

Ever since arriving, the days had just blown by. With nothing to do, the sisters just remained sedentary, watching cartoons, sleeping and, of course, eating. Sara and Gwenda, working together, made sure that Emily got the bulk of the food (though Sara didn't skimp). Gwenda had also managed to find some sort of weight gaining substance at a local fitness shop, and she made sure that Emily's food was smothered in the stuff. Even after a only few days of this life, Sara was seeing quite a change in her younger sister. She became, if possible, even lazier than ever before, barely moving except to use the restroom. Her enormous round stomach had also settled down now that all of the people were digested, becoming an enormously heavy and flabby blanket that hung off the end of the couch when sitting and to her knees when she (rarely) stood. Sara's had also changed, but since it was significantly smaller to begin with and compounded with the fact that she was eating much less than Emily meant that her belly stayed a big blubbery (but not round) ball. However, Sarah knew she was making significant progress in the right direction when Emily...
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Skip a few days

choices: Sarah makes it back just in time for the rescue
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Nowaya (1)

The first major milestone in Sarah's fattening plan was reached on a rainy Saturday afternoon. The two sisters had been marathoning television shows as usual when they ran out of snacks. As Gwenny was out of town, Emily employed the time-honored tradition of puppy-dog eyes until Sarah agreed to get more. After much grunting, groaning, and grumbling, Sarah lifted herself off the couch and waddled off to the kitchen. Emily heard her sister's thunderous footsteps slowly taper off until they were completely inaudible. An uncomfortable stillness settled over the room, despite the beating of the rain on the roof. Emily waited. And waited. And waited. It seemed like hours before the silence was interrupted by an angry groan from her belly. This was not a hunger groan-far from it. This groan signaled the need for an urgent trip to the bathroom. Sighing heavily, Emily heaved herself forward-

-and promptly sank bank onto the couch. She heaved again, with even less success. The uncomfortable pressure in her stomach was building. She attempted to bring her legs onto the couch and push off, but her apron of belly and rolls of fat on her legs made it impossible to do anything more than flop uselessly to the side. Her belly let out another strained groan. The pressure was growing intolerable. A crack of thunder rang out through the house. Emily sniffled in worry.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: ...couldn't stand up alone.

choices: Skip to Emily reaching full immobility.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Nowaya (1)

Sarah took a deep breath. Moving was hard, especially when she had seven extremely heavy (to her weak arms, anyway) bags of chips clutched in their fatty embrace. Luckily, she only had a few feet more to go before she reached the couch and relaxation again. She wobbled her way into the living only to find Emily in a state of severe distress. She quickly tossed the chips onto the floor and waddled slightly faster towards her oversized sister. "What's wrong, Emily?" Sarah asked as she drew near. Emily only managed to whine out "B-Bathroom..."

Sarah got the message, luckily enough, and she was able to heave her enormous sister to her feet in only about five minutes, resulted in Emily being in even more distress than before. Working together, though (really Sarah did most of the work) they were able to make it to the bathroom before anything too major happened. As Emily sat, sighing in relief, Sarah silently congratulated herself. Emily was now unable to get up under her own power. Soon she'd be unable to get up at all, and then she'd outgrow the furniture, and everybody would be safe from the menace that was Emily and her voracious appetite. She beamed. She was, however, so distracted by this vision that she failed to notice Emily pawing at her side for a good two minutes. "Sarah...Sarah..." said Emily. "What?!" snapped Sarah. She wasn't too happy about being shook out of her vision like this. "I'm hungry again..." moaned Emily. "Fine, fine, let's get you up again," sighed Sarah, reaching for her hand again. Emily, however, drew back. "What now!?" cried the mildly annoyed Sarah. "I'm not done..." whined Emily. "Could you get me some food in here?"
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Sarah makes it back just in time for the rescue

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51)

A few days later it was obvious Emily would never walk again. Her weak muscles could't support her huge body anymore. Sara was happy they had Gwenda. That girl had some talents. After she and their father knew that Emily would soon be immobile Gwenda took her tool kit and started working at the couch. She made a hole that you could open and close right under Emily's huge behind. This way Emily did't need to get up if she needed to poo. When you closed the hole it also kept the smell in there. It became very handy. Of course this meant Emily burned even less calories then before.
Sara was still mobile however. Thank to trips too the bathroom, too the kitchen and to her bedroom. Of course she also burned some calories by walking around her huge body. Smaller then Emily's but still... very heavy.
Emily at the other hand did't seem to care she would never walk again. The only thing she did seem to care about was... food.
Sara was happy her plan had worked. There was no chance Emily would go outside to eat some innocent people.

A few days later both were watching T.V.

"Is there some pizza left Sara?" Emily asked.

Sara looked through the twelve pizza boxes.

"Nope. not a crumb."

That's too bad." Emily said looking hungry at the empty boxes. "Pizza is great and all. But I really want to eat people again."

"Come on. You can't eat daddy. Not after everything he did for us." Sara said in disbelief. "And I really like Gwenda. She made..."

"I'm not gonna eat daddy or Gwenda. Daddy is Family and Gwenda is... well... she's a good friend. I won't eat somebody I like. I mean that would just be mean. But just some people that are wandering alone in the woods. A lot of people disappear here. Thanks to all that bears, wolves and snakes that are out here."

Sara rolled with her eyes. She doubted there were any bears here. Wolves probably but they were't so dangerous like in old fairy tales. Wolves were pretty shy animals. There were snakes of course, but they normally stayed away from people. Besides snakes that lived here were't so dangerous to people.

'If they come near here... I can eat them."

"You can't just eat innocent travelers." Sara said.

"Really." Emily asked on a childish tone. "Why not. Can I eat poachers or hunters, then?"

"Well I guess poachers but further..."

"Sara I'm hungry! And when I'm hungry I wanna eat! I wanna fill my tummy with some tasty humans!"

Sara hoped that Emily lost her sadistic character together with her cannibalistic appetite. But it did's like it would ever go away;
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Immobile Emily

choices: Later that night, a burglar sneaks into the house...
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Nowaya (1)

Unfortunately for Emily, her dreams of eating more people were somewhat tempered by her utter inability to move and her sister's encroaching on that size, so she went hungry (metaphorically- she still ate enough normal food to feed a battalion, if not the entire army) for the next few months. As such, she had grown to such a ridiculous size that she now took up one entire couch by herself, and the tip of her constantly fed stomach brushed gently against the floor whenever she shifted her weight (which was rare). Her feet were of course useless, but her arms seemed to be rapidly approaching that size as well- she would often tire herself out with the simple act of eating and require help from somebody else, mainly Gwenda, to finish the job. Her immobility was beginning to present another problem, as well- she smelled! She'd never smelled good, but now they were fully in the throes of summer, and she sweated quite a lot. And with no way to move her to the bathroom, well, the problem simply perpetuated itself. Sometimes it was too much for Sara to even be in the same room. Not that she was really any better.

Sara was still mobile, albeit barely. She could no longer manage the trek to the kitchen, leaving food transportation duties entirely to Gwenda. She did still make the effort to go the restroom, though with quite a bit of difficulty, as the fifteen-foot trek took her nearly half an hour. She'd also given up her bedroom, preferring to sleep on the couch and take some weight off her. So sizable was it, in fact, that she'd followed in Emily's nonexistent footsteps and moved up to super-sized clothes. Despite this she still saw herself as thin and didn't at all realize how close to immobility she really was.

Still, though, they were sisters, and they enjoyed themselves. They watched cartoons and played video games all hours of the day and many of the night, though Emily was starting to have trouble with the controllers- she had to move her arms enough to grab them, and playing for too long would exhaust her, plus somebody would be have to feed her throughout the game. In fact, more than a minute or so without food and she'd start whining for more. Sara had once tested her to see how long she could hold out. After two minutes she began to cry, and after three she began to throw such a fit Sara began to worry she'd actually move enough to fall off the couch and hurt herself. That was several pounds ago, though, and Sara began to wonder how long she'd hold out now... one minute? Less? She idly scratched herself and ate a chip. She'd have to find out.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Some more times passes

choices: In light of her size, Emily is moved to a bed
Sarah gets in trouble with her Dad.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Nowaya (1)

It had been a while since Sarah's initial plan to test Emily's foodless fortitude- two weeks, probably. She hadn't kept track of the time very well. She hadn't been able to execute the plan, though, since there was always somebody around- Dad or Gwenda- to retrieve the food for her bigger sister. But, once again, they were all out of the house, and she finally had a chance to do it. Emily was nearly out of food- hardly a surprise, as it took nearly a hundred dollar's worth per day just to keep her sated- but now, the collection duties fell to Sarah. Luckily, to save the time and effort of walking all the way to the kitchen, Sarah had stashed a bag of corn chips within easy reach. "Sarah," whined Emily pitifully, "I'm starving...get me something else to eat!" "I know, Emily, I'll be right there...hang on..." Sarah reached over (not easy with hips as wide as hers) and grabbed the chips, then proceeded to wobble from side to side to get the momentum needed to stand. That took almost a minute, during which Emily's noshing finally ceased. Crunch time, thought Sarah wickedly. She waddled to the TV stand, put the chips down, and said, "Well, go get it!"

Emily's eyes nearly bulged out of her obese head. "W-What?" she cried, looking dumbly at the chips, then back at Sarah, then back at the chips. "S-Sarah, you know I can't-"

"Exactly," said Sarah. "So go get them!"

"Sarah, I-I can't-" A low growl erupted from Emily's cavernous belly. "I-I'm so hungry!"

"I know, Emily. And I'll give you these chips, if-"

Drool cascaded from Emily's mouth. "If what? If what?!"

Sarah grinned. "If you apologize for eating those people."

"W-what? I-" Emily shrank back into the couch, a terrified and useless mound of fat. Her belly growled again.

"You know what I want! Say you're sorry for eating all those innocent people!" Sarah crinkled the chips tantalizingly.

Emily's eyes darted around the room. "S-Sarah, they're just food! People are to be eaten!"

"That's not true and you know it!" cried Sarah, with such intensity as to set her acres of flab jiggling wildly. "Now apologize!"

"I- I won't! I-"

"Well, that's just too bad. Looks like I'll have to eat these chips then." Sarah made a move to open the bag.

"NO!" screamed Emily. She flailed her useless limbs wildly, shifting her massive body as much as she could. Waves of flab spread across her massive stomach, the tip sliding back and forth across the couch. Useless though she was, her enormous size had an effect- the couch, overburdened with girl as it was, gave way, and it collapsed, dumping the massive girl unceremoniously onto her pillowy belly with a BANG that reverberated across the house, knocking over dishes in the kitchen and books from Sarah's personal bookshelf. It also served to jar the chips loose from Sarah's sweaty grasp. Quick as a wink, Emily grabbed the bag with one flabby arm, and soon was inhaling the contents with a flurry of chewing noises. Sarah, with a satisfied smirk, waddled slowly into the restroom.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: The breaking point

1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: amber (51)

The only time Emily was able to be without food longer then a minute was when she was asleep. But she wanted food from the moment she woke up. Sara wanted to eat less but the hunger pains in her belly always asked for more until she could't stand it no more and gave in. However she realized a lot more ho much help they got from Gwenda. She always kept a close eye at Cindy when Gwenda was around. Afraid that Cindy in a hunger attack would eat her. That would be terrible. She really liked Gwenda. Gwenda was also really nice to her and Emily.

Sara opened her eyes. It was dark. No wonder it was night time. She could see the stars and moon outside. She started to think. Why did she woke up? Then she heard some noise. Footsteps. For a moment she thought it might be her dad or Gwenda but it did't sounded like them, and Emily could't walk. She listened carefully. Then she heard a voice. it was Obvious not her dad or Gwenda.
Sara started to become scared. Just like all little kids are scared for burglars. But suddenly she calmed down. Why was she so scared for. She ate people. Or she used to eat people. Just like her sister. They were cannibals. He would't be more then just a tasty snack. All right she did't wanna eat people anymore. It was wrong to eat innocent people but this was a burglar. He was't innocent. Perhaps did he killed some people. But at the other hand she did't want to eat people anymore. But she knew someone who did.

"Pssst. Emily." She whispered.

Emily just kept snoring.

"Hm. Emily. There's food." She whispered

Emily woke up and looked around.

"Where's the food?" Emily asked greedy.

"Ssst. There's a burglar. In the house. I thought you might be interested in him. Like a little... snack."

Emily licked her lips and nodded excited.

"Now how do we get him near your mouth. Oh here he comes. Don't make a sound."

Both girls stood still. Thanks to the darkness and their huge bodies that hardly looked human the man did't notice them. He walked closer to the two. Sara opened one eye and waited. He came closer. But Sara still waited. The he came too close too Sara. She got up from the couch and pushed the man with all her weight towards her sister.
Emily hardly used her arms and hands but for this she made a exception. She grabbed him by his shoulders and opened her mouth and closed her jaws around his head. She got his shoulders inside and started to swallow. Showing no mercy.
Sara stopped eating people because she knew mercy but not for this man. It was his own fault. If you tried to steal stuff there were risks. If you did't want to take risks you should't do it. She waited and watched how the man got eaten by her sister.
She just saw how the mans feet went past her sisters lips. It suddenly looked like something was bothering Emily. The next moment she spit his shoes out and swallowed and belched.

"Delicious. But his shoes were't so tasty." Emily mumbled before passing out.

Sara closed her eyes and was soon gone to dreamland.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: Midnight snack

choices: Immediate results; they burst through the roof.
Slow results; this is going to take all day.
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Sara waddled through the backyard and around to the gate. She rushed down the front lawn towards her desired breakfast.
“Hey you guys! I want to talk to you!”
The teenagers turned and gasped at the enormous girl running at them. This was hardly the most frightening image in the world, but Sara was quite enormous, and the desire to eat was blazing in her eyes. They had no idea they were on the menu, but it sure looked freaky.
Purely on instinct, the three of them yelped and began to run as far as they could.
“Hey! No, no! Wait!” Sara sighed. Even if she wasn’t fat and lazy, she probably shouldn’t be running around in broad daylight. “Dang it…I’m starving...”
Grumbling as she hurried back to Castle Emily, she noticed something in the mail box. A package. She decided to take it inside, so it looked like the old man was still checking his mail…but then she noticed something.
It came with a letter addressed to ‘Emily and Sara.’

Emily was overjoyed.
“Presents! Ooooh, it’s not even our birthday! Let me open it! Can I open it? Please, please, please!?”
Sara paced back and forth, letting the package rest on the table as her sister bounced up and down excitedly. “No, sis, this is bad! Don’t you see? Someone knows we’re here! Someone knows who we are!”
“And they’re giving us preeeeeseeeeeents!” the young girl beamed. She just didn’t get it. Yanking off the letter, she handed it to Sara. With a sigh, the older sister began to read. She immediately noticed it was messily written in pencil.

“’Greetings young ladies, I’ve seen what you’ve been up to…’” she gulped. “’But…please don’t panic.’ Too late. ‘I think what you can do is…’ Oh wow…”
“What does it say?” Emily asked, on the edge of her seat.
“It says, ‘I think what you can do is super cool!’ It actually says that!” she lit up. “Sara, you might know me from school, but I was too shy to talk with you. I think it’s about time some big girls like yourselves got your way in the world, and I think I can help in a big way.”
Emily crossed her finger for good luck, “He sent food, he sent food, please, please, please!”

“’My dad is a chef-’”
“Can I marry this boy?!” Emily squealed.”
“Sis, let me finish reading, okay? ‘My dad is a chef. He used this stuff to grow his vegetables really big really quick to save money. But I guess he wasn’t supposed to have it, since he needed to get rid of it really quickly. Put some in your food, and see what happens. Hope it gives you some big results! Love, Áustin.’”

Both sisters took in the moment. This was…strange to say the least.
“’PS, I didn’t mean ‘love’ as in ‘love-love.’ I know we’ve never really met, I didn’t mean anything by it….PSS, not that you two aren’t super pretty, but hopefully you understand. Anyway, hope it works on people.’ Emily, do you know what this mean?”
The younger girl had tears in her eyes, “Yep…someone thinks I’m pretty!”

Inside the box were a few cans of bright green sludge. It smelled of apples, but had a Toxic warning on the side. Sara was already mixing one into two bowls of ice cream.
“So if I understand him right…he thinks this will make us grow really big really quick.”
“That sounds kinda fun I guess,” Emily shrugged, not quite seeing the big deal.
“Emmers, if we’re big, then nobody can push us around anymore. Not even if we get caught! Nothing could stop us from eating all the people we want! Forget Castle Emily, try on Emily Kingdom!”
“Hold on…you mean?”
“We can be princesses for real, sis. Who’s gonna tell us we’re not?”

And without another word, both girls grabbed a bowl and gobbled away…
1442311212121221222121121221212211121111.title: The gift of growth

By: gendor

"Breakfast and someone more!" Emily almost yelled, so hungry was she.

"Alright" Sara said getting down from her bed with a slight smile, "Why don't you go downstairs to make us something?" she said, hoping to have a moment of peace before she to would walk down.

"Sure thing sis" Emily said rushing out the door as fast as she could

It was a beautiful summer morning. The sun was shining brightly in the sky and only a few, puffy, clouds were out to block its rays. This gave the air a feeling that was warm, but not too hot. It was the perfect day to be outside and enjoying the day. A lot of people were out and about, taking in the fine weather. Teens, adults and lots of children on their summer vacation were walking or playing about.

Few took notice of the 10 year old red-head waddling her way down the street. Obese Becky was happily taking in the day just like everyone else. However, she wasn't walking around to enjoy the scenery and good weather.

Becky was, as usual, hungry and was looking at all the different options she had to fill her big belly up. Yes, she was such a glutton that even the playing children, and their parents, were something she was considering eating. Of course, Becky didn't just eat people. She ate normal food as well. She'd eat pretty well anything her tummy could digest.

She had just reached the local park, which on a day like this would be teaming with lots of tasty people. However, it wouldn't be too far to walk to get to a wonderful restaurant that had a great breakfast buffet. The obese little girl rubbed her tummy happily before she decided to...
1442321.title: Becky Sounds Good

choices: Drop in on that kissing couple
14423211.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

The park wasn’t very far, but being the butterball that she was, Becky was huffing and puffing by the time she arrived. She immediately dropped down on the cool grass to catch her breath, holding her enormous, fat belly in her hands as it gurgled hungrily.
“Staying fed is hungry work…” she huffed, fanning her chubby face. Wrestling with her gut for a moment, she sat up and smiled. As expected, such a beautiful day brought everyone out. There was a family sharing a picnic, a boy and his grandmother feeding the ducks, a bunch of kids running around chasing each other, and two teenagers kissing by the pond.
Her belly rumbled just a little more.

Licking her lips, she failed to notice a ball flrisbee flying her way until it smacked into her tummy. It caught her off guard, but it was far too padded to really hurt. In fact, she laughed.
“Oh, I am so sorry!” a boy, looking a few years younger than Becky ran up to retrieve the toy. “I wasn’t aiming for you, honest!” he seemed pretty honest, looking very worried. Becky grinned.
“Would have rather you throw a sandwich at least…” she looked sadly at the Frisbee, wishing it was something edible. Or rather, something tasty. The boy ran up next to her.
“Sorry, sorry, sorry, sorry!” he pleaded forgiveness.
“It’s okay, you didn’t hurt me!” Becky giggled. “In fact, you’re about to be a big help!”
The boy didn’t quite know what she meant, but it didn’t take long for him to let him know. Grabbing his arm and opening her mouth, he naturally didn’t know what she was doing. Of course, when she pulled his head into her mouth, he started to scream, but that she quickly closed her lips around his neck, cutting off any noise he made…

“BRraaaAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHP!” Becky fell back onto the grass, feeling her stomach filed up with boy. She smiled, watching it jut into the air, shaking and squirming by itself. The poor kid thought Becky truly had been angry at her, but no, she really was just hungry.

“Thanks buddy, I was starving!” she had a very genuine sweetness in her voice. She placed the Frisbee over her belly button and giggled as it was wiggled off. “Hope you don’t mind some company, though…”

Looking over the park again, she grinned mischievously. Who was next on the menu?

The couple sat together against a large rock, wedged into the side of the pond, keeping them just out of sight to most of the park goers. The girl pecked her boyfriend on the cheek while he played with her shoulder length black hair.
“Let me put it this way,” she smiled between kisses. “If you come to my dad’s retirement party, I’ll dye my hair blue again.”
“No way!” he gasped. “Just like on our first date?”
“Yep, I know you were crazy about it for some reason, ya big weirdo,” she smooched him on the lips.

“Adults are so weird…” Becky thought to herself as she watched, curiously inspecting a lock of her own red hair. “It’s just hair.” She shrugged, losing interest in whatever they were talking about.

The girlfriend was tall and thin, dark skinned, and wore a blue, striped top. ‘Mint flavoured’ came to mind when Becky looked at her. The boyfriend was a little shorter, and had a much paler complexion. He sounded French, but Becky wasn’t sure. She did hope so, though, she always heard such good things about French dining.

The two had returned to mauling each other, when they finally noticed Becky waddling down to them.
“Oh…wow…” the girl’s eyes bulged. And why wouldn’t they? Even not knowing there was someone trapped inside of her, Becky’s size was something to behold. “Can…can we help you…little girl?”
“I’m looking for lunch!” she said happily. “Can you guys help me out?”
The boyfriend was speechless. He wasn’t sure how this girl was even standing with a belly like that. She should’ve just fallen over.
“Oh, I’m sorry, but we don’t have anything left….” The girlfriend laughed, “Ate it all up ourselves, sorry,” she patted her flat stomach. Becky scoffed, unimpressed.
“Well, how about…Oh, I know something I can eat!” Becky beckoned the girl over, as if to whisper something.
“What?” the girl asked, puzzled more by the girl herself than anything she’d said. Curiously, the girl stepped closer. “I’m sorry, but we really don’t have anything left…”
She leaned in and Becky whispered into her ear.
“Well you look pretty yummy.”

The boyfriend backed up against the rock in fear as Becky’s chubby hands wrapped around his girlfriend’s head and shoved it into her wide open mouth.
“Plum! Baby, no! Let her go!”
Even with the girl’s head firmly in her mouth, Becky had to laugh. “Plum?” she thought. “I thought she tasted sweet.”
144232112.title: Becky the date crasher

choices: The boyfriend runs. That's okay, the park is full, and Becky isn't
1442321122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Plum thrashed and pushed at Becky, but her jaws had a tight grip as she was gradually pulled in deeper. She couldn’t punch very well with the circumstances, but even when she hit her mark, her fists basically bounced of the girl’s fat.

“Please! Let her go!”
If she could have, Becky would have shaken her head. Once something was in her mouth, it only had one direction left to go. Her lip overcame Plum’s chin, and her neck was quickly swallowed up, quick and smoothly.

“No, no, no! Stop! Stop it!” The boyfriend darted around her, having no idea what he was looking at. Finally, he dropped o his knees beside the immense child. “Look, you…you’re hungry right? That’s what this is? Let her go, and I’ll get you something to eat!”
He held out his wallet.
“Until you’re full or until you max out my card, just please let her go!”

The idea of eating up someone’s entire bank account sounded just wonderful…but Becky wasn’t dumb. A lot of people thought she was, but she just didn’t care about a lot of things outside of food. But she could be quite sharp if a situation could end with a fuller tummy. If she let this girl go, they’d run, and with their thin, long legs, a butterball like her would never catch them.

She gave her answer by pulling Plum further down her throat, now swallowing up her chest and shoulders. Her boyfriend wailed in sorrow and began pushing and shoving at Becky.
“Let her go!” he tried to push the portly monster over, but she stuck to the ground like a tree, devouring her victim.
“You can’t do this, this is impossible! Just stop!” He stepped around and rammed his shoulder against her stomach, causing his to shake violently and for the boy trapped inside to start kicking again. Plum didn’t seem to appreciate it much either.

Becky began pulling Plum’s butt into her hungry jaws. She could have done this all a little quicker, but she wanted to savour the taste. That, and the boyfriend’s attacks on her belly was surprisingly soothing. But now all he was doing was moping and blubbering, so she decided to slurp her legs down nice and quick.

“BraaaAAAHHHHHHP!” she pulled the bottom of her shirt up and wiped her lip. “Gee whiz! You’ve got great taste in girlfriends!”
He was left glaring at the biggest belly he’d ever seen, with his beloved’s figure very visibly trapped inside. He could just hear her yelling for help whenever Becky opened her chubby lips.
“How could you?”
“How couldn’t I? Her name was Plum!” She laughed, and her belly shook. Plum’s panicked voice became louder and louder…
1442321122.title: Becky's no sucker

choices: Becky crams her way in and 'hides' the other kids.
Becky gets stuck half way in. She really was too fat.
14423211221.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

She stood, smiling innocently as her huge belly sagged to the floor. Her fat obscured Plum’s figure somewhat, but it was hard not to see that a woman, much taller than herself, was trapped inside and very eager to get out.
“Let her out…please!” the boyfriend begged.
“Nah, I don’t think so. I think she’d like it much more in my tummy!” From the outside of it, you could just hear a chilling, primal scream for help.
“Let…her…OUT!” the boyfriend charged at Becky, no longer seeing her as a strange little girl, but as a monster that needed slaying.
Becky smiled like it was her birthday; it was always a treat when her food came to her!

It didn’t take long for the young, redheaded glutton to waddle back into the open area of the park, twice as bloated, and chewing on a shoe. Her teeth cut through the leather in one good chomp, and she swallowed it down like the snack it was.
“Mmmm!” she rubbed the side of her belly, giving her lips a quick lick. The man’s wallet had fallen to the ground while she ate him, and she was trying to figure out where to put it. She might get a bank account worth of snacks later after all! If only this darn skirt of hers had any pockets…
No longer having anything to eat, she almost immediately saw a girl, about her age, hiding under a tree. “For me? It’s not even Christmas!” she laughed.

The tree was on the edge of a little hill, and the roots hung off the edge, creating a little gate around a tiny, dug out cave beneath the tree. The girl seemed very on edge, so much so that he didn’t notice Becky sneaking up from the other side.
“Hey! Whatcha doin’?” She caught her by surprise, and she fell backwards.
“Hide and Seek, I’m…” she looked over and set her eyes on the massive girl. Squatting down into the little space, all she could see was a massive, shaking pink shape, with some sparkling green eyes and red hair peaking over the top.
“You’re what? Tell me!”
“Uh…I’m, well, hiding…I thought this would be a good hiding spot, but I guess…I wasn’t the only one.” A boy with a baseball cap, and a girl with short red hair poked their heads out of the cave.
“You can’t hide here, it’s taken!” the girl told Becky.
“She’s not playing, I’ve never seen her before,” the boy said. “Besides, where could you hide all of that?”
Becky smiled, “Yeah, I’m a little too fat for this game. But I think this is a great hiding spot!”

“So did we,” said the first girl, “So does everyone! That’s why it’s always the first place people check! We’re doomed!”
Giggling with excitement, Becky dropped onto her huge stomach and began crawling through through the roots.
“Hey, what are you doing!?”
“I’m going to help you hide!” she said, dragging her massive weight along. There was a flicker of excitement and hunger in her eyes that the other kids very quickly noticed.
“No! G-go away, you’re too big!”
“No I’m not, I’ll fit!” Her head and chest did, but that belly of hers was a little too much for it to handle. She gave herself a shove, and snapped one of the roots.
It was obvious she was determined to get in there. Even without knowing what she truly had in store, the kids began to scream and retreat into the little cave; there was just something…scary about this huge girl.

More roots snapped as her blubber began pouring in. “See? I’m fitting!”
“No you’re not! You’re too fat! You’re gonna give us away!”
“Trust me, I’ve got the perfect hiding place for you!” her eyes locked on the girl as drool began to pool behind her lip...
14423211221.title: Treats under the tree

choices: "That pizza and me were meant to be..."
14423212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

A true slave to her appetite (or perhaps the master), Becky got one tiny whiff of bacon and eggs, and immediately began on her way towards the restaurant.
The buffet doors swung open, revealing the enormous child to the patrons. The girl behind the counter almost jumped.
“N-no, no! Becky, you can’t come in here!” It obviously wasn’t her first visit. “The breakfast buffet is closed!”
“It will be in a minute!” she winked, before marching over to the buffet tray.

With each step, the other customers could hear the contents of her enormous stomach slosh and gurgle. Inside was three bowls of Lucky Charms, two plates of macaroni, and a whole loaf worth of toast. The look in her eye, the determined way she walked, and the heavy breathing; anyone who was in her way quickly got out of it.
Reaching into the trays, she opened wide and simply scooped the bacon straight into her mouth, almost emptying the whole thing in one gulp before chewing it all down. She popped the last few bits in and quickly licked the warm tray clean before moving onto the sausages.

“Disgusting blob…” commented a chef, peering through from the kitchen. He quickly stepped out and went looking for the manager.

Becky’s pudgy face quickly became smothered with grease and mashed food, and her cheeks inflated with every egg, pancake, and sausage she stuffed into it. To be blunt, she killed the buffet. Utterly murdered it.
“Aaaah! Good stuff!” she pulled her shirt up off her belly and wiped her face clean. Just as well, the old thing hadn’t fit her in years, anyway. A few more stains wouldn’t hurt.

The manager looked over and, with a heavy sigh, approached the girl, though he kept a good distance away from her. “Young lady, do you have any idea what you’re doing?”
“Havin’ a little breakfast!” she poked her stomach. Her fat was thick and deep, but still seemed hard and firm. “And I really mean a little! It tasted great, but I’m still starving!”

He thought for a second, but after last time, he knew there was just no arguing with her. “Please…just go. You ate the whole thing; if you want to eat anything else, you’re going to have to pay for it.”
“Nah, you can just give it to me for free, because you’re soooo nice!” she grinned.
“No,” he replied flatly. Becky huffed and crossed her arms.

She wouldn’t leave until she was finished eating, and nothing he could say would change that. She sniffed the air, and felt the scrumptious aroma of pizza waft across her nose. The way her belly growled, you’d think she hadn’t eaten in days.

That settled it; she was going to march right into the kitchen, find that pizza, and make it her own!

But then again… this was the second time this guy had asked her to leave before she was finished. Maybe it was high time she finished him. She didn’t pay much attention, but he was clearly the boss around here. It wouldn’t be too hard, she could fake a stomach pain, beg him to call her parents, leaving them both in his office…
She’d done it a dozen times before with gym teachers and swimming instructors, after all.
14423212.title: Buffet just for Becky

144232121.content:
ddition by: phrooglefa (38)

Becky did think this guy did look tasty. However, the gluttonous 10 year old had a one track mind and right now it was saying only one thing: Pizza!

Ignoring his demands for her to leave, Becky waddled her way into the kitchen. She was moving a bit slower now, thanks to having just wiped out a decent sized breakfast buffet. Still, she managed to get ahead of the chef and waddle right into the kitchen. What she saw there made her face lit up.

There were at least 4, food-covered, cooks that were working hard on prepping for the coming lunch rush. It also looked like today's special was pizza as there seemed to be around 10 or so either being cooked, or cooling from their time in the large stone oven on the other side of the room.

"Yummy!" Was all Becky could say in delight as she waddled over to the pizzas.

The rest of the staff all froze in their work. Most had, at the very least, heard about Becky's previous trip to this restaurant. However, there were a few chefs who didn't know who she was and found it odd that some chubby child was able to just barge right into the kitchen.

Becky wasn't deterred by this. There was delicious smelling pizza right in front of her and she had to have it. Nothing was going to stop her. She quickly waddled over to the closest pizza that was finished and dove right in.
144232121.title: "That pizza and me were meant to be..."

choices: Becky is rolled out and banned for life.
Becky farts, choking the cook and letting her escape.
1442321211.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Becky’s chubby hands tore apart the first pizza and began cramming it into her mouth. The cooks could only watch as she ate up their hard work without a worry in the world.
“What are you doing?!” yelled a cook who had obviously been absent during Becky’s first visit. “You can’t just barge in here like that!”
“Let it go, man,” another cook told him with a sigh. “She’s like a dog. Once she’s sunk her teeth in, you’d need a doctor to prise her off.”
“That’s ridiculous!” he responded, “She’s just a kid…if maybe a big one…”

Becky swallowed up the second pizza, smearing sauce and cheese all over her chubby face, and dripping it everywhere on her white top. She was already tearing into her third pizza before even finishing her second. With her free hand, she rubbed her stuffed gut, smearing more red gunk onto the pink food balloon.
“Good stuff,” she belched, still forcing more and more of the meal into her face.

The cooks’ stomachs lurched as they watched the utterly gluttonous display. “Where the heck is Barry?” Barry, the previously seen manager, had his head buried in his hands, trying to pretend this wasn’t happening again.
“Look, we can’t let her do this!” the cook grumbled as Becky waddled over to claim her next ‘victim.’ As she dug in, he marched over and tapped her on the shoulder.

“Miss, you need to leave, right-“ Becky turned around and promptly smacked her extended belly into the cook, knocking him right over.
“Braaaaahp,” she replied before going back to eating. Perhaps that burp was her trying to apologize? Unlikely.
“Listen here-“ he began pulling himself up, just for her butt to clobber him back down as she turned. There was a murmur of laughter; annoying as Becky was being, it was an amusing sight.

“Alright, that’s it,’ he inched away and pulled himself up, then promptly pushed Becky over.
“Hey! What’s the big idea?” she gasped, still holding tightly to the slices of pizza she was devouring. She landed on her belly like a big cushion, giving everything inside a good slosh.
And then, the cook began to roll her like a wheel, straight out the kitchen door.

“Your parents need to teach you some restraint,” huffed the chef as everyone began to cheer for him. Becky would’ve found the rolling quite fun if it hadn’t interrupted her eating.
“My pizza…” she whined, feeling her stomach rumble for more, despite being stuffed larger than a watermelon. Everything inside her churned with each roll. Becky was starting to feel a little queasy. She wasn't one for being sick (surprising for someone who ate so much), but being gassy was another story.
1442321211.title: For the love of Pizza

choices: "There's a party in my tummy, and they're all invited!"
14423212111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Two customers opened up the front door, and with a great shove, Becky rolled out of the restaurant and onto the street. She cupped her stomach with both hands, waiting for its contents to settle..
“Please!” she cried as the manager and chef turned away, “You can’t do this to me, I’m just a kid! Can’t you see I’m wasting away?” she struck a melodramatic pose. Unfortunately for her, one that only helped to emphasize how massive her fat belly was, pushing it out just so. “You’re just mean because I’m a little tubby!”

“Not at all!” the manager said, “Actually, you’d be a valued and beloved customer if you had any intention of paying for anything you ate. You’d keep us in business singlehanded.”
Becky scoffed, “But I’ve got no money!”
“Not our problem. Look kid, don’t let us catch you here again. Next time, we call the cops.”

And with that, they slammed the doors shut. Becky did try to shove them open again, but they were locked tight. She’d have pushed at them all day, had her belly not been rumbling (and it was always rumbling). After rattling the door hinges and making everyone inside very nervous, she finally decided to seek food elsewhere. She wanted to polish off the pizzas, but she wasn’t getting any fuller standing here.

“How am I supposed to pay, anyway? My skirt doesn’t even have pockets!” she whined, trudging down the street. Inside her was enough food for a dozen family breakfasts, and it showed. Her belly bounced with each step, sloshing loudly. Obese just by herself, all that food just made her gut larger, and that’s the way she liked it. She remembered sitting on the bus next to a pregnant woman once; her unstuffed belly was far larger.

Turning a corner, the lardy little lady suddenly stopped as a familiar, delicious scent wafted by her nose, “Mmmm…more pizza! For me?” she gleamed as she set her sights on ‘Papa’s Pizza.’
She remembered this place from the commercials on TV. A family walks in, with a very uptight mother asking for a salad, since she needs to stick to her diet. Her husband convinces her to try just a bite. Then the ad would immediately cut to the family carrying her out, her belly busting out of her shirt, burping and telling ‘Papa’ they’ll be back next week.
That was probably Becky’s favourite commercial. That tore it; she needed to eat here.

Waddling up to the window, Becky looked inside and grinned. There were a dozen kids sitting around a table covered in toys; a birthday party! She just loved crashing parties; there was party food, games to play, and of course, delicious party guests. She always left feeling nice and full (well less hungry), though generally she was the only one who got to leave at all.

“It’s your party, and I’ll dine if I want to, dine if I want to!” she sang happily, dancing towards the door when a delivery boy stepped out, carrying a stack of pizza boxes.
“Last one?” he called out.
“One more!” a voiced called from inside, and after placing the boxes in the backseat of a car, he returned inside. Curious, Becky stepped over and looked inside. The car was filled with stacks and stacks of pizza boxes. Just about every surface aside from the drivers seat was covered in them. This was obviously a big order; Becky had never seen so much pizza all in one place; this is what she smelled on the way over!

She peered in a little deeper. There was a slight gap, maybe just enough for her to hide inside? Well, she was a bit large, but maybe he wouldn’t see her behind all the other boxes. And who knew where the delivery was headed, anyway? This was getting more and more exciting by the second!
That delivery guy would be back soon. If she was going to get in, she’d have to do it now. But then, could she really resist that scrumptious party?
It was a total win-win situation, but Becky still felt torn utterly torn…
14423212111.title: Becky's quest for pizza

No One Gets Between Becky And Her Food
14423212112.content:
addition by: phrooglefa (38)

The chef smirked with delight as he, with some effort, was ready to give this greedy little fat girl one last push. With it he would push her out of the restaurant and would follow it up with a life time ban for the 10 year old glutton.

This, however, wasn't what happened. Before the chef could give his last push, Becky's dress-covered butt, which was pointing right at his face at the time, let out a nice big fart.

"Oh, my...I...!!!" Was all the poor chef could stammer out before promptly passing out from the horrible smell the overweight child had released.

As the rest of the staff found out a second or so later, Becky's extra plump rear could produce some of the worst farts. The poor chefs and servers couldn't help but cough and fan the air around them, trying to avoid the smelly toot. One teen waitress with a sensitive nose even had to run out of the kitchen, unable to bare it.

Becky didn't seem to mind this at all. In fact, her fart had stopped her rolling towards the street and actually got her rolling to opposite direction. She slowly rolled back to the very spot she had started from: right in front of the cooling pizzas. She didn't miss a beat before continuing to gorge herself with the tasty treats.
14423212112.title: Becky farts, choking the cook and letting...(SCAT)

144232121121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

And so, Becky ate. She munched down each greasy slice like she hadn’t eaten in days. Some she didn’t even chew, slurping them up like spaghetti. It tasted better chewed, but she was just so eager to get it inside of her. The gagging cooks could only glare as Becky’s balloon belly drooped lower and lower off her waist. They’d never seen anything like it-at least not since her last visit, anyway.

“Get out!” roared the cook from earlier, stumbling up to her and giving her a shove. Becky fell flat on her very unflat behind, and grumbled as she crammed another slice into her mouth. This guy was becoming a real pain.

“I’m trying to eat here, ya big meanie!” He didn’t even respond, instead trying to push Becky over, obviously trying to roll her again. Not this time, though. “BRAAAAAAAAHHHHP!” The burp hit him like a shotgun, and left him sputtering back into a rack of pots and pans. Becky had a big belly laugh as everything fell every which way around him; served the jerk right!

Pulling himself to his knees, the chef was greeted with Becky’s gigantic tummy looming in front of him. “What…what is wrong with you?” he asked, utterly shocked.
“Hey, I’m a gassy girl!” she laughed, slapping her belly and burping again.
He watched as she greedily devoured another pizza, sticking her tongue out at him. “Aren’t you fat enough as it is? You look ridiculous.”
“Yep, ridiculous-ly beautiful!” she hopped forward, bowling her meaty middle straight into the cook, and knocking back to the floor “Everyone with a brain knows ‘Fat’s where it’s at!’ Hahaha!” her whole body quaked as she cackled happily.

The cook tried to get up again, but didn’t get far before Becky plopped herself down onto his back, firmly pinning him down. She rested the last two pizza dishes on her belly as she ate through them without a care.
“Aaaack…please get off…I’m sorry…” he sputtered, but Becky wasn’t convinced.
“Just two more!” she swallowed a big mouthful of cheese and meat, “Just one more! Ehehe!” She happily bounced up and down just slightly, thoroughly pummelling the poor man under her weight. He really shouldn’t have gotten in her way; especially not twice.

Crunching down the last cheesy crust, Becky licked her greasy fingers and sighed, “No more pizza…” Running out of food was the only downside to Becky’s piggy lifestyle. Yummy as they were, there was just never enough for her liking.
But that did leave just what she was meant to do with the cook…

It was almost lunch time, so it was way past due that she ate someone today. But then, she was actually having a lot of fun messing with him, and he certainly deserved it for trying to kick her out…what to do…

“Someone get her off of him!” shouted one of the cooks, and Becky immediately stood up. “Oh…thank you.”
There was a slight wobble in her step as she stepped away from her victim. Still conscious, but barely, the man, along with all others, had no idea what was coming next.

“OH MY GOD!”
“WHAT IS SHE DOING?”
“SWEET MOTHER!“ They watched as Becky’s mouth gaped over the chef’s feet and pulled him into her face. He just slid smoothly past her lips, like she’d done this a dozen times before. Little did they know, she had.

“Let him go!” one cook grabbed her co-worker by the arms and pulled arm, only managing to slip over. Becky seemed to have some impossibly strong grip on him with just her hands and throat. He blinked and saw the top of her fat face coming towards him, but he didn’t have the strength to pull away, even with both hands free.
His feet plunged into a pit of mashed up pizza and…other things. Exactly what was happening hadn’t hit him yet, but it almost felt like a small pile of wristwatches and…bones?

The last anyone saw of him was his face, upside down, framed by Becky’s lips as they closed around him. His last expression seemed to have him realizing just what was happening…
Her throat was a massive squirming lump, and then she finally swallowed the last of him down. Fatter than most any girl her age as it was, having a grown man inside her stomach simply looked ridiculous. Her belly dragged onto the floor, looking massive, and yet fitting easily onto the rest of her; like it had actually been too small just a moment ago. And there had been NOTHING small about her!

“You…you ate him!”
Becky shrugged, as if to say, ‘Duh!’ She took one happy step forward, and everyone took a step back, making her laugh. The young glutton loved playing with her food, just not nearly as much as she liked eating it.
She knew what they were thinking, and so, she decided to just make it clear for them. “Yep. I’ve still got room! Don’t you worry!”

144232122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

She choked, and tears began to well up in her eyes. “M-mmm-MY TUMMY H-HURTS! BWAAAAAH!”
Becky fell back on her bottom, and grabbed the sides of her stomach, sobbing uncontrollably. The manager sighed as she weakly tugged on his pant leg.
“Well what do you expect when you eat like that? I’m surprised you don’t just explode,” his remarks just seemed to make her cry more. Shaking his head, he nevertheless held out his hand and, with a hard tug, helped her to her feet. “Come on, let’s call your parents.”
Becky tried very hard not to smile in victory.

Most everyone breathed a sigh of relief as he took Becky to his office, and returned to their meals. He closed the door behind the obese child as she waddled in, clutching her stomach and moaning painfully.
“Look, uh, Betsy, was it? It’s flattering how much you love our food, but the way you eat, it scares off the customers. And somehow, since your first visit, you’ve managed to eat more than six hundred dollars’ worth of meals.”
She tilted her head curiously.
“It’s a lot, trust me. And you haven’t given us one cent. And now you’ve gone and made yourself sick! Do you think maybe it’s time you stopped eating like that?”

The cheek of it all! Becky took her hands off her tummy and smiled, “You know, I’m actually feeling a whole lot better! Great, actually!” she wiped the wet from under her eyes. “I’m thinking I could go for seconds!”
Naturally the manager didn’t want to hear one bit of this, “Well, I’m sure your parents can help you with that. What’s your home number?” Becky began climbing onto his desk, causing the wood to creak and shake.
“Hmmm, I’m not sure my mummy and daddy can help…maybe you can ask them if you yell loud enough into my belly button!” she pressed her belly into his face and pushed him away.

What she was implying was obvious. Normally that would just be silly and ridiculous…but with Becky, the manager wasn’t sure if she was kidding. Certainly she was fatter than any child he’d ever seen, and she certainly ate more than any one person he’d met.
Becky just giggled, and wore a hungry grin. She pounced, hitting him like a wrecking ball. That took the wind out of him enough as it was, but for one brief moment, he looked up to see her mouth open up. Her jaw popped, and her lips stretched…and then everything went dark…

“Sir, some of the customer’s are complaining…” An employee opened the door to see her boss’s torso being sucked into the portly redhead’s gaping maw. Going to leave, the obese child shook a chubby finger, disapprovingly, then she pointed up at the girl, then down at her filling tummy. Taking a deep breath, the girl carefully closed the door behind her and watched in fear as her boss was steadily eaten alive.

“So rude! You don't interrupt someone when they're eating!" Becky thought to herself as she swallowed up the poor man to his feet.

It wasn't long until she sat there, grinning happily as the man hurled up inside of her belly, barely even understanding what had happened to him. There he was, a man with many years behind him, a job, desires, and a family...turned to food without a second thought.
"Good stuff!" she sighed, "BuuUUUUURRRP! But now I need thirds!" she giggled, using her shirt to mop up some of her drool.

"C-can I go now?" the girl shivered, her eyes glued to the swollen orb containing her boss.

You'd expect that swallowing someone whole, let alone someone taller than her, would fill the young lady right up. But not Becky, it just made her want to eat another. Some people were said to have bottomless appetites, but it seemed like Becky's really was.
"I've got a way better idea!" she grinned.
144232122.title: Becky's bellyaching

1443.content:
By: mephilis

Name: Savannah
Skin: white
Age: 11
Hair: long and blond
Eyes: blue
Body: Rather thick pretty much everywhere, but most obviously her midsection and thighs. Pudgy face and subtle second chin

Backstory: Savannah is a very nice and very kind girl, though she can also be somewhat loud and a bit obnoxious if she is particularly excited. Her weight seems to contradicts her eating habits, as she appears to eat much like everyone else her age. This isn't the case, as Savannah gets out of bed, goes to the kitchen, stuffs herself silly, then goes back to her room and goes back to sleep. Yep, Savannah sleep eats, something that she only vaguely knows about and something that completely baffles and confuses her parents, as they can not figure out why some food goes missing overnight. This isn't a recent oddity; Savannah has been "sleep eating" for years, every night since she first "started". Her laziness, coupled with her mother occasionally cooking what she wants, and the fact that her sleep eating puts a whole extra square meal in her stomach, built Savannah into a rather thick young lady. She isn't obese, but she is certainly larger than average.

Of course, how could someone as big as her go through school without getting teased or bullied? She doesn't. Savannah is very sensative about her weight, and is sometimes even reduced to tears when she's picked on. The teasing can range from simple verbal abuse to even having her stomach aggresively poked and pinched, which would normally attract even more verbal abuse, such as a boy taking a stick and poking Savannah's belly, warning his friends that she might explode. Needless to say, this would sometimes make Savannah arrive home from school sad, in which case she would eat a "little" snack to drown out her sorrows.

Luckilly for our tubby Savannah, however, she has an ability that she doesn't even know of. An ability that'll take away her bully troubles, but will probably scare just about everyone at school.
1443.title: Savannha

14431.content:
By: mephilis

The bright morning sun shined like a flashlight through the windows of Savannah's room, lighting up the room and bearing down on Savannah herself, which eventually woke her from her slumber. Savannah groaned and rubbed her eyes, then opened them so they could adjust to the excess light. She then threw the covers off herself, revealing her large, overweight frame, cuddled tightly in her purple pajamas. Her body argued with the pajamas, as they clearly weren't big enough to fit comfortably onto her, and her pajama shirt failed to cover her entire torso, as some of her belly could be seen in between the pajama shirt and pants. Furthermore, the shirt looked like it was under massive stress. The wholes in between each button was easily visible, and the bottom button looked like it had its day.

Savannah sat up, her blond hair falling over her face. She wiped the hair to the side and looked down at herself. Her pajama shirt was riddled with stains and crumbs, something that was actually rather normal for Savannah. Her parents didn't know it, but their daughter sleep eats. Every night, late at night, Savannah would get up, go to the kitchen, and eat. Just eat. When she would feel full, she would sleep-walk back to her bed and lay back down, all without waking up. Savannah was able to conclude that she sleep-eats by adding her stained clothes with her parents confusion. She of course never told them.

Savannah got up from her bed and stretched, pulling her pajama shirt even further up her body, even over her belly button. Her room contained of course her bed, a dresser right next to the foot of the bed, a closet just beside the dresser, a desk and a computer on the corner opposite from the door, a desk with a TV in between the two windows, and a mirror in between the door and the computer. Savannah turned to the mirror and looked at the sight there was to behold. She grinned, as she thought she looked adorably cute. She then turned to her side, showing just how far her belly stuck out. Sure enough, it stuck out quite far, and hanged a little, giving definition to how thick of a girl Savannah is. Her midsection wasn't the only part of her body to have excess fat, in fact, her entire body was loaded with it. Her arms were flabby, her thighs were of course very thick, her butt was rather large, her face was pudgy, and she had little bit of a double chin showing up. Savannah rubbed her plump belly, its smooth and round feel always did bring a smile to her face. Her stomach gave a slight growl, which can only mean one thing. Time to eat.

Savannah headed out of her room and made her way towards the kitchen. She wouldn't bother changing out of her pajamas until after she had breakfast, unless it was a school day, but she didn't have to for today, as it was Saturday. She would normally wake up before her parents did on days like this, though sometimes is she stays up too late, she'll sleep in a bit longer than usual. This, however, would not impede her sleep eating.

Savannah entered the kitchen. It was well kept and well cleaned, with a bright shiny tile floor and shiny wooden counters. The only real problem with this kitchen is the fact that the floor is always riddled with crumbs in the morning, thanks to Savannah. The tubby girl opened the fridge, pulled out a jug of milk, and placed it on the counter. She then looked into the pantry and pulled out a box of cereal. Only one problem, the box was empty. Sure enough, Savannah must have eaten the rest of that box of cereal during her sleep eating. She tossed that box in the garbage and pulled out another, this time it wasn't empty.

This is how every day of Savannah's life begins. She'd wake up, get out of bed, get dressed for school (aside from weekends obviously), then she'd usually make her own breakfast, unless her mom woke up soon enough to make it for her, which only happened on school days and wasn't often. Her mom would sometimes just set food out and let Savannah make it herself, much like what she's doing right now to make cereal. A weekend morning is always a time for Savannah to look forward to, as she is almost always awake long before her parents are, allowing her to eat whatever she wanted, and better yet, in peace and quiet.

Savannah finished making her bowl of cereal and sat down at the dining table. The bowl was rather large, and was certainly loaded with the crunchy cereal. It goes without saying that Savannah has a rather large appetite, though almost no one except for Savannah's friends would know this, as no one would ever see Savannah eat on her own terms, all anyone would ever see her eat is what's given to her. Savannah dug in ravenously, quickly reducing the amount of cereal in the bowl spoonful after spoonful. It would take her a while, but Savannah eventually ate all the cereal in the bowl, leaving only milk inside. She picked up the bowl and began chugging the milk down, completely draining it until there wasn't a drop left. She sat the bowl down, and had a line of milk resting over her upper lip. She licked it off and brought the bowl and spoon to the sink. She looked at her belly and patted it, as the sounds of footsteps started coming towards her.

"Good morning my sweet princess." Said a voice.

Savannah slowly turned around and smiled, "Morning mom."

"What did you have for breakfast?" Savannah's mom, Heather, asked as she walked into the kitchen. Heather was a rather thin woman with darkish blond hair and blue eyes. If you were to look at the two of them beside each other, Savannah and Heather, you would only be able to tell they were mother and daughter by their hair and eyes, obviously due to Savannah's heavy frame. Heather never minded her daughter's excess weight, and neither did her husband, Sean. They were of course both very happy with their wonderful daughter, even if she was overweight.

"Just cereal." Savannah simply answered. Heather looked at Savannah, particularly her belly, which her pajama shirt failed to completely cover.

"Well, looks like we're going to the store today." Heather said.

"Why?" Savannah asked.

Heather bent over and gave Savannah's belly a slight poke, "These pajamas aren't going to last much longer. You're going to need bigger clothes. Go get dressed, we'll go once I'm done with my breakfast."

"Ok mom." Said Savannah as she walked past her mother, heading for her room.





"Hmm, I guess I do need bigger clothes." Said Savannah. She wore a white shirt, brown shorts, and flip-flops. The shirt wasn't doing a very good job. It covered her entire torso, but it felt uncomfortably tight, and her shorts where the same way, tight around the waist.

Savannah sighed, "These will have to do."
14431.title: Same stuff, different day

choices: Skip to night time, and Savannah's "sleep eating"
144311.content:
By: mephilis

Savannah and her mother looked through the clothes section of a local Wal Mart, with the obvious intention of looking for clothes that could comfortably fit the somewhat slowly but very surely growing girth of the already overweight Savannah. They had just arrived at the store a few minutes before, and so far haven't had much luck with their search, but they still had a lot left to look. Savannah wasn't very picky when it came to clothes, though she typically wasn't fond of shirts that had designs on them. A picture with some text was one thing, but stuff like random flowers and streams weren't really her cup of tea.

Savannah pulled out a light green shirt. It had absolutely no designs on it, and when Savannah placed it against her body, it looked like it would fit, but there is only one way to find out. Savannah showed the shirt to her mother, Heather, who shrugged and gestured her to put it in the cart. Savannah kept looking in the same collection of shirts, but found nothing to her likings or even looked like her size, so she looked for new shorts. Of course, finding new pants were always more difficult than a new shirt, as there really weren't many pants that could successfully fit Savannah's large waist. Savannah grabbed a white pair of shorts and examined them. Just by looking at the waist of the pants, she could see it; not even close. She stuffed the pants back in its place, not even refolding it, and looked for another. She found a similar one with the same color, but a bit longer and, most importantly, wider. She placed that pair in the cart and continued her search, but stopped when her mother found a shirt.

"Hey Savannah, look at this." Said Heather as she pulled out a lightish purple shirt. It showed a chocolate bar on the right side, and on the left side there was text that read "Inside every fat girl, a skinny girl is trying to escape. But I shut her up with chocolate". Savannah giggled, apparently because their parents don't mind having an overweight daughter, doesn't mean they won't acknowledge it.

"Is it big enough?" Savannah asked.

Heather placed the shirt against Savannah's torso, which seemed a bit bigger than the shirt she was already wearing, "Looks ok. We'll look for a few more and you can try them on. Oh, and let's not forget; you need new pajamas."





After a somewhat long session of searching, Heather stood outside of the ladies' dressing room. Savannah walked out of the dressing room, holding the several shirts and pants that they had picked out.

"So, they all fit good?" Heather asked.

"Almost." Said Savannah as she pulled a shirt out of the handful. It was yellow and had Hello Kitty on the front, "This one was way too small; I could see my belly."

"Well here, give me the clothes that do fit and put that one back." Said Heather as her daughter handed her all the clothes except for that one shirt. Savannah headed off back to the girls clothes section and put the shirt in a random crowd of other shirts, and headed back to her mom.





Savannah and Heather were in the car, just pulling out of the driveway of the Wal Mart. The bags of clothes were in the back seat.

"Hmm, so we're going back home?" Savannah asked, even though she knew the answer.

"Yes we are. Why?" Replied her mother.

"Oh nothing it's just...I dunno, I'm just afraid I'll be bored." Said Savannah.

"But you have a computer and TV..." Said Heather.

"Hmm, you're right." Said Savannah. She chuckled, then jokingly asked, "Do you think there's someone inside me?"

"Huh?" Asked Heather, "Oh oh...that shirt." She chortled, "Oh there must be, since you look like you shut her up quite often." Savannah burst into heavy laughter. One thing that Savannah liked about her parents. They would joke about her weight, but would word it in a way that wouldn't be derogetory or insulting, in fact, it would almost sound like they were praising it, although it may just seem that way since they're perfectly fine with Savannah being larger than the average 11 year old girl.
144311.title: Clothes shopping
