1443112.content:
By: mephilis

Take note. Dream sequences will be signified by this kind of text. Events in the real world will look like normal text.




The moon's half full appearance illuminated the ground with a power similar, but not as strong as, the sun. The light jumping off the white ball of rock beamed through the windows of Savannah's room, though not enough to light it up like the sun would. Savannah fell asleep a few hours ago, but just because her mind is out, doesn't mean her body is. Her face sealed in a warm, enjoyable slumber. Her eyes were locked tight like the doors that hold the money at a bank. This didn't keep her body from rolling over feet first on the floor, slowly slouching its way to the kitchen. Savannah had apparently forgotten to put on her new pajamas this night, and instead wore the small ones she wore the previous night. While her body was moving, her mind was thinking something else. Dreaming something else, more accurately.

Savannah was eating her lunch at school, sitting alone in one round table in the lunch room. Alone. She chewed into a chicken sandwich quickly, looking around the lunch room, hoping she would finish before any bullies came over to ruin her day. She turned ahead and saw a boy sitting across the table from her. The boy was a bit taller than her, with short brown hair and brown eyes. The kid was Tony, a boy in school who Savannah had a huge crush on.

"Hello Savannah." Said Tony, "How are you today?"

"G- good." Savannah blushed.

Savannah opened the fridge and grabbed the first thing her hands felt, which was leftover burgers from dinner. Not closing the fridge, Savannah sat down where she stood and ate the cold burgers, giving no care for the taste or quality, only caring for the satisfaction of her midnight hunger. She finished the small burgers and "looked" for something else to eat.

"Dang, looks like you're hungry." Said Tony. Savannah didn't catch it at first, but without realizing it, she just ate that entire chicken sandwich in a few seconds.

Savannah blushed and reached for her carton of milk, "I guess I am..."

Savannah grabbed a jug of orange juice and twisted the cap off. She then placed her lips on the mouth of the jug and held it up, literally chugging the juice. She eventually stopped after a couple seconds and sloppily put the cap back on the jug, and almost threw it back into the fridge.

"Hmm, looks like I was right." Said Tony.

"What?" Savannah asked.

"Have you eaten breakfast, or are you always like this?" Tony asked. Savannah looked embarrassed. She just ate almost her entire lunch in less than a minute.

"I...I..." Savanna muttered, "Sorry."

"Don't apologize. If you're hungry, you're hungry. Here, have my lunch, I'm not hungry." Said Tony as he pulled a tray of his lunch from below the table. It had an entire deep fried chicken, and a pitcher of apple juice.

Savannah gasped with a huge smile, "For me?!" Chicken was always her favorite.

"Dig in." Tony simply said.

Savannah plopped back down on the floor, holding a jug of vanilla ice cream. She tore the lid off and shoved her hand into the cold food, scooping it up and shoving it into her mouth. Bite by bite, the amount of ice cream in the jug dwindled, disappearing into the belly of Savannah. By this point, her old pajamas had enough. This event caused the pajama shirt, at least the bottom half of it, ride up Savannah's tummy, exposing a little more of the ball of flab with each movement.

Savannah sat flat on her back, her eyes closed much like they were both before, and during her sleep eating. Her belly stuck up like a mountain over her body, and the jug of ice cream, now empty, laid beside her. She sat up, and slowly closed the fridge, and made her way back to her room, rubbing her belly along the way.

"Wow Savannah, you're amazing." Tony exclaimed. Savannah gave out a heavy burp as a bone flew out of her mouth over Tony's head. Her shirt rod up to just below her chest, revealing to everyone in the lunch room the large blob of meat that was her belly.

"You, really think so?" Savannah asked, smiling.

"I certainly do." Said a voice. Savannah and Tony looked to the side to see an angry looking boy with a mohawk, "She truly is amazing. She just ate her lunch and her friend's lunch. Though I guess I should expect that from a tub of lard like her!"

Savannah gasped. Tony looked at the boy angrily, "Don't you dare say that about her."

"Or what?" Asked the boy.

"Or she'll show you just where the food goes, right Savannah?" Tony answered. Savannah looked at him, confused.

"Pff, I know where the food went, and I know where all the food in the world will go one day. Right here!" Said the boy as he punched Savannah square in her exposed belly button. Savannah gave a shriek of pain, and was beginning to cry.

"Ha, see?" Asked the boy. Savannah stood up, her face red with anger.

"Hehe...what are you going to do tubbo? Sit on me?" The boy asked sarcastically.

Savanna said nothing. She simply grabbed the punk by his shoulders, and shoved him head first into her mouth.

Savannah laid sleeping in her bed, though she didn't have any covers over her since it was on the floor and she never bothered to pick it back up whilst sleepwalking. She had successfully eaten her fourth square meal, and returned to her room without waking anyone up, just like every single night of her life. Her belly had grown a little, though the only visible difference was the pajama shirt, and the fact that, without her pajama shirt even trying, her belly remained easily visible. There was something odd about this particular night though...

Why was some of her pillow in her mouth?

Savannah grabbed the boy's shoulders and shoved his head into her mouth. She lifted the struggling boy and began to pull him down her throat, making him disappear into her mouth with each passing second. All of the kids in the lunch room, aside from Tony, were screaming and running out of the cafeteria, hoping to not fall victim to Savannah. Eventually, she slurped up the last of the bully, and he was now trapped into her gut, never to escape. Savannah's belly stretched greatly to accommodate for her previous stuffing and the fact that she had an entire kid taller than her held inside. So much so that she just fell to her knees, the weight of her belly being way to great for her to stand.

Tony was utterly shocked, "You! You just ate him!"

Savannah burped, "Yep! He was pretty tasty too!"

"When I said you'd show him where the food goes, I didn't think you'd take it literally!" Tony exclaimed.

Savannah was on the verge of crying, "Did...did I scare you?"

"N- no! I'm just surprised! Savannah you just did the most awesome thing I've ever seen! You just ate that guy! Whole! It was awesome!"

Savannah smiled, feeling much better, "Oh ok. Thanks." She cringed, as she sat down on her bottom, moaning.

"Oh...my poor tummy..." Savannah moaned, "I think I'm going to pop..."

"No you won't. Here, let me rub it and make it feel all better." Tony said as he knelt down and slowly rubbed Savannah's overly bloated and overly stuffed gut. Savannah's eventually stopped moaning and started humming, as she drifted to sleep.

Savannah's eyes slowly opened, groggy. When she realized she was awake, she sat straight up, looking around. Much to her disappointment, she was not in the lunch room at school nor anywhere near Tony. It was just a dream. Just a dream.

That was one thing Savannah never liked about her sleep eating. If she was dreaming, it would be about her stuffing herself, her dream going on-beat with her stuffing herself in real life. Naturally, however, in the dream she would usually be surrounded with food or large amounts would just keep coming out of nowhere. But this one was rather odd. She had never eaten anyone in her dreams before. She looked at her pillow and raised an eyebrow. Why was the edge of it wet? She shrugged it off. It wasn't uncommon for her to sleep with her mouth open.

Savannah got out of bed and stretched, her pajama shirt revealing even more of her flabbly flesh. She looked at herself in her mirror. Her shirt made her belly more visible even when she wasn't stretching. The folds, the hanging, the deep belly button, just about everything up until just above the belly button. Well, that's what happens when you accidentally wear old clothes that don't fit anymore right?

Savannah gave her belly a quick pat and...
14431122.title: Dream continuation

...began to slowly rub her hand all around the smooth blob. The feeling of being so soft and jiggly, albeit heavy, was cherished by Savannah. She wasn't necessarily a gainer of any sorts. She never full on stuffed herself with the intention of putting on weight and therefore adding size to her already overweight body. Any and all stuffings where done out of hunger.

Though that doesn't say that she never enjoyed being a rather chubby girl. She absolutely loves it. She can hardly look at some of the girls in her class. So thin. Not to say that any of them aren't fed, it's just that Savannah, being a larger girl, feels in her gut that most other girls aren't fed enough.

Savannah continued to give her abdomen loving rubs and occasional pats as she continued to ponder. She felt bad for her few friends, as they were all skinny and therefore had no extra body fat to coat their frames with. Pity, they would probably look cuter that way. She also felt sorry for the few other overweight girls there were in this school, as she wasn't the only one being teased. She never understood why some of the boys had to be so mean to her, just because she was fat. The names, insults, the painful pinching and poking. She really wished there was some way for the bullies to go away. Let her be fat in peace.

Savannah brought a chunky hand up to her chunky chin in thought, 'How...?' She searched throughout her mind, and came across something, 'Ooh, maybe I could eat them all, like in my dream! Wait...no. There's no way I could swallow a whole kid, and even if I could, I'd probably explode.' She sighed.

In fact, it was the main reason she never said anything about her sleep eating to her mother: she didnt want it to stop.

The 11 year old was jolted from her thoughts as she heard her mother pouring cereal down in the kitchen. It seems her mother beat her to getting up early. Savanna quickly ran downstairs, her big belly jiggling in time with her steps and quickly entering the kitchen.

The fat 11 year old arrived just in time to see her mother brining a nice heaping bowl of cereal over to the table for her. She grinned even more at sight of her plump tummy spilling just a bit further than normal into her lap as she sat down at the table and licked her lips.

Heather leaned towards Savannah's direction upon noticing her daughter's cheeks turning slightly red. She smiled and asked, "You're blushing. What are you thinking about?"

Savannah's body shook suddenly as if she was shocked by a jolt of lightning, caught by surprise. She made eye contact with her mother for a brief moment, but then her eyes moved out of it as she panicked with a few "Uhh"'s.

"Uhh, nothing." Savannah finally said.

"Not gonna work." Said her mother, "Try again."

"Uhh..." Savannah muttered as she blushed a little more.

Heather chuckled, "I know something's on your mind. Would you tell me if I made you...a sundae?"

Savannah sat straight up with widened eyes. She loved sundaes. Give her any kind of food, but if she had a choice between a sundae and anything else, she would choose the sundae.

"With bananas and chocolate syrup and a cherry on top?!" Savannah asked, excited.

Heather nodded, "With bananas, chocolate syrup, a cherry on top, and some caramel. But you got to tell me what you were thinking about just then."

Savannah sarcastically groaned. She felt like a dog with a treat being held just out of reach and she had to do a trick to get it.

"A boy in my school. His name is Tony."

"Awww...."

"Good enough?"

"Good enough." Heather answered as she opened up the freezer. She grimaced and announced, "Actually, I think you might be in trouble; I don't see any ice cre- oh wait nevermind; found some." Savannah sighed in relief.

"For a second there I thought I had to make you something else." Said Heather.

"I'm glad. I love sundaes." Said Savannah.

"Maybe a little too much, but I can't blame you." Heather murmured. Savannah's smile turned upside down into a frown. She knew what her mother implied with that statement.

"Mom, do you think I'm too fat?"

"Oh no of course not." Said Heather as she placed a jug of ice cream on the table, beginning to make the promised sundae, "You're on the heavy side, but you're not huge."

"Ok..." Said Savannah as she looked at her belly, "I just thought that you thought I needed to lose weight...get skinny."

"Savannah, you're my only daughter and my little angel." Heather assured, almost finishing the sundae, "It's perfectly fine if you have some extra pounds packed on; it's your happiness that's important to me."

Savannah smiled, "Thanks." Heather walked towards her daughter with the completed sundae. It consisted of three scoops of vanilla ice-cream, two bananas on opposite ends of the bowl, a cherry on top, and the entire masterpiece smothered in chocolate syrup and caramel. She handed Savannah the sundae and a spoon and Savannah wasted no time digging into her prize.

Savannah slumped into the kitchen with her tummy rumbling, yet with her mind in a deep slumber. She lazily "walked" her way towards the fridge and opened it, blindly reaching for a bag of shredded cheese. The sleep walking chubby girl made little hesitation to start eating the cheese handful by handful. In her sleeping mind, a somewhat similar scenario was taking place.





It was recess at Savannah's school, and appropriately enough, several students were playing around in the yards and the jungle gyms and the swings and having a blast with what little time they had. Savannah however, wasn't. She was sitting on a bench alone, eating a bag of chips while watching the other kids play. It's not like she didn't have any friends to play with, it's just that Savannah here just was not fond of doing any form of exercising, even if it was a bunch of made up games with a soccer ball.





Savannah downed the bag of shredded cheese in seconds and quickly reached for something else. Her pudgy hands grabbed a package full of sliced ham and she tore open the pack and wasted no time with eating the ham.





Savannah finished her bag of chip somewhat quickly and reached into her lunch box and picked up a ham sandwich. This is what typical recess was for Savannah - sitting on a bench eating. Conveniently enough, lunch doesn't start for her until one class after recess, so Savannah basically gets to eat two lunches on a school day, although, both are somewhat small, since she can only put in her lunch box what can fit, and school lunches tend to be small compared to Savannah's meals. As she bit into the sandwich, Savannah nearly groaned when she saw three punks walking her way.





Savannah burped softly as she finished the slices of ham. She aimlessly reached into the fridge and grabbed a hold of a jug of milk. While she did this, her other hand mindlessly came up and squeezed and rubbed her belly.





"Here she is, this is that fat girl I told you about." Said one of the boys.

"Oh my god she's huge!" Exclaimed the boy on the left.

"Of course the fat kid would be eating right? Right?" Asked the boy on the right. The other two boys laughed.

Savannah groaned, "What do you want?"

The boy in the middle scoffed, "Just wanted to show you to Jeff here - he's never seen a circus freak before."

"Nah, she doesn't look like a circus freak." Said the boy on the right. Savannah's hopes didn't go up; she knew he was going say she looked like something worse, "You know those Boomer thingies from Left 4 Dead? She looks JUST like them!"

"Dude you're right!" Exclaimed the boy in the middle, "She's got the belly and everything! Now we just need to see if she explodes." He picked up a stick off the ground and pointed it at Savannah's midsection.

"Stand back guys, don't want her guts to spew all over us!"

Savannah growled as she stood up. She pulled up her shirt so the boys could see her "disgusting" belly, which they reacted as if it were disgusting.

"You know we really didn't have to see that!" Shouted the boy in the middle.

"I thought you were going to poke me and make me explode." Savannah sternly stated.

"You know what?! I'm gonna!" Yelled the boy as he shoved the stick into Savannah's belly. Savannah then dropped her shirt and grabbed the kid's arm.





Savannah twisted the cap off of the jug of milk and shoved the mouth of the jug into her own mouth. She then pulled the jug up and upside down so the milk would drain down into her mouth and into her belly. With each passing moment, Savannah's belly got slightly bigger and bigger.





Savannah wasted no time in taking the punk's surprise to her advantage. She grabbed his head with her free hand and shoved it into her mouth. She then proceeded to pull the boy down her throat until she had to open her mouth further to get his shoulders. When she got his shoulders in her mouth. she then used her arms to push him further and further down her throat, and could feel his head hitting her stomach. Within seconds, the entirety of the boy now laid in the belly of Savannah, easily extending the already big dome a by a foot and making her shirt ride up to over the belly button.

The other two boys were a little too shocked to move, but Savannah wasn't too "belly heavy" to lose her stance and walked towards them.

"Your friend was yummy." Said Savannah, "Yummy yummy in my tummy." She patted her belly, not paying any attention to the boy's futile attempts to puncture it and escape, "Who wants to go next? I'm sure both of you will be yummy yummy in my tummy too."

The boy on the right started scream, "NO!!! G- Go eat someone else!!! Get away from me!!!" He then pressed his hand on the other boy's back and shoved him towards Savannah before running away.

The boy landed on his knees and had Savannah's belly perfectly level with his head. He looked up at the bloated girl and begged, "Please don't eat me, I didn't do anything."

Savannah grabbed him by the shoulders and licked her lips, "Sorry. I'm still hungry." The boy cried in panic as he was given the exact same fate as his friend - swallowed whole.





Savannah dropped the now empty jug of milk and hiccuped. She accidentally closed the fridge door as she started making her way back to her room, although a little bit slower than before. Her hands held her belly as she slowly walked towards her room, her belly growling with digestion while she released occasional soft hiccups. Upon walking to her room, she laid herself to bed and continued her uninterrupted sleep, her torso rising and falling with each deep breath and her pajamas hugging her belly as tight as it could.

She wouldn't call this a bad thing; she was particularly fond of her big frame. She pulled up her shirt up to under her chest so she could see the entirety of this, blob that she had attached to her. She rubbed this blob of a belly in deep thought. More and more recently she's been starting to genuinely like her enlarging frame. What caught her ear, though, was the fact that her mother also mentioned that kids usually eat more around this time, to compensate for the changes. Savannah concluded that that was probably why she started to like how much thicker, plumper, and rounder she was getting, and why she was eating more than she used to.

Her thoughts disappeared when the pop tarts popped out of the toaster. Upon hearing the sound, she picked up another paper towel and pulled the pop-tarts out of the toaster. Savannah walked up to him, "But I'm fat and lazy. Why don't you get me some food?" She could tell by the look on the boy's face that she was turning the tables on him; he was starting to seem a little scared of her.

Savannah was panting heavily. She didn't know what to do. She couldn't continue the school day like this - people will notice that she has gotten bigger. A lot bigger.

'I have to leave.' Savannah thought, 'I can't stay in school!' She turned back to the bench she was sitting on and grabbed her backpack, which laid against it. Leaning over was VERY hard for her, since her now enormous belly was in the way. Oh, and on the subject of her meal, the shaking and sudden bulging was slowing down, and getting less and less aggressive, indicating that the bully was being digested. Savannah opened a pouch in her backpack and pulled out her phone, dialed her mom's number and called her. After a few rings, her mom answered with a fairly worried voice.

"What's going on Savannah?" Heather asked.

"Mom! I need you to pick me up from school now!" Savannah shouted into the phone.

"Why?! What's going on?!"

Savannah looked down at her belly and answered, "I...I don't know how to explain it! I'll have to show you! Just get here quickly!"

"Ok honey I'll be right there!" Her mother said finally before hanging up. Savannah closed her phone and put it in her pocket, sighing heavily. Now she needed to think about what to tell her. She obviously couldn't tell her mom that she had eaten another kid, but she couldn't say that there was something wrong with the food at the school; if the food was enough to make her THIS much fatter so quickly, all the kids in the school would be obese. She kept thinking, but her thoughts changed when the right person came to the right place at the wrong time. Tony.

He walked towards Savannah fairly quickly, not exactly running, but he wasn't being entirely casual neither. When he finally approached her, he studied her body with confusion and shock.

"Savannah? Is that you?" He asked.

Savannah tried her best to sound like she didn't know what he was talking about, "Um, yes?"

"I thought it was..." Tony agreed, scratching his head, "Uh...Savannah, what happened to you? I know you have a big appetite, but you were nowhere near this big in the morning."

Savannah gasped. He must've spotted her earlier in the day, "Uh...Are you sure that was me?"

Tony stepped closer to Savannah, "Savannah, I saw you walking to your first class."

Savannah sighed, "No point trying to hide it from you..."

"I know you have a big appetite Sav, but don't use that as an excuse for you to get so big that your shirt doesn't even fit anymore, in one day. What happened?"

Savannah sighed again, "Ok...Recently I've been having dreams about me eating a lot of food with you watching, then some bully comes up and makes fun of me, then...I swallow him whole..."

Tony raised an eyebrow, "Is that what you did just now?"

Savannah slowly nodded.

"Wow...That certainly explains it."

"You won't tell anyone will you?!" Savannah panicked.

"Of course not. Nobody needs bullies anyway." Tony said, "Your secret is my secret, but if I were you, I'd hurry up and come up with a reason for this." He placed his hand on Savannah's belly, patting it.

"I know. I've been trying to think of something." Said Savannah. She paused, noticing that Tony hadn't taken his hand off of her belly.

"Though I must say," Said Tony, "whatever you did filled you up nicely."

Savannah's face earned an expression of joy, "You...like my chub?"

"I always did really...I just never had the nerve to tell you." Said Tony.

"Wow..." Savannah verbalized, "Do you...want to play with it?"

Of course all of this was more than enough to distract Tony who could see his tubby young crush from across the room. He was studying in this class, even if it wasnt the chalkboard at the front. He made sure to study every pound his beautiful fat crush had on her. The young boy knew he had to make this plump princess his girlfriend. He wanted to bring it up at recess, but was still really shy about asking her. I mean this would be his first actual girlfriend.if she said yes.

Finally, after what seemed like an eternity, the bell rang and the children happily rushed out of the room and out onto the playground. Savannah waddled after them and quickly took a seat under a near by tree. She grinned as waited for Tony to arrive.

She didnt have to wait long as Tony quickly found her and sat down next to her. He still wasnt sure if he could ask her to be his girlfriend or not, but was really trying to work up the courage.

Here Savannah said as she lifted her shirt slightly to reveal her belly, breaking the boys train of though.

Can you rub my tummy some more? It kinda feels nice. The fat little girl quickly added, blushing as she did so.

By: mephilis

Tony's hands gently slid around the mass of Savannah's belly, feeling the warm softness it possessed. He could definitely feel that it was bigger, rounder, and made sure to explore every inch of the vast land of fat. He also took occasionally took a break from his "exploration" by gently squeezing and patting Savannah's belly, making it mold like dough and jiggle like jello. Savannah joined in the fun as well, almost making a bongo drum out of her belly. Too bad she wasn't very good with rhythm.

Tony greatly enjoyed this. Savannah's belly was practically a shrine of joy, radiating with warmth and comfort that just begged for a good cuddle. He would have, in fact, given it a good cuddle, if he wasn't so nervous. He really wanted to hug Savannah again, especially around her waist. He just had an urge to rub his face against her belly and smother himself in her warmth. Heck, he almost wanted to use her belly as a pillow!

Savannah on the other hand was almost enjoying this as much as Tony was. It was very relaxing to just sit back and have her belly rubbed by a nice boy such as Tony. She was already fond of him, but knowing that he liked her fattiness made her appreciation leap. Tony's attraction to her also started giving her second thoughts about her body. She used to be completely indifferent or sometimes oblivious to her weight, but now that she was getting some positive attention from someone who wasn't either of her parents, she's started to notice what there is to like about being a big girl. And then her thoughts were interrupted by Tony's words, which greatly excited her.

"Um...Savannah?" Tony slowly asked with a shaky voice.

Savannah looked directly into Tony's eyes and asked, "Yeah?"

"Well...I...um..." Tony said with obvious difficulty, "I...I was wondering...since I like you, and you...you like me, I was wondering if you..." His face was getting redder with each word, and he was having difficulty looking at Savannah with his growing nervousness.

"Come on Tony, just say it." Savannah encouraged, "I want to hear it!"

"Savannah...will you...will you be my girlfriend?" Tony asked. His eyes were shut in fear of embarrassment. Several seconds passed by before Tony's eyes opened again, and they didn't open until Savannah gave her response. She said nothing; she just smiled widely and pulled Tony towards her, hugging him very tightly. Rubbing her cheek against his and cuddling him into her fat, Savannah wanted to express her happiness and show to Tony exactly what her answer was.

"Thanks for asking Tony." She whispered, "I really like you, and I really want you to be my boyfriend."

Tony was practically crying, "Thank you S-Savannah!"

"You're welcome Tony." Said Savannah. It was difficult to keep herself from giggling at Tony. She thought it was so cute to see him cry with happiness.

"Savannah, as my girlfriend," Said Tony, getting control of himself, "I promise that I'll never let anyone be mean to you, and that you'll always be fed until you say no. I promise."

Savannah grinned, "Thanks a lot Tony. Here..." She released Tony from her arms for a brief moment so she could lean further back against the tree, until she was almost completely on her back. She then pulled Tony down with her and pulled his head towards his belly, having him use her as a pillow. His face sinking into his new girlfriends fat, Tony's eyes were locked with Savannah's, the two of them looking at each other with seemingly permanent smiles.

1443112222222121211112222122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

…Savannah’s belly began to rumble! It shook against Tony, and both his and her cheeks flushed bright red.
“Well, it is recess…” she smiled. Tony pulled his arms off of her and opened up his bag, producing his lunchbox, and emptying it between himself and Savannah. A bag of cookies, a tub of yogurt, an apple, a sandwich, and some orange juice. He took the apple and rested it atop her belly button. It sank down just a bit. They both laughed.

“But...what are you going to eat?”
Tony shrugged, “Does it matter?”
He said it so casually, he really didn’t mind giving her every scrap. He wanted her to have every scrap. Her heart fluttered just a little bit. “Okay, but get something at lunch, okay? What good is having a boyfriend if he starves on the first day?”
And with that, she sank her teeth into the apple, tearing out almost half of it in one go.

What was meant to keep Tony full all day felt like little more than a snack to Savannah. Her new boyfriend kept a hand on her tummy, moving it up and down as he watched his lunch disappear into her. She drank the yogurt like a small glass of water, dribbling a bit down her chin and onto her shirt. Neither of them noticed, far too dazed by their love.
And of course, she also had her own lunch to polish off, which was just a little bigger than Tony’s.

The two sat there, laying against the tree in their own little world, making only the sound of Savannah’s chewing. They did want to talk, oh how they wanted to talk! But nothing seemed right for the moment… just being there was enough. Even as the plump girl scrunched up her last empty chip packet, she just tossed it aside and turned to face her love. Her gut covered his leg, and they both smiled, just staring into the others’ eyes.

But then Savannah’s smiled faded. Tony worried he’d done something wrong, but saw she was just replacing it with something else…was she…leaning in for a smooch? A real, actual smooch?
Taking the chance, Tony closed his eyes and moved in too, inching closer and closer…

And then the bell rang. Their eyes popped open, both facing the other making a kissy face. How embarrassing…

“Oh man…” Tony sighed. “Well, I’ll see you after lunch, it’s no big deal…”
Savannah rolled the thought around in her head…

So, Savannah heaved her chubby body up and gave her tummy a loving pat, before she headed back to class. She wasn't sure which class they had now and, even after the lesson began, she couldn't pay attention to anything that was said. She was far too distracted by thought of her new boyfriend to listen to the teacher.

It was probably this reason the 11 year old didn't even hear the lunch bell ring. This was VERY unusual for Savannah. She was usually the first one up and raring to eat the second she could. It seemed that Tony really had done a number on her.

"Wow! Look everybody. I think Savannah's finally gotten so fat she can't get out of her chair. She's still sitting and not running off to stuff her face!" Sneered a thin, redheaded, girl.

She was wearing quite trendy clothes and was pretty well known to be part of the "in" crowd. Although not as incessant as the boy were, this girl did make fun of people quite a bit and today it looked like it was Savannah's turn to get her brunt.

However, Savannah only grinned slyly as the redhead laughed and walked out with the rest of the class. She quick got up and out of her seat and decided...

…to have a redheaded snack.

Watching from a distance as the girl met her friends at the locker, she pondered how to do it. She hadn’t planned that first bully snack whatsoever; everything had just sort of lined up for her. She really wanted to just forget it and find Tony, but then she imagined his hands on her enormous, swollen stomach. It was the only thing missing from that first time…
And then, inspiration struck. Taking a napkin and pencil from her own locker, she jotted down a little message, and waited for the girl to leave her locker vulnerable…

Leaving to use the bathroom for just a moment, the girl returned just two minutes later and found a note inside. She was curious, since she had only just checked inside her locker; whoever left it had just been here.

“’Every time I look at you, my heart swells as big as that Savannah girl’s belly’,” she blushed red as her hair, though that was certainly an odd thing to say. “’Every word you say is like poetry and you look like an… an artists’ masterpiece!’” The girl giggled, very taken aback by the flattery. “’You’re way too good for me in every way, but if you’ll meet me in the Romance section at the library, I have a gift for you.’ Not good enough for me? Oh, we’ll see about that, Mr. Romance1”

Giggling, she made off for the school library like nothing else mattered in the world. A love letter! How gentlemanly! It was just like one of her sisters’ romance novels!
But much unlike those stories, upon arriving in the romance section, she didn’t find her secret admirer. Standing there was Savannah, of all people, grinning from chubby cheek to chubby cheek.
“Savannah! I guess someone must have greased your seat for you. Look, could you get lost? No offence, but I’m meeting a boy here, and my romance story has no room for you. But then again, I’m surprised anything has room for you.
Savannah smiled, and pulled up her shirt, giving her tummy some room to breathe.
“Well…” she said, trying not to laugh, “I’ve got some bad news…”

Tony sat alone at the tree. This tree had become his favourite place in the world, but without Savannah, there wasn’t much point to it. He was getting worried…maybe she didn’t like him after all? In his mind, she could snag a hundred boyfriends with that cute tummy of hers, why would she settle for him?
But then, he smiled. Standing in front of him was a very familiar, very wide figure.

“Guess where I’ve been!” Savannah giggled, making sure he saw every inch of what she’d done with the red headed girl.

Tony could only sit there in shock as he looked at the large tummy Savannah presented to him. With the way she was standing, and the way he was sitting, her globular gut was right in his face. Thanks to her latest "meal", her stomach was completely exposed to him too. It gave him the perfect vantage point to see the hand print of the girl she had just eaten as the skinny child inside desperately tried to escape.

"You-you-you ate..." Tony stammered out, before he was interrupted.

"Yes! And she was delicious too! Wish she had a bit more meat on her bones though." Savannah said as she looked down at her jutting tummy.

Tony could only look on at her tummy with wide eyes. Of course, had anyone looked closely enough they would have seen the little smile the boy had on his face. He couldn't help it. He loved how big Savannah had become.

"You know what this means don't you..." Savannah began as she grinned down at the boy.

He broke his gaze from her tummy and looked back up at his bloated little girlfriend.

14431122222221212111122221221121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Savannah’s tummy pressed hard against Tony and he almost fell over. They both laughed, and she sat down in front of him, waiting patiently for her belly rub. Not that she had to wait very long. While he did hesitate for a moment, once he was sure he had her permission, Tony pressed his hands against his girlfriend’s massive stomach, and the fun began.

It was even better than he had imagined. At recess it had been round and huggable, but now he couldn’t even describe it. A big padded ball of squirming food, just as huggable, but four times as big. It was so large, he couldn’t decide where his hands needed to be. He began pressing down on the front, around her belly button, but felt he was neglecting the sides, but she was a bit too large to reach both at the same time, so when he moved to rub one side, the other was neglected.

It had to have been the best problem Savannah ever had. While Tony did have a lot of space to cover, he seemed he was born to soothe bellies. His touch sent tingles up her back, and she began to burp without meaning to as he popped each little gas bubble trapped inside her. Somehow, she’d almost forgotten her big meal was another student, and that Tony was pushing and pressing at her as she wiggled weakly in her slimy container.

“I’m sorry, I wish I had more hands,” Tony sighed, pinching one of her love handles.
“Are you joking? That feels amazing!” the large girl replied, starting to drool. Now and again, her parents had given her a soothing belly rub after she ate too much, but understandably, Tony had a very different approach, actively wanting to touch as much of her tummy as possible. And he was good at it, too…
A thought crossed her mind, and she leaned forward. Her tummy was so soft and creamy, Tony hadn’t noticed she’d moved until their noses were an inch from touching.
And then she kissed him on the lips.

The boy panicked and pulled away, much to her surprise. But then he saw that warm glint in her eyes, wordlessly asking him to lean in again. And so he did, and carefully kissed her back…

Out of nowhere, the bell rang, almost as if someone really didn’t want these two to kiss.
“Not again!” Tony cried, suddenly hugging Savannah very tightly. She squirmed a little, and he relaxed, quickly apologizing.
“I don’t blame you,” she smiled, standing up with some difficulty. With a heartfelt sigh, she rested her hands upon her tummy and gazed lovingly upon her handsome young boyfriend…
Of course, that was when they both realized her belly was still huge and kicking, and they both started to panic.

They knew they couldn’t use the same lie again, it would be far too suspicious, but how else would they explain this? Sure, she was a big girl, but a belly this big just couldn’t go unnoticed! And if she did think up a good lie, they’d surely take her to the school nurse, and they’d find the truth before long.

"I can't go back to class like this!" Savannah cried, "They'll figure me out! They'll know what I had for lunch, for sure!"
Even though he couldn't quite reach all the way, Tony tried to hug her, and she quickly hugged him back. "That's okay we only have a few classes left today anyway. Maybe they won't notice we're gone?"
"We? You mean?"
He smiled, "I'm not leaving you alone in your time of need!" For a split second, she stared at him in utter surprise, but then gave him another forceful smooch.
"I love you, Tony," she whispered into his ear, and he practically melted.

1443221.content:
Matthew was a pudgy boy, but he didn’t really mind it. His mother had always taught him not to be ashamed of it, and that it was cute. However, that seemed to be changing. As he gets older and older, it seems more of the other kids make fun of him for it… and while he’s still not ashamed, he does try to hide it away most of the time. Right now, he’s at the pool… and sadly, he has to wear a big swim shirt now, so that the rolls of fat on his big tummy don’t show. Of course, that didn’t help too much…

“Hey! I didn’t know they let whales in the pool!” He heard a voice from the pool as he was just walking by, minding his own business. He turned to see a much younger girl, just about 6, sticking her tongue out at him, mockingly. Despite how young she was, her insult still made her angry, and he clenched his fists.

“I-I’m nothing like a whale!” He insists.

“Are, too!” She taunts in a sing-song voice. “If you flopped into the water, the splash would be so big, it’d drain the whole pool!” She giggled at the thought, while he just got angrier and angrier. Mostly, he tries to ignore the bullies, but he just hated her smugness...
1443221.title: Matthew

choices: Sneak over to the locker rooms
14432211.content:
A mischievous grin spread across his face as he came up with a way to silence her mockery. “You know what? I’m not a whale…” He said as he reared back. “I’m a shark!” With that, he dived right into the water, and instantly started swimming beneath the surface towards the girl! She started laughing and swimming away, crying out about the shark that was chasing her, but it wasn’t long before he was able to grab onto one of her ankles! Once he caught her, though, he had no idea what to actually do. If he was a shark, he’d just eat her, but alas, he couldn’t do that.

Guess he might as well pretend, though. Curiously, he started nibbling and lapping at those feet underwater, only to end up tickling her and causing her to laugh like crazy in the waves. He was immediately surprised by just how delicious they were, though! It was like no candy he’s ever eaten! Soon, the nibbling turned to slipping both of those feet into his mouth… and before he knew it, he’d swallowed them into his fat throat! She disappeared quickly beneath the surface of the water, her startled cries unheard as he swallowed her down by instinct.

The girl was finally taken from the cool, open waters and plunged somewhere very tight and swelteringly warm. It didn’t take her long to realize that that older boy had imprisoned her in his fat tummy! It wasn’t calm and soft like in cartoons… no, it was just terrible! It smelled horrible, as she was covered in half-digested food, and she was surrounded by deafening gurgles and churns as the boy’s stomach squeezed and jostled her around. Worse was the weird juices in here, the tingled and stung on her skin! Disgusted by her tight prison, she started kicking and punching the walls as hard as she could, demanding to be freed…

Meanwhile, Matthew finally surfaced with a huge, shuddering belch, as he got used to the weight inside of him. He looked down, to see that his belly had gotten quite a bit bigger, his swim shirt now having ridden up his body and left his tummy revealed. He stared at it in awe, knowing that it had a whole kid contained inside. He never really knew that that was possible! He rubbed his hands over it as he felt her delightful movements, and wondered just how on Earth he was going to get her out of there...

… then again… maybe he doesn’t have to let her out? He looks down at his belly beneath the water, rubbing it with his hands and feeling the movements of the young girl imprisoned within. There was no way she was gonna get out on her own… his belly was too powerful for a kid to escape from! So why should he let her out? He knew that, if he didn’t, his fat tummy was probably going to digest the child… but was that really his fault? After all, he just swallowed her, nothing more! If his tummy decides that it wants to digest her, that’s its doing, not his! He has no control over what his tummy does.

“You can handle her, right, tummy?” He giggles a bit, rubbing over his distended tummy. As stated earlier, he’d always found digesting food to be super fun… and digesting a little kid seemed like it would be even funner! Besides, it’s what a shark would do. Even beneath the water, he could hear his tummy making all sorts of crazy noises, which he all found extremely funny. Her wriggling in there was like he was getting a very thorough belly rub from the inside.

Of course, something tells him that digesting this girl in his fat tummy could get him into a lot of trouble, so he has to make sure nobody finds out. He could stay in the pool for a while, as his tummy is hidden under the water here, but he was already getting sort of cramped, and somebody might bump into his tummy. On the other hand, if he’s quick, he might be able to hop out and hide in the locker rooms without being seen.
14432211.title: He's not a whale... he's a shark!

144322112.content:
Being a larger boy, he always found big crowds like this pool rather claustrophobic, as he was always bumping into people. This became even worse when his tummy was twice its regular size! That jiggling tummy was constantly bumping into people, and while nobody seems to realize just what was inside it, it was still definitely ruining the moment for him. He had to get somewhere private to enjoy his meal!

Of course, this proved quite difficult, too. “Oof… calm… down in there…!” Climbing out of the pool alone was dificult as could be with the girl kicking around inside his fat, gurgling tummy, and just keeping his balance while walking was made difficult by just how wildly she was thrashing around. “My tummy’s not letting you out… so just stay… where you belong!” He bit his lip, trying his best to cover his huge tummy with a towel as he walked quickly towards the bathroom, trying not to bump into anybody.

He let out a huff of relief when he finally made it to the locker rooms, and plopped his fat body down on the bench, finally giving him some relief. Now that he had a break, and was a lone, he could finally take a look at his huge tummy, slowly removing the towel from around his torso… only to almost gasp in awe at what he was seeing!

It was obvious that just beneath that layer of softness, a little girl was fighting like crazy inside of his tummy, with small handprints, feet, and even her face making clear bulges as she tries her best to stretch her way free. And of course, his tummy wasn’t even giving her an inch of progress. “Aaaah! There we go!” He let out a long blissful sigh as he groped that smooth gut. “You’re so tasty, I’m surprised nobody gobbled you up sooner! Well, their loss! Now you’re all mine~”

In response, he just shuddered as an absolutely huge bulge protruded from the smooth surface of his tummy as she tried to push her way free! In response, she just laid a hand back on the bulge and pushed her back to where she was, forcing her to curl up in a tight ball in his cramped tummy! “Okay, that’s it! I think you need to learn where you belong~” With that, he stood up… and started squishing his gut up against the wall!

As he leaned up against the wall, he could feel the kid inside of his belly squirm like crazy! Not only was she getting digested by his big, fat tummy, but she was getting crushed, too! This only got worse when he decided to lay down on his tummy, squishing her beneath his weight! Eventually, he rolled over on his back, his tongue hanging out as he basked in the sensations. At this point, her will to struggle seemed to be gone, and she was just shifting and moving weakly around in his stomach, giving him a relaxing belly massage from the inside.

He soon ran up against another problem, though...
144322112.title: Sneak over to the locker rooms

1443222.content:
Zama: A 12-year old hippo girl all the way from Kenya! She used to live a happy, hippo-ey life, but she was tragically orphaned when her parents were killed by poachers. Recently, though, she was adopted, and now she lives in a normal neighborhood among humans. She has troubles fitting in with her peers, though, sometimes literally. Having grown up in the wild, she’s openly gross, not seeing the problem with farting and burping whenever she pleases, and not really liking showers or toilets. She’s also the tallest, pudgiest kid around, and frequently likes to use her pudge to squish kids she doesn’t like. She’s definitely a big eater, sloppily chomping down on huge meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner. She’s happy being herself, but sometimes, she wishes her peers liked her more.

Jimmy: A small 9-year old human boy, who’s now Zama’s little brother now that she’s been adopted into their family. At first, he hated the idea that his step sister was going to be some big, gross hippo. However, as he’s slowly gotten warmed up to her, he’s starting to be more and more intrigued by her. Now, he just wants to learn more about her, and hopes they can become good friends.

Note: Due to Zama's personality, gas and scat and all that is going to be an inherent part of her story. If you're not interested, choose 'Something else, please'.
1443222.title: Someone else

14432221.content:
Zama had not been the first anthro Jimmy met. He knew a few cats and dogs at school, after all, even a rabbit. So when he was told that his new step sibling was going to be an anthro, he didn’t hate the idea. He was just intrigued.

Immediately, though, he realized there was going to be a problem: Zama was a WILD anthro. Meaning she wasn’t used to living in societies, or spending time indoors. Needless to say, she wasn’t a big fan of personal hygiene, and before too long, the whole house smelled like a zoo. She was much taller than human girls her age, being almost 5’8”, and she was certainly way taller than Jimmy himself. She also had a bunch of blubber on her, making her heavy enough to destroy chairs just by sitting on them sometimes. Worse, she cam across as something of a bully at first, always pushing Jimmy around and messing with him.

At first, Jimmy was upset over this, thinking that the inclusion of the hippo would essentially ruin his life. Since they slept in the same room, her loud snoring and constant gassiness in her sleep kept him from getting any sleep himself, and being associated with her kept him from making many friends. However, over time, he’s slowly started to warm up to her, becoming more and more curious about hippos and their culture.

“I know you humans are boring all that, but man, these ‘video games’ y’all make are fun!” Zama laughed, loudly chomping her way through bags of chips and slurping soda while sitting next to Jimmy, both playing some fighting game. Despite being older than him, she was much worse at video games, but he often let her win just to keep her from getting angry. At the moment, she was wearing a band t-shirt that was too small, riding up and showing off her belly completely, alongside some jeans that similarly barely fit her. “They would be a lot funner if they were made by hippos, though~”

Just being this close to her, Jimmy could feel the body heat radiating off of her huge form. “Y-yeah…” He shrugged. He could hardly even imagine what kind of a video game hippos would make. It would probably be the grossest video game ever. Maybe an eating contest simulator. “Have you… known many hippos?”

“Oh, yeah. Used to be in a whole tribe of hippos. Way cooler than all y’all humans,” she chuckled. She had just finished easily gulping down the contents of an entire bag of chips, and had already moved on to another bag. Meanwhile, a ton of empty soda cans were accumulating by her side. “My parents were the coolest of all. Back when they were, ya know, alive.”

You pause. “Your… your old parents, they…”

“Yup. They got shot up by poachers and all that…” She nodded. She tried to seem nonchalant about the whole thing, but notably, Jimmy could see her tense up slightly. He was just about to express condolences, before she continued. “Those guys were just mad because us hippos liked to gobble their dumb poacher friends up.”

“Wait… what!?” He immediately forgot what she just said, only staring at her, wide-eyed. Did she really mean what he thinks she means? Anthros… eating people? Sure, they were poachers, but… that was still stunning to even conceive of! “Are you saying they… they ate people?”

“Well, duh! Hippos can’t eat ANYTHING, doofus!” She rolled her eyes with a chuckle as if this was obvious, even leaning back and jiggling her own big belly a bit. “Heck, my mama once gobbled up a whole little boy just like you once! Just opened her maw and swallowed him… whole!”

“A… what? She did?” His heart sank, and he skipped a breath for a moment. The image was so vivid in his head… a big hippo lady with a pair of legs dangling from her maw, only to swallow them down for the kid to disappear into a bulge in her belly. “Just like me?”

“Yup! She lured him away from his tour group by promising him a kiss… but instead, she gulped him right down, into her big tummy!” She said, nonchalantly. “I even got to rub it after! You could hear him in there… all like, ‘mommy, mommy, I wanna go home’. Hahaha!” With that, she leaned back and let out a big, guttural laugh, slapping her own belly.

Jimmy paused… before scowling when he realized what she was doing. “You’re just messing with me.”

“Maybe I am, maybe I ain’t,” she taunted, with a devious grin. “Unless you wanna find out, you should bring me more chips. Three bags should just about do it, I think.” With that, she shoved a pack of empty pack of chips into his hands, forcing him to stand up. With a sigh and a roll of his eyes, Jimmy went to bring his sister some more bags of chips. He’s found it’s easier to just do what she says rather than disobey…

If it’s any condolence, at least today is...

14432221112.content:
“I want to see if you could – uh – swallow….me?” Jimmy concluded with uncertainty.

For once, Zama pushed her food to the side and gave him her undivided attention. The hungry look, which Jimmy had previously thought he might have imagined, dominated her expression.

“It’s not a matter of if, little man,” Zama said, hoisting her globular frame up and walking over to him. “Us hippos can swallow just about anything. I’ve never swallowed a little boy, I’ll admit, but you’ve seen how much I can put away in this big belly.”

She grabbed one of his hands and pressed it into her fat middle. His hand sunk deep into its squishy folds.

“I could easily swallow you – or any of your cute little buddies. Just imagine,” she continued, forcing him to massage her belly, “you wiggling around in this big belly of mine.”

Jimmy shivered. He was almost certain it was out of terror, but maybe it was morbid fascination or even…excitement?

“I – I can kind of imagine it, yeah,” he said nervously, looking up at the grinning hippo-girl’s face.

Despite having just downed so much chips and bottle of soda, she said, “I’ve got plenty of room if you wanna do more than imagine it. I’m sure your parents would understand: they knew what they were getting into when they brought me home.”

Jimmy wasn’t sure if she was lying about that last part, or about the whole thing, for that matter. Maybe she really was just trying to scare him.

“So,” Zama continued, interrupted briefly by a belch, “are you signing up for a one-way to receive the honor of being digested by me? Or maybe you’re getting cold feet?” She licked her lips and her belly rumbled once more, seemingly showing how serious she was. “Or would you rather see one of your friend squirm around in here?” she gave her belly a loving pat.

Jimmy…

Lisa stuck out her tongue at the memory. 'Oh well, there's always next time... unless mom and dad take a hint and stop hiring sitters. In that case, Bart and I won't have to keep digesting the poor saps into belly-fat.' The more she thought about it though, the more she disliked the idea of giving up her new diet. A simple 'please' and 'thank you' could go a long way. And as for bullies, she wouldn't need to ask their permission at all. By eating them she'd be making the schoolyard a safer, friendlier place. The more she thought about it, the more the idea appealed to her. Lisa was all about doing community service, and what would be more beneficial to the community than turning people like Nelson and Jimbo into bowel movements? Tilting her head backwards she let the chocolaty treats spill into her mouth. The young girl's cheeks expanded, ballooning outwards, as she managed to pack in hundred of them without swallowing. After she'd emptied the who jar, Lisa swallowed. Like one, giant mass, the tightly packed ball of chocolate chips descended into her hungry tummy. Her little belly shook lightly in response, causing Lisa to release a tiny, girly sounding burp.

"Excuse me." She said to no one in particular. It was always good practice to remember one's manners. Next, Lisa moved on to a bowl of fruit and began peeling bananas. She sucked one after another down her esophagus, enjoying the feeling of the unmasticated food tickling the back of her throat. Delicious! 'If Bart would just give fruit a try, he'd find it a lot easier to pass our babysitters' Lisa thought. Looking at the fridge, Lisa figured she'd finish off last night's pork chops and call it quits. or

Mabel - Chipper little goofball with eyes for any boy close to her age, a love of anything sparkly or cute, and armed with a handy grappling hook and an already notorious sweet tooth?

Either way, something big is going to go down at the Mystery Shack.
145331.title: Mystery Twins!

choices: Dipper doesn't have the guts for it.
1453311.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Dipper was tired and hungry. He’d been up in his and Mabel’s room for hours trying to decode a strange message he’d scribbled on a rock in the forest. After all that hard work, it finally clicked together as ‘Robbie wuz here.’

Going down stairs revealed to him two things; his sister Mabel was eating a large bowl of uncooked cookie dough, and Wendy was cheering her on, capturing the whole thing on her phone’s camera.

“Do I even want to know what’s going on here?”
“Your sister’s going for the world record, Dip!” Wendy laughed as her young friend spooned another large wad of cookie dough into her mouth. Slobber and crumbs dripped from her lips with each bite. Dipper noticed her green sweater was stretched out, and another, empty bowl sat on the table.
“That’s uh, kind of gross, actually…”
“I think it’s awesome, look at her go!” Wendy laughed, watching Mabel empty the bowl more and more.

Well, if Wendy thought something was cool, Dipper suddenly felt the need to change his opinion. He’d do just about anything to impress the beautiful, teenage red head. To hear her say he was the coolest, to

“You think that’s impressive? Mabel’s always been kind of a lightweight, to be honest.” Had her mouth not been crammed full, his sister would have loudly protested.
“Oh, you think you can do better? That’s her third bowl today.”
“Three? Oh, how cute!” Dipper laughed, trying to seem confident, “She must be really trying. I could put away at least five!”

There was a loud gulp, and Mabel started to gasp. “Oh yeah? Well, why don’t you prove it, Dipping Sauce?”
“Aww man, there goes the record!” Wendy sighed as Mabel’s munching came to an end. “But it sounds like you shouldn’t have any trouble with it.”
Dipper froze, not knowing what to say.
“Yeah, I totally forgot what a total Eating Machine you were, bro. It’s feels like forever since I’ve seen you in action!”
“Uh, the thing, you know-“ he didn’t get much of a word in.
“Hey man, don’t worry if you’re a little rusty. It’s a pretty obscure record, you only need to get down four and a half bowls. Sounds like you should crush that!”
“Oh, well I’m not really very hungry right now,” his stomach rumbled loudly. “But…maybe I can make some room…”

Bloated as she herself was, Mabel hopped up and scooted Dipper into a seat, and pushed a bowl in front of him. “Good luck, you’re gonna…oooogh…” she grabbed at her full middle and groaned,
“Maybe you should stay sitting down, too.”
“Yeah…good idea,” she burped, plopping into a chair.

Dipper braced himself, undoing his belt and reminding himself, ‘This is for Wendy.’
1453311.title: Cookie dough record

choices: "That was totally awesome!" Wendy is officially impressed.
"Dude, are you okay?" Nurse Wendy, here to help.
14533112.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Spoon in hand, Dipper attacked the first bowl with determination in his eyes and Wendy in his heart…
Wendy laughed, keeping her camera focussed on her younger friend shovelling the sweet mush into his mouth. He got a few good mouthfuls in before he started slowing down. All he could taste was the dough, coating every inch of his mouth and sticking between his teeth. His jaw was already tired and he was already sick of how it tasted.
The only thing that kept him shovelling it in was his rumbling belly.

“Why am I doing this? I’m not like Mabel, my taste buds still work!” he thought to himself. He knew he was going to choke (figuratively or literally, the result was the same), and Wendy would laugh at him. Maybe he didn’t deserve her attention if he was going to make claims he couldn’t live up to…

That’s when a tall glass of milk slid across the table in front of him.
“Record doesn’t say you can’t wash it down!” Mabel grinned. Was she trying to humiliate him, or help him? It could be so hard to tell with her. Nevertheless, Dipper skulled the milk down, and felt like a maid had just given his mouth a once-over.
“Urp!” He was ready to keep going.

Every few spoonfuls, Mabel poured another glass for her brother, until finally he pushed the bowl away and began work on the next.
“Ha, nice work dude!” said Wendy, admiring his work. Mabel was impressed, too; she wasn’t actually expecting to have to mix another bowl, but he was well on his way to where she left off. But could she outdo her?

Two cartons of milk and two bowls later, it was looking like it.

While he diligently ate away, it was obvious Dipper was past his limit. He looked ready to fall over, and a good percentage of his face was covered in cookie dough. And of course, his orange shirt rode right up, the formerly flat belly refusing to let it fit. The fact that he was trying to force more in would have worried most people.
At least he wasn’t hungry any more.

“So how can we tell when he’s finished half?”
“I dunno…maybe we should have measured the bowls…Dip, try eating just one side!”
Wendy was starting to worry. While she was all for breaking the record, Dipper really wasn’t looking too well. He’d come this far, but it really wasn’t worth getting him hurt over.
“Hey, Dipper, if you want, you can call it quits, y’know. I mean, there’s a reason why it’s a record, it’s meant to be hard.”

Dipper thought about that…but he decided to ignore it. Downing one last glass of milk, he tossed away the spoon, dug his hands into the bowl and went in for the kill.

“Four and a half…five bowls! That’s five bowls! That’s a world record!” his sister cheered. “Dipper, you’re a world champion!”
“UuuuugghhhhUUUURP,” he replied, falling back into his chair. Waddling over Mabel pulled up her sweater and pressed her own cookie dough gut against his.
“Oh wow, you’re belly’s way bigger than mine! But I guess I shouldn’t be surprised, Eating Machine!” she laughed, playing along.
“P-please don’t touch it…like that…BRAHP!{{/b}/i}” He’d never eaten this much at once in his entire life. He felt less like a kid and more like a giant, living cookie at this point, and will all that dough at crumbs smeared on him, he looked a little like one too.

He looked down, unable to see his knees past the solid, gurgling monster hanging off his frame. It wasn’t comfortable…but it was worth it, every bit of it, because he managed to impress Wendy!

That’s what he thought, anyway, looking not unlike an overfed human pig that was exhausted out after a long day of rolling in the mud.
14533112.title: Dipper vs. cookie dough

145331122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)
Wendy might have been impressed, but that definitely wasn’t what was on her mind. “Dude, are you okay?”
“Just great…” Dipper groaned, holding his belly with both hands, “Think I could go for another five, actually…” he hiccupped, “S’okay, only hurt a little.”

The tall teen sighed, “Man, this is all my fault. I brought over the stupid record book in the first place. I’m sorry.”
“Sorry about what? I feel great!” he sounded like he was stuck in a washing machine. Unconvinced (and who could blame her?), Wendy kneeled down, and carried Dipper off the chair with both hands. His cheeks flushed bright red, but he couldn’t find the right words for this.

“Oh man, you weigh a tonne now…no offence,” she carried him off into the living room. “Mabel, could you grab some Tums, or Bepto Bismol, or, I dunno, whatever Mr. Pines has laying around.” The small girl saluted and ran off to find what she could.

Dipper found himself lying flat on the couch. His solid stomach barely even changed shape, still jutting high into the air.
“Better?” Wendy asked. He nodded, not wanting to accidentally burp in her pretty face. She cracked her knuckles and focussed her eyes on her friend’s bulging tummy. “Okay, so I’m going to try and relieve the pressure you built up in there...”
“Have you done this b-brahp-before?”
“Well…no,” she shrugged, before placing her hands on her his stomach and giving just a slight push.

How it felt actually took her by surprise; it was like kneading actual cookie dough! Dipper had really packed it in there good. She gently pressed a finger into the side, and the little groove stayed there for a moment.
Wendy wasn’t known for being delicate, what with her dad’s lumberjack genes, but maybe her rough hands were just what they needed.

“Ooooh…Urp…BRAAAARRRRRRRRRRHHP!” So much for not burping in her face. That felt so much better; it was like he’d just woken up from a deep sleep. “Oh, thank you…you’re a life saver, Wendy…”
“Don’t sweat it, you’d do the same for me,” she was completely right, too. “Just let me know if you need anything else!” she gave his stomach an affectionate smack, and he burped again, “Oh, sorry!” she blushed.

Just her attention like this was more than enough, but something else popped into Dipper’s head…something he really wasn’t sure he should say…at least not right now…
145331122.title: Nurse Wendy

choices: "You wanna take over? This is actually really fun!"
"Want to run down the store and grab some more milk?"
1453311221.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“This could be the stupidest thing I could possibly ask for right now, but…could I get another glass of milk?”
Wendy froze for a second – and then cackled with laughter. “Dude! Seriously?!”
“Have you ever eaten five bowls of cookie dough? I’m going to be tasting this for days.” Laughing again, his ‘nurse’ nodded and headed back to the kitchen. “Be right back!”

For a brief second, he was alone. That’s when Mabel snuck up from behind the couch.
“Bwah! Where’d-how-oh, who cares?”
“Well, I see someone’s got Wendy fawning all over his big, oversized self!” she smiled, unable to hold back her excited giggling. “How convenient.”
“What are you saying? Mabel, you didn’t plan this.”
Smiling, she rested an arm on her brother’s stomach. “Didn’t I?”
“No. There is no way you planned this,” he nudged her hands off it.
“Well, maybe not this exact outcome, but you know, a thank you would still be nice.” She zipped her lip as Wendy returned with a big glass of milk.

“Did you find anything for Dipper?”
“Still working out what Bepto Bismol is.” Rather than explain, Wendy decided not to worry about it. Dipper thanked her for the milk, and drank it much slower this time. She pressed the sides of his stomach, trying to help churn the contents inside. It felt nice, very relaxing, even. Maybe he did owe his sister some thanks, even if the circumstances were a little embarrassing, being so quiet and attentive with Wendy warmed his young heart. Her hands affectionately soothing his poor, aching tummy, filled up just to try and make her smile in the first place…

“Hey, doesn’t he look cute?” Mabel giggled.
“No,” Dipper thought.
“With his big ol’ belly, sipping on his milk!”
“Mabel stop!”
“Don’t you wanna just pinch his cheeks?”
“WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS TO ME SISTER!?”

Wendy smiled, “Yeah, pretty adorable, honestly.”
Dipper’s heart sank link a rock, but she wasn’t done speaking…
1453311221.title: Mabel's master plan

choices: She tries to say something, but bursts into laughter..
14533112212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

"Want to run down the store and grab some more milk?" Wendy took a few dollar notes out of her pocket.
“Really? Uh, that’s a pretty long walk from here…”
“I’ll give you a few bucks extra for glitter while you’re there,” and with that, Mabel was off.

Dipper nursed his empty glass as Wendy’s hands gently moulded his stomach. They could hear the milk sloshing around inside, between the gaps she pushed into the dough. It was very strange to hear so much going on inside of himself, and oddly, a little exciting. It was like having a little world in there.

“I appreciate it, but I think I’m officially done,” he showed her the empty glass of milk, “I feel like bursting would be kind of a relief.”
“Well, actually, I kinda figured you didn’t need any milk,” Wendy blushed, “I just didn’t wanna…share.”
“Share what, exactly?”
“You…your belly, I mean!” She seemed completely embarrassed. Dipper didn’t know what to say, or if he should say anything. “Have you really pressed your fingers into it?” she did so, leaving a very visible hand print for a moment before it faded. “It feels so weird! If Mabel figured that out she’d be playing you like a bongo drum.”
Dipper pictured it, then thanked her for preventing it. It was beginning to dawn on him how embarrassing this all really felt. He was lucky Wendy was such a sweet girl at her core, or this could have been truly humiliating.

“This is seriously neat,” the tall red head was making shapes in his gut now. It couldn’t have been as fun as she was treating it…could it? He was enjoying his side of the rub, sure, but he wasn’t so sure why she was enjoying hers so much.
“Sorry, I’m getting carried away.”
“You saved my butt twice just now, I think you earned it,” he smiled. “I hope this isn’t too weird for you, though…” Her smile was so sweet…he had to come clean. “Wendy…I…I only did this because I wanted to impress you…”
She took her hands off his belly.

“I know…” she sighed, “You do that sort of thing a lot…it can get pretty obvious…”
Dipper’s head sank into the arm of the couch, trying desperately not to make eye contact. She obviously got rid of Mabel so he wouldn’t embarrass himself like this. “I’m such an idiot…”
“No, you’re not.”
“Yes I am. Wendy, I am so sorry…Look, if you never want to talk about this again, I wouldn't blame you.”
Her hand slid behind his head and pulled him out from the couch, "Well, I think we should talk about it, actually. Thing is..."
14533112212.title: saving dippers belly

145331122121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“I think I kinda like you too…”
He politely waited for her to correct herself. But, as it became more and more apparent that she had said what she had meant to say, Dipper suddenly realized that he was completely unprepared for this situation.
He somehow managed to blush even redder, looking a lot like a juicy, plump tomato.
“Yeah, I totally just rocked your world view, didn’t I?” Wendy laughed, unsurprised by his reaction.

For a moment, they were both quiet. And then came a rather loud churning noise from inside Dipper’s very full stomach. Then, for almost a full minute, all they could hear was each other’s laughter.
While a much better feeling, Dipper tried to stop, feeling his insides rock around with each chuckle.
“Okay…since when?”
“Since…now,” she shrugged. “I mean, there’s a hundred reasons to like you, or to like anyone really. But sometimes there’s a tipping point, something that makes everything start lining up, and…well…” He felt her hand press gently into the compacting, sore mound resting on his abdomen.

Now, Dipper didn’t want to complain, but even he (appropriately enough) found this hard to swallow. “You can’t be serious. Wendy, I’m a balloon!”
She sat down next to him “Yeah, you’re totally adorable. It’s a nice little bonus to getting to know you better.”
He was starting to understand. They were friends, no question, but either they were goofing off, or he was trying a little too hard to impress her. The circumstances weren’t ideal, but they were actually getting up close and personal with each other for once.

“Wow…you know…I can’t say I was expecting to eat my own weight in raw cookie dough today…and I really wasn’t expecting it to be the best decision I’d ever made!”
“Hey, don’t get too ahead of yourself. We both like each other, but that doesn’t mean we’re dating just yet.” Dipper’s heart raced as he smiled
“Just yet, eh?” She smiled back.

Hesitating for just a moment, he put his arm around her…and she put her arm around him.
“BRAAAAAHHHP!” she patted him on the waist.
“Sorry, didn’t mean to press that hard!”
145331122121.title: Wendy

choices: Wendy and Dipper go somewhere after work.
Wendy and Dipper ditch work for their date,
1453311221211.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

An hour or two had passed, and Mabel now sat on her bed, halfway through the second volume of ‘Love, Success, and other Lies’ when the door slammed open, and in waddled her brother. He had a noticeable sway in his step, no doubt thanks to the massive weight he was carrying, but it didn’t seem to bother him. In fact, she hadn’t seen him smiling so hard in quite a while.

There was a thud when he hit his bed, and then only the numerous sounds made by his body trying its best to process the mess of food stuck inside.
“Did you get the milk?” Mabel dropped down a carton on their bedside table. Dipper cracked it open and began drinking it down, each gulp sloshing down noisily into his already huge girth.
“Ha, Stan’s gonna kill you when he finds out where all the milk went.”
“Then I die a happy man…BrurrrRRRRRRP!” a wet belch rumbled from his milky lips. “Four words: Me, Wendy, Date, Tomorrow.”

His belly shook as Mabel gave it a rough, but affectionate shove. “Oh! My! Gosh! Did she kiss you!?”
“Uh, well no, not yet.”
She grunted, disappointed. “Oh come on, I let you steal my world record, mix you three bowls of cookie mix, run across town to let you two have a minute alone, and you don’t even kiss her!?”
Dipper owed Mabel a big thank you, but in his current condition, he wasn’t really in the mood to listen to her rant about her romantic delusions. Instead, he just hugged his round figure and thought back to that glorious little moment with Wendy.

“See you tomorrow, big guy,” she had laughed, giving him one last hug before she headed home, his bare tummy squishing against her chest. They both laughed, and took their time letting go.
Being stuffed so full wasn’t comfortable for Dipper at all, but he now found his hands gripping it excitedly even as he sat motionless at the front of the store, watching her leave. After all, without this big ol’ belly, he’d just be sitting in bed wishing he’d said something to her.
He’d have eaten nonstop his entire life if this had been the end result.

In the present, Dipper had dozed off, and with a smile, Mabel threw his blanket over him. He had a big day ahead of him tomorrow, and she couldn’t have been happier for him.
Though getting to sleep was hard, with the sounds of bubbling and churning echoing across from his side of the room.
1453311221211.title: Dipper got a date

choices: It was a rather surprised Antonio
1453312.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Mabel adored boys. She couldn’t help it, she was at that stage of her life. Older, younger, tall, short, she wasn’t fussy. If she could date them, they were perfect; good looks and personality were more of a bonus. Fortunately Antonio was both quite a cutie, and he seemed like a pretty nice guy; more importantly, he seemed to like her back.

And admittedly, that was a little stressful. Mabel was very unlucky in love so far, so the fact that things were looking up was mighty suspicious. So long as Antonio wasn’t crazy or some kind of disguised monster, he’d be the best date she’d had all summer. But it seemed so likely at this point...

She sat, waiting for him at Lazy Susan’s diner. He was running late. To take her mind off things, she ordered a donut and some hot chocolate. A donut turned into donuts, and a hot chocolate turned to fifty dollars in omelettes, cookies and pancakes. And then she realized she was an hour early.

Leaning up against the window, she kept a close eye out for his messy blonde hair and white jacket. Or at least, she was hoping he was wearing the white jacket. That’s what he was wearing yesterday, and all of her kissing fantasies had him wearing it. If he wore anything else, it would ruin everything!
“…maybe I’m overthinking this,” Mabel thought, sipping down a banana smoothie. “BRAAAAAAAHP!”

“Little lady, are you alright?” asked Lazy Susan herself, removing the stack of plates from in front of her young customer, and replacing them with a fresh stack of syrupy waffles. “There’s an awful lot of food here for such a little lady. Meaning you, little lady.”
“Keep it coming!” she munched away, “I’m gonna need all the energy I can get if I’m gonna pull this date off! Just put it all on my Grunke’s tab.”
“He doesn’t have one little lady.”
“Well can you start him one? I’m only twelve, I can’t pay for all this!” she giggled. Susan nodded, perfectly fine with the idea.

Her sweater was growing snug. Mabel could feel her stomach pushing out more and more, but didn’t worry, just telling herself again and again that she’d need the energy. She loved a snack at the best of times, but she’d never felt quite this nervous before.

After a good few more minutes of munching, the clock hit 12:00, and the bell rang as a new customer entered.
“This is it, Mabel!” she gasped, pulling her face out of a bowl of ice cream. She began quickly practicing her ‘cute, confident’ look, apparently forgetting that her face was covered in food, and her stomach was spilling over her skirt. She did take a napkin to her lips, but it failed to undo the damage her snacking had done.
“Hey there cutie, are you ready to meet the girl of your dreams?” she fluttered her eyes as the new customer arrived at her table, discovering her in all her gluttonous glory…
1453312.title: Stress eating

choices: Mabel's feeling better. No, she's feeling great!
Mabel's still feeling down about her huge belly. Thanks for trying, Dipper
14533122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“I certainly hope that question isn’t directed at me,” replied her brother, taking in his sister’s new look.
“Dipper! What are you doing here?!”
“Well I was looking for my sister twin sister Mabel, but it looks like you ate her.”
Mabel grumbled, in too much of a food daze to deal with this. “Dipper, you need to go, right now! My-BURRP-date could be here any minute. It is going to be romantic, and I’m gonna be so irre-URAAP-irresistible he’s probably going to propose or something. Point is, you can’t be here!”
“Hold on, you’re here for a date?” he looked at the mess strewn across the table, spreading across to his sister’s face and clothing. “Oh gosh, I was just joking around, but…”
“But what? Don’t worry, you’re invited to the wedding, don't be silly!”
Dipper sifted through his backpack and took out a small mirror and held it up. Mabel gasped, seeing herself, post-snacking.

“What have I done to myself?” she panicked, slapping the sides of her face, just to get them covered in syrup. “This is awful! No boy is going to find this irresistible! Oh Dipper, I’m gonna be single forever-hey!” She fell off the chair as her brother yanked on her arm, pulling her along.
“I’m not gonna let that happen, come on!”

Dipper dragged her into the Men’s bathroom. A burly, tattooed biker turned from the mirror to see them – and immediately ran out screaming, “EEEK! A GIRL!”
Wetting some paper towels, Dipper began wiping the smudged food and slobber off his sister’s face. It took some doing, but the cute face he’d grown up along-side shined through before long. Then, he grabbed the sleeves of her sweater, and carefully pulled it off, revealing her untouched, sparkling white ‘Ducktective’ shirt.

“There, good as new!” he smiled, flicking one last crumb out of her hair.
“UUUURP! Thanks Dip, I owe you-BRAP-big time…” Mabel sighed. In her best moods, she fancied herself a romance expert, but in action, well, things like this tended to happen. She admired herself in the mirror, gradually smiling until her eyes hit below her chest.

“Too bad about my tummy, though…”
