“Afraid I can’t do anything about that, but hey, uh, guys like girls in belly shirts, right? Right now you’ve cornered that market. The belly part anyway!” He laughed, but Mabel didn’t. “Come on, you look great! It uh, it suits you! Seriously. And if this guy can’t see the awesome girl under that little extra weight, then that’s his problem!”
That ‘little extra weight’ left her normally flat stomach larger than her head, but he was trying to be optimistic. Honestly, he didn’t think she looked that bad at all, but then, he’d seen her in a few much more embarrassing states in their twelve years as siblings.
14533122.title: Dipper's dating advice

choices: Antonio warms up to Confident Food Filled Mabel
Antonio is not a fan of Confident Food Filled Mabel.
145331221.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Mabel took a second look in the mirror, carefully studying that exposed tummy of hers. After a moment, a grin began creeping between her rosy cheeks.
“Y’know? Yeah! I guess I am pretty awesome when it comes right down to it, aren’t I?” She posed, pushing her stomach out as far as it would go. It made noises she wasn’t used to hearing from her own body, and she had to laugh. “What boy could resist aaaaall this?”
“None that are worth your time!” Dipper received a hug for his trouble, being pressed against her sloshing midriff. It was like someone threw a bean bag at him.
“After the wedding, I’ll aim the bouquet at Wendy just for you!” Mabel giggled in thanks, shoving the open and storming out to greet what challenge this date would provide her and her expanded figure.
"Go get him!" her brother cheered.

And there he sat, just a table down from where she had been. Antonio, scouring the menu. Wearing that beautiful, white kissing jacket.
And to think, she was this close to breaking down and running off!
“Antonio!” she announced, excitement dancing each syllable of his name. “What a surprise seeing you here today at the time and place we arranged to meet each other!”
“Ha, you kidding? I would have missed this for the wor-“ he looked up from the menu, smiling until he laid eyes on his date. It was safe to say he’d noticed her belly.

“BrURRP!” replied Mabel, smiling sweetly and looking dreamily into his eyes.
Taking a deep breath, he smiled as best as he could. “You uh…say, is there something different about you?”
“Oh, definitely! That’s how I do things, no two days are the same! Today, Ducktective shirt, tomorrow, who even knows? Spontaneous, am I right?”

Sitting down in front of him, she took her date’s abandoned menu and began to flip through it. “So, got your eye on anything?”
“N-not sure,” he mumbled, calming down just a bit now that the table hid her middle. “What would you recommend?”
“Ha, everything!”
145331221.title: Mabel's back baby

choices: You're like a dozen jerks rolled into one. We're through!"
"I'm sorry I'm acting so weird. Want to kiss and make up?"
1453312212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“So, you’re going to be skinny again tomorrow, aren’t you?”
“Huh?”
“Well, you were…skinnier yesterday, and now you’re…well, not ‘fat’ exactly. What happened to you?”
Mabel looked down, unable to see her legs past her belly. “Funny thing, it’s kind of your fault, actually. If you hadn’t been so stupidly handsome, I wouldn’t have gotten nervous and eaten so much!” Her date blushed, and they both had a good chuckle over it.

“So you’re just really full? Cool. It’s weird seeing something so big and gross on such a ridiculously cute girl.” Mabel tilted her head, but he gently took her hand, and her heart began to flutter. “In fact, how would you like to go on a hike down by the lake tomorrow, just the two of us?”
“That sounds so romantic, Antonio…”
“And like good exercise, right?”

It had been done. Mabel now had herself a cute, loving boyfriend who she could drown in smooches. Her heart was pounding with excitement…so why didn’t she feel excited?
“Just curious…if this was permanent, you’d still wanna go out tomorrow, right?”
“Definitely!” he smiled sweetly, “I’ve been meaning to lose a little weight too, so we can help each other!”
“I meant if I wasn’t planning to lose weight.” He seemed a little stunned by the correction. “After all, my face wouldn’t be any less cute if it were just a little rounder, would it?”
“I…I guess not…”
“And so what if my shirt doesn’t fit anymore? You guys love girls in belly shirts right? You could say I’ve cornered that market!” She laughed, he didn’t. Now she knew how Dipper felt. “Look, if I ate like this every day and got fat, would you still want to go out with me?”

Put on the spot, Antonio fumbled with his words for a moment before finally coming clean, “N-no…but, you’re not going to…right?”

She thought back to what Dipper said. Antonio seemed like mostly a nice guy, but ‘nice’ was hardly the word that came to mind if he’d dump her over something like that. Dipper said she looked great, and frankly she had to agree! If this guy couldn’t handle that, then he really wasn’t worth her time.

“Well, y’know, I think I look pretty good!” She held out her arms, “Look at me, I’m a walking hug!”
Antonio just sort of stared, and laughed, waiting for a punchline that wasn’t coming. Mabel was starting to get angry. Her stomach began to growl, suggesting she grab a bite to eat instead of flipping out.
“Look, Mabel I’m sorry, but I just don’t like fat girls…”
“Come on, looks aren’t everything!”
“Of course you can say that, you already have good looks. But if you keep eating like this you won’t!”
She’d officially gone from ‘getting angry’ to ‘enormously ticked off.’ Her stomach rumbled.

“Hey handsome, listen here and listen good!”
1453312212.title: Yet another failed summer romance

choices: Call up her friends Candy and Grenda
14533122122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“I’m sorry I’m acting so weird… Want to kiss and make up?”
Antonio smiled, his cheeks blushing bright. “Kiss? Do you mean that…literally?”
“Well I don’t mean it artistically” Mabel winked.

The two held hands as they left the café, and snuck around to the side, both giggling excitedly. She tried guiding his hand onto her stomach, but he kept moving it back to her hand. They hurried behind the building, away from any interruptions.

Mabel’s plan was simple, pull him close, pucker up, and bowl him to the ground with that food baby of hers, and top it off with a handy lecture about body acceptance. She snickered and giggled about it, all the while her date just thought she was excited to lock lips with him.

There they stood, alone and together, both excited for their own reasons.
“Look Mabel, about before…I understand, okay?”
“You do?”
“Yeah, but look, it’s just one big lunch, you aren’t going to wake up fat tomorrow!”
“Oh, yeah, I feel so much better…shut up and kiss me.”
She closed her eyes, he closed his and leaned in. Mabel stepped back for her run up…and felt her stomach growl at her again.

It was another hungry, angry growl from deep inside. “Show that jerk! Eat something! Eat a lot of something! Eat ALL of something!” it called out to her. She groaned in discomfort, but Antonio was leaning in ever more, waiting for that kiss.
Charging towards him, she could hear the back door starting to rattle open. Headfirst into his chest, Mabel tackled her dopey date to the ground as Lazy Susan swung the door open.
“Wait, this isn’t the Ladies Room. Silly me,” she slammed it shut and disappeared.

“Whoa, Mabel, slow down!” Antonio gasped, “I think I fell on a rock, and you’re really heavy with that…that gut…Mabel...babe?”
Pinning him to the ground, Mabel felt strange. All she had to do was stand up and give him a few choice words about body shaming, but good golly she was still hungry. And no matter what he’d said he was still so cute! She really did want that kiss after all…

It was very strange from his perspective. His new girlfriend was just squatting in front of him, keeping her hands pressed down on his chest, staring anxiously into space. He was starting to get worried about her…

And then she opened her mouth and began stuffing his head into it.

“Wha-hey, what are you doing there, cutie?” he asked, before her lips overtook his eyes. Then he knew something was up…

There was a scream, followed by a lot of slurping, another quick scream, and then a lot of muffled noise. Even just out of sight, it was hard to ignore. “Darned raccoons. Have your anniversary dinner somewhere else!” Susan yelled, banging on the back door.

The ordeal took a lot out of Mabel, and finally, only she remained, with her date, and her own legs, nowhere to be seen, though both were actually quite close by.
For a moment, she just laid there on the ground, admiring the beautiful, clear sky and the relaxing gurgling noise she was suddenly unable to not hear.

But finally, she took a look at herself. Her belly may have already been big, but the shaking and squirming were certainly new. And that occasionally noise that sounded like someone begging for help? That definitely wasn’t there earlier.

“UuUuuRP! MmmMmm…I think I just did something terrible,” she said in a happy, dizzy tone.
14533122122.title: Kiss and make up fake up

choices: "Okay, I think I might have an idea!"
"What's the hurry to get him out, anyway?"
145331221221.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Not far in the woodlands, a camera sat, rolling as Dipper prepared his trap, giving the lowdown on what he was up to.
“If the rumours are to be believed, and in this town they most certainly should be, something has been some mysterious force has taken refuge along this hiking trail. Tourists and locals alike have reported hearing voices, from quiet whispers, to howling shrieks, while passing through. Today, I intend to-“
“DIPPER!”
He tensed up, frozen in shock, “It…it knows my name…”
“DIPPER HELP!”

Through the trees came Mabel’s familiar face, barrelling towards her brother. Normally a petite, energetic young lady, she currently reminded Dipper more of a stampeding elephant.. Being Mabel, she wasn’t quite satisfied with getting his attention, and in her hurry, she and her belly collided with him like a wrecking ball, ending with them both flopped onto the ground.
“Hi,” he groaned, crushed under her surprising weight. “I see you took our little pep talk to heart.”
“Maybe a little too much…I uh…I can’t pull myself up…”

Dipper gave a hard shove, and his sister rolled onto the grass. If screaming for help hadn’t clued him in, the simple fact that she wasn’t smiling definitely meant something was up.
“So…well, just say I…may have possible…swallowed Antonio whole, in a single bite, and now he’s trapped inside of my body…”
Dipper stared at her, his eyes widened in complete shock.
“I mean, hypothetically, if that did happen, what sort of advice would you have?”

He leaned in, getting a good look at her stomach. Settling in place, he could clearly see the shape of a curled up young boy under her skin, resting inside of her. Cautiously, he put his ear to the bulge…and heard sobbing.
“I don’t know what’s scarier…that you ate someone…or that I’m really not that surprised.”
“Dipper! This is serious!”
“No, not about you, I mean, in general. I mean, this is hardly the weirdest thing that’s happened to us.”
“Well it’s the weirdest thing that’s happened to me!” she cried out. She began to recount what happened, from seeing Antonio’s true colours, to finally eating him. It did all sound shockingly straight forward for their usual mishaps…
“I just wanted to teach him for being a shallow jerk, I didn’t mean to eat the guy!”
“I guess you could say you got fed up with your date!”
“DIP-p-pahha! Okay, that’s a little funny.” Antonio kicked, the shape of his feet sticking up through her belly. “Ooof! We have to get him out!”

Dipper nodded, and took out some measuring tape from his backpack. All was quiet for a moment as he checked the size and width of his sister’s stomach. He placed his ear over her belly button and listened carefully (“LET ME OUT LET ME OUT LET ME OUT”).
Flipping through a few pages of his trusty journal, he scribbled down some notes, and gave her one last, curious look.
“Hmmm…”
145331221221.title: Finding Dipper

choices: Get Mabel back to the Mystery Shack
1453312212212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“What’s the hurry to get him out of there, anyway? He sounds like a total jerk.”
“What?” Mabel couldn’t believe what she was hearing. “Dipper, how can you say that!?”
“You’ve been trying to get a date all summer, and it always ends up like this!” She burped “Okay, not like this, but some jerk always yanks it out from under your feet! First Norman, then Gideon, and now Antonio. You deserve better than this! Can’t say I condone eating people, but that’s karma for you.”

He could be so sweet when he wanted to be. Blushing, Mabel sat up and held her Antonio-sized girth in her lap. Finally taking a moment to relax, she finally began to realize just how satisfying it was to have so much in there. To have her waist balloon out far enough to hold another person. It was satisfying, like eating a dozen home cooked meals all at once. She felt heavy and immobile, but she didn’t feel like moving much anyway.
And thinking back…the taste…The taste had been amazing; that was part of why she finished eating him, actually. She just remembering her taste buds scraping his skin and knowing she had to eat that little bit more. Coupled with everything, it was no wonder she didn’t stop herself.
Their Grunkle Stan was right; those cannibals really were onto something!

“Yeah…yeah! Maybe if you can’t handle a little extra pudge, you can try being a little extra pudge instead!” she laughed, smooshing the lump in her tummy that was very likely Antonio’s head. “I’m glad I’m not the only one sick of it!”
“What can I say? I hate seeing you upset,” Dipper shrugged, nudging her belly affectionately. Sitting down next to her, he opened up his journal and began flipping through the pages.

Mabel was serious. She was emotional and impulsive, dead tired of failed dates, and still angry over what he’d said about her weight. For the moment, keeping Antonio in there seemed perfectly reasonable to her.

Dipper, on the other hand, wasn’t being quite so harsh. He did want to teach the boy a lesson for upsetting his sister, but he didn’t believe for one second that she could actually digest him. Getting him in there was one thing, but the human stomach just wasn’t built for that. They’d have days and days to work out a way to get him out of there before her belly even got through his clothes.

But of course, Dipper couldn’t be right about everything.
1453312212212.title: That's harsh, Dip

choices: Both take a well deserved nap
Dipper asks if he can feel her belly.
14533122122121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Regardless of how either of them actually felt about it, they quickly decided that a popular hiking trail was not a great place for Mabel to be laying around with another person very obviously stuck inside of herself. It was a long walk to the Mystery Shack from here, but at least through the woodland they had some privacy.
Though the walk seemed much longer for Mabel than her brother.

“I think I’ve got a cramp…can we slow down?”
“Mabel, the fact that you can stand at all is still blowing my mind.”

They were lucky, from the looks of things, Stan was in the middle of giving one of his Mystery Tours, meaning his focus would be on scamming tourists, and not on them. They snuck by parked cars, and dropped behind a large ‘No Refunds’ sign as Stan and the tour group briefly passed by.
Mabel needed a push up the little steps, clasping her huge belly with both hands.
“Just roll me the rest of the way…” she groaned, her cramps gnawing at her in full force.

So he did.

“I WAS KIDDING!” she screamed as the world spun around her, rocketing across the gift shop floor. Dipper just laughed, making much better time this way.
“If it works, it works!”

Finally, she hit the wall, Antonio taking the brunt of it. “BRAAAAHP! Hah, having this ol’ thing is full of little bonuses! I’m starting to see why Santa’s so jolly all the time.”
Getting her upstairs wasn’t easy. Each step took it out of her, and Dipper couldn’t do much to push her up or pull her along, but he kept on trying. By the time they reached the top, they had to crawl on their knees towards their room, though Dipper clearly had the lead.
“G-get back here and roll me again…” she huffed. “What is this agony they call cramps!?”
“Calm down, we’re here,” Dipper got to his feet and pulled her along.

Just falling onto her bed had never felt so good. She sank deep into her mattress, and sighed happily, finally feeling content and safe. Sure, she had an enormous weight on top of her, but even that felt good. She liked feeling like this.
All those little snack attacks throughout her little life, how close had she been to feeling this way? Maybe her date had been good for something after all…

Dipper sat down on his bed with far less fanfare. “How are you feeling?”
“Words cannot describe…” she sighed.
“…is that good or bad?”
“Definitely good!”
“After everything it took getting you up here, I’d hope so!” He watched as she wiggled her stomach back and forth. Through he giggling, he could hear Antonio moaning uncomfortably as she tossed him around. He sounded tired and defeated in there. If he hadn’t learned his lesson my now, he never would.

Dipper glanced at the journal, sitting in his backpack. The book held the answer to many of the town’s abundant secrets, from catalogued monsters, to secret tunnel networks. Surely it had to say something about how to cough up an entire person…

But he didn’t quite know where to start. This boy filled Mabel was extremely heavy, and pushing her up the stairs was no mean feat. That, and his body still ached from when she accidentally body slammed him earlier. Frankly, he needed a break if he was going to help fix this.
He kicked back and dug his head into his pillow.
“You know what’s really funny.”
“No, what?”
“You forgot to bring back your camera.”
“…darn it.”
14533122122121.title: Feeling cramped

choices: Check the Journal, this is getting too weird
They can't help it. They kiss (Pinecest)
145331221221212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

In just one afternoon, Mabel has become very difficult to ignore. He may have been effectively cramped up into a ball, but Antonio was still another person, and now he was trapped like so many sandwiches. She threw her blanket over herself and laid on her side, but it just looked like she was trying to hide someone under the cover.
Eating people definitely wasn’t an easy thing to hide.

Though, she wasn’t quite so concerned with such things. That responsibility went to Diipper, whose eyes seemed glued to his sister’s enormous belly. Too tired to figure out the problem, but too intrigued to get some rest. Even in Gravity Falls, this wasn’t something you saw every day.

“Hey, totally weird question, but…can I feel it?”
His sister looked over, clearly surprised, but smiling.
“If that’s too weird, that’s-“ The floor shook, and the swollen figure stumbled over to him, presenting him with the boy filled belly bag. Dipper decided not to question it, and just places his hand onto its side.
It was weird…her skin felt smooth and soft, but he could clearly feel the hard surface underneath. He could it squirming around, trying to get comfortable. He grasped the other side of it with his other hand gave it a little wobble, seeing Antonio’s shape stay in place while her tummy shook around his shape.
“BraahhURRP! Careful, that’s all me there!” Mabel giggled.
“S-sorry!” he had almost forgotten this thing was his sister. It was almost surreal knowing what she’d done… “What’s it feel like?”
“Like Thanksgiving, Christmas dinner, and our birthday last year rolled into one.
“So you think you might explode, but it’s too good to care?”
“Yeah, exactly! Hahaha!”

Her laughter rippled across her figure. Dipper felt it on his hands; he couldn’t let go, he just wanted to study this thing all day…
145331221221212.title: Hands of experience

1453312212212122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Then, things sort of escalated.
Dipper just had his hands squeezing into his sisters’ enormous gut, causing Mabel to giggle and belch at his touch…
It was hard to pinpoint when this changed into them kissing each other on the lips.

For Mabel, there was nothing to it. Just on instinct, she pulled him close and began pressing her lips against his; she’d been so dead set on smooching this summer, it felt like second nature.
Dipper on the other hand had a massive, jiggling, kicking belly standing in his way. He didn’t care, propping himself over it to reach her, and anchoring his palms to the sides of her tummy.

The two finally pulled apart, gasping for breath and gazing lovingly into each other’s’ eyes.
For about half a minute before they remembered what was happening.
“BWAAAAAAH!”
“AAAAAIIIIGHH!”
Mabel lost her balance, and her weight was crushing down on him within moments. Dipper was getting a little tired of this happening.
Basically having two people sitting on him, Dipper wasn’t going anywhere, and Mabel had clammed up, leaving them both stuck in place, eye-to-eye, hoping the other would say something. Finally taking a deep breath, Dipper managed something.

“W-why’d you kiss me!?”
“Why did you kiss me!?”
“No, don’t do that, you started this! You kissed me!”
“Well yeah, but why did you kiss back? When your sister kisses you, you should be all ‘Eww, gross, what are you doing?”
“Then why would you do it to begin with!?”
“I don’t know, when I get close to cute boys, my first instinct is to try and kiss them! If I hadn’t, you were about to anyway, I saw you puckering up!”
There was a brief silence before Dipper finally replied. “You…think I’m cute?” Perhaps she was just being narcissistic; they were twins after all.

Her long, brown hair drooping down the sides of her face, Mabel was all her brother could see, right now, her shocked, awkward expression was his entire world.
He smiled. She smiled back.
“A little bit… Dipper, boys keep slipping through my fingers, or pushing me down. But you’re always there…”
“Well, yeah, of course I am. You’re my s-sis…you’re wonderful. Mabel, it’s really-” Almost typically at this point, a guttural, bubbling noise came from the depths of the girl’s tummy. But it was getting hard to read at this point.
Was she nervous? Or just hungry?
1453312212212122.title: Kiss your sister

14533122122121221.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Dipper saw Mabel’s braces sparkle a bit as she grinned.
“Oh, what the heck? Come here!”
Their eyes closed and their lips met. It was a huge relief; Dipper didn’t want to admit it, but he’d been desperate to do that again since they hit the floor.
This hadn’t been Mabel’s first kiss, but this definitely blew it out of the water (appropriately enough). That had been meaningful, but quick and almost desperate. This was plenty meaningful, but now she had time to enjoy it. To squeeze her hand and hold him close. To rub her fingers against his cheek. To burp rather loudly in his face.

“Eugh, Mabel, that’s gross!” They both laughed, and she sat up at last. He’d briefly forgotten how hard it was to breath with that massive weight pressing down on him. That suited him just fine, he needed as much air in him as he could get right now.

Sitting on her bed, Mabel cradled her stomach affectionately, not taking her eyes off Dipper. “You know what’d be just the worst right now?” Mabel asked, staring dreamily at her brother, whose hands were already pressed up her belly. “If Grunkle Stan or Soos’ walked in right now…”
They both looked at the door, mortified. It stayed shut and didn’t so much as creak in the wind.
“That must be a sign!” Dipper gasped, letting two hands grab his shoulders and pull him in close for another wet smooch. Unlike his sister, this was in fact his first kiss, and it was well and truly blowing his mind.
Wendy who?

They went a good while without saying anything, making much better use of their lips. There was something a little odd about the way Dipper’s hands kept finding themselves on Mabel’s belly, but she didn’t complain, and even held them there, pressing down and forcing out another burp.
However long they kept it up, it wasn’t nearly long enough for them. Eventually, they heard Stan’s voice calling out, telling it was time for dinner.
“Dinner?!” Mabel gasped, letting go of her brother and letting him flop onto the floor. “Already but it’s only…” Dipper checked his watch, finding that it was seven thirty. They both sniggered cheekily.

Feeling very gentlemanly, Dipper took her hand and guided her to the door. That belly of hers was clearly giving her some trouble, so he held onto it as she walked…and they suddenly remembered why they were hiding up there to begin with.

“Don’t worry, got it covered!” Mabel threw on a cardboard box around her waist and began beeping and swinging her arms. “Nobody suspects Hungrybot 15!” They both grinned, knowing Stan probably wouldn’t ask about it at this point.
Both were heading down when Dipper stopped her on the staircase, grabbing her hand and blushing brightly. It took him a moment to speak; he never had been good around cute girls.

“Mabel I uh…what happened up there…we’re not…I mean was that…that a one-time thing?”
Mabel sighed, she’d been waiting for this. “I know, I know. That got pretty out of control pretty quickly. I mean, what was that about? If you want, once I sleep this tummy off, we can just pretend it like it never happened.”
“That…wasn’t quite what I had in mind…” Cautiously, he held out his hand. “I mean, just because it was weird, and gross and…weird…doesn’t mean it was...bad, right?”
His sister glared, and then pecked him on the cheek. “You rebel! Come on, I’m starving!” She took his hand, and waddled eagerly down the stairs with him by her side.

Neither of them seemed to remember just what was filling up her belly this whole time.
14533122122121221.title: Forbidden smooches

choices: Something's snuck into the house and taken him.
Dipper is making Mabel something to eat.
145331221221212212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Dinner was eaten, and no questions were asked. Actually, that wasn’t quite true. He seemed surprised at how quickly Mabel wolfed down her meal, and how she asked for seconds and thirds.
“I’m not starving you two am I? Three meals, that’s enough right? Uh, look, that’s five bucks each and some dessert if you don’t tell your parents...”
Dessert here meant some cold pie with ketchup, but Mabel gobbled it up anyway. Needless to say, she slept very well that night, but not before another breathy kiss from Dipper. Or two. Really, the only reason they went to bed was the promise of more kisses and cuddling in the morning.

But the next day was sadly, not off to a great start.

As soon as her eyes wiggled open, Mabel glanced over to Dipper’s bed, and found it was empty. It was only 6:30, shocking enough. She waited patiently for the clock to tick over to 7:00, but he never reappeared, much to her dismay. She’d been hoping they could cuddle up together.
“Where could he have-“ Suddenly very worried, she quickly clutched her round stomach in horror. It was still big and hard at work churning what she’d eaten the day before, but was now far too small to hold her brother, thankfully.

That still didn’t tell her where he was, though. Her eyes were still heavy and her brain wasn’t at 100% just yet, but after what they shared last night, Mabel felt very determined to spend a romantic morning snuggling with her new boyfriend.
He was her boyfriend now, right? It felt that way, but they never actually said it. Was she coming on too strong again? He seemed so happy; she didn’t actually scare off her own brother, did she?
Nervous, she held her face, and suddenly noticed it felt a little softer than usual. She felt around her waist and noticed she felt a little rounder all over, not just in her belly. Of course, she’d eaten like some whale-pig-hippo hybrid, it only made sense that she’d gain a few pounds. If everything Dipper had told her was true, he wouldn’t mind…assuming she could find him.

Quite unable to rest, the chubby young girl slipped off the bed and into her bunny slippers, making her way downstairs in search of her lost brother lover.
145331221221212212.title: Oh brother, where art you?

choices: The two get a sudden and rude awakening.
Dipper finally remembers Mabel freakin' ate someone.
1453312212212122122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

While she was ready to trek across town before the sun even showed itself to find him, it didn’t take her very long at all. He came marching up the stairs with a tub of ice cream in his hands.
“O-oh, Mabel…hi…this um, you weren’t meant to see this yet…” he blushed.

Pressing her hands to her chubbier than ever cheeks, Mabel gasped with excitement. “Dipper, did you…trek across town before the sun even showed itself to get me a romantic morning snack?”
Blushing redder and redder, he nodded, “I kinda had to. You finished all the pie.”
Her little fingers wrapped around the tub, but her eyes were firmly on him. “Hey Dipper. I’m your giiiiiiiiiiiirlfriend,” she giggled. Oh, it was so weird hearing it out loud. “And you’re my boooooooooyfrieeeeend!” she pecked him on the cheek.

Momenta later, they sitting together at the front steps of the Mystery Shack. Mabel hungrily gobbled up big spoonfuls of ice cream, splattering it across her pyjama top. Dipper tried not to stare too much at her slowly growing belly, but couldn’t keep his eyes off it. All he heard was he burping and slurping as she gobbled away, so he tried breaking the silence.
“So, you’re looking much skinnier this morning.” That got her attention, but her expression wasn’t quite pleased, “I mean, you look really good is what I-not because you’re skinny, you looked great when you were fat yesterday-I mean, you weren’t fat fat, but…yeesh, now I’m starting to see why I never got anywhere with Wendy.”

Chuckling a little to herself, Mabel pulled up her shirt a little and Dipper’s eyes immediately glued themselves to her gut. “Don’t act like I haven’t got you figured out! My quaint little tummy is the whole reason we’re in this mess. Or rather, that little pep talk you gave me. If you didn’t love it, I might have to eat you too!” Dipper blushed just a bit harder. “Well guess what Dippy, hope you’re ready for some high intensity snuggling, because this belly ain’t getting any smaller!”

He had no idea why, but that made him feel really excited. He waited for her to finish her mouthful and pecked her lips, tasting strawberries.
They nestled against each other, and just as she ate her last spoonful, she yawned and dozed off, Dipper soon following.
1453312212212122122.title: Tub o' love

choices: Mabel listens and let's her go
14533122122121221221.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

It felt so peaceful, sitting there in a daze, both listening to the quiet gurgles of Mabel’s plump belly. Oh, they wished the sun would never finish rising so they could stay like this…
Unfortunately, they were no longer alone.
“Oh grief! I knew you people had issues, but I didn’t need to see that!”
There was only one person in Gravity Falls who spoke in that superior, smarmy valley girl voice. Both twins stirred awake and quickly recognised Pacifica Northwest, the richest girl in town, and Mabel’s own personal arch-enemy. While never happy to see her, it did make them curious.

“What are you doing here? And so early?” Dipper asked.
“HOW MUCH DID YOU SEE!?” Mabel blurted.
The girl snickered, crossing her purple sleeved arms, “Not much, but enough. Enough to make the rest of your summer very difficult! But that’s fine, right? Doesn’t this place specialize in freaks of nature?”
Dipper stood up, balling his fist. “You can’t talk to my girlf-my sister like that!” Angry as she was, Mabel’s eyes sparkled a bit as he defended her. He’d earned another squishy cuddle.
“Don’t want everyone to know about your sister snuggling? Good, then listen up.”

Pacifica explained about a little situation at her home at Northwest Manor. Her father had bought an expensive vase from overseas, but when it arrived, something else was in the crate. Something that had smacked around their butler, and was still loose in the house. As the local conspiracy nut, she had decided Dipper would be the one to deal with it.
“And trust me, if I tell the story, there’s going to be biting, dribbling and tongues.” Pacifica swore she heard Mabel giggle. Was she too stupid to understand what blackmail was?

What a rotten start to their relationship. If he said no, half the town would know by the end of the day. He and Mabel would never hear the end of it…
“Well of course Dipper’s going to help you! He’s just a helpful guy!” said Mabel, strutting up towards the girl and wiping the ice cream off her lips, “But first, there’s a few contractual details we need to iron out?”
Pacifica glared in confusion. “Contractual what? I…did you get fat?”
“I prefer the term ‘bellytastic,’ but to each their own.”

Dipper watched as his sister walked off with one of the people she hated the most, speaking like a business woman. It was a pretty typical Mabel thing to do, she just threw together a lot of vaguely business related words for most of it…and then he saw her rub her pot belly.
“Wait, Mabel, no!”
14533122122121221221.title: Pacifica's proposal

choices: A nice little spot in the woods.
145331221221212212211.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

He was too late, and Mabel stuffed Pacifica’s head into her mouth.
“OOOH MY GOOOOD, WHAT ARE YOU DOING!?” she screamed, losing none of her accent.
Dipper stood by, watching his sister eat Pacifica alive and whole. He ran up to try and stop her, but froze just inches away from them. Did she really deserve his help? After all, she was threatening to completely humiliate them if he didn’t help her out, right? And it wasn’t like she’d ever been nice to them to begin with.
He’d never seen her do anything quite worth getting eaten over, but then he also never saw her do anything worth him stopping it.

“Uh, Mabel…stop. No. Don’t do it,” he said without effort.

Antonio was taller than Pacifica, but he’d been set up for it; now Mabel was in for a fight! She had to hold on tight and keep pushing her in, opening her mouth wider. Honestly, she didn’t remember it being this hard last time…
Pacifica broke free, her thick eyeshadow smudged with saliva and her hair gluggy and wet. She turned to run, but was tackled to the floor. Mabel was putting her extra weight to good use.
“Come on, you’ve been in my mouth already. You don’t spit up food just cos’ someone else was eating it first or anything, do you?”
Pacifica tried kicking her away, but Mabel caught her foot and stuffed it in her mouth, shoe and all. The downside to being eaten foot first was that it let Pacifica holler and scream all the while. Annoying, yes, but what if Stan woke up and saw this?

Turning away, Dipper decided he didn’t want to see this. Then he looked around carefully for another peak. Then he turned back around and found he couldn’t keep his eyes off it at all. It was just like watching her eat the ice cream but…scarier. More…exciting?
“PLEASE, MY DADDY WILL BUY YOU ANYTHING YOU EVER WANT!” Pacifica cried, one arm stuck in her attacker’s throat, and the other grabbing desperately at the dirt. “I’m not even kidding! WE HAVE CONNECTIONS! JUST DON’T EAT MEEEEEE!”

Dipper’s heart jerked. No, this was wrong. He couldn’t just stand by and let it happen, no matter how much he loved his sister. Diving down, he grabbed Pacifica’s waistlength hair and pulled it tightly.
It slid right through his fingers, and Mabel slurped her up completely.
“Well…I tried,” he decided, satisfied with his heroic act.

Mabel with a very familiar looking, big bellied physique. Her attitude was different this time, though. She was all smiles, patting her stomach and relishing the next burp. “You know what Pacifica? I’m totally fed up with you!”
Her over sized sleep shirt covered most of her belly, save for a small bit at the bottom. It was still very clear she had eaten someone, though. There was no easy way to hide that just yet.
After a hearty laugh, she beckoned Dipper over, grinning sweetly.
“This is awful…” he said, sitting next to her.
“This is awesome!” she countered.

Part of him wanted to yell, but he couldn’t work up the anger. He was simply too happy, as wrong as he knew it was. Mabel had never looked better (and now that they were together that meant something), but he felt like he had to say something.
“So, you like doing that now?”
“Sure, if it’s someone like Pacifica. C'mon, don't you think we're all a little better off this way? BRRRRRRRRP!” she took Dippers hand and patted her stomach with it. “Pat-Pat. Maybe I should just go through town and eat all the jerks!” She giggled, but Dipper didn’t. “That’s a joke, bro-bro. We still do jokes, right?”
“I’m not worried about Pacifica, I’m worried about you. You’re not going to be able to go around wearing a cardboard box forever…that’d make it hard to cuddle,” he blushed.
Grinning cheekily, she rested her head in his lap. “Well then maybe we ought to hide out somewhere today, just the two of us. You know, until my fabulousness goes down to a safer level.”
“For you? There is no safe level,” he patted her stomach and she giggled. Pacifica cried, and his hand recoiled, before slowly placing it back and deciding he didn’t mind.

But where to go?
145331221221212212211.title: Mabel devours Pacifica

1453312212212122122111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Right at this moment, nothing seemed sweeter than a picnic by the lake. While Mabel got changed, Dipper threw on his usual outfit and packed whatever snacks they had lying around into his backpack and met his sister out the front of the store. In lieu of her usual handmade sweaters, she wore a simple pink blue top and a green skirt. Dipper took special notice of this, since it let her Pacifica filled stomach hang free without any attempt at covering it. A small part of him suspected she’d chosen it with him in mind. And he was right

Nevertheless, they had to hurry to the lake if they didn’t want her to get caught. They didn’t waste a moment, finding a nice secluded spot with a gorgeous view of the lake barely three minutes after arriving. Mabel sat atop a small rock, posing as though she was on the cover of a sappy romance novel, while Dipper eagerly rolled out the picnic blanket and started unloading the snacks.

“Food? Already? If I didn’t know any better, I’d say you were trying to fatten me up!” Mabel grinned…until realizing Dipper had stopped after taking out a single bottle of syrup.
“It’s not hard when you can’t stop yourself from eating almost everything just on the way over.”
Her hand rubbed against her massive stomach as if to say ‘Ha, you got me there’, and she sat down on the blanket leaving just enough space for Dipper to join her. “Well, I can’t say I came here for the food, anyway.” Almost immediately, her belly gave a hungry rumble and she blushed. “I’m pretty sure that was a ‘hungry for love’ rumble.”
“Why can’t it be both?” he grinned. “Stay right here, I’ll be right back with something for that,” he winked, and ran off in search of a vending machine, or hoping that the tackle shop had some snacks. “Just don’t eat anyone else until I get back!” he laughed.

Left by herself, Mabel kicked back and drank the syrup like soda. Admittedly, she’d have preferred Dipper stay by for a lakeside snuggle, but she wasn’t about to say no to being showered with delicious treats by her new boyfriend. Someone was still digesting inside her belly as she sat, but her head was swimming with images of her twin. Her handsome, loving twin…
Oh, why did she let him leave? She wanted, no, she needed his hands on her fat, squirming tummy…
1453312212212122122111.title: Lakeside romance

choices: Mabel puts up with the family.
Mabel can't help herself and eats one of them. Or more?
14533122122121221221112.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Oh my goodness! Do you see how fat she is?”
Mabel’s eyes suddenly popped open at what she heard.
“I’ve never seen anything so round! Is she even real?”
Voices. A whole bunch of them, some old, some young. Talking about her and what she’d done with Pacifica. The jig was up! She hadn’t even had a boyfriend for one day and she could already see herself being carted off to jail or some crazy lab…
“Everyone, take out your Hi-Def cameras so we can share this with the world!”
Fear shot through her swollen body. Fear of ruining everything. Fear of never seeing her loving brother again. Ignoring the strain on her little legs, Mabel pulled herself up, ran, and leapt off the sand and into the water, splashing hard and submerging herself completely.

“Yes siree, that has to be the chubbiest sparrow I’ve ever seen!” said a woman, snapping away at the plump bird with her camera.
“The guys at Birdwatchers Club are gonna love this!” said her son, doing the same.
Mabel bobbed back up just in time to see a family of five wander past the trees and into what she had dubbed ‘The Romance Zone.’ They smiled at her, unable to see Pacifica struggling for escape underneath the water.

“Oh, hello there!” smiled the father, “Glad to see we’re not the only eager beavers out this morning!”
“Haha, right! You could say that Nothing wakes me up like a morning dip!” she tried very hard to act casual, but her heart was still pounding in her chest.
“I think she’s got the right idea! Kids, how does a swim sound?” The three children cheered, dropped off their cameras, and ran for the water.
“NO THAT’S A TERRIBLE IDEA THERE’S EELS AND PIRANHAS AND GIANT SQUIDS AND-“ Nothing she said could stop them, and the three kids splashed down around her. She held her tummy tight, trying to somehow keep it closer.

They were two young girls, about six and seven years old, and a boy roughly Mabel’s age. The girls began to splash and play, while their brother kicked back and soaked in the morning sun. Going by her expression, it was like Mabel was surrounded by a brigade of armed soldiers.
Delicious gingerbread soldiers…

“This is actually a great little spot! Mind if we set up here?” The mother unfolded a pocket chair and sat down, along with her husband on one of his own.
“Would you look at that view, honey? Maybe we should come back here by ourselves and have a little picnic.”
“Oh, you know I’d just get all bloaty like last time.”
“You say that like it’s a bad thing!” They both laughed, and Mabel began to grind her teeth. It was time to leave before she did something she’d regret.

She began to doggie paddle away, hoping to find Dipper by the dock before he went looking for her. Unfortunately, she didn’t get far before she felt a pang in her oversized gut.
“I knew I was supposed to wait thirty minutes…”
Managing to pull herself back to the shallow water, she slumped up against a rock, keeping a hand below the water to soothe her aching tummy. Accidentally being sick could never have been more disastrous. The brother approached her, smiling brightly, revealing one of the cutest boys she’d ever seen, with a hypnotically charming smile.

“What’s a pretty girl like you doing swimming out here by yourself?”
“Waiting for my boyfriend to come back,” she brushed him off without a second thought. Wherever he was, Dipper suddenly felt his heart warm just a little bit.
14533122122121221221112.title: Unwanted guests

choices: Something stops her just in time.
145331221221212212211121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

And so, Mabel was stuck there, clinging to the rock as the sisters played, the parents sat and talked, the brother hovered nearby, and her stomach gurgled sickly. She felt the water bob her belly up and down, tossing Pacifica about. It felt kind of nice, but that didn’t make up for the sharp cramp pains, or the stress of being so close to getting found out.
And of course, somehow she was still ravenous.

“Does he usually leave you out here by yourself? I know if I had a girlfriend, I’d never want us to be apart.” For once, the world seemed to be gift wrapping her a cute boyfriend, now that she already had one. Even if she wasn’t feeling sick, she’d have found it annoying.
“Look, I’m really not interested,” she paddled a big closer to the shore and sat down on the sand, keeping her huge belly hidden.
Inside of herself, Pacifica tumbled around. She’d heard them talk about going to the lake, but that seemed like hours ago. Why was everything wobbling like this? She couldn’t see a thing. What was this huge, hard surface Mabel was shoving her against? Why was she upside down?! And most importantly, why was nobody helping her? Was this really her last moments?
She could just imagine her parents’ reactions when they found out.
“Our daughter? Eaten by a peasant? And she had the gall to call herself a Northwest!”
As the girl screamed and cried for her very life, Mabel grumbled irritably, only knowing that her belly was acting up.

“Okay, listen,” said the handsome boy, “I didn’t mean to sound rude. My family’s just here for a few days, so I was hoping…” He seemed genuinely apologetic, but his voice trailed off as Mabel’s stomach grumbled more beneath the water. She looked at him and saw a big hotdog sitting in a lake of BBQ sauce. To the side, the little girls were a pair of fried dumplings, and their parents were just two very delicious looking people.

Chewing her lip, Mabel stood up, and everyone gasped.
“OH, HOLY COW!” the boy’s eyes dropped to the huge tummy wiggly about off her hips. “…lucky guy…” he murmured.
Licking her lips hungrily, she began to trudge forward towards the two dumpling children, who stared back feeling most uncomfortable, watching her legs kick up her gut, sloshing noisily towards them. Even the aloof, borderline brainless parents felt pangs of panic as they saw her figure drag through the water.

“Dipper doesn’t have to know…” she giggled giddily…
145331221221212212211121.title: Seasick with voracious hunger

choices: The two paddle over to a little island
Later, the two return to the Mystery Shack.
1453312212212122122111212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Mabel’s mouth began to widen, and for a quick second, the girl’s thought they saw a pair of eyes peering up from the bottom of her throat…
Thankfully, Mabel was distracted by the suddenly roaring of a boat engine. Eyes were finally off her as a tiny fishing boat pulled in close by. Mabel went from drooling thoughtlessly to gleaming with delight as she saw it was Dipper who was driving.
“Your chariot awaits, m’lady!” he said romantically.
The boat floated a little closer to the shallow, and Mabel excitedly climbed on board, causing it to wobble and shake as she did. Finally dropping in, she found herself surrounded by chip packets and chocolate bars, much to her utter joy.

“Dipper, how did you?”
“The vending machine was broken when I got there! Nobody can prove it wasn’t!” They never thought they’d be happy to have some of Stan’s influence rubbing off on him.
He struggled with the rudder for a moment, and the two smooched as the boat sped away, leaving the family confused, but relieved.
“What a cute couple,” the mother smiled. “It must be true love, did you see how similar they looked? It was like the universe built them to be together! So sweet!”
“And he’s feeding her well, too!”

The two siblings rode across the lake under morning sun, all the while Mabel began filling the bottom of the boat with empty packets. It was a good thing they were out here so early, because Dipper kept looking at her and the boat kept swerving.
“You stole a boat for me, Dipper! That is so…” she flopped dramatically onto her back, pretending to swoon, “Romantic!”
He blushed, “Well, I could see you had company and, well…I didn’t want anything bad to happen, you know? That was a pretty close call with Pacifica.”
“My knight in shining armour,” she sighed dreamily, chocolate, chips and gummy treats hanging out of her mouth.

Finally, they were alone in the middle of the lake, just Dipper, Mabel, and a darkly quiet Pacifica. Taking his hands off the rudder, Dipper sat down next to Mabel, and she pulled him close, with a very cheeky look in her eyes as she finished another little treat.
Both puckered up and…
“BRAAAHHUUUUUUUURRAAAAAARRRRRRP!” Mabel’s chocolatey lips wobbled and shook as she burped piggishly into her brother boyfriend’s face. His eyes stung a little as her hot breath swam over his face, giving him a whiff of everything she’d eaten today, from the strawberry ice cream, to the potato chips, and even Pacifica’s expensive perfume.
He coughed and choked, as she held firmly onto him, giggling over what she’d done.
“Mabel, that was disgusting!” he gagged, trying to breath in some fresh air.
“I couldn’t resist, I’m sorry!” she laughed, trying to calm down. She let him go so he could breath in and out. “Was that too much?”
It took a minute for him to recover, unable to smell anything but the inside of her mouth. “Actually…could you…could you do it again? While…we kiss?” he asked, sounding extremely embarrassed.
But she just shot him a sly look and grinned, “I can try.”

The two almost leapt at each other with their next kiss, throwing their arms around each other. They’d been waiting for this moment since they drifted off to sleep last night. To have their lips meet, and the massive, full tummy pressed between them, even if it did get in the way. Dipper tried to climb over it, and Mabel tried to push it to the side, but it wasn’t going anywhere.
The two struggled so much just trying to keep kissing that the boat began to wobble and rock, and finally, tipped right over, dumping both of them in the lake. Mabel had been just a little too much for it…

Both bobbed up, Dipper spitting water, and Mabel swallowing it. “Steal a bigger boat next time, would ya?” she laughed, before realizing she was a bit too heavy to stay afloat. Dipper grabbed hold of her and began kicking at the water, pulling her along. “My kniiiiiight…” she sang, her words bubbling in the water.
1453312212212122122111212.title: The tubby love boat

choices: Stan comes up to investigate the strange noises.
14533122122121221221112122.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

The two made it into shallower waters and spent some time splashing about before settling down to massage Mabel’s aching tummy. And kiss, of course. They both really liked the kissing. They chased each other around the lakeside woods, laughed at Stan’s terrible new attraction ideas, but they always seemed to start smooching again by the end of it. They somehow even interrupted smooches with more smooches.

When Mabel’s stomach had shrunk just enough, they went for a bite to eat at the ice cream stand, and eventually made it back into town, spotting and listing good places for dates, though were sad to find out the town only had a single buffet.

Eventually, however, they did have to return home after the long hours of blissful togetherness, and were unsurprised to find that Stan was not happy with them.
“Where were you two today?” he fumed, “You can’t just walk out on me like that! I had to dress Soos’ up like a mummy because he didn’t fit in your scarecrow costume! Do you have any idea how much toilet paper we lost today!?”
“Gee Stan, I could’ve sworn today was Saturday.”
“It IS Saturday, that’s why we were so busy! Instead of helping me, you were out doing who even knows what, and you come up sopping wet and…uh…well I don’t know what happened to you.”
Their Grunkle Stan was not what you’d call a polite person, but even he wasn’t rude enough to poke fun at his great niece’s obvious weight gain. And it was quite obvious. Her chin now hung low, and her top now left a slight gap for her pot belly to hang out of. He decided he was overdoing it with the pie last night.

“Look, we’re meant to be a team here for the summer, right? And the place is mine, which makes me Team Leader, and that means you two work hard so I don’t have to. I can’t help it if the rules line up perfectly to serve my interests!”
“Aww come on, Grunkle Stan, it was just one day!”
“I don’t care if it was ten minutes! Time is money! Sorry to do this, but I’m sending you both to bed without dinner!”
“What, right now?”
“That’s right! You two, march up to your room, right now!”

The siblings grinned, and charged up the stairs with gusto, leaving their great uncle feeling rather confused. The door slammed shut, and what followed was at least forty minutes of uninteresting, slobbery smooching, and belly smacking tummy rubs.
He gave them no other choice, after all If Mabel couldn’t have more food, she needed the only thing better.

Mabel gave Dipper another ‘burping kiss’ and the two tumbled off her bed together. Her weight crushed down on him again, but it wasn’t nearly as bad as the first time when she had a whole person inside her gut. Mabel stood up first, and Dipper admired her pudgy pink stomach as his rose up in front of his face.
“Wow, I can’t believe that used to be Pacifica.”
“Yeah, I finally found something she was good for!” The chubby sister giggled. “Hey, is Robbie still giving you a hard time? Or do you think maybe Gideon’s out of prison yet?” She began to drool at the idea of munching down on their old enemies. As lovely an image as it put in his head, Dipper wasn’t sure was okay with how excited she seemed.

“Hey uh, I was wondering…I think we both…appreciate your new figure. And-“ Mabel pushed him to the wall and pressed her belly against him.
“Appreciate is one word for it, I guess. Hehe!”
“But! There’s a but! A big but!” Mabel quickly turned and checked her backside curiously, having not noticed how much larger it had gotten. "No! As in, ‘But I have to ask, were you really going to eat that kid back at the lake?’”
Mabel hesitated, then laughed, “Oh, come on, Dipper! You know I have better self-control than that!” He looked at her like she had said her head was detachable, “Okay, okay, so maybe I lost control there for a moment. But, well, maybe that’s why you’re here!”

She let him lean off the wall, and hugged him lovingly. “I get hungry, things get crazy, and then you swoop in like a hunky superhero and save me!”
“Wouldn’t I technically be saving the other people from you?”
“See? Only a true hero would think like that! Gimme a second!” Mabel began swallowing up air, prepping another gassy kiss.

The better thing for her to do would simply be to not eat anyone ever again, but Dipper felt thoroughly buttered up. He did like the idea of them working together like that. It felt really meaningful and sweet, even if the circumstances were awfully unusual. And the trust this put him in warmed his young heart…
And then, she pressed her lips against his and whispered.
“Love you…BRAAAHHHHHHHUUURP!”
14533122122121221221112122.title: The best punishment

145331221221212212211121222.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

All of a sudden, life was very good. What followed were some of the best days of the twins’ young lives. Sure, they still had to work hard at the Mystery Shack for most of the day, but every now and then they’d sneak off behind a shelf or an exhibit to sneak in a snuggly smooch. And Mabel was certainly getting snugglier.
Every day after work, the two would run down the store and buy Mabel a whole box of sweets, and maybe an ice cream for the trip home. Dipper started waking up early to make her a big breakfast of toast, cereal and an toasted cereal sandwiches (a breakfast food of her own creation), and on their time off, Dipper sank more money than he thought he had into hamburgers and pancakes for her. Sometimes she wasn’t even hungry; she just ate for the fun of it.

In just a few short days she had gone from being reasonably skinny to a bit of a butterball. On an empty stomach, her tummy still hung out big and round, drooping over her pants. Even her baggiest sweaters couldn’t hide her rounded figure, not that she wanted to. She and Dipper enjoyed watching them grow a little tighter each day. Though the downside was that not all her clothes were so loose, and she needed to ask Stan very nicely to buy her some new pants after a few too many rips and tears.

And of course, most people tended not to gain so weight so much so suddenly, so she and Dipper often tried to excuse her hunger with a sudden growth spurt. They were always together now, so it was very obvious that she was only growing wider. Thankfully Soos’ didn’t even seem to notice, and Wendy seemed to think it was cool. They even spent one afternoon drawing faces on her stomach when they were meant to be working.

Aside from her sudden ballooning, nothing seemed out of the ordinary for her and Dipper. They’d run around the Shack, spray Stan with water bottles, and goof off as normal. Nobody suspected how differently they felt, or that they’d been falling asleep in each other’s arms. It was their not-at-all-little secret, and they relished every moment together.

It was just a little over a week after it all began when Dipper found himself sitting in front of the TV, watching the new episode of Tiger Fist and actually feeling a little down. He’d spent most of the morning trying and failing to capture a giant dragon fly, and the whole thing had roughed him up pretty bad. After all the scary stuff he’d been through, he didn’t like being beaten by an oversized bug.

“Nurse! Come quick, this is urgent!” declared a beautifully familiar voice. He looked to the side to see Mabel standing proudly, her yellow sweater jutting out more than it had been this morning. “I seem to have come across a handsome young man with a serious case of Downer’s Disease!”
“And I suppose you know the cure?”
“Yup. Dr. Pines prescribes twenty CC’s of Vitamin Me!” Stan was out, so she didn’t hesitate to pull up her shirt up just enough to show him the ample, swollen tummy he adored so much, and then cuddled up next to him. Which here meant that she ran up and once jumped crashing onto his lap. Now he wasn’t exactly comfortable, but he was a lot happier.

“Y-you were eating while I was out, weren’t you?” he groaned, just barely managing to peck her on the cheek.
“Well I sure wasn’t doing push-ups! Hahaha!” She shook her belly up and down, making it slosh quite loudly. “So what’re we watching?”
“Tiger Fist!” They glanced back at the screen to see a human armed tiger punching a criminal in the face before being abruptly cut off. “Or I guess a breaking news bulletin.”
“Hey, wouldn’t it be funny if the news was about Tiger Fist getting cancelled? I mean, sad funny, but still a little bit funny. Heh.”

The bulletin was in fact about…
145331221221212212211121222.title: One fat week

choices: Dipper has an idea to help!
Dipper has no idea how to help.
1453312212212122122111212221.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Breaking news! Beloved town Gravity Falls resident and heiress to the Northwest family fortune has vanished!”
Dipper and Mabel froze in their seat. “Uh oh…”
“The great, great granddaughter of beloved town founder Nathaniel Northwest was reported missing earlier this morning after failing to return home several days prior. Her father, Preston Northwest, maintains that he last saw her leaving to visit a friend.”
Mabel laughed, sounding incredibly nervous.
“Nothing is more important to us than the safe return of our daughter!” barked her father into a microphone. “We are sparing no expense to find her! If we have to tear the town apart and put it back together by hand, we will find her, and bring Pacifica back home!”
“If you do find her, I don’t think you’ll want her back,” Mabel said, rubbing her stomach.
"Eww, Mabel!" Dipper nudged her in the arm, but she didn't laugh.

He went on to stress just what lengths they were going to find her. They were offering rewards in the quadruple digits for any information, and would be working with the police to track her down again. They were organizing daily search parties, and her mother even announced a ‘Bring Pacifica Home’ charity foundation.
“And finally!” spoke her mother, “We have a little message for whoever may be responsible for our darling Pacifica’s disappearance.”
“I hope you are having a fine day! I hope today is the happiest and best day of your life! Because when we find you, we will see to it that you cling that the dying shreds of that memory as you desperately beg and plead at our feet to finally put you out of our misery…uh, you think we should cut that out? I can do that take again.”
“We now return you to your regularly scheduled program.”

Dipper looked and saw Mabel retreating fearfully into her sweater. “I have made a terrible, terrible mistake…”
Packing her arms, head and belly into the already strained clothing, it began to rip and tore open, revealing her terrified, chubby face. “Dipper, what am I going to do!?”
1453312212212122122111212221.title: Mabel's massive mistake

choices: Mabel comes to her senses and runs out of the store.
14533122122121221221112122212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“I uh, I wouldn’t worry too much,” Dipper said, trying his best to sound reassuring, “I mean, you don’t really think her parents care this much, do you? It’s all a show for the press. I can practically hear her dad saying ‘That’s fine, honey, we can buy another one.’”
He kissed Mabel on the chubby cheek as she poked her head out through the ruined sweater.
“Sorry, I think I need a moment,” she replied, pulling it back down and hopping off the chair. Her brother wanted to hug her and try to laugh it all off, but he respected her wishes and let her go.

After a quick change to an intact blue sweater, Mabel left the Shack and went for a walk. Considering how much she’d grown to enjoy sitting around and doing nothing but smooch, it was now very clear how troubled she felt. Her heavy belly slapped against her knees as she walked down the road. It made her burp rather loudly, which gave her a quick reason to giggle.

When she ate Pacifica, it seemed like the best idea in the world. That was one less jerk in the world, she got to feel big and full, and Dipper couldn’t keep his hands off her belly. Not once did she even considered that it might come back to bite her. And it was hard to admit, but she was actually feeling a bit…guilty.

“You know, I like to think that if things had gone a little differently, maybe we could’ve been friends?” she hoisted up her chunky belly and spoke down towards it. “I mean if someone as sweet as me can do something as bad as eat two people, maybe someone as rotten as you could do something nice, right?” Her stomach gurgled a little, “You’re upset, that’s okay, I would be too!”

The last few days had been spent stuffing her face full and cuddling up with her brother, and while those were her new favourite things of all time, she’d been neglecting her arts and crafts projects. Paint, glitter, macaroni and stickers, that’s what she needed! Those would cheer her right up! Maybe she could even combine her new hobbies and have Dipper paint a love heart around her belly button after a big dinner. That made her smile, and bolt down to the Craft store.

It was only a few stores down when she saw them. A whole mob of people, dozens and dozens of them, all wearing bright purple ‘Bring Pacifica Home’ shirts, marching towards her. Immediately she turned to leave, but they were already too close and she was swept into the crowd.
“Guess you found her,” she thought nervously to herself.

The swarmed into the nearest shop and began hanging up Missing posters, pulling the overly chubby child in for the ride. Before she even knew what was happening, she was sitting in a chair in front of someone’s abandoned piece of pie, which didn’t last long in her presence.
That was when a young girl with short red hair sat down next to her.
“Are you here to join the search party?” she asked happily.
“Haha! Actually, I think you guys have it all under control!” The words ‘go away go away go away’ rapidly repeated through her head.
“We need all the help we can get, don’t be shy! When we find her, Pacifica’s gonna be so happy!” Mabel’s stomach rumbled and she shushed it, “And hey, it’s sort of like a hike, so it’ll be good exercise!”
The plump Pines narrowed her eyes angrily, “And why would I need any of that?”
“Uh…because you’re…it’s good for you?” The girl hadn’t meant to be rude, but Mabel wasn’t in the best mood. As a matter of fact, suddenly she was fuming!
She’d earned this belly! Everybody that mattered loved it! Two people gave their lives to making it bigger! Maybe this girl should join her precious Pacifica…
14533122122121221221112122212.title: Pacifica's search party

choices: She accepts! Time to try and let her out
No dice! Hopefully she has a last request in mind.
145331221221212212211121222121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

On Mabel’s chubby cheeks appeared a twisted little grin. One born out of irritation, rather than malice, but worrying all the same.
“I think I know where Pacifica might be.” The other girl’s eyes lit up and followed Mabel out the door without question.

“BRRRRAUUUUUURRRRPPP!” Mabel sat beside a dumpster, enjoying just how huge her latest victim made her. She wasn’t too much larger when she ate Pacifica, but how she was looking massive all over. And so filling! Her time with Dipper had been so much fun that she hadn’t really thought much about eating anyone else, but now she remembered just how…good it felt.
It felt good. Feeling so full, feeling so big, it all just felt good! Easily the second best thing she’d ever felt in her life, next to her brothers warm, loving embrace.
But that didn’t take away that she’d eaten somebody else.

“If it makes you feel any better at all, you really did find Pacifica! I’m sure a few of her bones are still in there!” The girl she ate screamed so loud that Mabel felt her body shake. “Heh, yeah, that sounded a lot creepier once I said it out loud. Sorry!”

Antonio had been a jerk, and it had been an accident. Pacifica had been utterly horrible to her whole family, and was going to blackmail them. But this girl had done nothing but show concern for someone she believed to be lost. Mabel was both feeling satisfied, and guilty.
“Hey, hey, come on, it can’t be that bad in there!” How exactly were you meant to comfort somebody you had just eaten? “How about this! We can do something you like. I mean, I did just eat you, we might as well do something you want to, right?”
“I’d like to come out,” whimpered from inside her body.
“Anything aside from that…” Even if getting tattled on and arrested weren’t problems, she wasn’t even sure she could let the girl out. Heck, she didn’t even know how she was getting all these people in to begin with! But…it was the right thing to do.

“Do you promise not to tell anyone about this?”
“That you ate Pacifica and tried to eat me!?”
“Yep, that exactly.”
The girl hesitated. “Yes, of course!”
“Promise me!”
“I promise! Please, just let me out…”
Mabel wanted to believe her, but she just wasn’t feeling it. Maybe she was just being selfish and didn’t want to spit up her filling meal, but she could see the girl running back inside and screaming about what Mabel had done to her.
“Listen to me! I ate you! You’re in my belly, and as long as you’re in there, you’re nothing but an oversized snack! So if-“ Her stomach began to wail with sadness, and she immediately regretted her harsh tone. “No, no I meant… Oh flarp! I really couldn't help it, okay? The things you said and you looked so tasty and I don't want to get caught out! If I let you out, you need to promise me with all your heart that you’re not going to tattle, okay? And if I don’t believe you, I-I just can’t do it!”

The girl sobbed, curled up uncomfortably inside of Mabel’s fat stomach, and finally managed to reply. “I-I promise, I won’t tell anyone! I’ll go home, throw out my shirt, and I’ll forget all about Pacifica! I promise!”

It sounded sincere…but what did Mabel think?
145331221221212212211121222121.title: Guit trip in the gigestive tract

1453312212212122122111212221212.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“I wish I could believe that…” Mabel sighed, and her tummy suddenly cried out in despair. She tried to shush it, but her voice echoed and boomed around inside of her, and wasn’t at all calming.
It bounced and wobbled and shook, fuller and fatter than ever before, too large for her to control. She gripped it with both hands to try and hold it in place, but it just smacked her face and pushed her into the wall. Thank goodness it was padded with pudge.
“That’s right, work out all that negativity!”
Even if she wanted to get up and go home, she’d just be pushed over again. For about twenty minutes, she just sat there, feeling her latest victim pulverize her insides. It actually felt quite nice, aside from being shoved around; weight aside, this girl was a fighter! But inevitably, she ran out of kicks, and settled down. Once again, Mabel offered her one last request, and this time the girl took accepted. Though she seemed reluctant to admit what she wanted.
Slowly, however, she managed to stammer it out…

Mabel’s puffy cheeks rose in delight. “Did you say what I think you said?”
“N-no, please, forget it, I shouldn’t have said that.”
“But it’s so sweet! You want me to eat your boyfriend so you can be together forever? That should be a romance novel!”
“Maybe written by Stephen King.” The girl felt the world shift and shake around her as Mabel sat up and began to move. “No, seriously! He’s not my boyfriend! I was going to ask him out, but I never got around to it. Just, leave him alone, please!”

Oh, but she only managed to make it worse. Now Mabel couldn’t help but make it her mission to unite these two in the bonds of true love. Even if that meant condemning them both to the inside of her hungry stomach.
“Oh, trust me, if you knew the sweet sting of romance, you’d be begging me to eat him up! Now, you said his name was Noah?”

Gravity Falls was a small town; she was pretty sure a boy named Noah was among the many boy's she'd tried to ask out. She remembered, he liked to hang out at...
1453312212212122122111212221212.title: Last request

choices: Mabel begins her hunt for Noah
Mabel bumps into a familiar face.
14533122122121221221112122212121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Mabel had never been to Big Gunz Laser Tag, but she’d heard Soos’ mention it in passing at least once. Maybe f she could stop making out with her brother for five minutes, she and hers friends could give it a go; she hadn’t been to any laser tag place in years.
The inside of the building was a dark, neon blue, with pictures of planets all over the carpet, and the walls done up to look like the inside of a spaceship. There were kids running around with snacks, flocking to arcade machines, and lining up for the next game. Her stomach rumbled as a boy just a little younger than her ran by with a slice of pizza in her hands, and she wasn’t sure which of the two was making her hungry.
But she was here on a mission, she had to stay on target.

“So where is our little Noahromeo?”
“Please don’t eat him!” called out from her belly. Mabel ignored her and scanned the crowd.

Her memory banks flashed through all the boys she’d fallen in love with over the summer, finally clicking in place as she saw him waiting in line, already strapped into the light-up harness. He had short black hair, tanned skin, and a lot of freckles. It wasn’t hard to see why her lunch wanted to ask him out, she thought.
Mabel slicked her hair back and waddled over, letting her enormous gut wobble and shake through her sweater. It was her attempt at a confident, beautiful strut.
“Do you believe in true love?” she asked with right away, sounding dramatic and breathy.
He stared at her and smiled through a bright red blush, “As a matter of fact, I do.”
Lowering his plastic laser gun, both of them tried to ignore the other kids in line, starting to snicker at him. He asked for her name, and she leaned against the cushiony wall, grinning confidently.
“The name’s Mabel, and let’s just say I’m your ticket to the best date of your little life!”

Noah’s heart seemed to flutter as she winked at him, stifling a small belch. His eyes glanced from her chubby face, down to her tummy, which was without a doubt the biggest he’d seen in his life. His friends were giggling at him, but he couldn’t bear to look away from her.
“Y-you’re not pulling my leg or anything, are you?”
The massive middle Mabel just giggled sweetly, “Let’s just say this’ll be the most important date in your entire life!”
Not believing the beautiful things this equally beautiful girl was saying, he tried to take a moment to comprehend what was happening before the alarm went off, calling for his group to enter the ‘battle zone.’

“I-I will be right back!” he said, clearly wishing he could delay the game longer. “Will you be here when I get back?”
“Yeah, I guess, but if we leave it that long-“
“Great! I-I’m sorry, but I really need to go. I’m really sorry, believe me…”
With a deep look of regret, he ran into the arena, giving her one last hopeful look before disappearing.

“But if we leave it that long, your date’ll be in my lower intestine! Come back!” she called out, grabbing the last remaining harness and pulling it on over her fat frame. It would have fit fine if she didn’t have a whole girl in her guts.
Running after him, the doors closed behind her. The laser tag arena was even darker, illuminated by neon lights along the walls, which she could have sworn were made of old mattresses. Nevertheless, she did suddenly feel like she was trapped somewhere in the future.

The harness lit up and shook as her belly kicked it, and she raised her gun over her shoulder, a look of determination burning in her eyes.
“One way or another, there’s going to be a date in my tummy by the end of today!”
14533122122121221221112122212121.title: Big gutz laser tag

choices: Noah is nowhere to be found.
145331221221212212211121222121211.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Her belly bounced to the blaring techno music as she stalked through the arena. It was like a big, lit up maze, full of stretching pathways and flashing columns to hide behind. Finding Noah in all of this was going to be tricky, but she wouldn’t turn her back when true love was on the line.

“Maybe to find a cute boy… I need to think like one!” A moment passed as she cleared her head and thought boyish thoughts. “Oh look at Mabel, she’s so big and cute! I wanna kiss her face and feed her chocolate forever and ever until my lips fall off!” After waiting a few seconds, she grunted, realizing that it wasn’t helping.

She stepped through a glowing arch way, and a boy ran past and shot the target on her chest. It buzzed, and he ran off, laughing. All she knew was that it wasn’t Noah. Waddling through the maze-like arena, she saw glimpses of kids and teenagers chasing each other, but none of them seemed to have Noah’s voice. They were running out of time…how long did these rounds go for, anyway?
“Don’t worry, I’ll find your Boyfriend-To-Be if it kills me!”
“I keep telling you, I want you to leave him alone!”
“This is a matter of true love, what we want is irrelevant!”

Determined to unite the two, she marched forth, ignoring the weight of her own gut beating against her legs as they kicked up and down – and promptly got herself stuck in a flashing doorway.
“W-what? Come on, I’m not even that fat yet!”
Regardless of what she thought, her waist had been firmly wedged between the two walls. On one side, her gut hung out far ahead towards a large open space filled with doorways, almost looking like it was trying to escape from her. Behind her, her large butt wiggled and shook as she tried to pull free, but she was stuck in there good. It didn’t take long for someone to notice, and quickly start racking up points shooting at her.

That was a little annoying, but then more kids began joining in, and she really got ticked.
“Seriously? Pick on the fat girl? What is this, 2007?” Two kids began shooting at her from the back as well. Briefly, she wondered if she’d travelled back in time again (long story).

“Wow, she’s huge!”
“Hey, I think her belly jiggles when you zap her!”
“No, she’s just jiggling all the time, look!”
“It looks like she ate someone! Haha!”
“I’M FINALLY GONNA GET A DECENT SCORE!”

Growing more and more frustrated, she pushed and wiggled harder and harder. Not quite able to tell what was going on outside of the meaty container, Mabel’s meal kicked hard in a panic, and her devourer finally popped free. The crowd finally dispersed as she pushed through and ran down another doorway, making sure to suck in her gut first (for all the difference it made).

“Maybe this is karma?” said her stomach.
“Oh, shut up,” she replied, turning a single corner…
145331221221212212211121222121211.title: Mabel hunts her prey

1453312212212122122111212221212111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Without even a word of warning, she turned a corner and came face to face with Noah, and tackled him straight to the ground, clacking their harnesses together and letting both guns drop to the floor. And of course, squashing him under her weight.
Understandably, he was completely shocked. Until he realized who it was.
“M-Mabel!” Even like this, he was happy to see her. “You really c-couldn’t wait, could you?”
“True love doesn’t have time to sit around and wait!” she told him, sounding distressed. “I’m sorry, but this has to happen now!”
The joyous look on his face couldn’t be described. It looked like he might start to cry tears of joy. “M-Mabel, I know we just met, but I really think…I really think I love you!” He leaned up against her crushing belly and smooched her on the lip.
Immediately, she recoiled and fell back on her oversized butt.

“Whoa, whoa! Just what do you think you’re doing?”
Noah sat up, looking rather dumbfounded. “Um…kissing you? I think? Isn’t that what we’re doing? You said you wanted to take me on a date.”
“Yeah, but not with me!”
“Oh…are you sure?”
“I...I have a boyfriend. I’m really sorry I didn’t make that clear…”
“That’s fine…you’re way out of my league anyway. Don’t know what I was thinking.” He seemed really disappointed.

Sitting down next to him, she patted him on the shoulder and accidentally let her belly spill into hiss lap. He seemed to freeze as the beauteous blob brushed against him.
“Hey, if it makes you feel any better, if I wasn’t crazy mad in love with him, we’d totally be kissing for real right now!” That did seem to cheer him up a little. “And even better! I’ve really do have a date for you! Really sweet girl!”
“Really?” He wondered if she was as large as Mabel, but decided it would be rude to ask. “Did she come in with you?”
She nodded happily and grinned. “She’s sitting in your lap right now!”

Before he could ask what she meant, she started eating him head first. At first, he thought she was kissing him, leaving him totally confused. Though this didn’t really change much even after he realized what was really happening. Unlike her previous victims, the light from his harness blared brightly as she forced him down her throat, meaning he could see her oesophagus stretched around him as she ate him up.
“Mabel…what are you doing?” Of course, she couldn’t reply. Regardless, he was still far too smitten with the obese child to risk hurting her just to try and get out. He’d have slid right into her belly if it weren’t for that heavy harness.
Her own harness bent and snapped slightly as he bulged down her chest and into her belly.
