The alarm went off, but Mabel stayed in place, swallowing up what little was left of the boy. He was easily the cutest meal she’d had so far, and he wasn’t even a jerk like Antonio! He tasted as sweet as he acted! She was almost sad to send him away with that final swallow…

Inside her belly, Noah saw a cute girl his age with red hair sitting chest deep in a puddle of goop and human bones. The fact that she wasn’t a big girl suddenly didn’t seem so important. She gasped and shielded her eyes just as he was pushed all the way in, a whole other person forced into this tiny, cramped space. It wasn’t comfortably for anyone, but Mabel was the only one enjoying it.

“Brrrrp oh man…BRRRRRUUURP OH MAN OH MAN…”
When she had eaten Antonio, Mabel thought she knew what it was like to be impossible full. But now there were two people trapped inside her belly. She fell flat on her back, and felt her weight wobble and shift. She couldn’t see past herself; this was true hugeness! It the most uncomfortable thig that had ever happened to her, but felt better than anything!
So big…
So full…
What she wouldn’t’ have given for a belly rub right now…

“I…URRRRP…I just l-love…BRAHURP! H-happy…endings…” She patted her belly, and the massive thing wobbled. “How’s it g-going in there BURARP guys?”
1453312212212122122111212221212111.title: Mabel's double meal

choices: Mabel returns to the Mystery Shack.
Something happens to Mabel on the way home
14533122122121221221112122212121111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Inside Mabel’s guts, there was nowhere to go, and almost no room to move. They could see, but then there wasn’t much to look at other than each other, and slimy stomach walls. So, they chose each other.
“Did…did she eat us?”
The girl nodded, blushing, though this couldn’t be seen in the dim light. Noah seemed lost for words, clearly not knowing what to make of it all. That, and he couldn’t help but imagine how tremendously huge Mabel’s glorious belly was. He imagined it finally spilling out of that cramped shirt. And he’d never get to see it…
Something pressed the back of his head, and his lips hit the girls’ forehead. Now they were both blushing.
“I-I guess I was lunch,” she said. “But before that, my name was Baily.”
“Dinner, formerly Noah. S-sorry we had to meet like this.”
“O-oh, actually we’ve uh, we’ve met. We have Gym together.”
“You mean with Coach Brockwell?”
“Yeah! What a nightmare, right?”

Mabel happily reclined, taking her hand off Noah’s head bulge, and listened to them chatting it up. Obviously, they were just trying to put their minds off what was happening to each other, but it was still sweet. They started getting really enthusiastic, and before long, the bumps on her belly closed in towards each other. The two had abandoned the small talk and began smooching it up instead. All according to plan…

“You’re welcome!” Mabel blew her belly a kiss before closing her eyes and making herself comfortable against the cushiony arena walls. They deserved some privacy, after all…

When Mabel opened her eyes, something was different. The sun was out, and she was flat on her back, but not on solid ground. In fact, she felt like the world was shaking and quaking under her massive weight…
“Seriously,” she yawned irritably. “I’m not that fat yet!”
Once her eyes adjusted, she saw six people in white clothes straining and struggling around her. She was laying on a stretcher, being carried towards an ambulance. There wasn’t much movement in her belly, so Noah and Baily must have been mush by now, but that clearly hadn’t made her any less heavy.
“What’s going on?” she murmured, not fully awake just yet.
“We got a call from Big Gunz Laser Tag. We found you passed out in the arena, and dangerously bloated. Don’t worry, you’ll be okay!”

In her head, she saw herself in an operating table, with doctors pulling whole skeletons up and out of her throat. “B-but I’m not sick! I’m just fat! Really, really fat!”
“The man on the phone said your stomach was moving around by itself and making unnatural noises.”
“You’ve obviously never had my Grunkle’s Six Alarm Chilli.”
It didn’t take much to convince them to let the incredibly heavy girl hop off and leave, but one of them did point out that she was dangerously overweight for her age. She laughed and said ‘You bet my big booty I’m dangerous! Rawr!” Then she playfully swiped at them like a lion before scampering off.

Scampering was a bit harder than it used to be. Never before had she felt this heavy. It was sort of like having a huge beanbag strapped to her waist while wearing a few raincoats. Her steps her slow, but long, and it took some times for her to get her balance just standing still. Normally she was a very energetic young girl, so it seemed that she had found the only real downside to her rapid weight gain.

“URRRLLLLP! I guess that’s what happens when you eat two kids at once…this is gonna take some getting used to…BRRRUUUURRAAP!”
Waddling along as though she’d never walked a day in her life, she came to a shop just as a man finished cleaning the window. Or at least he stopped cleaning and left as soon as the fattest girl he’d ever seen walked by. Finally, she could see her reflection, and quite liked what she saw.

It almost looked like she was wearing an inflated Mabel mask, the way her cheeks and chin hung out, plump and round. Her belly had gotten so large that, indeed, it no longer fit in her stretchy sweater, which rode up over her wobbling, abundant flesh. With Baily and Noah inside (or what was left of them), she couldn’t quite see her legs past it, and even turned to the side, it jutted out far ahead.
From this angle she got a decent look at her backside. It looked like she had a big cushion ready to sit on. From the other side of the window, the customers watched and giggled as this huge girl danced and shook her enormous butt.
Had she been taller, she’d have easily weighed more than Soos’, but as it was, she couldn’t quite be sure…

Grinning, she blew her reflection a kiss and wiggled her hips, wobbling her whole fat figure in the process. “Now that’s what I call a whole lotta woman! Hahaha!”
She couldn’t wait for Dipper to see her now!
14533122122121221221112122212121111.title: A whole lotta woman

choices: Dipper is wearing a little tuxedo.
145331221221212212211121222121211111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

There was no way Mabel would be waddling all the way home like this. Even if her stomach wasn’t full of mushed kids, she was getting a little too large for such long walks. So, she took the bus, and what an experience that was.

With her tummy spilling over her lap, Mabel took up a whole seat by herself, but the bus was a little too packed, and she had to share with some poor sap. She apologized, but he wasn’t any less squished against the window. They came to his stop, but Mabel couldn’t suck in her gut enough to let him leave, and he was trapped in place. She’d also sat on his hand, which was limp and numb by the time he got it back.
When she actually got to her stop, she too had some difficulty getting up, and had to raise a big fuss so they didn’t just drive off before she could leave. The other riders had to help pull her out, but it was no small feat. The man next to her pushed against her with both legs, and at least four people pulled at her arms, and once she popped free, the arm of her seat had bent and warped.
Once she was pushing down through the aisle, the others were shocked to realize just how young she was. They wondered just how gluttonous this little girl had to be to get so big…
Oh, they had no idea.

Finally free of the bus, it was a relatively short walk home, though it felt a lot longer with all that new pudge on her frame. And of course, the anticipation of seeing Dipper again was weighing her down. She tried to jog, but worked up a sweat within moments. When did this sweater get so darn hot?

Naturally, she was very disappointed to find Dipper was not around. She’d arrived sweating like her pet pig Waddles, her hair messy and frizzed up, and her face bright red; the least she could have asked for was a Welcome Home Smooch. Instead, all she found was Stan, eating some pork rinds and not at all sure what to make of her massive weight gain.

“Hey uh, think maybe you’re…sweater shrank in the wash? That’s lookin’ kinda snug on ya.” By that he meant her gut was easily bigger than she used to be and the sweater couldn’t reach after further than her chest. It was impossible to ignore.
Mabel wasn’t in the mood to think up an excuse, and thoughtlessly took the bag out of his hands and finished off the greasy little snacks. She asked where Dipper had gotten to, and he gave her the answer she was dreading: Upstairs.

Even just the last few days she’d had trouble climbing them. Dipper usually helped pull her along, but that only helped a little. After what she’d done to herself, she wondered if it would be easier to just ask Stan to install an escalator.
Wait, she thought. Stan!
“Grunkle Stan, can I ask you a teeny, tiny favor real quick?”

It was at this time that Mabel was happy to discover that her great uncle was much stronger than he appeared. Pushing his back against her like a large piece of furniture, climbing up wasn’t too much of a hassle. For her; only half way up, Stan could feel his bones rattle with each step and silently begged that he could find a cheap industrial crane before the next time she asked for a favor.
When they reached the top, Mabel thanked him, and he collapsed onto the floorboards, mumbling about a bright light and his many regrets.

“Diiiiipper, I’ve got a surprise for yoooouu,” the fat sister sang as she pushed open the door. In their room, she saw her brother lover posing in front of the mirror, shocked to see her and jumping in surprise.
145331221221212212211121222121211111.title: Must. Never. Walk. Again.

choices: "Are you crazy?! Everyone'll see us together! They'll know!"
1453312212212122122111212221212111111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Gazing up at her from the floor was Dipper, wearing a half buttoned tuxedo. At first he just seemed surprised to see her, but his mouth opened wide in surprise when he got a decent look at her. Though ‘good’ was an understatement.
“How typical,” she pretended to sigh as she shut the door behind herself. “Guys are always falling for me.”
“Can you blame them?”
“Haha, nope!”

Rather than help Dipper up, she dropped down beside him. He, along with everything else in the room, seemed to bounce as she hit the floor. She was about a whole foot away from him, and her belly was barely an inch away from touching his. Without thinking, his hand began to feel it. A soft, fat coating, with a full, hard center. Anf it was so…damn…big…
But this could only mean one thing…
“Mabel, what…who did you eat?”
There was a mix of sadness, embarrassment, and amusement in her expression. “That’s a fun story, actually. There’s tragedy, romance, laser tag!”

She told the story of what happened on her walk. Though she played up the romance and how she brought true love together, Dipper couldn’t exactly ignore that she ate two people, and one for a very, very silly reason. A pang of guilt hit him, and he pulled his hand off her tummy.
“You know you can’t just keep eating people, right?”
“Even if it makes me look like this?” She grinned and pressed her cheeks, her fingers sinking in quite deep. Dipper’s stern look did not falter, and she sighed for real. “I know, I know…”
“Eating Pacifica is what got you into this mess!”
“I wasn’t thinking straight, Dipper! She said I was fat!”
“You are fat! You like being fat!”
“I-” That was right. She did like being fat. She really did. She loved feeling herself growing larger. The feeling of filling up her belly until she had to unbutton her pants. The way her belly rested over her legs when she sat still. She loved it ever since it began, but this was the first time she’d really thought about it, or heard it said out loud.
It sounded wonderful.

Dipper had continued on talking about how worried he was for her, and how he didn’t want her getting in trouble. So sweet. With a wide, loving grin, she interrupted.
“Hey Dipper. I am so fat.”
“Y-yes? I…mean…it’s a good thing, r-right?”
“I think you like it too.”
He wasn’t sure what he was meant to say. She winked at him, and went in for the kiss, and it was their most amazing yet. As their mouths pressed together, her fat face seemed to bury his. With a slight manoeuvre, she pulled him close, and she draped her belly over him. He was caught in a trap he’d never want to escape from.
“I-I don’t think my arms can reach around anymore…”
“Good.”

After sucking face for nowhere near long enough, Mabel finally remembered a small detail and stopped long enough to ask a question.
“So, why are you wearing a tuxedo?”
It seemed that he’d completely forgot. He laughed, and hesitated, clearly wanting to say something, but very hesitant. Finally, she saw her pure, warm, expectant smile, and let it out.
“Would you like to g-go out with me? I mean, out-out…Mabel, will you go on a fancy date with me!?”

Her eyes widened. Her knees wobbled. Her teeth chattered. Her stomach rumbled.
1453312212212122122111212221212111111.title: I'm so fat

choices: Miraculously, the dress stretches and fits.
Inevitably, the dress rips and breaks apart
14533122122121221221112122212121111111.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

"Oh…Dipper…Yes…Yes! YESYESYESYESYESYESYESYESYESYESYESYESYES!!"
She seized her brother and pulled him up with her, as she started dancing with joy, making him rather nervous as he felt the floorboards rattle under her feet. At least she was happy…and very, very soft…

She twirled around the room with him before crashing onto her back, making the furniture hop again. Dipper sank into her belly before rolling off and onto the floor, almost as giddy as her. Mabel laughed and reached for him, but he was just that little bit out of reach. It gave her a moment to calm down, and let her consider a few details.
“You know…people are going to see us together, right? They’re going to know about us…”
He looked at her, seeing a massive pink ball with his sister’s head from where he lay. “I have a cover story all planned out. If anyone asks, it’s our birthday. Why wouldn’t we want to celebrate together?” He sat up and moved next to her, looking down at Mabel. “But if nobody believes that and they figure us out…is that really the worst thing that could happen?”
Sitting up, Mabel grinned at him. “People would make fun of us. Mom and Dad would flip out!”
“They can flip out all they want, is that gonna stop us kissing?”

Grabbing his jacket, she pulled him down to her face. “You’re unbelievable!”
“You’ve had a rough day.” They kissed. “And besides, if that secret gets out, people probably won’t even consider your other little secret.”
A gurgle rose through her body and she burped softly into his face. It smelled like…well, Dipper didn’t go around smelling people, but he guessed that’s what it smelled like. Mabel’s lips quivered. He was so thoughtful. So…romantic…

“So, where are we going, anyway?”
“A little place called The Club.”
“OH SHUT UP!” Mabel stood up, helped Dipper to his feet, and then shoved him over in surprise. The Club was the fanciest restaurant in Gravity Falls. The food was meant to be heavenly, and the whole place was shaped like a giant playing card club. Gideon tried to take her there once, but she wasn’t interested in going anywhere with him. “Get out of here!”
“No, really! Mabel, I…I really wanted this to be special. You…I look at you and-“
“No, really, get out! If we’re going there, I need something to wear!”

With a smile, Dipper left the room, and noticed Stan laying on the floor, snoring and mumbling a few feet away from the door. Mabel on the other hand pulled open her suitcase and rummaged through it until she found her fluffy pink dress.

Standing in front of the mirror, she held it in front of her. Her wide frame bulged around it. By this point it looked more like an overly fancy bib.
“This might be a problem…”
14533122122121221221112122212121111111.title: Fat sister kissin' goodness

choices: Mabel meets up with her friends at the mall.
Something strange is going on at the mall.
145331221221212212211121222121211111112.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

Snug fit didn’t begin to describe it.
Once the dress was over her head, it didn’t want to go much further. She got one arm through a hole, but felt a rip when she tried for a second. Instead she tried pulling it down over her body, which wasn’t much easier. Everything was so much bigger now; she might have fit this morning before her walk. Managing to get it over her surprisingly thick chest, she pulled it further over her belly and heard another rip.
“Come on little dress, you can do it! I believe in you!”
Sucking her great girth in, she inched the dress lower and lower around herself until finally it burst apart around her.
“Oh, way to go! Last time I put my faith in you!”

Standing amongst the shreds of fabric and feathers that had been her beautiful dress, Mabel put on her old clothes and pondered what to do. There was no way she was going somewhere as swanky as The Club with Dipper without dressing the part. A thought struck her, and she poked her head out the door to find Dipper heading down stairs.
“Silly question. You haven’t made the reservations yet, have you?”
He smiled a little too hard for delivering good news. “I got a little anxious…Six o’clock tonight isn’t going to be a problem, is it?”
Mabel thought, stroking her chubby chin. “I’ll make it work.”

That wasn’t long enough to make a new dress herself, but it might be enough to buy one. There was only one thing for it. Downstairs, Mabel got her hands on the phone and began dialing a familiar number. Then she felt a rumble, grabbed a banana, and then went back to dialling.

“Candy! Are you busy? Get Grenda and meet me outside the mall! We’ve got a dressmergency!” She paused to let Candy reply. “Dress-emergency, Candy. It isn’t that hard.”
145331221221212212211121222121211111112.title: The dress never stood a chance

choices: She decides not to tell them.
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

It had been a few days since Candy and Grenda had last seen Mabel. That had been after she ate Antonio and Pacifica, so her growing waistline wasn’t new to them. However, the girl they met in front of the mall looked more to them like a large balloon dressed up to look like her. They almost didn’t recognise her at first.
“Hehe, and now you see why I need a new dress.”

“Gee, Mabel,” began Grenda, who herself was quite large and understandably shocked that her shorter friend had suddenly outgrown her. “You’re looking totally-“
“Great!” interrupted short, bespectacled Candy, nudging her. “So radiant and uh, rubenesque! Very beautiful!”
“Oh, you guys!” she blushed, trying to be modest. “You don’t need to sugar coat it. I, your dear friend, have, by choice, become pleasantly plump! I have become ravishingly rotund! Voluntarily voluptuous! Chubby by choice! Beautifully Bellytastic! Wilfully wobbly! In a word, I got fat on purpose.”
“But…why would you do that?”
“Yeah! Don’t you know how hard some of us try to do the opposite? HOW MANY HOURS I’VE SPENT ON THE TREADMILL!?”
“Oh, what a story it is. But we don’t have a lot of time, so let’s shop it up in here!”

The trio hit their first stop, a store called ‘Edgy On Purpose’, and Mabel began the story of her gain. Of course, she left out and changed a lot of details. As it went, she only met with one boy, who was much more appreciative of her stress eating, and things escalated from there, both romantically, and hungrily.
Naturally, there was no mention of anyone getting eaten in this version.

Mabel sifted through a rack of shirts, slowly realizing this was not the place they needed to be.
“So,” asked Candy in a curious voice, “This boy likes…watching you eat?”
“Oh, does he ever! And then, sometimes I let him listen to my belly when I'm done! He purrs like a kitten!”
“Your boyfriend sounds like a total weirdo.”
“He sounds awesome!” added Grenda, swallowing a whole apple.
Mabel thought, then shrugged. Technically, she couldn’t argue with either statement. “I’d be eating whether he liked it or not. He lit the fire, but it’s never going out!”
“You sound like a weirdo, too. But I am still happy for you.”

The next shop was more promising. ‘Petite and Sweet’ had dresses lining the window, and Grenda explained that she’d gotten one from here that nicely fit her heftier frame from there late last year. Mabel’s eyes glimmered as she searched for the sparkliest dress on offer.
Grenda poked her friend’s side curiously. “What have you been eating?”
“Huh?” Mabel suddenly felt very nervous. “You know, pizza, burgers, sweets and…other stuff. Just, you know, a lot of them.” That didn’t seem to convince her. And why would it, really? “Why do you wanna know?
Grenda didn’t seem to have a real answer, instead suddenly wanting to change the subject. Mabel grinned. She told her that she and her mysterious boyfriend were well and truly in love, and it would take more than a few hundred pounds to steal him away. Grenda shrugged, deciding it was worth a try.

The shop had a lot on offer, but nothing fit over her belly. It was a kids store, so they realized what they needed was an adult size. But that would have to wait, while they were on the clock, Mabel couldn’t help but suggest a quick snack break. A snack break that involved three cheeseburger meals. Her friends had actually thought she was ordering for all three of them.

“Maybe this is why you can’t fit into any dresses,” Candy suggested, watching Mabel scoff down her first greasy burger. “What would Handsome Weirdo Boyfriend say?”
“Not a whole lot, I think he’d be too busy enjoying the view. Or you know, hand feeding me.”
“Okay, you gotta tell us who this guy is!” blurted Grenda, slamming her meaty fist against the table.
“Yes, who is your Belly Loving Mystery Boyfriend?”
Mabel laughed nervously, “Kinda ruins the mystery, doesn’t it? And you know my family, we’re all about the mystery!”
“Aw come on, tell us! Does he at least have a cute brother?”

Grenda and Candy had become two of her best friends. She trusted them enough to open with ‘Hey, I like getting fat and I’m going to get fatter!’ Chances were that her upcoming date would at least start a few rumours, so why shouldn’t she tell them about her and Dipper?
She swallowed a big bite of cheeseburger and cleared her throat. “Well…”
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.title: Massive Mabel at the mall.

choices: They manage to find a dress that fits her frame.
Shouldn't have eaten those burgers. Nothing fits!
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“…okay, I’ll tell you, but it’s a big secret, okay? An actual, real, swear-on-your-life secret! You can’t tell anyone!”
Carefully, both nodded, and she beckoned them in closer. They moved an inch, and she called them in even closer, right up to her face.
“It’s Dipper.”
“Could you repeat that? It sounded like you said it was Dipper.”
“I did! I’m dating my brother!”

Candy slapped one hand over her own mouth, and her other over Grenda’s as they both gasped in genuine shock. She made a motion, as if to ask ‘Really?’ and Mabel sheepishly nodded back ‘Really.’ Their reaction didn’t really surprise her. Both of them spent a moment glancing at each other, then her, trying to say something, and then sputtering out nothing. Mabel finished off her fries as she waited for them to say something.

Finally, Grenda managed to form a sentence. “You’re macking with your…brother?” she whispered the last word. “He’s the one who likes watching you eat?!”
“I am learning so many interesting things today.”
“If it sounds weird to you, imagine how I feel. I’m the one doing it!” she couldn’t help but laugh. Mabel knew exactly what she’d been doing, but hearing about it from someone other than Dipper was a new experience. Neither of them seemed all too excited anymore.
“Mabel, that’s really gross…tell me everything.”
“CANDY!” both Mabel and Grenda both shouted in surprise.
She shrugged, “I can’t blame you. I’d kiss my brother too if he looked like Dipper.”
Mabel smiled, slurping up a mouthful of fries. Grenda still didn’t seem so sure, but it was a start.

“Alright, so I’ve told you my dark little secret.” One of them, anyway. “You two can promise me you won’t tell anyone, not ever, no matter what or ever?”
Grenda hesitated, then smiled. “Heck yeah, I’m not going to ruin this for you!”
“If anyone asks me who your boyfriend is, I will kill them!” Candy chirped, punching her open palm.
“I knew I could count on you guys!” Squeezing her huge gut out from under the table, she threw her arms around both of them, squishing them deep into her wide belly. Candy almost disappeared until she let them go. “Now, how about we find me a fitting dress, and I tell you all about my first, big, fat, wet smooch with ‘Flipper.’"
“Spare no details!”
“Uh, I’m good thanks.”
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.title: Mabel's less dark secret

choices: The trio prepare for the date.
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

The next and last shop they went to was called ‘Delightfully Debonair Distractions.’ The selection wasn’t nearly as glittery or bright as Mabel would have wanted, but at this point she didn’t have a lot of choice. She picked out an enormous red dress as she told Candy an edited version of her and Dipper’s date on the lake.
“And then he asked me to burp in his mouth!” recounted Mabel, as though it was the most romantic thing in the world. “Can you believe that?”
“Flipper has serious issues,” said Candy. “Tell me more.”
Grenda groaned, unable to see the appeal. “Hey uh, how about you try that one on? Looks your size! N-not that it’s too big or anything, I mean-”
“Relax, I like being this way, remember?” Grenda was still wrapping her head around it, honestly.

Mabel took the red dress into the changing room. Moments later, she gasped and emerged wearing it. Much to their amazement, it fit just fine. Her belly bulged out as a giant red blimp, but it was completely contained within the dress, and the fabric didn’t look ready to burst open.
“How do I look, girls?” She posed with her arms out, and her friends cheered.
“Awesome! Totally uh, fat! With an F, not a P-H.”
“Like a majestic orca whale!”
Music to her ears. After all, chances were it was the only fitting dress they had.

It was quite expensive, and while she only needed it for tonight and renting would be cheaper she’d fallen in love with the silky smooth feeling, and decided that Grunkle Stan would graciously foot the bill for his beloved great niece. It was so comfortable, she struggled to change into her old clothes, simply not wanting to take it off. But inevitably she left the store in her regular outfit, with her chunky stomach hanging out.

“Thanks again, guys! You really saved my bacon today! Haha!”
There was a pause.
“Oh, bacon!”
“I get it!”
“Because you’re fat like a pig!”
“Yes, that was the joke.”

They sat at the bus stop, all waiting to return home. It was clear that this date was important to Mabel, and so her friends had promised to help her get ready. Makeup, hair, perfume, at Mabel’s new size, it would be all be a team effort. Though as they sat, Mabel could see an obvious discomfort in Grenda, alongside Candy’s rather avid fascination.
“Guys, I know I’ve dropped a few bombshells today, but I don’t want you to worry. I’m still Mabel, you know? It’s not like I don’t know how weird this is.” Before saying a word, Grenda hugged her.
“Hey, don’t worry about me. It’s your body, your choice.”
“And your brother your choice!”
“Uh, sort of,” Mabel laughed.
“Life’s too short to worry about stupid junk, you know?”
“Yeah, did you hear about Pacifica? They’re saying she just vanished!”
The huge girl suddenly went quiet as the two began yammering about the news reports and how frightening it was that someone so in the public eye could just disappear, and how they feared it could happen to anyone. Thankfully, the bus pulled up just minutes later and she had a reason to change the subject.
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.title: The dress actually fits

choices: hey arrive at The Club for their date.
The cart is not road safe and breaks down halfway.
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

When they arrived at the Mystery Shack, climbing the stairs was thankfully not as big of a hassle with two sets of hands pushing her along. Grenda and Candy were still huffing and puffing by the end, but they were doing better than Stan, who was still passed out by the door. Dipper was again nowhere in sight, but this time that was in her favor.

Pulling up a stool, a mirror, and a makeup kit, Mabel sat down and let her friends get to work.
“I’m your canvas. Let us make art,” she said before burping loudly.
Candy got to work pulling her hair back and taking to it with a brush, carefully pulling apart the knots and tangles she’d worked up over her busy day. Needing to tend to her friend’s face, Grenda had the harder task; Mabel had a lot more face to work with than she used to.
Her cheeks were so puffy and round, and her neck was so well covered up, she wasn’t sure where to stop applying foundation. When she worked the blush brush, it sank deep into Mabel’s cheeks, making her giggle and laugh, and forcing them to quickly start over.
Eyeshadow and mascara were simple enough (they went with a light blue), but something about doing the lipstick made Grenda nervous. She couldn’t explain it, but Mabel’s mouth…worried her. It reminded her of passing by a dark alleyway, not knowing what was waiting for you if you decided to pass through it.
She asked if they could swap, and Candy finished with the lip gloss.

Outside the door, Dipper reached the top of stairs and stared at the bedroom door. He was nervous. Why was he so nervous? He and Mabel had been smooching the forbidden smooch for a week now, why was this any different? Just because they’d be in public. Just because this would be their first romantic dinner together. Just because he was really actually in love with his own sister…
Straightening his bow tie and taking a deep breath, he reached out and knocked.
“M-Mabel! You in there? If we want to get going we should-“
The door opened, and Candy smiled back at him, in a very ‘caught you doing something sneaky’ way. Before he could ask what she was doing here, she stepped away, revealing Mabel. He had a hard time saying anything after that.

Her hair tumbled over her shoulders, framing her wide face. She batted her eyelashes at him, and his whole body tingled. Her bright red lips were held between her large cheeks, curved into a smile that was all for him. Looking at them made him pucker up without meaning to. And then there was that dress. It may have fit her, but it hugged her massive figure just enough to show it off. The imprint of her bellybutton was just visible on the broad red curve that was her belly.

Delicately, her trembling lips opened, “OH MY GOSH! You look so cute in your little penguin suit!” She skipped over to him until there was but an inch between their bellies, cupping her plump face in excitement.
“Well you look…kind of…I mean, pretty nice in a…flattering...sort of way that…”
“A bit tongue tied are we?”
“If we weren’t already knee deep in forbidden love I’d fall in love with you right now and forget that you were ever my sister.”
“Oh stop!”
“Cleopatra, Lady Godiva, Marilyn Monroe, and Jessica Rabbit were all failed attempts by the universe to create you.”
“I could've told you that!” Mabel held out her hand and they linked arms. She looked back at her friends and gave a silent Thank You as she and Dipper descended the stairs, grandiose compliments still pouring out of his mouth.

"I get it, I'm beautiful! Yeesh!" she laughed as Dipper brought her to the golf cart and they began struggling to squeeze her in. "I hope you can butter my bread as well as you better me up!"
"Oh, I hope you're feeling more ambitious than just bread," he winked, putting the keys in the ignition and starting the cart.
"Is this thing road safe?"
"Well I'm not legally allowed to drive anything else," he shrugged
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.title: Fat belly in red dress

choices: ...the food began arriving at long last!
...Pacifica's parents sat down one table over
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

The golf cart stood out amongst the vintage cars and limousines lining the parking lot. Unsurprisingly. Neither Dipper nor Mabel gave it any though, far more focussed on pushing her out of the tiny, cramped vehicle so they could go inside. For a moment, Dipper’s hand was squished between his sister’s belly and the dashboard, and they were locked chin to double chin. A kiss was tempting, but with more customers entering and the doorman on duty, they were not exactly in private.

All the way to the table, people stared. Not one of them recognised the two, but a girl both Mabel’s size and age was hard to ignore. She strutted confidently with her gut wobbling ahead of her, deciding that if they wanted to look, she might as well enjoy it.

Red curtains covered the whole room, making her giggle with excitement. On the one hand it was very classy, and on the other, her dress blended in with the walls. It made her imagine she had to wear a curtain or a bedsheet, or even a circus tent because nothing else would fit. Without thinking, she grabbed Dipper and hugged him deep into her pillowy body. They hadn’t even sat down yet and she already wanted to sneak off for a smooch.
And speaking of sitting down, they were delighted to see the chairs. They had expected wiry wooden seats that would snap under her weight, but instead found cushiony armchairs. Mabel was still squished between the arms, but she didn’t plan on getting up for a while anyway.

“This place is so cool, Dipper! Did you hear the guy at the door call me ‘ma’am?’ And these chairs! Oh Em Gee, my butt feels like a celebrity!”
“That’s…an image I didn’t know I wanted until now,” he smiled back as the waiter handed them their menus. Mabel looked it over, then took out a marker and circled just about every dish. She and Dipper tried not to giggle like idiots.

The wait would have been unbearable had they been with anyone else, but together the promise of food seemed to be icing on the cake of each-others company. It didn’t hurt that when it arrived, Dipper really was as good at buttering her bread. That was to say, completely smothering it in butter and hand feeding it to her.
As the bowl of bread disappeared, they talked on for quite some time. Dipper told her about the dragonfly incident, and Mabel offered to help him try and catch it again next time he tried. How well she could at her size, he didn’t know, but he was happy to have her along.

For a moment it was almost a normal, romantic dinner. They stood out as the least restrained, loudest, and youngest couple there, but for the most part they just talked and laughed and enjoyed one another’s company like a normal couple.
That finally changed when…
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.title: The fanciest fatso

choices: That's not going to work this time.
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

…two familiar faces sat down one table next to them.
The Northwests.

“Preston, I am exhausted. After that last interview I think I started sweating!”
“Great goodness, are you sure?”
“I think so. It’s been so long, I’ve forgotten how it feels.”
“You’re right. This has been more time consuming than I’d ever imagined. The things we’ll do to get back our…our…uhm…”
“Hmmm…”
A waiter stepped forward and handed them their menus. “Mr. and Mrs. Northwest, I’m so sorry to hear about your daughter.”
“Daughter! That’s the word!”

Dipper saw Mabel sink into her squishy seat as her eyes locked fearfully on the couple. He suspected that their flippant attitudes weren’t providing her much comfort.
“Oh look Mabel! The food is here!” Dipper announced as his small bowl of chicken goulash was brought over. He motioned desperately to the waiter, and they instead placed it in front of Mabel. She didn’t even look at what it was before she started eating it, piling as much into her mouth as she could in a single breath before swallowing. He hadn’t seen her so nervous in years.

“You know, what I don’t understand is: where are the demands? Rich children never go missing without so much as a ransom note!”
“Maybe they’re just trying to annoy us. Pretty cold hearted if you ask me, our time is far too valuable!”
I’m not cold hearted! thought Mabel.
“You don’t suppose something’s just…happened to her? That…thing is still crawling around our house. What if she never got out the door…”
“Our daughter? Eaten? We’d be a laughing stock! Could you imagine a more horrible, gruesome fate?”
It’s not that bad in there, really! Mabel silently urged.
“Being poor,” replied Pacifica’s mother, and both of them broke out in laughter.

Mabel took a deep breath and almost choked on her steak. She looked down and saw stacks and stacks of plates and bowls. How long had she been listening to them? Unable to see her beloved brother, she grabbed her belly in fear, but sighed in relief as he peaked past a particularly tall stack of dishes.
There was a thick, messy stain down the front of her beautiful dress, and there were crumbs and bits of pasta in her hair. To her surprise, not even the full feeling in her stomach made her feel better. She hadn’t even got to enjoy eating it all.

Mr. Northwest glanced over at her. “Now see, if we’d fed her like that, we wouldn’t have been able to lose her!”
“Even if we wanted to,” his wife replied with a small chuckle.

Mabel rummaged through the plates for something to eat, but it was all inside of her now. This had been her whole order. Anyone else would have exploded trying to eat this much, but now she needed more! She felt sick and starving both at once! She couldn’t take much more of this!”

Dipper appeared from the obstructing stack and took her hand.
“Come on, we’re getting you out of here.”
“B-but our date!” Mabel protested.
“We’ll finish it somewhere else. Anywhere else.”
She glanced around the classy restaurant and bit her lip sadly. This had started so well. “Thank you, Dipper.”

Feeling even heavier than normal, Dipper slung her arm over his shoulder and escorted her to the door. They tasted a scent of fresh air when a waiter stopped them.
“I sincerely hope you’re not going to try and leave without paying?”
“P-p-paying?” They both stammered, looking back at their dish covered table.
Dipper couldn’t believe he’d forgotten about the bill. He’d been so determined to give Mabel a fancy, expensive date, he’d forgotten just exactly what the word ‘expensive’ had actually meant.
“Just bill it to our Great Uncle Stanford Pines!” Mabel burped, trying hard to force out her usual, chipper attitude.
1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.title: That moment when you ate their daughter

1453312212212122122111212221212111111121.content:
addition by: Sandwich Boy (10)

“Stan Pines? Oh that…gentleman who runs that uh, Murder Hut attraction?”
“That’s the one!” Mabel grinned hopefully.
He began to laugh. Really laugh. He almost fell to his knees, he was laughing so hard. His point was very well across, but he just kept on laughing at them.
“Okay, we get it!” said Dipper. “Look, we can’t pay for our meal right now, can we work something else out?”
“Boy, you do realize she ate six thousand dollars-worth of food?”
“BRUURRHP!” Mabel gasped and held her enormous belly. It was heavier than when they arrived, but she had barely noticed until now. “Are you kidding!? All that and I’m…” The room went quiet “…I’m still hungry.”

Laughter echoed throughout the room. The Northwests pointed and cackled, and suddenly Mabel didn’t want everyone looking at her massive belly, and her ruined dress, and her mortified brother. Her legs went weak, and Dipper gasped as he caught her massive weight. He needed to get her out of here, but the waiter wouldn’t budge.
“What kind of waiter would I be if I just let you two leave after that horror show?”
“My best friend the waiter?”

That didn’t impress him much at all. Leaning down, he looked Dipper right in the eye and held up a copy of their bill. “Are you asking me to let you two walk away with six thousand dollars?”
“N-no, I’m just saying-“ the waiter put his hand on Dipper’s shoulder, forcing him to let go of Mabel.
“I’d hope not. Because if you were, that would be breaking the law. And it would be just terrible going to prison on your birthday, wouldn’t it?” The siblings gasped. “Oh yes. Normally we don’t take things quite so seriously but well,” he pointed again at their bill.

Dipper gulped. “I-I’, sorry, but I-I can’t pay it…”
“That’s a shame. I hate to do this, but-ACK!” Mabel’s belly bashed into him and he fell onto his back.
“Leave! Him! Alone!” She stepped forth and her hefty frame pushed him away.
The waiter tried to stand up, but was just shoved against the wall. He tried to push her away, but it was being squashed by a big, padded boulder.
“You don’t talk to him like that! My brother is the sweetest and best guy in the world! You’re not going to punish him because I got greedy!”

The waiter gagged as she slammed him against the wall, burying him under her fat. She was standing up for him, but Dipper rarely saw her angry. And boy did she look angry! It would have been sweet if they weren’t in so much trouble…
“You should show my boy-b-brother a little more respect you giant jerk!”
And then he saw the drool running down her lip.
“Oh no…Mabel, don’t do it!”

A class full of 7 year old children is taking a field trip through a high-tech farm. Two of the kids get separated from the group and stumbles upon a chemistry lab. One of them ends up drinking a fertility-enhancing serum (which causes the drinker to get hugely pregnant and also forms a womb if the drinker is male) as well as an appetite-enhancing serum. Who drinks the two serums?

Is it Penny - the outgoing, playful girl with green eyes, long blond hair done up in a ponytail, and a bit of a mischievous streak?

Or is it Sam - the kind and careful boy with blue eyes and short brown hair?
Choices:
Penny
Sam
Someone Else

1511.content:
By: phrooglefa

It was a beautiful afternoon at the old McDonald farm. The sun was shining brightly and there wasn't a hint of a cloud in the sky. It seemed like it would be a nice peaceful day on the farm. However nothing could be further from the truth.

The local school's 2nd grade class was here on a field trip in the most literal sense. However, the hyper active, playful, kids seemed to be a bit too much for the old farmer to handle. Many had wandered off to exploring the farm on their own while their teacher hurriedly tried to get control of the group.

Two of these kids had just run into a strange looking building. From the outside, it looked like a barn, but within it looked more like a laboratory than something one would find on simple farm. You see old farmer McDonald actually started off as a chemist and moved into farming as a retirement. However, the old man still kept inventing and one of those inventions was about to be discovered a young, mischievous, little girl.

"Common Penny we shouldn't be in here." Her friend Sam said.

"But it looks so cool." The, blond haired, 7 year old replied as she looked around.

"If you don't leave I'm telling!" Sam replied back, knowing it took a lot to get his friend to listen to him.

"Fine, I'll go...but first..." She said to herself as she noticed a glass of water sitting on one of the tables.

Poor Penny had gotten thirsty from the dusty field and wanted a drink. She looked around for a second and downed the glass without thinking. She puckered her face at the strange taste though before she headed back to her friend, not giving it a second thought.
1511.title: Penny

choices: Old farme McDonaldand his farm hands have prepared a barnyard feast
15111.content:
By: hooklaw64

A few moments after drinking the strange-tasting liquid, Penny noticed that she felt oddly bloated. She lifted up her shirt and saw that there was a slight bulge in her stomach, just below her belly button. She poked the bulge and noticed that it felt more firm than flabby, but before she could investigate further, she clutched her stomach as she felt an intense hunger pang come over her. Penny felt perplexed since she had never felt this hungry before, but those thought were quickly drowned out by her growing urge to stuff her loudly grumbling tummy full of food.

"Hey Penny, what are you doing?" Sam asked.

"Uh, nothing. Let's go." Penny replied as she tried to regain her composure. As she followed Sam out of the barn however, she couldn't help but feel that she might starve if she doesn't eat something soon. When they got out, Penny saw that...

1511121.content:
By: phrooglefa

The little girl grabbed her stomach again as both kids came out of the barn. Of course, Sam gave her a worried look as he came over to her. He could tell something was going on with his friend.

"Are you alright Penny? What's wrong?" He asked with concern.

Penny looked up at the boy with a very sad face. She was not enjoying her current state in the slightest. She quickly replied

"Oh....I'm so Hungry!" She almost shouted at her friend before she rubbed over her, slightly bigger, belly.

"Don't worry. I think it's almost lunch time Penny." Sam said reassuringly to the cute little blond girl.

He was soon proven correct too as he helped her around the side of the barn and back to the rest of the class. Well he was proven partially correct anyway. Both kids could see everyone taking out their lunch bags. However, it wasn't lunch time just yet. It was just a mid-morning snack for the children. Their lunch would come later on when farmer McDonald would prepare a nice big feast for them.

Being so hungry, the very sight of so much food sent Penny's belly into rumbling and the young girl began licking her lips. She instantly broke away from Sam to get her own bag out. Unfortunately, she found only a single fruit roll up inside it, thanks to her mother having been told about lunch being provided for her. She wolfed down treat in seconds flat but it didn't do much to curb the young child's hunger.
1511121.title: All the other kids have their lunch boxes out

Penny was licking the chocolate off her fingers moaning in delight as Sam stealthily approached her trying to not draw attention to them. “Penny what’s happening to you.” Sam said in a hushed gasp as he stared at his friend in disbelief. “I couldn’t help It; I was just so hungry.” Penny replied defensively, blushing with embarrassment.

“Not that, THAT!” Sam said pointing at Penny’s tummy. Penny didn’t know what he was talking about but noticed a strange feeling, a worrying tightness she hadn’t noticed. Penny looked down following Sam’s finger and found her shirt billowing out like balloon.

“What’s going on my clothes feel like their shrinking!?” she groaned as she reached for the hem of her shirt. “I don’t think your clothes are shrinking.” Sam said worryingly. Penny lifted up her shirt again, and out bulged a pot belly that looked like Penny had swallowed a small melon whole.

“You blew up like a balloon.” Sam said in awe at Penny’s bizarre transformation. “No I didn’t, I just ate too much.” Penny retorted as she slinked away from the prying eyes of her classmates, Sam following close behind.

When they were alone, both Sam and Penny inquisitively explored her belly, poking and prodding it in childish curiosity. “You got so fat.” Sam gasped as he grabbed Penny’s gut. “I’m not fat, I’m just full, you dink.” Penny said trying to cover her gut up again. “I don’t know Penny, even with all that food you ate, you still look really big.

“I’m not that big, just a little puffy.” Penny countered but she stopped as she felt something.

In the kitchen, the smell grew overpowering, caused the little boy's thin stomach to growl audibly. Eggs, bacon, pancakes, waffles, oatmeal, orange juice, milk - it was the whole shabang! One of which is a ray device that can only work on food. This caused to make the food extra larger and fat, but it has never been tested to humans when it consumes. Emily was an average girl, however with one strange desire, unexplainable by her friends or family; She wanted to be big.
Not like big as in popularity, or fame, or even fortune. She meant in weight, obese and very fat. She already was well over 200 pounds at the age of 10, however she stayed mobile and active, at least until she could be fat enough to stay indoors and gain all day.

Her dreams would come true, when one day, her uncle, an expert in the fields of Science, asked if Emily wanted to be a lab rat, or lab 'fat', in some experiments he needed testing.
When asked, he simply replied, "Trust me when I say, it will allow all your dreams to come true!"

Emily was instantly hooked, and followed her uncle to the laboratory. Once inside, her Uncle pulled out a rickety chair, that Emily sat on. Her weight caused the chair to strain a bit, but it would hold.
"Now, as for the first experiment. I shall simply inject you with a harmless shot, now you will not feel anything straightaway... Well, maybe a prick, but after that your stomach will be in some pain, but don't worry! That's just the serum working it's scientific magic! Now, think of something cute and fluffy... It will be over soon."

Once it was over, Emily felt...
15531222.title: Emily an obese girl

choices: She's still hungry and wants more
While she's eating, she begins to grow taller
155312221.content:
By: phrooglefa

Emily didn't feel all that different right away...well outside of the sting from the needle, but she could get over that. She looked over at her uncle and was just about to say something to let him know his experiment didn't work.

It was then it began. It started off as a large rumble in her obese belly. However, that was quickly followed up by a bigger, longer, more deep sounding rumble that visibly shook her flabby middle. The tubby 10 year old hunched over, pushing her tummy out a bit more as she did so, and clutched her middle in pain.

Her uncle, Ken, had been enjoying this so far. He had always been a fan of her weight gain and liked seeing her push her tummy, even if it was because of her hunger. However, he loved his "little" niece and didn't want to see her hurt, as was shown by the look of concern on his face.

Emily was almost crying at this point and looked back up at her uncle Ken,

"I'm SOOOO hungry! I need something to eat NOW!" She almost shouted at the man.

Ken nodded and rushed off to the fridge upstairs and quickly returned with a large ham he and his wife had cooked up for dinner. He had grabbed a huge bowl of left over potatoes as well. He made sure to have a lot of food, knowing how hungry his fat niece was.

"Here, why don't you start on this." He said handing her both items.

Emily didn't say a word but just shoved her face into the ham and began to eat like a wild beast. Despite how tubby she was and how much she loved her food, she never ate with this much passion. It was the serum beginning to work.
155312221.title: Hungry and wanted food NOW!

1553122212.content:

"Hmm... Looks like it's working so far." Ken responded which he was proudly to say the serum made her niece hungry endlessly. The more food she ate, the more she can gain as much weight as possible in good measure.

It started off in a good way when it was processes. The chair she sat on, took no much with an impact underneath her size and with her gaining much more weight already, the chair gives way and soon collapsed, sending Emily falling onto the floor. She didn't feel hurt or any reaction from an impact, but she was still satisfied by eating as much as the serum does to her.

It all looked fine just as Ken was hoping for, but it didn't last long. It took a couple of moments before when somehow for no reason or any idea, that Emily was growing fatter, but also getting taller, minute-by-minute as she grew and it now compares a table like a tiny stool. That's when Ken realized that it was the biggest mistake of his life so far.

As far as he already knew, the serum would not stop, unless she would receive a different serum to try and stop making her hungry and even getting bigger when she had reached the ceiling of a Lab, more like 20 feet as it seems. That was all the food there is just as Emily ate it all, but an overgrown, obese 10 year old, isn't satisfied from this and wants it more.

"I want more, and I need it now!" Emily demanded in her sitting position while her head was touched the ceiling with her voice now called in echoes.

That's when Ken had the biggest issues to deal with and if he wanted to make a serum right now, her hunger could go run amok in chaos. However their could be some options which it should be for the best, but at what cost for her niece's sake? What is Ken gonna say from his response?

"Okay, fine! I'll stay like this then." Emily sighed in reply but was only until she had raised her smile knowing that she is still huge at 20 feet and obese and already she would settle this size for a while. "Maybe, I can I'll be liking this and show everybody hoe huge I am."

Soon, Ken's face turned to worry and soon he saw Emily begins to stand up and got her upper body through the ceiling to have a clear view outside. she then climbed out despite Ken's plea, but she didn't listen and takes off with a thumping noise which is minimal for the size just yet.

Emily was clearly enjoying life being a mini obese giantess in a meantime and soon wanted to experience what it's like to be huge when she head to where?

Emily smirked as she looked over her tubby giantess body. The "little" 10 year old was clearly enjoying being so large. Not just height wise either. She was so happy her uncle's invention worked, even with the side effects. She was loving how much more obese she looked now.

Her uncle was far less thrilled. Not only had his invention caused her to grow to such a large stature, but Emily didn't seem to want to get any smaller. Heck, his chunky 5th grade niece had just ruined his house and was trying to escape!

Emily was already waddling her way down the street. Her footfalls were loud, booming and shook the ground as went by. Worse yet, she was stomping on cars as she went, not caring what got in her way.

The obese little big girl was far too distracted by the growing hunger in her round tummy to care what she was crushing. She had to get a nice big snack and knew her mom and dad always had lots of food around the house.

Her big tummy rumbled as she approached her house and...
155312221221.title: Home

1553122212211.content:
addition by: pedro01 (37)

Emily had made it back to her house and within her mind she would always go hungry when her parents were expected to make a dinner for a 10 year old. However, being with her size she had grown from earlier, she would be able to surprise the couple, and her older brother to which he would always been bossy to her in most time.

Once she had reached her house, and soon realized she had grew again up to 30 feet, she kneel herself down and placed her hands to tear the roof before exposing it to have a look inside to see the family's reaction to their faces.

"Wha... Emily? Is that you?" Emily's mother was simply frightened to see what was going on and even when both her parents were in the kitchen and her brother was laying in his bed playing video games when this has happened.

"Yes Mommy, and now I'm hungry! Let me feed this to fill it up." Emily replied with her cute smile and now, she was starving!

All she had to do with her family pleaded her not to, was reaching out her hand and grabbed as many things as possible. No matter what kind she had held. she got it out and drops every single of it into her mouth and swallow, leaving these three people in fear seeing an obese giantess girl munching it in.

The more she eats, the more valuable stuff had soon been consumed and it didn't take long until she had finish off her 'meal' to put it this way. It seemed to be that way and even when her feast she ate, she eventually grew taller and even fatter again leaving her at 50 feet tall, but she didn't realized that and now it was down to the three to mess with,

"Mmm.... I wonder who should I play with these toys for a while?" Emily wondered and she loved toys, even for her age she could treat either her family members as one to play with and it's never a good thing to be hand held by a giant like her.

Soon, she had reached her hand, but who was she grabbing onto?
1553122212211.title: Begin her feast

info.brief_description: Kids and cubs grow bigger in any way
info.description:
First I want to say I'm not the original creator of this story. The original story was sadly deleted, so I'm resurrecting it. I got pernission from the origibal writer of the story so here it goes...

This is a story about kids, cubs (anthropomorphic furry children), or halfs (half human, half furry) getting rounder. Be it through weight gain/stuffing, inflation, pregnancy (see the rules in the first chapter about this), or by eating people/furs (vore) (see the rules in the first chapter about this too). Each of these “genres” of expanding will be separated so you can only see the type you want, except in the “Combo” choice where you can mix which ones you want ^_-


Rules:
-No sexual stuff or descriptive nudity (these are kids after all)

-Puppy love (ex, crushes with at most kissing/hugging) or strong friendships are fine but please no same gender puppy love relationships. Same gender friendships/family relationships are fine

-The CHILDREN should be the main focus of the expansion. Teens/Adults can get rounder along side them but AT LEAST HALF OF THE POST should be about the kids!


-Please no magic, demons, curses, or unrealistic gains (ex. No gaining 50 pounds from eating one burger and fries)

-When you add a new character (as the main character at the beginning of a story) always have the second choice be “Someone Else” so other people can add in their characters too ^_-

-GTS is allowed in all “genres”, however the child MUST also continue to either get/have a round belly or get/be fatter. Also, please post a “Something else” before the chapter with GTS so those who don’t like GTS don’t have to view it

-I will allow digestion (for vore) and scat (farting, pooping, etc) in all “genres” but put a “Something else” option before adding the chapter with scat so those who don’t like it don’t have to read it


The kids/cubs/halfs can be anywhere from just born up too and including 12 years old. They can be boys or girls, original fictional characters or fictional characters from cartoons/games/comics/etc. As long as they grow bigger its welcome here, and above all have fun ^_^
